Title: La vie est belle absolu woman eau de parfum
Description:
the quintessence of la vie est belle's iconic fragrance.

a new exceptional olfactory signature, combining the flower of happiness, the iris, with a delectable accord of goumand ingredients.

olfactory notes: the most precious interpretation of lancôme’s iconic goumand iris fragrance. a heart composed of the noblest natural ingredients (concrete of iris pallida, jasmin sambac absolute, orange blossom absolute, patchouli essence), enhanced by a smile of exquisite delicacies.

how to apply la vie est belle l'absolu de parfum
spray la vie est belle l'absolu de parfum onto your skin, focusing on the pulse points of your body: the inside of your wrists, under your earlobes and behind your knees.

fragrance notes

transversal notes: iris, fine delicacies accord
top notes: pear, blackberry
heart notes: pallida iris concrete, orange blossom and jasmine sambac absolutes
base notes: heart of patchouli essence

bottle

the resplendent bottle, entitled "le sourire de cristal" (the "crystal smile") evokes the rounded imprint of a smile at the heart of the crystal square.
the finishing touch of refinement: a pearlescent grey organza ribbon is tied around its neck, forming the twin wings of freedom.

what make the difference

the unique olfactory signature perfume scent of the first tasty iris by lancôme

ingredients

alcohol • parfum / fragrance • aqua / water • linalool • benzyl salicylate • limonene • methyl anthranilate • tris (tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) citrate • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • ci 147 / red 4 • ci 172 / red 33 • ci 475 / yellow 1 • geraniol • alpha-isomethyl ionone • coumarin • farnesol • citral • citronellol • benzyl alcohol • benzyl benzoate. 
* this ingredient list is subject to change, customers should refer to the product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list.

Title: La vie est belle l'eau de toilette woman
Description:
life is beautiful. live it your way.

a new universal declaration of happiness, composed of some of the noblest naturally-derived ingredients. as one of the 1st flowers to bloom in spring, magnolia is the symbol of new beginnings. 

the new eau de toilette is illuminated with magnolia essence which adds a fresh luminosity and is a majestic interpretation of the iconic la vie est belle signature.

olfactory notes
eau de toilette composed of a luminous heart of some of the noblest naturally derived ingredients [majestic magnolia essence, iris pallida, white flowers absolute, patchouli essence] enlightened by a smile of delicate gourmand notes.

how to apply la vie est belle eau de toilette
spray la vie est belle onto your skin, focusing on the warm areas of your body: the inside of your wrists, under your earlobes and behind your knees.

fragrance notes

transversal notes: iris, almondy fine delicacies accord
top notes: pear, blackberry, coconut milk 
heart notes: magnolia essence, pallida iris concrete, jasmine sambac and orange blossom absolutes
base notes: heart of patchouli essence

bottle

the resplendent bottle, entitled "le sourire de cristal" (the "crystal smile") is seen in more profound, radiant form than ever.
its new, pared-down lines are magnified with an iridescent white organza ribbon, forming two ethereal wings on its joyful silhouette, symbols of freedom.

the unique olfactory signature perfume scent of the first tasty magnolia by lancôme

ingredients

alcohol • parfum / fragrance • aqua / water • benzyl salicylate • linalool • methyl anthranilate • tris (tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) citrate • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • bht • ci 147 / red 4 • ci 475 / yellow 1 • ci 673 / ext. violet 2 • geraniol • alpha-isomethyl ionone • coumarin • farnesol • limonene • citral • citronellol • benzyl alcohol • benzyl benzoate.
* this ingredient list is subject to change, customers should refer to the product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list.

Title: La vie est belle l'eau de parfum woman
Description:
spread happiness with la vie est belle, lancôme’s best selling feminine fragrance. incarnated by julia roberts, la vie est belle is a universal declaration to the beauty of life. a unique olfactory signature perfume scent created by three of france's leading perfumers.


olfactory notes:

floral eau de parfum with the noblest ingredients [concrete of iris pallida, jasmine sambac, orange blossom, patchouli essence...]. 

how to apply la vie est belle eau de parfum:
spray la vie est belle onto your skin, focusing on the warm areas of your body: the inside of your wrists, below your earlobes and behind your knees.

fragrance notes

transversal notes: iris, fine delicacies accord
top notes: pear, blackberry
heart notes: pallida iris concrete, orange blossom and jasmine sambac absolutes
base notes: heart of patchouli essence

bottle

the resplendent bottle, entitled "le sourire de cristal" (the "crystal smile") evokes the rounded imprint of a smile at the heart of the crystal square.
the finishing touch of refinement: a pearlescent grey organza ribbon is tied around its neck, forming the twin wings of freedom.

what make the difference

the unique olfactory signature perfume scent of the first tasty iris by lancôme

ingredients

alcohol • parfum / fragrance • aqua / water • linalool • benzyl salicylate • limonene • methyl anthranilate • tris (tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) citrate • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • ci 147 / red 4 • ci 172 / red 33 • ci 475 / yellow 1 • geraniol • alpha-isomethyl ionone • coumarin • farnesol • citral • citronellol • benzyl alcohol • benzyl benzoate. 

* this ingredient list is subject to change, customers should refer to the product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list.

Title: Tresor woman eau de parfum
Description:
love is a treasure. 

since its creation in 1990, trésor has embodied absolute love in all its facets. a delicate and light fragrance with a romantic and smooth touch.

share the emotion of everlasting love with trésor, the fragrance for treasured moments.

how to apply 
spray about 20 cm from skin, focusing on the warmest areas of your body: pulse points on the wrists, behind the earlobes or knees to intensify the alluring effect.

fragrance notes

" i drew inspiration from the kind of confiden feminine woman who always leaves her mark … trésor is an eau de parfum composed with noble raw materials. they reveal a remarkably rounded olfactory signature, as if extending an invitation to embrace … it is this transparent structure that makes trésor unforgettable. it reveals sheer femininity from start to finish"
sophia grojsman, the perfumer

top notes: rose petals, apricot blossoms, peach tree flowers
middle notes: lilly of the valley, vanilla, heliotrope, iris
base notes: sandalwood, musk

bottle

trésor bottle is a crystalline jewel as resplendent as love itself, drawing inspiration from high-end jewellery. 

its chiselled pyramidal form features many facets that capture and reflect light, perfectly echoing its similarly faceted square cap, accentuated by a ring of black lacquer, like the symbol of eternal union. 
a crystal treasure for the most legendary of love fragrances

what make the difference

an invitation to an embrace, from its iconic bottle to its delicate and light scent.

ingredients

alcohol • parfum / fragrance • aqua / water • alpha-isomethyl ionone • linalool • geraniol • eugenol • isoeugenol • coumarin • cinnamal • cinnamyl alcohol • limonene • hydroxycitronellal • citral • citronellol • diethylamino hydroxybenzoyl hexyl benzoate • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • butylphenyl ethylpropional • benzyl benzoate • benzyl salicylate • bht • ci 147 / red 4 • ci 1914 / yellow 5 • ci 6157 / green 5

* this ingredient list is subject to change, customers should refer to the product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list.

Title: L`homme eau de toilette
Description:
a perfect balance between unrefined and precious, ultra-masculine and elegance, off-the-shelf and luxury. a fragrance for the urban and charismatic 21st century male. in a sparkling opening, bergamot and a zest of cedar wood brings luminosity to the fragrance, sustained with chinese ginger. the middle floral and spicy notes contrast with this first note of freshness: the sophisticated and modern masculinity of violet leaves and basil flowers, the bite and resonance of white pepper. base notes of sandalwood, virginia cedar wood and haitian vetiver highlight this charismatic and magnetic fragrance.

application

ozone
accord
haitian
vetiver
tonka bean
violet leaves

ingredients

alcohol. aqua (water). parfum (fragrance). ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate. limonene. butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane. butylphenyl methylpropional. tris(tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) citrate. linalool. coumarin. propylene glycol. geraniol. alpha-methyl ionone. citral. disodium edta. ci 15985 (yellow 6). ci 19140 (yellow 5).

Description:

Title: Miracle l'eau de parfum woman
Description:
life is a miracle. a vibrant, sparkling fragrance that opens like the dawning of a new day with fresh, dewy notes of lychee and freesia. 

its spicy heart echoes with notes of magnolia, jasmine, ginger and pepper as its warm base notes envelop you in the sensual splendour of amber and musk.

how to apply ô miracle
spray about 20 cm from skin, focusing on the warmest areas of your body: pulse points on the wrists, behind the earlobes or knees to intensify the alluring effect.

fragrance notes

top notes: juicy lychee, freesia and pink peppercorn
heart notes: peony, damascena rose, delicate magnolia, bourbon pepper, ginger.
base notes: absolute jasmine, musk, patchouli, amber

bottle

the bottle is classic, pure and transparent. clean, modern and unimposing - a reminiscence of a bottle created for lancôme in the 1930's by lalique, a worldwide renowned french crystal manufacturer.

what make the difference

the celebration of moments of happiness

ingredients

alcohol • parfum / fragrance • aqua / water • linalool • geraniol • isoeugenol • cinnamyl alcohol • limonene • hydroxycitronellal • citral • citronellol • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • ethylhexyl salicylate • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • butylphenyl methylpropional • benzyl benzoate • benzyl salicylate • bht • benzyl alcohol • ci 147 / red 4 • ci 1551 / orange 4 • ci 172 / red 33 • ci 1914 / yellow 5 • alpha-isomethylionone • hexyl cinnamal. 

* this ingredient list is subject to change, customers should refer to the product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list.

Title: Tresor in love woman eau de parfum
Description:
twenty years after the creation of trésor, lancôme reveals trésor in love and writes a new story: the treasured moment when everything starts, a liberated spirit of romance conveyed with floral notes. both luminous and vibrant, sensual and radiant, trésor in love is a soaring hymn to love...

the heroine of trésor in love lives her love story with a desarming spontaneity. like the mixed feelings of a young woman in love, when the infinite sweetness of the meeting becomes confused with the intensity of the feelings, the juice of trésor in love is made with many constrasts: a new irresistible floral, composed of a touch of nectarine and wood of cedar, a characteristic rose and a bright jasmine.

fragrance notes

top notes: bergamot, nectarine, tangy pear, pink peppercorn
heart notes: jasmine and rose
base notes: cedar wood, musks

bottle

object of desire with slender lines, the bottle of trésor in love delivers a resolutely modern energy, like an essence of today. a black satin rose adorns the bottle like a lucky charm around the neck.

what make the difference

a scent that evokes the spirit and the spontaneity of the first love.

ingredients

alcohol • parfum / fragrance • aqua / water • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • ethylhexyl salicylate • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • bht • ci 147 / red 4 • ci 1914 / yellow 5 • linalool • geraniol • alpha-isomethyl ionone • methyl-2-octynoate • limonene • hydroxycitronellal • citral • citronellol • benzyl alcohol • benzyl salicylate

* this ingredient list is subject to change, customers should refer to the product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list.

Title: Essence pure woman eau de toilette
Description:
essence pure for women, in their plenitude, represent a unique way of looking at life. as though born under the point of an s.t.dupont pen, dreams become a spiritual journey to the ends of the world, immersion in an unknown land, the spectacle of nature's immensity.

an exceptional adventure for a man and woman in search of purity, a way of getting back to basics.

Title: Be exceptional man eau de toilette
Description:
be exceptional

inspired by the symbols of the french art of living and excellence of the s.t. dupont maison, the translucent black glass flask bottle is enhanced with a silver plaque, which bears the extremely elegant s.t. dupont signature as a seal.

this elegant woody aromatic oriental is a modern combination of a fresh breeze and a warm sensuality.

Title: By  s.t. dupont woman eau de parfum
Description:
emblematic of a brand that constantly impresses by its singular,

understated and chic allure, far-removed from passing fashion trends.

they cultivate refinement and high standards as a lifestyle, honing their style to perfection.

Title: Blossom woman eau de parfum
Description:
jimmy choo blossom special edition perfume for women is a joyful bouquet of colourful notes. it is a floral, fruity, woody scent that sparkles on its wearer. it opens with fruity notes of juicy pear that mingle with the sweet-tinged acidity of mandarin. at its heart, the fragrance makes way for a seasonal bouquet of fresh lily-of-the-valley, hibiscus flower and pink freesia. base notes of white musks and sandalwood leave a contemporary, sexy trace on the skin. 

top notes: pear, bergamot, mandarin orange 
heart notes: lily-of-the-valley, hibiscus, pink freesia 
base notes: sandalwood, ambroxan, white musk

Title: Illicit woman eau de parfum
Description:
jimmy choo illicit

punchy and provocative but with an underlying sweetness, illicit is a hypnotic and innately feminine floriental fragrance. 

an entirely unique olfactory experience, comforting ginger flirts with feminine rose and sophisticated jasmine before drying down to reveal the perfume’s pièce de résistance – a gourmand honey-amber accord.

strong, multi-faceted and intricate, illicit crystal bottle mirrors the architectural silhouette of an art deco style crystal glass tumbler. 
inspired by the gold faceted leather that features in the jimmy choo collections it evokes a glamorous spirit with a hint of rebellion.

Title: Illicit flower woman eau de toilette
Description:
the next step in the illicit journey, illicit flower is a flirtatious eau de toilette, for a mischievous and mesmerizing woman.

illicit flower will become every seductive woman’s most prized possession.
adding a new twist to the original rose accord that intuitively exudes an air of femininity; juicy apricot and zesty mandarin have been crushed over the pretty floral heart notes of grapefruit flower and jasmine to create a fresh, sparkling scent that springs off skin and into the atmosphere.

Title: Ice man eau de toilette
Description:
jimmy choo man ice

the evolution of the jimmy choo man continues with the introduction of the fresh and aromatic jimmy choo man ice.

refreshing and powerful, it opens with a citrus breeze of mandarin, bergamot and cedrat essence but is intensified with heart notes of woody vetiver, patchouli essence and cedarwood enhanced by crisp apple.

its carnal wake of musk, moss and ambroxan gives the fragrance a natural elegance punctuated by a hypnotic signature.

Title: Signature intense man eau de toilette
Description:
jimmy choo man intense

confident, masculine and daring, jimmy choo man intensecaptures the spirit of the jimmy choo man.

a new fragrance that smoulders with masculinity, sophistication and an intensity that’s truly irresistible.

this fougere oriental woody combines the elegance of a spicy freshness with the masculinity of a leathery amber base.

Title: Signature man deodorant
Description: jimmy choo man eau de toilette is a sophisticated, modern and distinctive scent, created for a confident and refined man with a rebellious spirit. the jimmy choo man deodorant stick provides long lasting freshness while leaving behind the signature scent of jimmy choo man eau de toilette.

Title: Fleur de pecher woman eau de parfum
Description: fleur de pêcher is a musky fruity floral that takes on a sophisticated elegance and a classicism with a modern twist. its fragrance is an interpretation of peach blossom, whose feel brings to mind the delicate sensation of velvet.

Title: Lanvin me woman eau de parfum
Description: lanvin me perfume by lanvin, share your unique sense of self with the world with lanvin me for women . introduced in 2013 by lanvin, this statement-making scent easily transitions with you from daytime girl-on-the-go to nightclub-hopping diva. enticing tuberose mixes with fruity blueberry and deep notes of sandalwood, black wood, and licorice, creating a sensual sensory experience. dab lanvin me on your wrists and behind your ears, and have them guessing who you are from the moment you walk in the room.

Title: Marry me woman eau de parfum
Description:
marry me ! the delight of love at first sight, a romantic whim or the thrill of seduction. the perfume of an encounter, the first days of passion, a hope of true love.

the lanvin fashion house imagined a wave of freshness, happiness and passion.

a floral composition blending the power of bitter orange and the softness of a bouquet of freesias. sensuality heightened by captivating sambac jasmine softened by notes of magnolia blossom. a union of white flowers warmed by white cedar and luxuriant musk.

Title: Rumeur 2 rose woman eau de parfum
Description: rumeur 2 rose perfume by lanvin, launched in 2007, this is an effervescent fruity/floral fragrance for women . with a contemporary, lighter and sweeter formula, it is a light hearted version of lavin's classic rumeur formulation. rose is the star of this scent with notes of orange, magnolia, jasmine, patchouli, and musk.

Title: Rumeur 2 rose woman eau de parfum
Description: rumeur 2 rose perfume by lanvin, launched in 2007, this is an effervescent fruity/floral fragrance for women . with a contemporary, lighter and sweeter formula, it is a light hearted version of lavin's classic rumeur formulation. rose is the star of this scent with notes of orange, magnolia, jasmine, patchouli, and musk.

Title: Emozione florale woman eau de parfum
Description:
brand: salvatore ferragamo

fragrance type: eau de parfum

frangrance family: floral & fruity

perfume name: ferragamo emozione florale

targeted group: women

size: 92 ml

Title: Emozione woman eau de parfum
Description:
• emozione opens with luminous citrus notes of bergamot, softened with soft and powdery flavors of iris
  • top notes are enriched with velvety shades of peach providing fullness and velvety effect
  • the heart incorporates gentle, feminine flowers of peony combined with bulgarian rose and heliotrope, resting on patchouli, suede and white musk in the base of the composition

Title: Emozione woman eau de parfum
Description:
• emozione opens with luminous citrus notes of bergamot, softened with soft and powdery flavors of iris
  • top notes are enriched with velvety shades of peach providing fullness and velvety effect
  • the heart incorporates gentle, feminine flowers of peony combined with bulgarian rose and heliotrope, resting on patchouli, suede and white musk in the base of the composition

Title: Alien woman deodorant
Description:
the regenerative aura of alien eau de parfum can now be experienced with the radiant deodorant spray.
the delicate fragrance and long-lasting active ingredients of the alien radiant deodorant spray work all day long, while protecting the skin.

Title: Alien woman eau de toilette
Description:
alien is the daughter of the sun, between humanity and divinity at the same time. alien eau de toilette, she is a radiant and enigmatic fragrance, illuminates all the senses with a flowery and amber creation.
the mauve-colored bottle, faceted like a jewel, is like the amethyst crystal, a symbol of humility and femininity.
notes: moroccan jasmine, white amber, cashmeran wood.

Title: Alien woman eau de toilette
Description:
alien is the daughter of the sun, between humanity and divinity at the same time. alien eau de toilette, she is a radiant and enigmatic fragrance, illuminates all the senses with a flowery and amber creation.
the mauve-colored bottle, faceted like a jewel, is like the amethyst crystal, a symbol of humility and femininity.
notes: moroccan jasmine, white amber, cashmeran wood.

Title: Alien woman eau de parfum
Description:
alien eau de parfum: the original and unique alien fragrance. 

a floral, woody, amber creation originating from the bold excessiveness of two powerful notes (cashmeran and amber) brightened by a sun flower (sambac jasmine).  
the olfactory expression of radiation and splendour.  
the fragrance bottle is like a gem, concealing the secret of alien.

olfactory family: amber woody floral

Title: Alien woman eau de parfum
Description:
alien eau de parfum: the original and unique alien fragrance. 

a floral, woody, amber creation originating from the bold excessiveness of two powerful notes (cashmeran and amber) brightened by a sun flower (sambac jasmine).  
the olfactory expression of radiation and splendour.  
the fragrance bottle is like a gem, concealing the secret of alien.

Title: Alien woman eau de parfum
Description:

the olfactory expression of radiation and splendour.

Title: Wanted man eau de toilette
Description:
are you ready to face every challenge? azzaro presents wanted, a virile eau de toilette for the flamboyant, epicurean man who knows how to seize his chances and defy destiny. azzaro wanted combines the freshness of cardamom, the woody elegance of vetiver and the smooth warmth of tonka bean within a sophisticated barrel-shaped bottle... like a symbol of liberty.

olfactory family: woody citrus spicy

Title: Wanted man eau de toilette
Description:
are you ready to face every challenge? azzaro presents wanted, a virile eau de toilette for the flamboyant, epicurean man who knows how to seize his chances and defy destiny. azzaro wanted combines the freshness of cardamom, the woody elegance of vetiver and the smooth warmth of tonka bean within a sophisticated barrel-shaped bottle... like a symbol of liberty.

olfactory family: woody citrus spicy

Title: Chrome man eau de toilette
Description:
azzaro chrome celebrates joie de vivre and true feelings, paying tribute to the unwavering complicity that unites father and son. a fragrance that encapsulates the sense of getting away from it all, with its invigorating, soothing and sleek freshness; a smooth, complicit freshness (citrus, white musk notes) combined with the green and aquatic notes of adventure, and the comfort of a woody tea accord (sandalwood, amber, mate).

olfactory family: citrus aquatic woody

Title: Champion man eau de toilette
Description: balance invigorating energy and earthy power when you use this woody citrus fragrance for men. launched by davidoff in 2010, davidoff champion is a sporty eau de toilette that mixes clean notes of bergamot and lemon with bitter green galbanum for a sharp introduction. clary sage lends an herbal note that mingles with oakmoss to conjure the scent of wild greens on the forest floor. fresh yet distinctive, davidoff champion unites a modern zest for life with masculine gravitas, making it an ideal fragrance for office wear and summer nights.

Title: Adventure man eau de toilette
Description: davidoff adventure for men was launched in the fall of the year 2008. this davidoff perfume is a fragrance for men who love new adventures. adventure by davidoff for men is for men who love to take on a new adventure at every moment of their life. it was designed by antoine lie. he was inspired by rich woody notes and freshness of nature.

Title: Cool water man eau de toilette
Description:
powerful, free, fearless – that’s the kind of man that davidoff cool water eau de toilette suits perfectly. try its cool breeze of sheer effervescence and lust for life for yourself.

  • an intensely refreshing aromatic fragrance
  • for the active modern man
  • ideal for every day

the composition of the fragrance
at the start, you will be hit by a wave of cool water and green notes, harmoniously complemented by fresh mint, rosemary, elegant lavender and gently piquant coriander seeds. soon after, they are followed by a floral, spicy heart, which softens the overall composition and gives it a seductive quality. accords of jasmine, neroli, geranium and sandalwood combine together. the base is made up of sensual musk, amber, cedarwood and tobacco, which makes it a completely captivating and unforgettable fragrance.

the story of the fragrance
davidoff cool water has been one of the most popular aftershaves for men since it was first launched in 1988. it mirrors the story of a man who fearlessly plunges into tumultuous ocean waves to emerge stronger and charged with a new burst of energy. the combination of the enormous strength and elegance of the sea is also reflected in the appearance of the blue bottle.

ingredients

top notes

coriander, sea water, calon, green notes, lavender, mint, rosemary

middle notes - the heart of the fragrance comes out after a couple of minutes when the head of the scent fades away. these notes usually last around 2 to 3 hours.

middle notes

jasmine, geranium, sandalwood, neroli

base notes - the last and often longest part of the fragrance's evolution on your skin. takes anywhere from 4 hours to over a day.

base notes

oakmoss, amber, tobacco, musk, cedar

fragrance category

citrus, aromatic

Title: My scent woman eau de toilette
Description:
product description:

trussardi my scent contains a fragrance featuring a delicate floral bouquet combined with the sensuality of noble ingredients that tell the story of timeless femininity. it opens with white flowers, orange and jasmine, setting off on a journey of exploration through the female world, gathering dreams and emotions, caught by the scent of nashi pear. the middle notes transport you towards romanticism with sweet lilac and intense rosebuds. the base notes feature the unmistakeable molecule known as serenolide that makes the finish fruity and vibrant with the contemporary nuance of soft, velvety musk and honey.

Title: Delicate rose woman eau de toilette
Description: it's love at first “scent” with trussardi delicate rose. the freshness of the fragrance exudes femininity and vitality through its elegant and graceful bouquet. the notes of kumquat, yuzu and noble bamboo light up the senses with their sharp freshness. the central accord of rose petals, jasmine and lotus flower combines with crisp hints of apple to add character and spontaneity. musk wraps around you like an embrace on the finish, softening the sophisticated notes of whitewood, while the cedar and sandalwood provide the piece de resistance to this sensory experience, expressing innate sensuality.

Title: Black extreme man eau de toilette
Description:
product description:

trussardi black extreme is the scent for modern, successful men always in pursuit of powerful experiences. tradition and the spirit of belonging meld with the elegant, timeless design to convey trussardi’s excellence in its field and premium italian quality. the fragrance is built around aristocratic black leather with intense, fine woody notes of vetiver and patchouli. the contrast between the lemon notes and the marine accord collides with the fruity notes of plum and iris, enhancing the unique, tenebrous feel, surrounded by dark, sensual and intriguing nuances.

Title: 1911 uomo man eau de toilette
Description: trussardi uomo embodies an elegant, yet contemporary fragrance which conveys the sophistication of the italian spirit. the top notes consist of an accord of scents inspired by aromas typical to italy, such as lemon, galbanum and bergamot. these aromas take us to the middle notes of violet and geranium, creating a striking blend. the finish reveals notes of clary sage, leather and patchouli, which add a feeling of luxury and texture to this fiery, seductive fragrance. the mysterious black bottle epitomises strength and class and the result is powerful and decisive.

Title: 1911 uomo man eau de toilette
Description: trussardi uomo embodies an elegant, yet contemporary fragrance which conveys the sophistication of the italian spirit. the top notes consist of an accord of scents inspired by aromas typical to italy, such as lemon, galbanum and bergamot. these aromas take us to the middle notes of violet and geranium, creating a striking blend. the finish reveals notes of clary sage, leather and patchouli, which add a feeling of luxury and texture to this fiery, seductive fragrance. the mysterious black bottle epitomises strength and class and the result is powerful and decisive.

Title: 1911 donna woman eau de toilette
Description: trussardi donna contains a delicate fragrance inspired by the floral oriental olfactory family. the top notes of yuzu, citron and water fruit create an intense, fruity blend. the distinctive feminine quality of the fragrance blooms in the middle notes of orange blossom, water lily and jasmine tea. a sensual texture explodes in the base notes of cedar and sandalwood, which are gently softened by the vanilla and enhanced by the delicate white patchouli finish. this pyramid of notes create a fragrance that represents the woman who wants to bring the elegant and refined sensuality of the east to mind.

Title: L'amour fou woman eau de parfum
Description:
lose yourself in the intrigue of love with the emanuel ungaro l’amour fou eau de parfum, a floriental woody fragrance that exudes passion and elegance.

l’amour fou is the scent of a modern parisian woman who inhabits the extraordinary universe of emanuel ungaro. inspired by the craziness of love and unpredictable passions of the heart, her avant-garde scent sparkles with a perfect blend of edge and glamour.

bright, juicy notes of pear and colourful blackberry are invigorated with a bite of fresh and spicy pink pepper. a heart of ultra-feminine violet and rose lend some sophistication, while a touch of brightening nectarine keeps the composition feeling joyful and fresh. a seductive dry down of cashmeran and amber are made more intense and creamy with vanilla.

lighthearted and chic with a twist of sensuality, emanuel ungaro l’amour fou captures the indescribable feeling of a wild romance.

Description: burberry brit for him is a fresh, woody scent that’s perfect for the modern man. this burberry brit for him eau de toilette spray captures the relaxed elegance for which the british brand is so well known. enjoy notes of cardamom, bergamot, ginger, and mandarin with a spritz of this great burberry brit aftershave. available in a range of sizes to suit every man, burberry brit for him eau de toilette comes in a sleek bottle, finished with the iconic burberry check. it’s the perfect addition to any men’s fragrance lineup, while the smaller sizes are ideal for keeping in the car. notes: cardamom, bergamot, ginger, mandarin, spice, wild rose, cedarwood, nutmeg, grey musk, oriental woods, tonka bean.

Title: My burberry black woman eau de parfum
Description:
my burberry black follows the same codes of craftsmanship, innovation and appreciation as the iconic heritage trench coat.

an intense and sensual reinterpretation by renowned perfumer francis kurkdjian and christopher bailey, my burberry black travels back to a london garden amidst a gathering storm; heavy rain contrasting with the warm and captivating flora.

the fragrance fuses the scent of sun-drenched jasmine flower and peach nectar with a touch of rose. this signature rose note at the heart of my burberry is given a sweet and inviting candied twist, while rich amber patchouli rounds off the scent for a deep and captivating finish.

the rich, amber-coloured bottle is finished with a hand-tied black gabardine knot and set with a dark, elevated horn-look lid, inspired by the buttons of the burberry trench coat

Title: My burberry woman eau de parfum
Description:
• inspired by the trench coat and its heritage of british design and craftsmanship, my burberry captures the fragrance of a london garden after the rain.
  • the scent is a contemporary british grand floral.
  • top notes of sweet pea and bergamot fuse with a geranium leaf, golden quince and freesia heart, rounded out with a base of patchouli and rain-tipped damask and centifolia roses.
  • the bottle reflects iconic details of the trench coat: a bold horn-finish cap echoes its distinctive buttons and the hand-tied bow is english-woven gabardine, honouring the fabric invented by thomas burberry over 100 years ago.

Title: My burberry woman eau de parfum

Title: Signature woman eau de toilette
Description:
fresh and delicate, the maison's eau de toilette version of its signature fragrance exudes a powdery white rose bouquet offset by heady magnolia notes. the complex floral composition reveals a unique blend of vibrant youth and classic femininity.

enclosed in a modern, delicately pleated bottle adorned with a hand-tied ribbon, the timeless fragrance is sure to beguile all chloé girls.

Title: Nero assoluto woman eau de parfum
Description: nero assoluto belongs to the floral woody family. its elegance is bestowed by its precious and ultimate quality key ingredients. a seductive orchestra of orchids, paves the way with a captivating top note that attracts attention and awakens the senses. this delicate but opulent flower bestows exceptional sensuality, that is prolonged and intensified by a rich and warm middle note of dark vanilla. the dualism of nero assoluto is highlighted by its bitter sweet aroma. this unique fragrance boasts a heady and majestic woody base note of ebony. made in france.

Title: Paradiso assoluto woman eau de parfum
Description:
roberto cavalli paradiso assoluto perfume by roberto cavalli, launched in 2016, paradiso assoluto is a sensual, heavenly scent that will send your mind to the amalfi coast in summertime . this alluring, lightly floral scent is the third fragrance in roberto cavalli’s paradiso collection. this scent starts off sweet with notes of floral and wisteria mingled in with a hint of spicy pepper. fresh wild jasmine mixed with cavalli’s signature red lily follow close behind as mid notes. at the base is rich patchouli, sandalwood and vanilla to finish off this beautiful, rich scent. 

bottled in a ruby colored, diamond-shaped bottle and available in 30, 50 or 75 ml, paradiso assoluto by roberto cavalli is the perfect fragrance for any woman who wants to add a little romance to her fragrance collection. roberto cavalli is a world-renowned designer born in the enchanting countryside of florence, italy in 1944. since he was just 21 years old, cavalli has been an entrepreneur and is widely known for his exquisite clothing and wild animal prints.

Title: Fluer woman eau de parfum
Description:
delicate and feminine, the new fleur de parfum unveils the sensual intimacy of the rose – the signature of the maison's fragrance line. 

a modern twist on a classic, the tenderness of the rose has been artfully combined with slightly tangy inflexions that recall the scent of raspberry. 
the heart of verbena flower adds a fresh and luminous verdant dimension that sublimates the luxurious rose heart, while retaining an absolute delicacy. 
the heart of cherry blossom diffuses milky almond notes. 

the bottle remains faithful to the same iconic flacon of the maison's signature fragrance, with finely pleated glass and a hand-tied ribbon.

Title: Love story sensuelle woman eau de parfum
Description:
eau sensuelle is a new elegant and feminine interpretation of the love story orange blossom scent. refined and voluptuous notes come together in a uniquely seductive combination.

sunny heliotrope, with its subtle vanilla scent, brings sweetness to the floral orange blossom. the base note of sandalwood adds a milky, velvety depth.

the bottle's padlock design with its distinctive pleated effect symbolises parisian romance. the transparent glass reveals the fragrance's delicate colour of pink blush with a coral undertone, evoking the setting sun. hand-tied around the bottle's neck, the romantic ribbon echoes the same youthful and delicate hue.

Title: Love story woman eau de parfum
Description:
a floral love story, the maison's fresh and sensual eau de parfum opens the heart with stephanotis jasmine — the flower of happiness — and seduces with luminous orange blossom notes. 

the unforgettable essence of seduction and freedom is finished with a padlock design to symbolise love and romance. a delicate ribbon knotted casually on the side complements the femininity of the pleated glass.

Title: Love story woman eau de parfum
Description:
a floral love story, the maison's fresh and sensual eau de parfum opens the heart with stephanotis jasmine — the flower of happiness — and seduces with luminous orange blossom notes. 

the unforgettable essence of seduction and freedom is finished with a padlock design to symbolise love and romance. a delicate ribbon knotted casually on the side complements the femininity of the pleated glass.

Title: Love story woman eau de toilette
Description:
sincere and tender, the eau de toilette reveals a new love story that embraces bare skin with floral sensuality. the adventure unfolds with a fresh infusion of the scent's signature orange blossom, delicately married with tantalizing plum tree blossom.

the unforgettable essence of seduction and freedom is finished with a padlock design to symbolise love and romance. a delicate ribbon knotted casually on the side complements the femininity of the pleated glass.

Title: Nomade woman eau de parfum
Description:
embrace a spirit of adventurous femininity uplifted by distant horizons and inspiring encounters: chloé nomade eau de parfum is a woody fragrance with fresh, floral notes.

intense, mineral oak moss is counterbalanced by the voluptuous sweetness of the mirabelle plum and a flowery luminescence carried by freesia.

the round o-shaped curves of the bottle bring softness, contrasting with the strong, graphic metallic pieces. a sleek collar and a delicate, dangling pink ribbon bring confident yet feminine detail to the elegant design.

Title: Jungle man eau de toilette
Description: kenzo jungle for men. this aromatic mix has led to an ideal hybrid. the head note is the spreading warmth of maté, with balsam accents. the unexpected note is the tart quality of sweet lime. a chorus of nutmeg and musk mallow seeds form the spicy middle notes. powerful, woody base notes dominate this composition with two cedars: the intense leather note of the atlas cedar, and the fresh forest note of the lebanon blue cedar. the sensuous benzoin of siam accentuates the vanilla undercurrent, and a hint of precious guaiac wood is smooth and marvelous. created by olivier cresp.

Title: L'eau pour homme man eau de toilette
Description: an aquatic citrus signed by olivier cresp. for him, an energetic scent punctuated by invigorating and lively yuzu and frosted mint notes over a cedar wood base.

Title: Homme man eau de toilette
Description: an original fragrance, woody and nautical, timeless. watery tones combine with floral sea spray for immediate freshness... ...prolonged by a solar accord where sage is warmed up by the spicy accents of nutmeg and clove... ...before the strength of sensual woods is revealed, carried along by the harmony between oak moss, vetiver and velvety sandalwood.

Title: World woman eau de parfum
Description: kenzo entrusted the composition of its new fragrance to the exceptional perfumer francis kurkdjian. this avant-garde creator does not hesitate to mix... genres, styles and materials. he takes perfume off the beaten path, shakes the classical dust off of flowers, and dares to go to extremes... this fragrance is an unprecedented blend of peony, jasmine and the sparkling crystals of ambroxan®. an unexpected, astonishing and addictive floral bouquet.

Title: World woman eau de parfum
Description: kenzo entrusted the composition of its new fragrance to the exceptional perfumer francis kurkdjian. this avant-garde creator does not hesitate to mix... genres, styles and materials. he takes perfume off the beaten path, shakes the classical dust off of flowers, and dares to go to extremes... this fragrance is an unprecedented blend of peony, jasmine and the sparkling crystals of ambroxan®. an unexpected, astonishing and addictive floral bouquet.

Title: World intense woman eau de parfum
Description: kenzo world reveals a new definition of femininity with its new perfume. this intense eau de parfum reveals the essence of a strong, bold, determined woman. in her image, francis kurkdjian and maïa lernout revisit the kenzo world floral bouquet with addictively velvety black plum, sparkling peony and jasmine, and indulgent vanilla. a gourmet fragrance for any woman who dares to be herself. kenzo world, an intense eau de parfum, reveals your power.

Title: Flower woman eau de parfum
Description: the power of a flower. for a beautiful world. a simple and beautiful, fragile and strong red flower, like the woman who holds it. unpredictable, the poppy grows here and there, where least expected, to reenchant the city. it blossoms on the urban curves of the bottle. kenzo invents the fragrance of this scentless flower. an unexpected, sensual and enveloping fragrance.

Title: Aqua kenzo man eau de toilette
Description: a dive into a contrasted water. pink berries splash the walnut leaf with their fresh, fusing notes, a one-on-one with singular, addictive vegetal accents. crisp and gourmand sandalwood marries with cedar in a refreshing duo to surprise us: unctuous, precious, it lends subtle savory notes and vibrates with sensuality to sign this fresh and stylish woody scent.

Title: L'eau par intense woman eau de parfum
Description: kenzo reveals a new kind of freshness for l’eau kenzo, intensely sensual and magnetic. a gourmand red apple top note unfolds into a floral bouquet of peony and lotus flowers over a base of patchouli, for intensely feminine notes.

Title: Jeu d'amour woman eau de parfum
Description: play, smile, surprise, seduce… reinvent love! kenzo jeu d’amour celebrates the idea of romantic lovers game with an ultra-feminine, sensual and captivating fragrance. the nude-colored bottle echoes the sensuality of the skin, its pure lines evoke the femininity of a dress… a joyful hymn to seduction which makes you want to play along.licence shutterstock

Girl of now woman eau de parfum
Description:
the spirit of the girl of now in a fragrance.
a distinctive gourmand floral eau de parfum: an addictive note of almond, textured with orange blossom and patchouli, the brand’s signature.
girl of now starts like an uplifting sparkle with notes of pear and mandarin orange. fresh-roasted pistachio leads to a unique floral scent created exclusively for girl of now: the ormond flower. made of bitter almond essence and orange flower absolute, it boosts and amplifies the positive mood.

Title: Girl of now shine woman eau de parfum
Description:
elie saab girl of now shine eau de parfum is a new solar and addictive variation on the original eau de parfum girl of now.

a floral addiction, enhancing the elie saab signature of orange blossom and patchouli, with the star ingredient, almond. the precious glass bottle of girl of now shine is adorned by a shimmering velvety gold flower at the top.

Title: Narciso rouge woman eau de parfum
Description:
embrace temptation with the narciso rodriguez narciso rouge eau de parfum spray, a floral-woody women’s fragrance with musky facets.

a powerful force of attraction, the narciso rouge perfume was made for a woman who can’t help but seduce. her magnetic confidence is the perfect match for this bold and daring scent; she’s not one to blend into the crowd, as her alluring and engaging presence captivates all in her path.

a surge of femininity rushes from the signature musc heart, attracting elegant petals of iris and rose to rile up the addictive base notes of tonka bean and woods.

Title: For her rose musc  eau de parfum
Description: an exclusive and precious fragrance with oriental facets, narciso rodriguez for her rose musk eau de parfum intense has an intense musk heart sublimated by the absolute rose of morocco, the richness of the spices and the depth of the woods.

Title: For her amber musc  eau de parfum
Description:
to celebrate the coming together of these shared values, the original heart of musk of for her – the olfactory signature – is transcended while enriched by the elegant accords of amber and precious oud, thus offering an exclusive interpretation of the orient that is steeped in tradition and breathtaking in its enchantment.

the eau de parfum absolue – for her amber musc is opulent yet free of ostentation, intermingling of shadow and light, refined and intense, mysterious and feminine, sensual and intimate, enveloping and valuable… precious as gold.

in its new trail, for her amber musc embodies each oriental woman. with bold taste and confident movement, the oriental woman is both strong and feminine and makes genuine luxury a personal quest at all times.

for her amber musc respects this shared vision of real luxury: a perfect balance between opulence and purity, generosity and refinement.

Title: Extra-firming day cream spf 15 - all skin types
Description:
an ideal anti-ageing anti-uv day cream for visibly firmer, rejuvenated skin. provides an immediate smoothing effect. day after day, the skin's youthfulness is boosted, wrinkles are visibly reduced, facial contours appear sculpted and features appear refreshed. the complexion is more even, skin radiates beauty. clarins anti-pollution complex.

  • wrinkles visibly reduced

  • facial contours appear sculpted

  • instant smoothing effect

  • radiance

  • anti-uv

  • skin protected from the harmful effects of pollution

Title: Super restorative night - all skin types
Description:
an intensive night time treatment that meets the specific needs of skin challenged by hormonal changes due to the ageing process. 
exclusive organic harungana extract, a 'healing' tree from madagascar, replenishes the skin at all levels* while an extraordinary plant extract, montpelier cistus (a 'phoenix' plant), boosts complexion uniformity**.
night after night, the skin is replenished, lifted and unified. nourished and moisturised, it is left radiant and glowing.
• replenishes the skin at all levels, lifts and combats slackening
• helps reduce the appearance of dark spots and boosts complexion uniformity
• boosts skin radiance
• hydrates and nourishes


dermatologically tested. non-comedogenic. 

* in vivo et ex vivo tests.**in vitro tests.

how to apply:

apply every night to a clean face and neck with light pressing motions, working from the centre of the face outwards.

Title: Extra-firming day cream - dry skin
Description: the ideal anti-ageing day cream for visibly firming and rejuvenating dry skin. provides an immediate smoothing effect. day after day, the skin's youthfulness is boosted, wrinkles are visibly reduced, facial contours appear sculpted and features appear refreshed. the complexion is more even, skin radiates beauty. clarins anti-pollution complex..

Title: Extra-firming day cream - all skin types
Description: the ideal anti-ageing day cream for visibly firmer, rejuvenated skin. provides an immediate smoothing effect. day after day, the skin's youthfulness is boosted, wrinkles are visibly reduced, facial contours appear sculpted and features appear refreshed. the complexion is more even, skin radiates beauty. clarins anti-pollution complex.

Title: Beauty flash balm
Description:
what it is
beauty flash balm is formulated with 96% naturally-sourced ingredients for a powerful radiance-boosting cocktail. acerola seed extract helps energize the skin for a radiant, glowing complexion and prickly pear extract helps activate cell renewal to restore the skin's radiance. it is also enriched with organic oat sugars with toning action, which help to immediately tighten and smooth facial features: they are rested and smoother. signs of fatigue and wrinkles are diminished. use by itself as a day treatment over your regular day cream, mixed in with your clarins liquid foundation, or as a mask.
skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily
texture: cream
use: every day, in the morning.

clarins plus
instant complexion enhancer.

results
86%* of women say their features appear more rested.
92%** of women say their complexion is revived.
*consumer text – 101 women, after application as a day treatment.
**consumer test – 101 women, after 28 days of use.

ingredients
aqua/water/eau. caprylic/capric triglyceride. glycerin. butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter. propanediol. c15-19 alkane. silica silylate. ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp copolymer. sorbitan stearate. polyacrylate crosspolymer-6. butylene glycol. hydroxyacetophenone. parfum/fragrance. avena sativa (oat) kernel extract. ethylhexylglycerin. tocopheryl acetate. aloe barbadensis leaf juice powder. disodium edta. sucrose cocoate. hydrolyzed opuntia ficus-indica flower extract. sodium hydroxide. marrubium vulgare extract. sodium benzoate. t-butyl alcohol. 1,2-hexanediol. caprylyl glycol. malpighia emarginata (acerola) seed extract. phenethyl alcohol. capsicum annuum fruit extract. furcellaria lumbricalis extract. ci 14700/red 4. lapsana communis flower/leaf/stem extract. maris sal/sea salt/sel marin. helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil. tocopherol. rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract [v3977a]
*for informational purposes only. every ingredient list is specific to an individual product reference. all formulas are subject to change. while we endeavor to keep this ingredient list accurate, we cannot guaranty that it is reliable, up-to-date, or error-free. please also refer to the ingredient list on the product's outer packaging for a complete, accurate, and up-to-date list.

Title: Bust beauty firming lotion
Description:
the essential firming and anti-aging treatment to keep the bust looking youthful. formulated with extracts of vu sua (vietnamese star apple) and bocoa, this creamy lotion restores density and tone to the ligaments that support the bust from the bottom of the breasts to the chin.

how to apply:

use the bust firming cream in the evening, preferably just before bed. smooth on gently in broad strokes from the bottom of the breasts to the chin. the lightweight creamy treatment absorbs instantly.

Title: Extra-firming night cream - all skin types
Description: an ideal night cream for visibly firming the skin and reducing the appearance of wrinkles while you sleep. the skin is visibly firmed, rejuvenated. on waking, it appears smoother and more even. clarins anti-pollution complex.

Title: Super restorative day cream
Description:
an intensive replenishing cream that meets the specific needs of skin challenged by hormonal changes due to the ageing process. enriched with exclusive organic harungana extract, a 'healing' tree from madagascar, it replenishes the skin at all levels.*

it immediately leaves the skin brighter-looking and smooth. day after day, it is left replenished, lifted, radiant and glowing.

• instantly brightens and smoothes

• replenishes the skin at all levels

• reduces the appearance of deep wrinkles

• lifts and combats slackening

• nourishes and moisturises

• prevents the appearance of dark spots

dermatologically tested. non-comedogenic.

*in vivo and ex vivo tests.

how to apply:

apply every morning to a clean face and neck with light pressing motions, working from the centre of the face outwards.

Title: Body shaping cream
Description:
a high-performing, yet kind slimming cream delivering triple sculpting, firming and refining action in a sumptuously soft formulation to be massaged into the body.

how to apply:

massage a small amount of cream into the skin concentrating on target areas: use sweeping circular movements over the stomach, waist area and hips, then massage upwards over the arms and knees.

Title: Nuit d'issey blue astral man eau de toilette
Description:
escape to the skies with the issey miyake nuit d'issey bleu astral eau de toilette, a fresh woody scent for men with leather facets.

a new light to take note of, the issey miyake nuit d'issey bleu astral perfume is alluring and powerful. capturing the power between the attractions of the stars, the bleu astral man is endearing and mysterious. a figure of immense seduction, you won’t be able to escape the unforgettable trail of the blue astral aftershave.

zesty splashes of lime drip over the herbaceous nuances of coriander, revealing a strong aromatic start to the bleu astral fragrance. as the scent warms, crisp notes of leather sew together the smouldering base of ambery woods and vetiver to reveal a long-lasting, sensual dry down.

top notes: lime, coriander

heart notes: leather, gentian

base notes: ambery woods, vetiver

Description:
new formula youth activating smoothing eye cream, targeting signs of fatigue. a wake-up call for your eyes: targets signs of fatigue.

this new cream-in-gel eye formula is enriched with probiotic-derived extracts and targets signs of fatigue: 
dark circles appear reduced, 
eyes look rested, more luminous 
and fine lines appear smoother, for a wide awake look

the gliding, fast absorbing cream texture is enriched with probiotic- derived extracts, and helps illuminate the eye contour, correct roughness and texture as well as targeting other signs of fatigue

eye area looks more awake 70% agree*

normal and combination skin types.

Title: London man eau de toilette
Description:
product description:

  • a sophisticated scent with top notes of bergamot, lavender and warm cinnamon
  • artfully balanced heart notes of mimosa flower and rich leather
  • lower tones combine heady tobacco leaves and dense oak moss to complete this distinctive and refined fragrance

Title: Fever woman eau de parfum
Description: this fragrance opens with the rich yet vivid juicy sweetness of plum, which is blended with the fresh rosy accents of lychee and countered with the subtle bitter tones of grapefruit. at its heart, the powdered roundness of heliotrope mingles with an exotic vanilla orchid, contrasted with ultra-feminine jasmine. it then evolves with base notes of creamy sandalwood, the balsamic warmth of benzoin and the roasted almond facets of tonka bean, giving the fragrance its carnal velvet sensuality. the ultimate scent for a woman who is effortlessly seductive and in charge of her destiny.

Title: Fleur de murier woman eau de parfum
Description:
karl lagerfeld presents his new perfume fleur de murier, a feminine perfume inspired by haute couture fashion shows.

fleur de murier we find an elegant, sensual and sophisticated aroma. in the world of karl lagerfeld, exclusive and glamorous is the order of the day. all designs, whether fashionable or perfumes, become icons for the whole world of fashion. with the launch of fleur de mûrier it could not be less, its exclusive, sensual and sophisticated character is reflected in every note of the fragrance.

fleur de mûrier is included in the line les parfums matieres, a line of perfumes in which several flowers are the basis of the inspiration of the perfume. the inspiration for this new fragrance comes from the flower of morera.

emilie (bevierre) copperman is the master perfumer who created this perfume. fleur de mûrier belongs to the floral fruit olfactory family. the olfactory pyramid begins with fruity and sweet notes of raspberry, red currant and orange. in the heart we find a conjunction of floral notes composed of violet, blackberry flower, orange blossom of the orange tree and lily of the valley. finally at the base of the perfume is formed by warm ingredients such as vanilla, musk, amber and sandalwood.

Title: Modern princess sensuelle woman eau de toilette
Description: once upon a time, there was a perfume for a modern princess, rebellious and enamored with freedom… for this heroine—with her disarming charm, brilliantly freeing herself from conventions—lanvin designed an extraordinary duet of pink lady apple and redcurrant with a bold base of vanilla orchid. a fragrance with a strong temperament, whose bottle reinvents the silhouette of a dress in an ultra-modern way…

Title: Be exceptional gold man eau de parfum
Description:
s.t. dupont be exceptional gold eau de parfum is a perfect modern fragrance that will give you an unmistakable charisma and allow you to achieve your goals easily.

  • a floral, woody scent
  • for the modern gentleman
  • for both everyday wear and special occasions

Title: Wanted bynight man eau de parfum
Description:
azzaro wanted by night is the weapon of seduction of a modern-day gatsby.

a dashing creature of the night, bold and magnetic, who catches the light and creates a buzz wherever he goes. everywhere he appears, whether night or day, he attracts stares, awakens the senses, and arouses desire. azzaro wanted by night is an eau de parfum with explosive woody-oriental-spicy accords and an impossibly elegant bottle.

Title: Alien woman eau de parfum set
Description: mugler alien, 1 pc, women's sets for women, you never have to say goodbye to your fragrance for a long time. the mugler alien women's perfume set contains the full version of the fragrance and its miniature version. it easily finds a place even in the smallest handbag and at any time of the day it envelops you again in an unmistakable aroma. properties: perfumed cosmetics will prolong the duration of the fragrance miniature of the fragrance is ideal for a handbag great as a gift will please all women contents of the set: mugler alien edp perfumed water for women 60 ml mugler alien edp perfumed water for women 10 ml mugler alien perfumed body lotion for women 50 jr

Title: Bi-facil face
Description:
start your cleansing routine with bi-facil visage micellar water. this bi-phased micellar water helps remove long wear face make up and cleanse the skin.

to use bi-facil visage shake the bottle gently to mix both phases together then apply the cleanser to a cotton pad and wipe over the face to remove makeup and impurities. follow with a toner on the face, neck and décolletage both at night and in the morning. finish with your favourite lancôme serum and/or moisturiser to complete your regime. discover your perfect skincare routine with our skincare finder. we recommend using our iconic bi-facil eye to separately remove eye make up. 

bi-phased: to dissolve make up and cleanse off the residue, leaving no greasy feeling.

tested under dermatological control.

Title: Bi-facil face
Description:
start your cleansing routine with bi-facil visage micellar water. this bi-phased micellar water helps remove long wear face make up and cleanse the skin.

to use bi-facil visage shake the bottle gently to mix both phases together then apply the cleanser to a cotton pad and wipe over the face to remove makeup and impurities. follow with a toner on the face, neck and décolletage both at night and in the morning. finish with your favourite lancôme serum and/or moisturiser to complete your regime. discover your perfect skincare routine with our skincare finder. we recommend using our iconic bi-facil eye to separately remove eye make up.

Title: La nuit tresor woman eau de parfum
Description:
la nuit tresor: the scent of a sultry night, when lovers embrace with absolute love.

it all starts at night with an infinitely poetic myth. from the irresistible attraction of 2 stars coming into fusion and generating a rain of particles that falls on earth and reagregates to become in time, the black diamonds.

how to apply 
spray about 20 cm from skin, focusing on the warmest areas of your body: pulse points on the wrists, behind the earlobes or knees to intensify the alluring effect.

fragrance notes

top notes: heart of black rose essence
heart notes:vanilla tahitensis orchid absolute
base notes: incense, papyrus essence and lychee praline

bottle

trésor bottle is a crystalline jewel as resplendent as love itself, drawing inspiration from high-end jewellery: its chiselled pyramidal form features many facets that capture and reflect light, perfectly echoing its similarly faceted square cap, accentuated by a ring of black lacquer, like the symbol of eternal union.

what make the difference

the new love philtre of the 21st century, composed of the rarest raw materials.

Title: Uomo the red man eau de toilette
Description: trussardi uomo the red is the scent of the intriguing man with a finesse and mastery for passion – in all its forms. this fragrance has been created to be persistent and leave its mark thanks to the woody, floral and spicy bouquet. all the audacity innate to italian elegance is contained within the top notes of zesty lemon, nutmeg, galbanum and cognac, which give life to a sensual and insouciant blend when part of a man’s fragrance. the intense aroma of the middle notes of geranium, violet leaves and clary sage have the same genetic fingerprint of trussardi’s original scents, which were the basis for everything that would come after.

Title: Black opium woman eau de parfum
Description:
the delivery of this product will be accompanied by a sample, in order to test the fragrance before opening the full size product.
if unsatisfied with the fragrance, you may return the sealed full size product within 28 days from the date of receiving the order.

discover black opium, the new provocative fragrance for women from yves saint laurent. 

a glam rock fragrance full of mystery and energy, black opium is an irresistible gourmand floral with notes of: black coffee, for a shot of adrenaline; white florals, to instantly seduce; and vanilla, for sweetness and sensuality. these sensual ingredients are bound by a warm undertone of white musk. 

what’s stopping you? 
""black opium is definitely set to seduce a whole new generation of fragrance fans. from its java 'jolt' of coffee through to the warm, sensual basenotes, it's very, very wearable - but excitingly edgy, too..."" - jo fairley, the perfume society 

ingredients 

the fragrance composition:
when the electrifying energy of black coffee meets the assertive femininity of white flowers. a vibrant, sensual and addictive contrast of light and dark. 

top notes:
black coffee accord 
mandarine 
bergamot

heart notes: 
orange blossom 
tuberose 
jasmin sambac

base notes: 
white musk 
vanilla beans 
cashmeran

olfactive family:
oriental, floral, gourmand

how to use black opium eau de parfum
spray black opium eau de parfum onto your skin, focusing on the warmer areas of the body with the fragrance: behind your neck, onto the inside of your wrist and underneath your earlobes. alternatively, spray generously in front of you and walk forwards, immersing yourself in the perfume.

Title: L'homme le parfum
Description:
description & benefits

discover a bold and woody fragrance in l'homme le parfum - made for men who are truly magnetic. this eau de parfum is a warm and woody interpretation of the classic l'homme eau de toilette. a mix of cardamon, basil, seductive cedarwood ysl brings you a lasting, more intense fragrance for the modern man. 

the inspiration

as an epitome of attractive charisma, his effortless elegance draws all the eyes on him. a quintessence of l'homme's dna, the fragrance shows a powerful and refined interpretation of the iconic eau de toilette, available now in a more intense, longer lasting eau de parfum.

the scent

it opens on a fresh fruity top accord and develops into a rich blend of precious ambery woods, then giving way to a strongly faceted cedar. layer with l’homme deodorant for protection and a fragrance scent that will last all day long. 

the bottle

l'homme le parfum's bottle design presents a new color - a bold blue, with a subtle downward gradiant on the glass a nod to the lasting power of ink, a apt symbol of modernity for the modern man.

Title: Blue man eau de toilette
Description:
a dynamic scent which plays on contrasts like the multi-facetted jimmy choo man blue himself, casual yet elegant.

on top, clary sage’s aromatic imprint strikes a balance between freshness and refined texture. the intense texture of leather reveals itself in the heart of the fragrance. the creamy sensuality of sandalwood provides a distinctive and addictive drydown.

jimmy choo man blue is an instinctive woody aromatic leathery scent.

Title: Modern princess woman eau de parfum
Description:
lanvin explores a new vision of a woman: one who lives in mysterious ways, a rebellious adventurer.

the fruity duo of pink apple and redcurrants brings a crisp and tangy freshness. the middle notes are more womanly, with a great deal of self-confidence and attitude. the dual personality of jasmine, at once delicate and carnal, flirts with the elegance of freesia. the last woman to reveal herself is an extremely sensual one, transformed even into a femme fatale with vanilla orchid.

Title: Rochas mademoiselle woman eau de parfum
Description:
mademoiselle rochas

reflecting parisian chic, mademoiselle rochas has that delicious, irresistible «je ne sais quoi» that casts a spell with its floral fruity trail.

its top notes reveal the bold pairing of a deliciously devoured toffee apple and bursts of redcurrant, with ivy leaf refreshing these delectable delights.

at its heart, sumptuous jasmine swirls with eternal rose and adorable, crisp violet.

finally, the fragrance is enveloped in the voluptuous, addictive notes of sandalwood, ambergris and whipped-cream musk.

Title: Rochas mademoiselle woman eau de parfum
Description:
mademoiselle rochas

reflecting parisian chic, mademoiselle rochas has that delicious, irresistible «je ne sais quoi» that casts a spell with its floral fruity trail.

its top notes reveal the bold pairing of a deliciously devoured toffee apple and bursts of redcurrant, with ivy leaf refreshing these delectable delights.

at its heart, sumptuous jasmine swirls with eternal rose and adorable, crisp violet.

finally, the fragrance is enveloped in the voluptuous, addictive notes of sandalwood, ambergris and whipped-cream musk.

Title: Y man eau de parfum
Description:
introducing the new y eau de parfum by yves saint laurent. an authentic fragrance expression capturing the essence of modern men.


y by yves saint laurent is not the story of one man but of a whole generation: a creative generation of men who dare to follow their passions and carve their own paths. from inspiration, through hard work and collaboration, to self-accomplishment and success.

the y eau de parfum man has accomplished his dreams and is moving towards a new tomorrow. he’s a man willing to share his ideas with a focus on improving the world; a man established, confident and capable of facing the challenges presented to him. he’s one step further on the route to accomplishment.

the fragrance
y eau de parfum for men is a light & dark fougère fragrance, featuring fresh citrus and aromatic notes followed by a deeper intensity of sensual woods. it perfectly complements the multifaceted personality traits of the y man.

the start of the scent is fresh, a tangy and explosive duet of bergamot and ginger. a freshness contrasted and emphasized by a fruity, juicy and crunchy green apple. sage and juniper redraw a powerful masculinity boosted by elegant notes of geranium absolute to provide freshness and contrast. the background of the scent is more intense, more sensual and more masculine with the addition of vetiver that reinforces the mysterious depth of olibanum and tonka bean.

the bottle
the y eau de parfum for men’s iconic bottle is an expression of modernity. a sharp & minimal design, sliced with the strong y identity as a creative signature. the bottle is a dark reflection of the intense juice within – an object to give you the power to create who you are.

Title: Instant eye make-up remover
Description:
which skin type is it good for?
âœ” normal
âœ” oily
âœ” combination
âœ” dry
âœ” sensitive 

what it is:
a gentle, effective eye makeup remover. 

solutions for:
- dryness 

if you want to know more…
this product comfortably removes heavy or waterproof eye makeup—without leaving behind an oily residue for a refreshed, clean complexion. it contains an array of ingredients to improve your skin care regimen: volatile ultra-fine oils to remove makeup, cornflower and rose water to comfort, soften, and moisturize delicate skin around the eyes, and soya proteins to help protect eyelashes.

Title: My land man eau de toilette
Description: trussardi my land expresses the distinctive features and the very heart and sole of the centenary brand that it represents. the name harks back to the feeling of belonging and connection with your own land, expressed in the fragrance’s notes. the powerful woody notes mingle with the leather, bergamot and green mandarin to create an original and vibrant olfactory experience, while the refined lavender notes juxtapose with the unexpected hint of calone on the finish. the designer bottle features a stylish grip detail around the sides in real italian leather embossed with trussardi’s elegant emblem.

Title: My land man eau de toilette
Description: trussardi my land expresses the distinctive features and the very heart and sole of the centenary brand that it represents. the name harks back to the feeling of belonging and connection with your own land, expressed in the fragrance’s notes. the powerful woody notes mingle with the leather, bergamot and green mandarin to create an original and vibrant olfactory experience, while the refined lavender notes juxtapose with the unexpected hint of calone on the finish. the designer bottle features a stylish grip detail around the sides in real italian leather embossed with trussardi’s elegant emblem.

Title: Eclat d'arpege man eau de toilette
Description:
the new masculine fragrance eclat d’arpège pour homme is a stopover in the heart of the mediterranean.the charismatic and magnetic eclat d’arpège man attracts everyone’s eye. a promise of refreshment, a thirst-quenching, aquatic vision.

the glass of the bottle reveals the azure blue fragrance and reflects light. the signature plexiglas box is enhanced with smoked brown color.

the aquatic and fresh fragrance reveals its seductive power. in the top notes, a dazzling freshness unveils a cocktail of sparkling citrus fruits. this invigoration sensation continues with the heart notes thanks to aromatic accents. based on a virile accord of blue cedar, the base notes evoke elegance.

Title: Eclat d'arpege man eau de toilette
Description:
the new masculine fragrance eclat d’arpège pour homme is a stopover in the heart of the mediterranean.the charismatic and magnetic eclat d’arpège man attracts everyone’s eye. a promise of refreshment, a thirst-quenching, aquatic vision.

the glass of the bottle reveals the azure blue fragrance and reflects light. the signature plexiglas box is enhanced with smoked brown color.

Title: Eclat arpege woman eau de parfum
Description:
éclat d’arpège is an invigorating fruity floral composition, artfully blending femininity and sensuality, spontaneity and elegance.

with a strong appeal to emotions, éclat d'arpège is a modern creation on the theme of love. fresh and joyful, gourmand notes of lilac and sicilian lemon rapidly give way to heart notes of green-tea leaves and peach-tree leaves. the base notes of cedar and musk warm up the fragrance.

Title: Signature man eau de toilette
Description:
jimmy choo man is an effervescent fragrance that captures the spirit of the jimmy choo man: an effortless attitude and a confident, overtly masculine style with a refined sense for detail and a rebellious sense of humour.

a woody aromatic fougère which opens on lavender notes blended with mandarin. in the heart, crisp notes of geranium accompany pineapple leaf resulting in a vibrant scent. finally, the most beautiful part of patchouli, patchouli heart, is a sophisticated signature of the fragrance.

the dark grey smoked bottle, inspired by an antique hip flask, feels innately masculine with strong and clean lines.

Description:

engineered with a flexible massage applicator.

Title: Alien man eau de toilette
Description:
with alien man, men find their inner strength and achieve their dreams. half-god, half-man, experience an extraordinary adventure where serenity meets power. 
an assertive and irresistible fragrance, leather and cashmeran wood transform you into a mugler man, while a hint of osmanthus ties it in with its alter ego, alien. an exquisite bottle with a masculine design in synergy with alien.

the alien man by mugler fragrance for men is part of the leather woody aromatic fragrance family.

Title: My clarins re-fresh hydrating beauty mist
Description:
a quick spritz of this fruity-floral beauty water moisturizes, boosts radiance and revives skin throughout the day. lightweight formula contains a healthy cocktail of fig and acerola seed extracts—plus softening robinia flower water. this alcohol-free formula is so gentle, you can even spray it over your eyes.

my clarins exclusive healthy in & out complex is comprised of organic coconut water to put nutrients into the skin and alpenrose extract to flush out toxins and pollutants.

your vegan friendly recipe - free of phthalates, parabens, and sulfates - for waking skin up in the morning, revitalizing it throughout the day, and soothing it before bed. my clarins is free of all animal-derived ingredients and was not tested on animals.

benefits

  • gentle, alcohol-free formula

  • preps skin for day/night treatments

  • refreshes and hydrates

  • softens, soothes and relaxes skin

  • promotes a healthy-looking, radiant glow

  • healthy in & out complex

  • dermatologist tested

Title: Mon paris woman eau de parfum
Description:
capturing the spirit of an intense love affair that lives in the euphoria of the moment, ysl beauté introduces mon paris perfume - a new expression of love today, inspired by the city of lovers, paris. 

mon paris is a fragrance which urges you to seize the moment; transcend the present; and prepare to fall head over heels into the arms of a passionate love. a subversive reinvention of the traditional chypre, the new floral perfume turns the traditional model upside down, by introducing a brave, bold narcotic white chypre fit for love today.

spell-binding, head-spinning, mon paris perfume captivates from the very first time it is worn thanks to its ultra-pure radiance, which binds patchouli to luminous, white notes, and balances it with the sensuality of musk.

mon paris white chypre ingredients:

top notes:
pear & fruit
be exhilarated with the exciting and vibrant juicy notes.

heart notes:
datura & white flowers
feel the head-spin with the forbidden floral radiance. the signature ingredient datura orchid is a legendary and bewitching flower known to take on more sensuality as the night develops.

base notes:
patchouli & white musk
lose your senses with the white musk and rotating patchouli. the reminder that love is addictive however crazy and out of control.

the iconic multi-faceted bottle with the cool black lavaliere and rock leather ties is a must for your dressing table - look into the mon paris perfume bottle and turn your world upside down.

how to use mon paris eau de parfum
spray mon paris eau de parfum onto your skin, ensuring you spray the warmer areas of your body with the perfume: the insides of the wrist and below the earlobes.

application

top notes:
pear & fruit
be exhilarated with the exciting and vibrant juicy notes.

heart notes:
datura & white flowers
feel the head-spin with the forbidden floral radiance. the signature ingredient datura orchid is a legendary and bewitching flower known to take on more sensuality as the night develops.

base notes:

the iconic multi-faceted bottle with the cool black lavaliere and rock leather ties is a must for your dressing table - look into the mon paris perfume bottle and turn your world upside down.

Title: Black opium intense woman  eau de parfum
Description:
what it is

an electrifying and bold interpretation of the iconic black opium signature. notes of coffee surrounded by the thrill of absinthe and orange blossom.

what it does

black opium eau de parfum intense is the stronger, bolder and more seductive take on the classic eau de parfum. the opening notes of adrenaline-rich coffee give way to a vibrant heart of delicate orange blossom, energized by a thrilling aura of blue absinthe.

keywords

coffee  absinthe  orange blossom

type

women's fragrance

Title: Le parfum royal woman eau de parfum
Description:
royalty has a new scent : le parfum royal.
bold, powerful and feminine, this ambery floral chypre reinvents the couture house’s olfactory signature of orange blossom and patchouli. a fragrance for all women to reveal their strength, power and aura.
crowned with mandarin combined with a radiant accord, the fragrance unveils a heart of rose and neroli and finally leaves a majestic trail of sandalwood, amber and vanilla.
