Title: For her  eau de toilette
Description:
narciso rodriguez for her eau de toilette is a crisp, woody fragrance for women with prevalent musky tones. it is clean, modern and timeless.   

 

flower honey accord: orange blossom, osmanthus, musk (solar) 

amber light accord: amber, musk (soft), vanilla 

tactile wood accord: vetiver, musk   

 

100ml eau de toilette spray, 75ml body lotion, 10ml eau de toilette purse spray

Title: Gentle care roll on deodorant
Description:
what it is
delicately-scented, alcohol-free antiperspirant and deodorant keeps underarms dry and odor-free all day long. formulated with natural plant extracts of buchu leaf, witch hazel, and rosemary, this non-irritating formula works to regulate perspiration and leaves skin feeling soft, fresh, and comfortable. non-sticky texture glides on without leaving white residue. gentle enough for the even the most sensitive skin.

skin type: all skin types
use: apply to clean, dry skin daily.

benefits
long-lasting deodorant and antiperspirant
non-irritating, alcohol-free formula
leaves skin feeling soft, fresh, and comfortable
no white residue

Title: Extra-firming night cream - dry skin
Description: an ideal night cream for visibly firming dry skin and reducing the appearance of wrinkles while you sleep. the skin is visibly firmed, rejuvenated. on waking, it appears smoother, better nourished and more even. clarins anti-pollution complex.

Title: Extra-firming night cream - dry skin
Description: an ideal night cream for visibly firming dry skin and reducing the appearance of wrinkles while you sleep. the skin is visibly firmed, rejuvenated. on waking, it appears smoother, better nourished and more even. clarins anti-pollution complex.

Title: Nomade woman eau de toilette
Description:
chloe- chloe nomade eau de toilette

chloé nomade captures the essence of a woman open to the beauty of the world. the chloé woman has a sense of freedom and natural and immutable elegance. self-confident and intriguing, she is a woman who grows and is realized through experiences and encounters, affirming herself without ever imposing herself. chloé nomade is a mix of strength and kindness: the facets of this flowered chypre blow like winds of freedom. the intense mineral nature of oak moss is enveloped by the voluptuous sweetness of the mirabelle plum and the freshness of the freesia.

olfactory pyramid:

head notes:

  • orange

  • lemon

  • bergamot

  • european plum

heart notes:

  • rose

  • fresia

  • fishing

  • jasmine

base notes:

  • white musk

  • sandalwood

  • patchouli

  • lichen

  • amber wood

Title: L`eau woman eau de toilette
Description:
jimmy choo l'eau

jimmy choo l’eau is an expression of the dynamic, alluring and adventurous jimmy choo woman. as delicate as she is defiant, as elegant as she is audacious, the jimmy choo woman’s duality is matched by l’eau’s strong, free-spirited yet resolutely feminine scent.

the fragrance combines a symphony of floral, fresh and musky notes.

Title: 1911 donna woman eau de parfum
Description: trussardi donna is inspired by the enveloping femininity of its bright white bottle featuring golden accents. this scent will take your senses on a journey from purity to passion. on the first inhale, you catch fruity hints created by the vibrant notes of yuzu, slightly unripe citron and the freshness of water fruit. the middle notes unfold through the light hints of white flowers, the sunny character of orange blossoms and the sophistication of jasmine tea, finishing off with delicate water lily. the base notes envelope the nose with their intense woody nuances. trussardi donna pulls the veil back on an irresistibly seductive fragrance.

Title: La vie est belle en rose woman eau de toilette
Description:
la vie est belle en rose introduces a fruity floriental to the la vie est belle family. la vie est belle is a french expression that means "life is beautiful." this new eau de toilette is composed of a floral heart of iris infused with peony and roses, and enlightened by a fruity smile.

what else you need to know: 
"la vie en rose" is a french expression that translates to life seen through pink tinted glasses. la vie est belle en rose paints your world in pink hues, inviting you to always see the brighter side of life, its pink side, cultivating happiness. this colorful fragrance spreads optimism with every spritz, allowing those it reaches to experience "la vie en rose" in all its fullness.

Title: Girl of now forever woman eau de parfum
Description: girl of now forever is about a new adventure of the girl of now girl band. a new fragrance infused with good vibes. its bold optimism merges with a refreshing wave of lebanese lemonade in which lemon zest and raspberry notes intertwine. its elegant and joyful femininity is expressed by rosa cassia, the exclusive rose-blackcurrant accord. its unforgettable patchouli trail nestles within sensual cashmeran and vanilla. more than a fragrance, it’s an ode to youth, to friendship, to life!

Title: Bois de vetiver man eau de toilette
Description:
• top notes: sanguine orange, grapefruit and mint.

  • middle notes: geranio and rosa.

Title: Floral woman eau de toilette
Description:
jimmy choo floral eau de toilette is a light and fruity floral that features the magnolia flower at the heart of the fragrance. this fresh, radiant scent that will take you to a journey through a spring garden with delicate blooms in abundance.

top notes: mandarin, nectarine, bergamot

heart notes: apricot blossom, sweet pea, magnolia

base notes: ambroxan, musk, woods (blonde)

family: floral

type: edt, eau de toilette spray

launched: 2019

Title: Rochas mademoiselle couture woman eau de parfum
Description:
mademoiselle rochas reinvents her original signature to become couture: a refined, elegant eau de parfum. a new opus, embodying resolutely parisian chic, diffuses absolute femininity in an intense woody floral breath.

a trio of notes, bergamot, pear and pink peppercorn, deliver a radiant opening. middle notes are based on orange blossom upheld by heliotrope and lily of the valley. in the base notes, sandalwood melds with musk, while tonka bean absolute reveals the addictive facet of the scent.

Title: Rochas mademoiselle couture woman eau de parfum
Description:
mademoiselle rochas reinvents her original signature to become couture: a refined, elegant eau de parfum. a new opus, embodying resolutely parisian chic, diffuses absolute femininity in an intense woody floral breath.

Title: Absolue precious cells rich cream
Description:
why you'll love it
the new absolue soft cream, infused with grand rose extracts helps your skin regenerate in as fast as 3 weeks.

lancôme preserves the life power of the rose: through sophisticated extraction processes, we have crafted an exclusive blend of grand rose extracts to infuse our sovereigns skincare collection - absolue. 

benefits
• after 1 day skin feels nurtured and soothed.
• in 1 week, it looks revitalized and regains luminosity.
• in 1 month, skin is regenerated and visibly transformed.
• accelerated skin cell renewal is clinically proven.
• skin feels firmer, plumper 
• wrinkles & fine lines appear diminished for smoother, younger looking skin 

ideal for
âœ” all skin types
âœ” dullness and uneven texture 
âœ” fine lines, loose skin and wrinkles 
âœ” dryness 

formula facts
from a unique self-regenerative rose, extracted by our french experts to formulate a magnificent rejuvenating skincare for dry skins. 

how to apply
before you start, blend and warm up the texture with your fingertips. soothe & comfort - apply it on the face by using light pressures. reactivate & illuminate - spread the product across the forehead, cheeks and chin in long gliding strokes, working from the center to the outside of the face.

Title: Guerlain homme man eau de parfum
Description:
guerlain homme is an authentic call to adventure. keen on discovery, man flourishes in a nature that he makes his own.

guerlain homme eau de parfum revels in contrast: freshness and strength united in a mysterious and intense fragrance. this eau de parfum surprises with its vibrant freshness lent by the mojito accord, the fresh floral accord and the green woody accord, which come together in an intense composition. this strength ensures its powerful and refined trail. guerlain homme boasts a bolder, woodier personality.

modern in its geometry and rigorous in its form, the bottle – iconic of the guerlain men’s fragrance collection – and its luxurious wooden cap are timeless figures of french elegance.

fragrance

citrus aromatic woody.
powerful, sensual, sophisticated.

the mojito accord (sweet lime, peppermint, rum) is made explosive thanks to an extra splash of rum. the floral accord recalls freshness and refinement. the green woody accord is reorchestrated for a more powerful trail and sensuality. patchouli, cedar and vetiver are enhanced.

Title: L'instant de guerlain pour homme eau de toilette
Description:
this olfactory version arose from an encounter. that of the guerlain perfumer and the inhabitants of the high plateaus that overlook the city of coimbatore in india. this is where thierry wasser discovered a new vetiver essence with incredible power and elegance. this indian vetiver immediately reminded the perfumer of bourbon vetiver, which has disappeared today. grown in a sustainable manner and encouraging the development of local populations, this vetiver is majestically showcased in guerlain homme l'eau boisée.

fragrance

luminous woody.
fresh, warm, sensual.

this paradoxical fragrance skates between fire and ice, flamboyant virility and discreet femininity. the luminous freshness of citrus crystals and star anise, embellished by floral notes, contrasts with the warmth of patchouli, hibiscus seeds and cocoa to offer, through this luminous woody scent, a unique moment after which everything will be different.

Title: L'instant de guerlain pour homme eau de parfum
Description:
l’instant de guerlain pour homme highlights a unique moment: the one in which a man takes the initiative and after which everything will be different.
this woody, sparkling, seductive fragrance was composed of contrasts. it is nothing less than surprising.

modern in its geometry and rigorous in its form, the bottle – iconic of the guerlain men’s fragrance collection – and its luxurious wooden cap are timeless figures of french elegance.

fragrance

luminous woody.
gourmand, warm, fresh.

there are no languid half-measures about the composition of this eau de parfum. the fresh notes of citrus and star anise embrace the light before melting into a deeply sensual and gourmand woody accord of patchouli and cocoa.

Title: L'homme ideal eau de toilette
Description:
the ideal man is a myth. his fragrance, a reality. guerlain decodes men’s aspirations and creates for them a concentrate of ideal: l'homme idéal eau de toilette.

the ideal fragrance ? the intelligence of citrus, the beauty of an “amaretto” accord and the strength of a woody leather note. three adjectives, three accords for this fresh woody fragrance that will trigger your full potential

the ideal bottle? masculine, luxurious and distinguished…
a mysterious pack, a graphic, black and white object, a flashcode as a door to a digital universe.
the bottle – square, facetted and streamlined, luxurious. radical matte black lacquer side faces. a decidedly masculine, heavy cap that is also matte and borrows its guilloché detailing from the world of watchmaking

fragrance

for the first time, an almond scent for men composed by guerlain around three accords
the intelligence of a sparkling and perfectly fresh top note: citrus, rosemary, orange blossom
the beauty of an incredibly sensual “amaretto” heart note based on an almond/tonka bean duo.
the strength of a woody leather base note, definitely masculine: indian vetiver, cedar and leather given a contemporary interpretation.

Title: L'homme ideal eau de toilette
Description:
the ideal man is a myth. his fragrance, a reality. guerlain decodes men’s aspirations and creates for them a concentrate of ideal: l'homme idéal eau de toilette.

Title: La petite robe noire eau de toilette
Description:
in la petite robe noire’s perfume wardrobe, i am the cocktail dress.
a perfumed creation by guerlain: an eau de toilette swirling fresh and floral, embroidered with citrus and white musks notes.
the legendary "heart-shaped" bottle has been boldly reinterpreted with a modern touch. its crystalline transparency, tinged with a delicate, powdery pink, reveals a sophisticated strapless dress, ready to dance!
i am absolutely essential and utterly irresistible. i am the chic and very glamorous perfumed creation by guerlain. i am la petite robe noire.

fragrance

fresh floral.
fresh, delicate, swirling.

in the first wink, a bouquet of rose, jasmine and orange blossom takes flight to a delicate melody. the second twirl takes place as cherry, apple and blackcurrant enter the stage, refreshed by explosive green notes. finally, white amber temptations are revealed and a cloud of white musks envelops the ensemble in a cosy halo.

Title: Idylle eau de parfum
Description:
in this combination of the chypre sensuality and the intimate facet of white musks with a bouquet of flowers, the symbol of a declaration of love, thierry wasser expresses the sensuous and romantic idea of the idyll.

embrace your perfume in the mythical bee bottle.
designed in 1853 by pierre-françois-pascal guerlain for the empress eugénie, wife of napoléon iii, this precious bottle is adorned with the symbol of the empire: the bee, which is now la maison guerlain’s emblem.

fragrance

idylle opens with a shower of flowers, a fresh and joyful bouquet composed of lily of the valley, peony, freesia and white lilac. the heart reveals a jasmine mixed with a blend of bulgarian roses. the base adds a sensual chypre accord composed of patchouli and white musks.

Title: Relax body treatment oil
Description: this relaxing body treatment oil — with 100% pure plant extracts, including geranium, petit grain, camomile and basil — helps relieve stress and fatigue for a total feeling of well-being. hazelnut oil locks in moisture to leave body skin soft and satin-smooth. helps soothe tired muscles after exercise. preservative-free.

Title: Relax body treatment oil
Description: this relaxing body treatment oil — with 100% pure plant extracts, including geranium, petit grain, camomile and basil — helps relieve stress and fatigue for a total feeling of well-being. hazelnut oil locks in moisture to leave body skin soft and satin-smooth. helps soothe tired muscles after exercise. preservative-free.

Title: Tonic bath & shower concentrate
Description:
what it is
invigorating gel body wash that leaves every inch of skin soft, clean, and beautifully conditioned. revitalizes skin and senses with energizing, aromatic essential oils of rosemary, field mint, and organic horse chestnut extract for a visible toning effect. sensorial gel formula—with gently cleansing organic soapwort extract—water activates into a fine, lightweight foam that rinses easily, leaving skin comfortable, smooth and delicately perfumed for a spa-fresh feeling of well-being. silky lather is gentle enough for the most sensitive skin.

the packaging is eco-designed, 100% recyclable, and made with less plastic. now available in an eco-refill format.

follow with tonic sugar polisher, tonic body treatment oil, and tonic hydrating oil-balm for a spa-fresh toning effect.

skin type: normal, oily, combination, dry
use: apply to moist skin in shower or bath. 

benefits
gently cleanses
softens and hydrates
energizes and visibly tones
revitalizes the senses
innovation and plant expertise
this formula contains a minimum of 96% ingredients of natural origin, including new foaming agents that are more sustainable and just as effective and sensorial as those used previously in clarins bath & shower concentrates.

clarins plus
clarins aroma care formulas contain a minimum of 92% ingredients of natural origin—the perfect synergy of fragrant essential oils and precious plant extracts to soothe your skin and boost your mood for a total feeling of comfort and well-being. create an at-home spa with aromatherapeutic treatments for every inch of skin—clarins’ holistic vision for body and mind since 1954.

results
96%*
softens skin

80%* visibly tones skin
80%** invigorating aroma
*satisfaction test - 104 women - after 14 days of use
**satisfaction test - 104 women - after the first use

ingredients
aqua/water/eau. glycerin. caprylyl/capryl glucoside. disodium cocoyl glutamate. sodium lauryl glucose carboxylate. cocamidopropyl betaine. lauryl glucoside. xanthan gum. sorbitan caprylate. linalool. phenoxyisopropanol. sodium cocoyl glutamate. rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf oil. disodium edta. mentha arvensis leaf oil. sorbic acid. pelargonium graveolens flower oil. limonene. citronellol. sodium benzoate. saponaria officinalis leaf extract. geraniol. aesculus hippocastanum (horse chestnut) seed extract. citric acid. potassium sorbate. [c3906a]
*for informational purposes only. every ingredient list is specific to an individual product reference. all formulas are subject to change. while we endeavor to keep this ingredient list accurate, we cannot guarantee that it is reliable, up-to-date, or error-free. please also refer to the ingredient list on the product’s outer packaging for a complete, accurate, and up-to-date list. organic ingredients are produced in accordance with european regulation (ce 2018/848).

Title: Fresh scrub
Description:
the cream exfoliant that thirsty skin cannot live without...fresh scrub gives your skin a blast of freshness and radiance as it removes impurities and dead skin cells. it contains two sizes of natural cellulose beads derived from wood. the larger ones exfoliate as the smaller ones polish the surface.

how to 

thoroughly cleanse your face, then moisten. warm up a dollop of scrub between your hands. without rubbing or applying pressure, gently massage in avoiding the eye area. rinse with water.

Title: Blue orchid treatment oil - dehydrated skin
Description:
this face oil made from 100% pure plant extracts restores vitality, radiance and freshness to dehydrated skin. a blend of blue orchid extract and essential oil of patchouli, the treatment tones and revitalises parched skin. nourishing hazelnut oil protects against dehydration and leaves the skin supple and satiny soft. absorbs instantly.

how to 

use in the evening after removing all traces of make-up. apply a small amount to the face and neck whilst the skin is still damp from toning lotion. pay special attention to areas of concern. avoid the eye contour. to remove excess, lay a tissue on the face.

Title: Santal treatment oil - dry skin
Description:
what it is:
an extra-soothing treatment oil containing aromatic, 100 percent pure plant extracts to tone, soothe, and comfort dry skin.

what it is formulated to do:
this luxurious oil is enriched with 100 percent pure plant extracts of sandalwood, cardamom, and lavender to tone and calm skin that is dry, irritated, or stressed. hazelnut oil soothes, smooths, and reduces redness while the formula helps prevent moisture loss. when added to your night cream or applied over your toning lotion, it delivers comforting relief. for an extra relaxing sensory experience, warm a drop or two between your hands and inhale.

what it is formulated without:
- parabens

what else you need to know:
for more than 60 years, clarins has incorporated plant extracts and essential oils into their products. the face treatment oils—pure concentrates of nature—were first developed for the spa and today remain among clarins 10 bestselling products.

Title: Relax bath & shower concentrate
Description:
revive your body and destress your mind with clarins relax bath & shower concentrate, a multipurpose foam that can be used as a body wash or a bath soak.

clarins' relax concentrate was made with busy lives in mind. it's the ideal sos after a hard day at work, or after exercise to re-energise and invigorate tired muscles. much more than a shower gel, or a cleanser, this gentle formula puts your wellbeing first, ensuring you feel instantly revived and ready for the day.

a combination of deeply relaxing essential oils, basil, geranium, chamomile, petitgrain, and natural mood-enhancers, st john' s-wort and valerian root extract blend together to ease and soothe. this foam's gentle cleansing base of coconut oil keeps skin soft, making sure this bath and shower concentrate can be enjoyed by even the most sensitive of skin types.

why we love it

now formulated without colouring agents in 70% recycled packaging, clarins' commitment to greener beauty makes us love this formula even more.

as soon as you unscrew the cap of the relax concentrate, its soothing aroma instantly awakens you. when applied as part of a ritual inside and outside of the bath, you reap the relaxing benefits of its calming scent and softening texture.

how to use it

it's best to use this concentrate as a ritual. start by pouring three to four capfuls into the bath and run warm water. before stepping in, massage the foam all over the body with a damp sponge. if you haven't got time for a bath, use as an all-over body wash, then rinse.

top tip: try massaging the foam into the shoulders and base of the scalp before cleansing. when used in conjunction with pressure from the showerhead or warm bath, built-up tension feels eased.

works well with

to ensure your skin feels soft and hydrated after you bathe, apply one of clarins’ best-selling body moisturisers all over.

Title: Angel woman eau de toilette
Description:
angel reivents itself for women in love with adventure. women who dream of living the present moment and pushing their limits. their star embodies their sense of lightness. their scent says their desire for freedom.

angel eau de toilette brings a new radiance to the legendary angel fragrance. angel eau de toilette is a gourmand fruity floral eau de parfum.

powerful scent, angel unleashes the power of every woman. angel eau de toilette expresses a new form of the angel femininity : terribly irresistible and luminous.

angel, wilder than dreams.

Description:

Title: Run wild woman eau de parfum
Description:
discover run wild davidoff, the new eau de parfum for women. 
discover a feminine fragrance inspired by the preciousness of nature. run wild, a callback to breathtaking nature, precious and floral sensuality.

Title: Pepe jeans man eau de toilette
Description:
the new masculine perfume of pepe jeans is the elegance of simplicity with a refined masculine freshness. the pepe jeans london fragrance for him is a unique blend that reflects exactly the essence of the brand, determined and vibrant.

- eau de toilette

- 100 ml

- fresh aroma with citrus touches of bergamot and mandarin

- notes of lavender and coffee liqueur

- creative and energetic touch

- masculine, fresh and vibrant fragance

- cocktail shaker-shaped bottle

Title: For her oud musc  eau de parfum
Description:
narciso rodriguez oud musc is the last fourth creation of the oriental musc editions. this rich, intoxicating and captivating creation reveals all its splendour through the precious oud wood accord, the intense heart of musc and the myrtle. oriental woody spicy musky 100ml. made in france.

notes

  • spicy accord

  • black pepper

  • myrtle

  • oriental heart of musc

  • intesne woody accord

  • oud wood accord

  • incense

Title: Un mastige man eau de toilette
Description: un mastige man eau de tiolette

Title: Signature woman eau de toilette
Description: an exotic fragrance for the strong and modern jimmy choo woman. floral and fruity, with a green top note, heart notes of tea rose and tiger orchid and bottom notes of vibrant wood and cedar wood. exotic prints are part of the jimmy choo dna and the python print wrapped around the packaging is an iconic signature reference to this.

Title: Signature woman eau de toilette
Description: an exotic fragrance for the strong and modern jimmy choo woman. floral and fruity, with a green top note, heart notes of tea rose and tiger orchid and bottom notes of vibrant wood and cedar wood. exotic prints are part of the jimmy choo dna and the python print wrapped around the packaging is an iconic signature reference to this.

Title: Extra-firming eye
Description:
a groundbreaking 2-in-1 formula combines the efficacy of a serum and the comfort of a balm for youthful, brighter-looking eyes.

extra-firming eye visibly minimizes the signs of a hectic lifestyle with a potent blend of albizia extract, caffeine and horse chestnut escin that targets dark circles, puffiness and signs of fatigue. kangaroo flower and mitracarpus extras visibly firm, lift and fight wrinkles. clarins’ new generation mother-of-pearl illuminates the skin so eyes appear brighter.

this innovative formula can be used daily or as a relaxing 10-minute eye mask that leaves eye contours looking tension-free and refreshed.

pair with extra-firming phyto-serum - the ultimate power lift duo

how to apply:
2-in-1 use:
1. daily, morning and/or evening: apply with fingertips to lower and upper eyelids, starting from the inside corners, and working outward.
2. use 1 to 2 times a week as a 10-minute eye mask. apply using clarins’ exclusive draining pressure point method to visibly relax muscles, release toxins and smooth tension lines.
3. follow with extra-firming phyto-serum.

key ingredients:
a potent blend of albizia extract, caffeine and horse chestnut escin targets dark circles, puffiness and signs of fatigue

kangaroo flower and mitracarpus extracts visibly firm, lift and fight
wrinkles.
.

palmitoyl glycine visibly smoothes tension lines.

glycerine and organic almond oil nourish, hydrate and soothe the delicate skin around eyes.

mother-of-pearl illuminates the skin so eyes appear brighter.

what else you need to know:
83% of the ingredients are plant-derived.

in accordance with clarins’ fair trade partnership with jardins du monde, the purchase price of mitracarpus extract includes a contribution to improve the social and economic development of the local communities that harvest this ingredient.

white lupine extract is a new clarins plant discovery.


about the brand
at the core of clarins is a love of all people, our planet and nature. as pioneers of plant science, for more than 60 years clarins research has traveled the globe in search of the most powerful effective plant ingredients. clarins uses over 250 natural plant extracts in its formulas, and each ingredient is sourced with the utmost care for the environment to protect our planet’s biodiversity.

visible results:

immediately:
92% hydrated eye contour*
91% softer eye contour*
90% nourished eye contour*

Title: Byzance woman eau de parfum
Description:
byzance is an oriental floral whose notes provoke addiction.
at the head, it displays a luminous accord of bergamot and pear, whose brilliance is underlined by the sweetness of neroli. this radiant start is followed by a luxuriant bouquet, where the rose, the freesia and the flower of heliotrope bloom. to add to the intensity of this bewitching scent, the base notes unveil themselves: the voluptuous vanilla absolute, surrounded by blond woods and soft musks.

Title: Byzance woman eau de parfum
Description:

Title: Narciso for him extreme bleu noir eau de toilette
Description: for him bleu noir eau de toilette extrême is an urban and modern reinterpretation of freshness: the signature musk heart is juxtaposed with fresh citrus notes and woody, sensual base notes. sharp, fresh & vibrant, this new fragrance revists masculine duality: the musk heart is wrapped in vert de mandarine and basil to create freshness. woody cedar and ebony notes combine to perfect this long-lasting fragrance. reviving the sleek and minimalist design of the for him monolith, the inner coating of the bottle is showcased by a graduated frosted effect and clear lid to illustrate the concept of freshness.

Title: Narciso for him extreme bleu noir eau de toilette

Title: Hydra zen night cream
Description:
hydra zen anti-stress night cream recharges your skin with moisture every night. our night-time moisture booster soothes the skin.

the hydrating silky smooth night cream will make your skin feel moisturised and refreshed.

Title: Le parfum essentiel woman eau de parfum
Description:
the new fragrance from elie saab: fruity tangerine paired with a powdery, gentle, enveloping gardenia and powerful cedarwood essence.

elie saab presents a new interpretation of its signature fragrance for women who know how to focus on the essentials in their lives. a beautiful escape from the hustle and bustle of the city to find your roots, your values yourself. a moment of luxury.
the elie saab signature of orange blossom and patchouli is reinvented with this fragrance. fruity tangerine in the top note, while creamy white gardenia in the middle note expresses the essence of femininity. as a strong signature of this radiantly feminine composition, a pure cedar essence shows the real power of the elie saab woman and melts with her skin.
the elegant calligraphic seal with its intertwined initials is placed in gold on the back of the transparent glass bottle and frames the gold-framed elie saab logo. the delicate pink color of the fragrance expresses the pure femininity of the new creation.

Title: Le parfum essentiel woman eau de parfum
Description:

Title: Tresor a la folie woman eau de parfum
Description:
la nuit trésor à la folie perfume for women embodies the one and only moment when true love is at its climax. a unique moment of “lâcher prise”, meaning, when time is suspended. lovers are transcended beyond themselves and experience the thrill of love: an indescribable feeling that makes you forget everything and lose control. 

notes:

la nuit trésor à la folie perfume is made with dazzling raw materials: a burning heart of rose essence, inflamed by the sensuous addiction of bourbon vanilla and intensified by smouldering patchouli essence.

Title: Eye contour gel
Description:
eye contour gel

reduces puffiness and dark circles
skin type: normal, dry, combination, oily

clarins' cooling, non-oily gel minimizes the look of puffiness and dark circles - refreshing, hydrating and resting the delicate skin around eyes. wild rose drains toxins to take down puffiness and dark circles. concentrated rose water relaxes, softens and soothes. palmetto refreshes, decongests and tones eyelids. preps skin for perfect eye make-up application and lasting wear. gentle enough for the most sensitive eyes.

in the morning or at any time of the day, apply a very small amount to the eye contour area with light tapping motions. can be applied under or over make-up.

Title: Hand and nail treatment cream
Description:
hands can be particularly damaged and painful when exposed to the agressions of everyday life, such as the weather, water, and the tasks we perform with them. so take time to care for them with clarins professional, emollient-rich moisturizing hand cream—with soothing sesame oil and fortifying japanese mulberry.

the moisturizer forms an invisible protective “glove” that shields hands from the elements, keeping skin smooth and silky and minimising signs of ageing.

softens and comforts chapped, irritated and sore hands, and brings moisture relief to dry skin on hands. helps strengthen nails and condition cuticles for naturally clean, soft and youthful-looking hands.

benefits:

  • softens the hands and hydrates.
  • protects from environmental damage (cold, sun, hard water, chapping).
  • diminishes dark spots.
  • regenerates and strengthens the nails.
  • this non-sticky cream spreads easily and absorbs instantly.

Title: Hand and nail treatment cream
Description:

Title: Body partner stretch mark expert
Description:
our stretch mark expert, targets stretch marks by preventing them and correcting them, all whilst comforting the skin.

new body partner has been created for those who want to avoid the appearance of stretch marks caused by weight fluctuations especially during and after pregnancy.

its plant powered formula acts on elasticity, firmness and redness. this pro formula is a combination of active ingredients: organic green banana and asiaticosidefrom centella asiatica, to help improve elasticity and firmness whilst soothing your skin.

benefits:

  • safely targets stretch marks
  • comforts the skin
  • promotes visible skin firmness and elasticity
  • soothes and relieves feelings of tightness
  • lightweight, fast-absorbing cream
  • tested and recommended by pregnant women

Title: Flower poppy bouquet woman eau de parfum
Description: flower by kenzo poppy bouquet, the new ultra floral perfume by kenzo. with poppy bouquet, the poppy unveils its full generosity in the bouquet. the fresh scent of nashi pear introduces a sprightly floral burst: a sensual mix-and-match of bulgarian rose and gardenia on a moreish base of almond wood.

Title: Urban hero man eau de parfum
Description:
jimmy choo urban hero, a masculine fragrance, is an ode to the mysterious and confident jimmy choo man. this woody aromatic eau de parfum is inspired by the urban environment. on top, the freshness of precious lemon caviar with its vibrant undertones combines with the warmth of black pepper. its heart opens onto the sensuality of rosewood and the sophistication of vetiver, before unveiling a dry down that combines the urban elegance of grey amber with a note of leather for just a hint of rebellion. it celebrates the intensity and contrasts of modern masculinity, working the codes of street art. the flask-shaped glass bottle is partially clad in metal with a mirror-effect chrome finish, a tribute to the metallic paint used by street artists, its magnetic shade evoking the contemporary urban spirit of masculinity. its weighted silver cap with chevron print and a subtle black logo add a level of refinement and elegance. the box is embossed with a dynamic black graphic linear design. in contrast, the sides are adorned in matte silver which reflect the daring side of the jimmy choo man.

  • scent type: woody
  • top note: lemon caviar
  • heart note: rosewood
  • base note: grey amber
  • a woody aromatic eau de parfum

Description: narciso eau de toilette rouge is an intoxicating counterpart to the narciso eau de parfum rouge. both fragrances celebrate the magical nature of attraction and the fine art of seduction while the new fragrance, narciso eau de toilette rouge, adds a refined quality that’s discreetly dramatic

Title: Mini winter hands
Description: formulated from plant extracts, this fine cream is soft, smooth and protects your hands from attack. moisturizes, regenerates and strengthens your nails. your hands are soft, smooth and satin

Title: Absolue precious cells soft cream refill
Description:
what is absolue?
absolue is lancôme’s legendary skincare collection infused with the renowned power of grand rose extracts. this exceptional range harnesses the revitalizing power of the lancôme rose, selected from 20,000 species for its rare regenerative power.

what is the absolue soft cream:
the absolue soft cream is the hero skincare of our premium absolue range. at the heart of this exceptional cream is our grand rose extracts enriched with lancome rose, rose damascena and centifolia rose. the cream helps promote skin surface cell renewal and leaves skin feeling softer, more supple and comfortable for visible results in as fast as 3 weeks.

which skin concerns does the absolue soft cream target:
the absolue soft cream helps you target dullness, fine lines & wrinkles, to achieve luminous and regenerated skin.

who is the absolue soft cream for:
absolue soft cream is suitable for every woman: all ethnicities, ages, and every skin type - dry, combination/normal and oily.

combine well-being, beauty and your environment with the refillable absolue soft cream. once you run out of your favourite regenerating cream, you can refill it here.

Title: Absolue precious cells eye serum
Description:
what it is
a fresh, indulgent anti-aging serum that reveals a visibly smoother and rested eye contour for a brighter look. day after day, it revitalizes the delicate skin around the eye contours, diminishing the appearance of under-eye wrinkles.

what else you need to know
made with an exclusive blend of grand rose extracts, this revitalizing eye serum targets the delicate skin around the eyes, one of the face's most expressive features. it reveals eye contours that look rested and rejuvenated for a brighter, more youthful look. immediately after use, skin looks fresher and feels hydrated, velvety to the touch. after one week, dark circles look visibly reduced and skin looks smoother, more radiant, even and replumped. in four weeks, the eye contour looks rejuvenated: fine lines look smoothed and under-eye wrinkles look visibly reduced.

instantly*:
• skin around the eye contour looks fresher and seems more comfortable
• it feels hydrated, more elastic and velvety to the touch
• its texture looks improved

after one week
• dark circles looks visibly reduced
• skin around the eye contour looks rested and strengthened - replumped, smoother, more radiant and even
• skin under the brow looks more luminous and tighter, as if lifted

after four weeks*:
• the eye contour looks rejuvenated
• under-eye wrinkles look reduced and fine lines look reduced, as if smoothed

Title: La petite robe noire eau de parfum
Description:
in la petite robe noire’s perfume wardrobe, i am the original dress. 
a perfumed creation by guerlain: an eau de parfum embroidered of the most beautiful "black" notes of perfumery.
the legendary "heart-shaped" bottle has been boldly reinterpreted with a modern touch. its crystalline transparency, fading from black to powdery pink, reveals an iconic little black dress.
i am absolutely essential and utterly irresistible. i am the chic and very glamorous perfumed creation by guerlain. i am la petite robe noire.

fragrance

fruity floral. 

delicious, mischievous, irresistible. 

black cherry blinks the first wink. it is illustrated by a blend of almond, berries and bergamot. the second twirl takes place as rose enters the stage. finally, tonka bean tonka bean appears, leading you into almond seduction, highlighted by black tea for a smoky concoction.

ingredients

alcohol • parfum (fragrance) • aqua (water) • limonene • coumarin • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • citronellol • linalool • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • butylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate • geraniol • bht • citral • benzyl alcohol • farnesol • eugenol • tocopherol • ci 14700 (red 4) • ci 60730 (ext.violet 2) • ci 19140 (yellow 5) • alpha-isomethyl ionone • benzyl benzoate • benzyl salicylate • hydroxycitronellal • isoeugenol

Title: Mon guerlain eau de parfum
Description:
the oriental fragrance enhances exceptional raw materials: french lavender, sambac jasmine, sandalwood and vanilla tahitensis. it expresses the quintessence of a history replete with experiences, nourished by success, expertise and generosity, all infused with the same passion since 1828. 

the “quadrilobe” bottle, created in 1908, established itself as one of guerlain’s iconic bottles. simple and graphic, it echoes an alchemist’s bottle and owes its name “quadrilobe” to its stopper, which is formed from one piece to obtain a shape resembling four lobes. one century later, beautifully enhanced by a luxurious glass weight and a golden adornment, this bottle offers a contrast between strong taut lines and sensual curves, expressing contemporary femininity.

my invisible tattoo, my signature, my perfume, mon guerlain.

fragrance

oriental.

audacious. radiant. sensual. 

french lavender, an exceptional variety grown in provence, shakes up the sensual and enveloping vanilla tahitensis by infusing it with its audacity and freshness. sambac jasmine, gathered at sunrise, gives this composition all of its finesse. sandalwood expresses strength and preserves the mystery of eternal femininity.

 ingredients

alcohol • parfum (fragrance) • aqua (water) • linalool • limonene • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • coumarin • diethylamino hydroxybenzoyl hexyl benzoate • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • butylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate • bht • citral • anise alcohol • benzyl benzoate • geraniol • benzyl salicylate • citronellol • farnesol • benzyl alcohol • isoeugenol • tocopherol • ci 60730 (ext. violet 2) • ci 14700 (red 4) • ci 19140 (yellow 5)

Title: Oud essentiel unisex eau de parfum
Description:
to create the new fragrance in the absolus d’orient collection, guerlain perfumer thierry wasser drew his inspiration from the unique and precious oud wood : oud essentiel. the fragrance is a majestic celebration of this rare ingredient which reveals its true strength and sensuality. 
both mellow and intense, this woody leather fragrance blends the mysterious notes of leather and frankincense and the sweet notes of bulgarian rose in a subtle alchemy.
a unique olfactory encounter between east and west.

fragrance

leather woody.

somptuous, charismatic, seductive.

top notes: saffran notes, pelargonium.
heart notes: agarwood, rose, atlas cedarwood.

ingredients

alcohol • parfum (fragrance) • aqua (water) • citronellol • geraniol • limonene • bht • farnesol • linalool • citral • eugenol • benzyl alcohol • isoeugenol • tocopherol

Title: Terracotta le parfum woman eau de toilette
Description:
as a 30th anniversary tribute to terracotta bronzing powder, guerlain’s in-house perfumer thierry wasser has interpreted the legendary powder as a sun-soaked invitation fragrance. an irresistibly sensual composition, inspired by the radiant realm of terracotta. an immediate departure to an exotic faraway paradise...

fragrance

the fragrance’s intricate harmony opens on captivatingly fresh notes of bergamot, before developing into a heart of tiaré flower and ylang ylang. one of guerlain’s emblematic ingredients, ylang ylang infuses scents with its warmth. its sweet, sensual signature finally reveals a delicious vanilla-tinged dry-down.
the senses are awakened, transported to a faraway land.

 ingredients

alcohol • aqua (water) • parfum (fragrance) • benzyl salicylate • linalool • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • limonene • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • butylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate • benzyl alcohol • bht • benzyl benzoate • geraniol • farnesol • coumarin • isoeugenol • citral • citronellol • eugenol • tocopherol • ci 14700 (red 4) • ci 19140 (yellow 5) • ci 60730 (ext.violet 2) • alpha-isomethyl ionone • hydroxycitronellal

Title: Vetiver man eau de toilette
Description: vetiver by guerlain is a woody aromatic fragrance for men. vetiver was launched in 2000. the nose behind this fragrance is jean-paul guerlain. top notes are bergamot, tobacco, lemon, nutmeg, neroli, coriander and mandarin orange; middle notes are vetiver, pepper, carnation, sage, orris root and sandalwood; base notes are vetiver, oakmoss, leather, myrrh, civet, tonka bean and amber.

Title: L'homme ideal eau de parfum
Description:
the ideal eau de parfum? one that blends captivating almond with a seductive warm vanilla tincture and mysterious leather. a woody oriental combining three ingredients and three accords to boost your powers of seduction and awaken the ideal lover within you.

the ideal bottle? masculine, luxurious and elegant. a square, faceted bottle with clean lines and unique taupe sides in a lacquered matte finish that would highlight the intensity of the fragrance. a bright– yet seductive– orange label. a heavy and decidedly masculine cap with gulloché detail borrowed from the world of watch-making.

fragrance

woody oriental
captivating, seductive, mysterious

 ingredients

alcohol • aqua (water) • parfum (fragrance) • limonene • linalool • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • coumarin • diethylamino hydroxybenzoyl hexyl benzoate • citronellol • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • butylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate • alpha-isomethyl ionone • bht • benzyl benzoate • citral • eugenol • cinnamal • geraniol • benzyl cinnamate • ci 14700 (red 4) • ci 60730 (ext.violet 2) • ci 19140 (yellow 5) • tocopherol • ci 42090 (blue 1)

Title: L'homme ideal l'intense eau de parfum
Description:
the ideal man is a myth. but thanks to guerlain, his fragrance is a reality with l'homme idéal intense. 
the ideal eau de parfum intense? fiery spices, bewitching tonka bean and smoky notes for an utterly intriguing trail. a vigorous, elegant, woody-spicy-oriental fragrance.
the ideal bottle? masculine, luxurious and distinguished. a square, faceted bottle fully coated in black lacquer. the label borrows its dynamic energy from yellow. a heavy, decidedly masculine cap that is also matt and borrows its guilloché detailing from the world of watchmaking.

fragrance

woody spicy oriental. intriguing. blazing. bewitching

 ingredients

alcohol • aqua (water) • parfum (fragrance) • limonene • linalool • hydroxycitronellal • coumarin • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • citronellol • alpha-isomethyl ionone • bht • tocopherol • benzyl benzoate • citral • eugenol • cinnamal • geraniol • benzyl cinnamate • farnesol • ci 47005 (yellow 10) • ci 14700 (red 4) • ci 60730 (ext. violet 2) • ci 42090 (blue 1)

Title: Cuir intense woman eau de parfum
Description:
for this powerful and contrasted creation, thierry wasser, guerlain's master perfumer, drew inspiration from the noble material that is leather.
as an exclusive raw material, leather is part of a thousand-year tradition in orient. with this fragrance, thierry wasser pays tribute to its strength, its softness and its sensuality. in its creation, the perfumer builds diversity between the powerful woody leathery notes and the luminous osmanthus flower with its light fruity apricot facets.

fragrance

woody leather
contrasted. powerful. smooth.

 ingredients

alcohol • parfum (fragrance) • aqua (water) • coumarin • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • evernia furfuracea (treemoss) extract • linalool • bht • alpha-isomethyl ionone • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • butylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate • citronellol • benzyl benzoate • geraniol • benzyl salicylate • limonene • farnesol • cinnamal • hydroxycitronellal • isoeugenol • eugenol • citral • cinnamyl alcohol • benzyl alcohol • tocopherol

Title: Mon guerlain eau de parfum intense
Description:
mon guerlain is a perfumed manifesto of today’s femininity embodied by angelina jolie. a multi-facetted, strong, free and sensual woman. 

with the eau de parfum intense, mon guerlain continues to explore the many facets of femininity and invites women to affirm their differences and individuality. a true invitation to explore and reveal their personality.

so noble and so dear to the house, vanilla is given more prominence in this eau de parfum intense, offering an addictive intensity to the overall fragrance and heightening its sensuality.

your mon guerlain eau de parfum intense fragrance is shown off to perfection in its “quadrilobé” bottle: created in 1908, the bottle established itself as one of guerlain’s iconic bottles. simple and graphic, it echoes an alchemist’s bottle and owes its name to its stopper, which is crafted from one piece to obtain a shape resembling four lobes. a century later, beautifully enhanced by a luxurious glass weight and a deep copper gold, this bottle offers a contrast between strong taut lines and sensual curves, expressing contemporary femininity.

my invisible tattoo, my signature, my fragrance, mon guerlain.

fragrance

woody and oriental.
sensual. unique. intense.
a distinctive, oriental, woody eau de parfum, sensual and intense, blending the warmth of vanilla with the freshness of lavender, enhanced by the woody notes of sandalwood and patchouli.

ingredients

alcohol • parfum (fragrance) • aqua (water) • linalool • limonene • hydroxycitronellal • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • coumarin • diethylamino hydroxybenzoyl hexyl benzoate • bht • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • butylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate • citral • geraniol • citronellol • benzyl alcohol • anise alcohol • farnesol • tocopherol • ci 60730 (ext. violet 2) • ci 19140 (yellow 5) • ci 17200 (red 33)

Title: Santal royal eau de parfum
Description:
for this creation, guerlain house perfumer thierry wasser drew inspiration from the treasures of the east, and worked one of the rarest and most precious ingredients in the perfume world: sandalwood.
shrouded in mystery, this bewitching note is exalted in a new woody oriental fragrance, a study of subtle contrasts between the dark notes of leather and oud wood, and the luminous floral notes of jasmine and rose.

fragrance

woody oriental.
 mysterious, syrupy, enchanting.
top notes: neroli, jasmine
heart notes: peach, rose, cinnamon
base notes: santalwood, leather note,

ingredients

alcohol • parfum (fragrance) • aqua (water) • peg-40 hydrogenated castor oil • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • citronellol • geraniol • linalool • coumarin • limonene • cinnamal • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • butylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate • bht • eugenol • farnesol • benzyl benzoate • benzyl salicylate • citral • tocopherol • alpha-isomethyl ionone • benzyl alcohol • hydroxycitronellal • isoeugenol

Title: Santal royal woman hair mist
Description:
the elegant and ethereal santal royal hair mist adds a delicate fragrance to the hair and creates an enchanting trail. 
shrouded in mystery, sandalwood is beautifully showcased in this woody oriental fragrance created by guerlain’s master perfumer, thierry wasser. dark notes of leather and an oud accord contrast subtly with the sparkling floral notes of rose and jasmine.

fragrance

a woody oriental fragrance.
mysterious, sweet, and enchanting.
top notes: neroli, jasmine
heart notes: peach, rose, cinnamon
base notes: sandalwood, leather note, amber notes, oud accord, musk tincture

 ingredients

Title: Heritage man eau de toilette
Description: inspired by previous generations, héritage is a fragrance dedicated to the men of tomorrow. it opens with an aromatic freshness. the subtlety of a warm spice accord is then expressed on a woody base tinged with the orient. heritage, for a man who is both the custodian of a tradition and the harbinger of a new spirit. a square, faceted, refined bottle drawing its luxurious lines from a model from the guerlain heritage. a matte, heavy cover that borrows its guilloche from the world of watchmaking.

Title: Habit rouge eau de toilette
Description:
habit rouge eau de toilettes is a classic of elegance, glorified by the freshness of citrus notes.

created in 1965, habit rouge was the first oriental fragrance for men in perfumery. from the moment of its launch, this tribute to guerlain's passion for the dressage of horses created an element of surprise with its scents of sensual and bold vanilla. an oriental that is by turns citrusy, warm and accented with vanilla, it expresses the genius of contrast and well-mastered emotions.
habit rouge embraces a dandy man who dares everything. combining sophistication and refinement. he lives his life fervently and distinguishes himself with a trail of extreme sensuality. 
with its modern geometry and mastery of form, habit rouge has an eternally elegant french appeal.

fragrance

oriental citrus.

dynamic, passionate, sophisticated, audacious. 

habit rouge expresses itself directly in a spicy, woody heart, nuanced with neroli and jasmine notes. leather and oud wood notes blossom in the base, tempered by the sweetness of vanilla and patchouli.

Title: Habit rouge man eau de parfum
Description:
discover the best perfumes from guerlain for low prices at jose candido | concept store. shop now!

habit rouge eau de toilettes is a classic of elegance, glorified by the freshness of citrus notes.

created in 1965, habit rouge was the first oriental fragrance for men in perfumery. from the moment of its launch, this tribute to guerlain's passion for the dressage of horses created an element of surprise with its scents of sensual and bold vanilla. an oriental that is by turns citrusy, warm and accented with vanilla, it expresses the genius of contrast and well-mastered emotions.
habit rouge embraces a dandy man who dares everything. combining sophistication and refinement. he lives his life fervently and distinguishes himself with a trail of extreme sensuality.
with its modern geometry and mastery of form, habit rouge has an eternally elegant french appeal.

Title: Superaqua rich emulsion
Description:
this emulsion is a concentrate of technology that lastingly hydrates the skin, offering protection against and correction of the first visible signs of aging. - the aquacomplex advanced technology 1-aquacomplex advanced promotes the flow of water in the skin providing immediate rehydration and protection against the risk of future dehydration*. - the aquabiotic system helps to visibly strengthen the skin by targeting its ecosystem*. the quality of the skin looks better preserved every day and glowing with radiance and beauty.  this rich formula is particularly suited to skin that needs nourishing and comforting through hydration. 95% naturally derived ingredients, in accordance with iso 16128, including water. the remaining 5% helps to optimise the integrity of the formula over time and its sensoriality. respects the skin's natural ph levels. suitable for all types of skin, even the most sensitive. unisex.
* in vitro test on ingredients

fragrance

guerlain abeille royale mattifying day cream combines blackbee repair technology with a sebum-regulating and protective propolis complex* to visibly firm the skin, correct wrinkles and imperfections. it is specially formulated to help rebalance combination to oily skin. day after day, the pores appear tightened, the skin texture looks refined, the complexion seems evened out.

with a ph close to that of the skin (ph 6.3), this delicate, creamy foam cleanses and purifies. it preserves the skin’s balance and hydration, offering exceptional efficacy and comfort. free from impurities and microparticles of pollution, the skin is soft and supple, its texture refined, and the complexion radiant and glowing.

Title: My clarins re-boost refreshing hydrating cream
Description:
a daily moisturizer that is a healthy morning cocktail of fruit extracts to boost skin’s energy and hydration. pink cream-gel formula is infused with a refreshing blend of organic goji berry, fig, acerola seed, organic apricot oil and tamarind pulp acids—plus detoxifying flower waters—to keep your skin healthy-looking, radiant and hydrated throughout the day.

my clarins exclusive healthy in & out complex is comprised of organic coconut water to put nutrients into the skin and alpenrose extract to flush out toxins and pollutants.

your vegan friendly recipe - free of phthalates, parabens, and sulfates - for healthy, hydrated, and glowing skin. my clarins is free of all animal-derived ingredients and was not tested on animals. 

benefits:

  • boosts radiance and smoothes skin texture
  • leaves skin healthy-looking, glowing and energized
  • visibly tightens pores
  • plant-based anti-pollution complex
  • healthy in & out complex
  • dermatologist tested

how to use:

apply each morning to clean, dry skin on face and neck.

Title: Nutri lumiere day cream
Description:
nourishing, nutrient-rich anti-aging day moisturizer formulated to restore vitality to mature skin that is dull, fragile, and severely dry. the melting, non-greasy, oil-infused texture leaves skin feeling smooth, nourished, and radiant.

clarins nutrition innovation
clarins' nutrient-powered plant discovery is the horse chestnut plant - known for its incredible longevity, strength, resistance, and rebirth every spring. two potent parts of the plant - organic flower extract and active fruit molecule, escin - take action to help revive skin. together, this revitalizing duo provides nourishment and luminosity for healthy-looking skin.

clarins scientific discovery
the micro-nutrient network is responsible for supplying nutrients and maintaining the skin's youthfulness. with age, the micro-nutrient network depletes and slows down, resulting in dullness, deep wrinkles, dark spots, and dry and fragile skin.

+ clarins natural plant-based expertise
nutri-lumière collection is formulated with 10 organic ingredients.*
new organic wakame seaweed extract and plant squalane promote supple, youthful-looking skin. a plant-based blend of organic harungana, organic oat sugars, organic desert date, and organic leaf of life takes complete action to help visibly lift and smooth slackened skin, target dark spots, and deeply hydrate. shea butter helps nourish, comfort, and soften. clarins anti-pollution complex protects the skin from harmful indoor and outdoor pollutants.

pair with nutri-lumière night cream to boost results and reactivate skin's luminosity.

*nutri-lumière day cream contains 10 organic ingredients.

Title: Libre woman eau de parfum
Description:
libre, the new eau de parfum by yves saint laurent, represents the freedom to live everything to excess. your boundless creativity, your complete emancipation, your ever-evolving femininity.

the perfume of a strong, bold and free woman experiencing her freedom at its most empowered extreme.

the first floral lavender. the tension between the burning sensuality of an orange blossom from morocco & the boldness of a lavender from france with a feminine twist. a singular trail like a breath of freedom.

Description: for him bleu noir eau de parfum celebrates pure masculine sensuality in an olfactory composition that’s discreet yet potent. the signature musc is heightened by sensual  woody notes—blue cedar and black ebony—and further transformed with vetiver. the bottle is an artful reinterpretation of the original bleu noir bottle in a dégradé translucence. bleu noir eau de parfum personifies the mercurial nature of seduction.

Title: Narciso for him bleu noir  eau de parfum
Description: for him bleu noir eau de parfum celebrates pure masculine sensuality in an olfactory composition that’s discreet yet potent. the signature musc is heightened by sensual  woody notes—blue cedar and black ebony—and further transformed with vetiver. the bottle is an artful reinterpretation of the original bleu noir bottle in a dégradé translucence. bleu noir eau de parfum personifies the mercurial nature of seduction.

Title: Narciso ambree woman eau de parfum
Description:
your inner glow and confidence are a natural part of you – and narciso rodriguez narciso ambrée eau de parfum for women will make sure that they shine through in all their beauty and sensuality. the scent of this fragrance will sparkle on your skin like warm rays of sunshine on a summer day.

oriental fragrance with floral elements
created by perfumer aurelien guichard

composition of the fragrance
the opening notes of ylang-ylang and plumeria will caress your senses like an exotic breeze. this playful floral accord is then pierced by the clean, sensuous aroma of musk. lightly sweet, velvety warmth of cedar wood closes the fragrance and stays with you throughout the drydown.

story of the fragrance
another inimitable fragrance by narciso rodriguez comes in a bottle whose colour was intentionally designed to resemble the shade of a sun-kissed skin. both the design of the bottle and the ingredients used in the fragrance itself are clear tell-tale marks of a new narciso fragrance.

this latest elegant composition of course contains musk – a common ingredient of the entire line. pairing it with the aroma of exotic flowers, the sunny ambrée will surround you with a sensual, magnetic allure.

Title: Abeille royale fortifying lotion with royal jelly
Description:
25 times more concentrated in royal jelly(1) thanks to microencapsulation, the fortifying lotion helps the skin resist various stressors and pollution which visibly affect its quality and beauty.
formulated for all skin types, even sensitive, it resets the skin so that it recovers its optimum condition : rebalanced, hydrated, supple and radiant.

Title: Les absolus d'orient patchouli ardent woman eau de parfum
Description:
with patchouli ardent, thierry wasser, guerlain's master perfumer, has reinvented patchouli, a raw material usually darkly woody and mysterious, in a surprisingly vibrant and bright way. it combines the elegance of rose with a majestic leather and musks accord to offer a unique sensorial voyage.

fragrance

woody floral.

captivating, bright, elegant.

ingredients

#14611 ingredients: alcohol • parfum (fragrance) • aqua (water) • geraniol • citronellol • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • limonene • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • butylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate • pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate • eugenol • farnesol • hydroxycitronellal • alpha-isomethyl ionone • linalool • isoeugenol • citral • benzyl alcohol • bht
disclaimer : guerlain product ingredient listings are updated periodically. before using a guerlain product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

Title: La vie est belle intensement woman eau de parfum
Description:
"la vie est belle," a french expression meaning "life is beautiful," is about choosing your own path to happiness.

introducing a new fragrance chapter of happiness to the la vie est belle family, la vie est belle intensément is an addictive fusion of red iris and vanilla, bringing a floral and warm intensity to the iconic perfume.

happiness lives within all of us. energetic and intense. lively and strong.

it’s here and now, beating inside the new la vie est belle intensément eau de parfum

Description:

Title: La nuit de l'homme le parfum
Description: le parfum, the quintessence of seduction. a woody oriental fragrance. accents of black pepper, labdanum and vetiver. a mysterious evolution of darkness and light. a darkly handsome man whose irresistible charm and seduction sweep away everything in their path.

Title: Extra comfort toning lotion
Description:
soothing toner—with comforting linden, sweet almond, marshmallow and mango—rinses-away every last trace of extra-comfort cleansing cream, leaving skin moist, toned, clarified and perfectly refreshed.

dry or sensitive skin glows with renewed radiance and clarity.

benefits

  • gently cleanses
  • tones
  • softens and soothes

ingredients

aqua/water/eau, aloe barbadensis leaf juice, propanediol, peg-8, butylene glycol, phenoxyethanol, panthenol, glycerin, peg-32, ppg-26-buteth-26, alpha-glucan oligosaccharide, ethylhexylglycerin, sodium citrate, peg-40 hydrogenated castor oil, acrylates/c10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer, parfum/fragrance, tromethamine, carbomer, tocopheryl acetate, sodium dehydroacetate, hydrolyzed linseed extract, linum usitatissimum (linseed) seed extract, tilia cordata wood extract, butylphenyl methylpropional, alpha-isomethyl ionone, citric acid, potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, benzyl alcohol, linalool, xanthan gum, benzyl salicylate, amyl cinnamal, citronellol, anise alcohol, eugenol, geraniol, althaea officinalis root extract, prunus amygdalus dulcis (sweet almond) fruit extract, ci 15985/yellow 6 [v0243j]

Title: Fusion d'issey man eau de toilette
Description:
powerful, vigorous, and fiery, nature reveals itself (again) with a vengeance. molten lava pours expressively from a volcano.

fusion d’issey transforms this eruption of energy into a bold, nuanced composition, giving rise to a creative, endemic nature. depth, tension, and power for a distinctive fragrance.

vertical and elegant, the bottle soars. deep blue polished glass lies between colbalt and blue-black tinted with green. light glows at its center, embedded but vibrant. the shiny black cap reminiscent of obsidian, carefully faceted like a jewel. the box echoes the same blue and black color scheme. this is accented by the orange (lava color), boldly graphic fusion d’issey name.

fragrance :

for the cool aspect, the sparkling brightness of lemon is paired with the milky sweetness of coconut water, a long-lasting solar scent. plunging into the heart of the volcano to encounter the mineral and uncover the roundness of ambrox

in an ethereal whisper, essence of fresh rosemary, geranium, and cardamom dissipate, filling the surroundings with their trailing scent. underlying the notion of fusion is the choice of warm, volcanic wood featuring patchouli.

a new masculinity, heat and cold to express the idea of the quintessence of molten rock. overflowing with energy and vitality, fusion d’issey, a fragrance for daring adventures.

Title: Mava dream
Description:
nourishing massage oil for nails.
it is blood that nourishes the nail roots. if you suffer from bad circulation, nails can grow very slowly.

mavaderma is a balanced blending of wheat germ, olive and sweet almond oils to massage onto the nail root area for more beautiful and longer nails. the emollient action of the oils keeps skin supple and soft

Title: Nail shield
Description:
the nail plate is composed of three layers. it is naturally the visible, outer layer that is particularly sensitive to outside elements and can very easily be damaged by too much sun, cold weather, detergents

its unique formula has been developed to give nails resistance to protect them from daily tasks and other damaging elements. the nail can then correctly regenerate and strengthen itself, its growth being protected from breaking, flaking and impacts

Title: Nailactan
Description:
nutritive cream for brittle and damaged nails.
the nail plate is composed of three layers. it is naturally the visible, outer layer that is particularly sensitive to outside elements and can very easily be dried out by too much sun, cold weather, detergents

nailactan is composed of essential amino acids, lipids and kerato-balancing vitamins. its nourishing and moisturizing action restores elasticity to the nail plate, improves its general condition and makes nails more resistant to splitting.

Title: Double-lash
Description:
a nutritive serum for longer, denser lashes.
eye lashes are an essential element of face beauty. double-lash contains a natural extract rich in vitamins and proteins that strengthens, covers and protects the lashes which will then become healthy, long and resistant. this serum helps lengthen and densify lashes, which become fuller and silkier.

Title: Mavala stop
Description:
discourages nail biting and thumb sucking.
 nail biting is a nervous habit, which can rapidly become uncontrollable. mavala stop has a bitter yet harmless taste and the appearance of clear enamel. helps break the nail biting habit and thumb sucking. works for children (more than 3 years old) and adults. to use without or over your nail polish. also recommended for children but not under the age of 3, as their taste buds are not fully developed and they might get used to the bitter taste

Title: Mava strong
Description:
mava-strong fortifying base allows splitting, soft, thus breaking nails to regain their normal, healthy and strong aspect. it combines two actions working in synergy: fortifying and protecting.

it is a colorless and shiny nail polish that incorporates, in a unique way, active ingredients combining technicality and efficiency to quickly improve the appearance of nails’ quality, and make them more resistant and thicker

Title: Total eye lift
Description:
this redefining expert skin care was specifically created to enhance the entire eye area from temple to temple. this fine emulsion with a smoothing texture ensures easier application and longer makeup hold. suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.

benefits:

  • lift effect
  • smooths out fine lines, wrinkles and crow’s feet
  • restores density to the skin around the eyes
  • brightens the eyes and beautifies the lashe

Title: Gentle eye makeup remover
Description: this refreshing make-up remover gently eliminates make-up and impurities, soothes the eyelids, and strengthens the lashes. the non-irritating formula is suitable for even the most sensitive eyes and for contact lens wearers.

Title: L'eau kenzo pour femme eau de toilette
Description: fresh elegant and feminine kenzo classic. fragrance with pure lotus flower, cooling mint and touch of pink pepper. aquatic and fresh scent.

Title: Mr. burberry element man eau de toilette
Description:
• introducing mr. burberry element – the newest fragrance to join the mr. burberry family. the scent is captured in a modern, masculine, fresh campaign that takes its inspirational cues from the beautifully effortless symmetry found within british nature.

  • mr. burberry element, a new scent that fuses modern strength and verdant freshness. a powerful base of mineral oak moss contrasts ambergris to create a unique interpretation of a woody eau de toilette. at its heart, spicy yet fresh juniper gives way to addictive and sensual green almond.

Title: Nomade absolu woman eau de parfum
Description:
imbued with the delicate, scented warmth of a fantasy destination, nomade absolu reveals woody chypre for a more intense interpretation of the original nomade eau de parfum. created by quentin bisch, the fragrance embodies the freedom-loving, independent woman.

the bold, masculine character of oak moss remains at the vibrant note of nomade, lifted here by sweet and sumptuous mirabelle plum. the fruity, aromatic inflections of velvety davana lend a sensuousness offset by the creamy, woody richness of soft sandalwood.

adorned in warm colours, the nomade absolu de parfum bottle reveals chic contrasts in the maison's characteristic graphic lines, golden studs and hazelnut leather.

Title: Nomade absolu woman eau de parfum
Description:
imbued with the delicate, scented warmth of a fantasy destination, nomade absolu reveals woody chypre for a more intense interpretation of the original nomade eau de parfum. created by quentin bisch, the fragrance embodies the freedom-loving, independent woman.

the bold, masculine character of oak moss remains at the vibrant note of nomade, lifted here by sweet and sumptuous mirabelle plum. the fruity, aromatic inflections of velvety davana lend a sensuousness offset by the creamy, woody richness of soft sandalwood.

adorned in warm colours, the nomade absolu de parfum bottle reveals chic contrasts in the maison's characteristic graphic lines, golden studs and hazelnut leather.

Title: Paradise found man eau de toilette
Description: roberto cavalli paradise found eau de toilette for him is designed to take the wearer on a hypnotic trip to an exotic garden of pleasure. the initial chords of pimento berry oil and star anise deliver spicy yet sweet aromatic impact that's softened with a touch of pineapple. secondary notes comprises a sophisticated blend of calming clary sage, fragrant lavender and patchouli oil, adding an earthy richness to the scent. the base perfectly balances the sweetness of tonka bean absolute with the resinous depth of styrax oil, and is enriched with precious ambergris. the result is a beguiling and vibrant oriental symphony that lingers in both the senses and the mind.

Title: Scent of kiss woman eau de toilette
Description:
it's a floral, fruity, oriental alliance that perfumer oliver pescheux composed, giving the fragrance a simple but refined fruity aroma in the opening with juicy apple and pear notes combined with strawberries and grapefruit. the heart of the composition is floral and revolves around the flowers of rose, jasmine, orange blossom and peach blossom, which rejoice with joy and romantic sweetness. the base intensifies the oriental character of vanilla and sandalwood, along with cedarwood and patchouli notes.

scent family: floral fruity
top notes: apple strawberry, grapefruit, pear
middle notes: rose, jasmine, orange blossom, peach blossom
base notes: cedarwood, vanilla, sandalwood, patchouli

Title: For her musc noir  eau de parfum
Description:
in the musc noir eau de parfum, the characteristic for her musk heart is enveloped in mysticism and sensuality.

top notes of lush plum, followed by heliotrope, an addicting flower with an intoxicating fragrance, bring light and harmony to the fragrance. furthermore, the black and captivating musk heart creates a depth with dark and sensual suede chords.

this mysterious fragrance pays homage to the dual nature of all women - where light and shadow seek each other in a mixture of mysticism and extreme sensuality.

for the first time the iconic for her bottle, with its simple elegance, reveals the mysterious seductive pink color of the perfume.

musc noir eau de parfum enriches the narciso rodriguez for her line by bringing mystique, strength, light and contrast.

Description:

Title: Mava white
Description:
various external factors (colour pigments, nicotine,…) can stain, yellow or make your nails look dull. their aspect is then particularly unsightly.

the special formulation of mava-white hides the unsightly aspect of stained, dull nails, while giving them a natural look. it is an optical colour perfector for the nails thanks to a specific optical azurant that react to uv light. used as a base under a nail polish, it restores its true shade : no more colour that turns into a dirty beige, a dubious yellow or a dull red ! applied on non yellowed, non stained nails, it will give an original bluish effect. as it dries it becomes matt and so also suits men whose nails have been stained or yellowed, perhaps due to nicotine, and who are concerned about the apearance of their nails.

Title: Mava dry
Description: essential product for today's busy woman, mavadry dries nail polish in seconds (touch-dry) : important manicure time-saver. it will enhance colour and give a protecting sheen that prevents nail polish from chipping

Title: A drop d'issey woman eau de parfum
Description:
a drop d’issey, the new eau de parfum for women by issey miyake, invites you to look at the world from a new perspective, to discover the hidden beauty and poetry of nature. it is at once a mirror, a magnifying glass. it opens your mind to admire what your eyes can’t see. suspended in front of a lilac flower that peeks out from behind it, the drop reveals a butterfly hiding among the petals, magnifying the unsuspected beauty of nature

to discover the optical illusion of magnification and distortion, just look through the clear, perfectly round shape. it’s a chance to see things in a new light, to make way for poetry and imagination. the spray nozzle is built into the white, soft-textured cap that releases the fragrance with a light touch. a drop d’issey’s drop-shaped bottle is designed to be laid on its side.

fragrance

for a drop d’issey, the perfumer imagined a modern lilac, a full-bodied, floral fragrance at the intersection of nature and technology. lilac is a uncatchable flower, meaning its scent cannot be extracted from the flower in nature and must be recreated by the creative talents of a perfumer. using green chemistry, they make the most of highly innovative techniques while protecting actual lilacs since the flowers don’t need to be harvested. in the top notes, damask rose adds a pure, sheer floral facet. in the heart of the fragrance, lilac is enhanced by a note of ethically sourced orange blossom and an almond milk accord. in the base notes, a musky accord meets upcycled cedarwood and vanillin to give the fragrance a full-bodied finish.

Title: A drop d'issey woman eau de parfum
Description:
