Title: Kashmir woman eau de parfum
Description:
a blend of herbal, leather, moss, oriental, woody, powdery, tobacco, and floral
top note: fruits, floral | middle note: chypre, powdery | base note: woody, oriental
high quality, long-lasting fragrances;
we proudly represent the finest quality perfume oils always offered at the lowest possible price
all of our fragrances are made in england, to an exceptional standard;

Title: Colour me gold man eau de toilette
Description: a blend of citruses, mandarin orange, grapefruit, lavender, patchouli, white woods, and amber notes top notes the colour me brand proudly represents the finest quality perfume oils always offered at the lowest possible price all of our fragrances are made in england, to an exceptional standard; this is an authentic product backed by its original manufacturer

Title: Colour me silver sport man eau de toilette
Description:
launched by the design house of milton lloyd.
milton lloyd is a family business, established in 1975; we have over 40 years of passion for creative perfumery.
top notes: citruses, fruits. middle notes: jasmine, spices. base notes: woody notes, amber, musk.
a blend of grapefruit, tonka bean, patchouli, lavender, vetiver, musk, and rosemary notes

Title: Colour me volt man eau de parfum
Description:
since 1975, milton-lloyd have earned an unshakeable reputation for award-winning, luxury fragrances without the luxury price tag
zesty, aromatic and distinctive - fresh top notes of citrus bergamot is enhanced with an aromatic heart of pepper and warm fougere heart over rich, warm base notes of woody musk and tenacious ambroxan

Title: Colour me white man eau de toilette
Description:
a blend of basil, green tea, bergamot, lemon, cardamom, leather, woody, musk, vetiver, amber, and sea notes
top notes : citrus, fruity | middle notes : aromatic, floral, woody | base notes leather, vanilla, muskthe colour me brand proudly represents the finest quality perfume oils always offered at the lowest possible price
all of our fragrances are made in england, to an exceptional standard; this is an authentic product backed by its original manufacturer

Title: Colour me gold woman eau de parfum
Description:
luxury fragrance – since 1975, milton-lloyd have earned an unshakeable reputation for award-winning, luxury fragrances without the luxury price tag
spicy, aromatic and masculine - sophisticated top notes of ruby mandarin orange, grapefruit and peppermint with aromatic herbs over a rich heart of rose absolut, cinnamon and spices, with distinctive base notes of warm leather, exotic patchouli, white woods, amber and spice

the colour me collection – a trending collection of luxury fragrances and aftershaves by milton-lloyd
genuine milton-lloyd product – milton-lloyd works with the world’s leading perfumers, using the finest oils, blended at high concentrations to create sophisticated, long lasting, luxury fragrances. their commitment to prioritising perfumery over packaging and advertising is what gives you incredible quality at affordable prices. every year, millions of people fall in love with milton-lloyd fragrances

Title: Colour me pearl woman eau de parfum
Description: launched by the design house of milton lloyd.orange blossom, jasmin, patchouli, rose, musk,amber, honey and cedarwood.it is recommended for casual wear.it is recommended for daily use.

Title: Perfumers choice mojo man eau de parfum
Description: a very commercial excotic woody oriental fragrance which is distinctive, warm and tenacious. the fresh aromatic rosewood top notes lift the rich distinctive heart of warm cardamom spices and oud wood. this exclussive fragrance is further enhanced with the classic woody base notes of an exotic sandalwood and vetiver accord and is completed with the rich sensual and tenacious amber and tonka bean dry down.

Title: Perfumers choice sofia woman eau de parfum
Description: a modern vibrant sensuoud chypre fragrance with fresh top notes of bergamot, muguet and sparkling water fruits. the fragrance heart blends precious rich jasmine, velvety red rose and woody vetiver and then this heady floral heart is enveloped by warm feminine sensuous base notes of amber, patchouli and creamy vanilla.

Title: Perfumers choice valerie woman eau de parfum
Description:
luxury fragrance - since 1975, milton-lloyd have earned an unshakeable reputation for award-winning, luxury fragrances without the luxury price tag
graceful, sophisticated and feminine - top notes of delicate orange flower and blackcurrant overlay a floral heart with black pepper and coffee, with sweet and sensual base notes of cedar and vanilla
it is the luxury oils, blended at high concentrations that promises outstanding quality and long-lasting performance

Title: Perfumers choice ( victor & mojo ) set
Description:
luxury fragrance - since 1975, milton-lloyd have earned an unshakeable reputation for award-winning, luxury fragrances without the luxury price tag
no 9 by victor is fresh, sensual and masculine - top notes of apple, bergamot and blackcurrant are enhanced with juicy pineapple on an aromatic heart of jasmine and rose with rich, elegant base notes of warm amber, vanilla and oakmoss
no 10 by mojo is distinctive, warm and exotic - fresh, aromatic rosewood lifts mid notes of amber, oud wood and spicy cardamom, supported by oriental woody base notes of oriental sandalwood, vetiver and tonka bean
 it is the luxury oils, blended at high concentrations that promises outstanding quality and long-lasting performance
genuine milton-lloyd product – created by the world’s leading perfumers using the finest oils blended at high concentrations; milton-lloyd prioritises perfumery over packaging and advertising to bring you long lasting, high quality, affordable fragrances

Title: Mavala cuticle cream
Description:
moisturize the skin surrounding the nails
soften the skin surrounding the nails
protecting the skin surrounding the nails from dryness and cracking
improving the appearance of the skin surrounding the nails

Title: Mava flex serum
Description: serum nails mavala mava-flex. nail serum very dry, too hard and brittle that often absorbing strips are exposed to external factors such as chemicals, water, the sun, or internal, such as age, diet or hereditary tendency. it is made with a concentrated urea, calcium, essential oil of lemon and vitamin b5, which penetrates the nail to hydrate and strengthen it. the result is healthy, flexible, bright and soft nails that will stop breaking.

Title: Mavapen
Description: handy pen for cuticles enriched with nourishing oils and vitaminsloosens overgrown cuticles from the nail surfacenourishes and smoothes skineasy application, and perfect for on the go fixes dry, hard, damaged cuticles

Title: Nail buffer kit
Description: the nail buffer kit contains two pads : the grey pad has a slightly abrasive surface to even out ridges and other irregularities; the pink pad is for polishing and shine nails.

Title: Nail white crayon
Description: nail-white crayon whitens nail tips and gives nails a natural clean outline.

Title: Scientfique applicator
Description: the tip of the nail is the most fragile, most unprotected part of the nail and breaks easily. this is therefore the part of the nail that needs to be strengthened. by quickly hardening the nail, mavala scientifique allows soft, flaking or splitting nails to become healthy and strong. its formula hardens the nail plate and restores the nail normal growth. instantly penetrates. is neither a base nor a nail polish.

Title: Hydra essentiel cream  spf15
Description: light and silky, smooth to apply and feather-light on the skin. rapidly absorbed, this cream refreshes and hydrates. contains spf15.

Title: Lotus face oil
Description:
lotus face treatment oil oily or combination skin 30ml
clarins lotus face treatment oil  is a natural astringent for oily or combination skins. clarins’ exclusive blend of rosewood, geranium and lotus extracts purifies,

Title: Lotus face oil
Description:
lotus face treatment oil oily or combination skin 30ml
clarins lotus face treatment oil  is a natural astringent for oily or combination skins. clarins’ exclusive blend of rosewood, geranium and lotus extracts purifies,

Title: Multi active day cream all skin types
Description: prevent and correct the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. utilising a broad spectrum of nurturing ingredients, this cream combines encapsulated teasel to protect and prolong youthful skin, poppy extract which helps absorb visible damage caused by late nights and a combination of hyaluronic acid, kiwi and shea butter to ensure the skin is kept delightfully comfortable,

Title: Multi active day cream all skin types

Title: Multi active day cream gel normal to combination skin
Description: discover the hard-working treatment created for you. visibly diminishes the first signs of ageing, restores radiance, hydrates and maintains younger looking skin.

Title: Multi active day cream gel spf20
Description: love your skin day & night. new multi-active day cream spf20 helps prevent and visibly correct the appearance of fine lines thanks to new myrothamnus extract.

Title: La vie est belle l'eclat l'eau de toilette woman
Description:
la vie est belle l'eclat eau de toilette reveals a modern radiance and dazzling freshness, surrounded by the essence of orange blossom and iris root, which are the essence of
la vie est belle l'eclat perfume .
the fragrance opens with a flame of fiery vitality of essences of mandarin orange, grapefruit and bergamot, along with elegant and wavy pink pepper. while the tea extract adds smoothness and freshness to the floral heart of the fragrance.

the heart of the fragrance features the original bouquet that is now illuminated with touches of orange blossom oil, highlighting the freshest and lustrous side of orange blossom.

as for the base notes of iris and patchouli, it becomes brighter under the unique and mesmerizing notes of musk and amber, the fruit of a comfortable blend of musk and ambroxan.

Title: La vie est belle l'eclat l'eau de toilette woman

Title: Genifique youth activating cream
Description:
génifique crème start your journey for younger-looking skin with lancôme’s génifique cream, a daily moisturising face cream that promotes a more youthful skin appearance.

this velvety formula provides moisture and leaves your skin feeling velvety soft to the touch with a radiant glow.

Title: Renergie multi-lift ultra eye cream
Description:
lancôme laboratories discovered eyes are the most demanding area that reveals your age and introduce our first lifting filler eye cream, featuring next-generation hyaluronic acid ultra-filler. this product targets 3 major signs of ageing: lift sagginess, improve the appearance of wrinkles and even brighten dark circles under eyes.

formulated with next-generation hyaluronic acid, the filling effect of this anti aging eye cream treats the most demanding area: your eye contours

Title: Energie de vie creme yeux
Description:
what it is:
wake up your eyes with this eye gel formulated with antioxidants and caffeine in a triple steel rollerball massaging applicator that instantly cools, refreshes, and hydrates the eye area.

what it does:
about last night? no one has to know. formulated with caffeine and antioxidants like cranberry, lemon balm, and ginseng, this eye gel is the perfect day-after solution. this refreshing eye gel priovides 24-hour hydration and features a unique applicator with three massaging rollerballs that instantly cools and freshens the eye area. over time, puffiness and dark circles look visibly reduced and wrinkles around the eye area are visibly improved.

Title: Renergie multi-lift firming anti-wrinkle eye
Description:
renergie multi-lift yeux pot  di lancome,fa parte di una gamma di trattamenti effetto lifting con risultati visibili da subito.
renergie multi-lift yeux pot  di lancome è un trattamento per ottenere uno sguardo più giovane e luminoso. dopo un mese, la pelle del contorno occhi appare più soda, come liftata, le rughe sono diminuite, borse e occhiaie attenuate.

Title: White plus pure brightening creamy mousse cleanserÂ
Description:
the essential first step to clean, refresh and relax the skin. key actions:
- leaves the skin less dull
- leaves the skin luminous
it cleanses all impurities, sebum and pollution.
contains acerola fruit extract, sandspurry extract, lady’s mantle extract and moringa extract.
a unique sensation with colored pale pink, whipped cream texture which is very gentle and comfortable.
 
benefits:
  • skin tone is even and more radiant instantly
  • skin is purified and cleaned
  • skin is soft, refreshed and feels great.

Title: White plus pure brightening emulsion spf20
Description:
this delicate, melt-in brightening emulsion is applied in the morning to deliver clarity, a matt finish, hydration and well-being for the skin. the skin is protected from uv rays.

benefits:

  • the complexion is brighter and dark spots are visibly diminished.
  • the skin has a velvety matte appearance.
  • the skin is uv protected.

Title: White plus pure treatment milky lotion
Description:
milky, brightening face treatment lotion hydrates, comforts, and calms redness. gentle formula eliminates every last trace of cleanser and preps skin to receive the full benefits of the white plus treatments to follow. acerola extract, rich in vitamin c, helps boost luminosity and even skin texture, leaving skin looking clean, clear, and refreshed.

benefits

  • refreshes and tones
  • hydrates and smoothes
  • boosts luminosity
  • calms and soothes

Title: Bois de yuzu man eau de toilette
Description:
discover bois de yuzu, the new eau de toilette by karl lagerfeld. this masculine fragrance captivates with citrus top notes set atop a warm, wooden heart of yuzu wood and sage. the grounding base of fern and moss rounds out this fragrance. natural, masculine, mesmerizing.

  • top: frozen ginger & tangerine
  • heart: yuzu wood & sage
  • base: papyrus & oak mossa

Description:

Title: My clarins re-boost healthy glow tinted gel-cream
Description: my clarins re-boost healthy glow tinted gel-cream is a light, natural-looking tinted moisturiser. the non-sticky, super fresh gel-cream contains an energizing morning cocktail of fruits extracts to boost skin’s hydration, help rebalance and boost radiance. the formula has the same hydrating, pollution protection ingredients of as the my clarins re-boost day creams, with the addition of micro-pigments and rose pearls to diminish signs of fatigue for a healthy, glowing complexion.

Title: My clarins re-boost healthy glow tinted gel-cream

Title: L'homme rochas man eau de toilette
Description:
rochas l’homme rochas eau de toilette for men will help you reveal the masculinity, strength, and courage hidden deep inside you. this fragrance is brimming with manly power and will perfectly enhance your character every step you take.

top notes: blood orange, cardamom, pineapple

middle notes: geranium, basil, juniper berries

base notes: patchouli, tonka beans

Title: For her patchouli musc  eau de parfum
Description:
a woody, floral fragrance that gives a floral twist to the warmth of musk. it combines woody, musky, and floral notes. this perfume opens with fresh floral notes of peony, while cloves and cinnamon add sensuality to the scent. the heart of this perfume is musky, which mellows to a delicate woody scent as it has a woody base. about the brand:narciso rodriguez is an american brand launched in 1997 in partnership with the italian manufacturer aeffe. narciso rodriguez presented his first women’s wear collection in october that year for the spring/summer 1998 season. narciso rodriguez launched his first fragrance in 2003.

Title: Fresh man eau de toilette
Description: emanuel ungaro fresh for him by emanuel ungaro is a woody aromatic fragrance for men. this fragrance is new. emanuel ungaro fresh for him was launched in 2020. top notes are grapefruit, ginger and bergamot; middle notes are geranium, mimosa and violet leaves; base notes are vetiver, oakmoss and patchouli.

Title: Signature rose tangerine woman eau de toilette
Description:
freedom, lightness and femininity: these are the principles on which chloe was founded in paris more than 60 years ago. today chloé’s vision of romantic, effortless chic lives in ready-to-wear, accessories, and fragrances.

chloé rose tangerine is an expression of femininity that is more liberated and assertive than ever.

it features the emblematic chloé note: a bright, fresh, clear rose that is integral to the brand’s fragrance identity. with rose tangerine, this unique rose note takes on an unexpectedly fruit-inspired twist: the lively, sunny essence of tangerine brings radiance to the scent, while vivid blackcurrant with verdant undertones reinforces its character. a base of cedar and white amber lingers for a streamlined, ultra-contemporary elegance.

Title: Signature rose tangerine woman eau de toilette
Description:

Title: Cool water intense man eau de parfum
Description:
zino davidoff - cool water intense for him eau de toilette
a new version of ever green "cool water". even more intense and sensual thanks to its citrus, sweet notes that give irresistible and uplifting charm. a perfume able to create a welcoming, inviting and luxurious atmosphere. it is part of the fresh oriental family, the creative nose is annick menardo, the main notes that characterize it are, mandarin, coconut and hazelnut blend together warming the fragrance right in his heart ... it closes with warm notes of amber .

Title: Fusion extreme man eau de toilette
Description:
powerful, vigorous, and fiery, nature reveals itself (again) with a vengeance. molten lava pours expressively from a volcano.

fusion d’issey transforms this eruption of energy into a bold, nuanced composition, giving rise to a creative, endemic nature. depth, tension, and power for a distinctive fragrance.

vertical and elegant, the bottle soars. deep blue polished glass lies between colbalt and blue-black tinted with green. light glows at its center, embedded but vibrant. the shiny black cap reminiscent of obsidian, carefully faceted like a jewel. the box echoes the same blue and black color scheme. this is accented by the orange (lava color), boldly graphic fusion d’issey

Title: Mon guerlain sparkling bouquet eau de parfum
Description:
your mon guerlain perfume is presented in its “quadrilobé” bottle, which offers a contrast between the strength of the taut lines and the sensuality of the curves, like an echo of the multiple facets of femininity.
today, it is beautifully enhanced by a luxurious glass weight and a shimmering silver ring that has been reinvented with a quadrilobé pavé setting like a precious jewel.
mon guerlain is a perfumed manifesto of today’s femininity. a multi-faceted woman – strong, free and sensual – embodied by angelina jolie.
with sparkling bouquet, mon guerlain is continuing its exploration of the multiple facets of the feminine with an ode to positivity. it is the aura of a radiant woman whose smile sparkles the world.
my signature, my perfume, mon guerlain

fragrance

a smiling and sparkling fruity fresh oriental. 

it is the fragrance impression of a radiant personality. a fragrance faceted like a jewel, which revisits mon guerlain’s essential ingredients – lavender, sambac jasmine, vanilla tahitensis and sandalwood –  in a fruity and intensely luminous register. a pear accord lends this composition a joyful opening. an irresistible smile… sparkling and mischievous, it melts its fruity accents into a contrasting floral heart where the freshness of lavender tempers jasmine’s sun-kissed accents. then vanilla exudes its delicious scent: nestled in sandalwood’s creamy woody notes, it weaves a tender and sensual oriental fragrance trail. a captivating sillage with a magnetic charm.

ingredients:

alcohol • parfum (fragrance) • aqua (water) • limonene • hydroxycitronellal • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • linalool • citronellol • geraniol • coumarin • pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate • citral • benzyl benzoate • benzyl salicylate • farnesol • benzyl alcohol • isoeugenol • ci 17200 (red 33) • ci 60730 (ext. violet 2) • ci 47005 (yellow 10)

Title: L'homme ideal extreme eau de parfum
Description:
the ideal man is a myth. his fragrance, a reality.
l'eau de parfum extrême? a woody oriental fragrance that will allow you to remain a man who is talented to the extreme, for everything. 
the ideal bottle? masculine, elegant and audacious. a square, facetted and refined bottle. the label borrows its extreme depth from the red. a heavy, matt and intense cap, decidedly masculine, which borrows its guilloché detailing from the world of watchmaking.

fragrance

almond, the olfactory seal of l'homme idéal, is accompanied at the top by the effervescence of bergamot mixed with pink pepper. 
in the heart, cinnamon and plum notes escort the heliotrope, a floral note with elegant almond accents. 
finally, the charm of a woody patchouli and cedar end note is adorned with tobacco and an intense leather note.

Description:
i want choo by jimmy choo is a oriental floral fragrance for women. this is a new fragrance. i want choo was launched in 2020.

top notes are peach and mandarin orange.

middle notes are jasmine and red lily.

base note is vanilla.

Title: I want choo woman eau de parfum
Description:

Title: New york woman eau de parfum
Description:
a fragrance that’s as sparkling, joyful, sensual and feminine as you are. it's a bright, colorful blend of fruits and flowers, including wild strawberry, rose essence and freesia, with alluring hints of velvety ambrox and cashmeran. each note is designed to celebrate and enhance your body’s unique chemistry.

top notes: citrus, bergamot, wild strawberry
middle notes: rose essence, freesia
base notes: ambroxan, cashmeran

Title: Rochas girl woman eau de toilette
Description:
girl is the fragrance of a new generation that is conscious and attentive to its well-being.
because the world is changing, girl is more respectful of the environment with a vegan formula containing 90% of ingredients of natural origin and with an eco-friendly bottle made from 40% recycled glass.

in the top notes, luminous neroli with its relaxing properties blends with the freshness of pink berries and blackcurrant bud.
in the heart, the fragrance develops around a bouquet of orange blossom and jasmine offering a radiant femininity.
finally, white woods and vanilla leave a creamy and textured trail.

Title: Rochas girl woman eau de toilette
Description:

Title: Supreme bouquet collection eau de parfum
Description: one of the components of the enticing le vestiaire des parfums oriental collection, a range inspired by yves saint laurent's fascination with the east, is the supreme bouquet eau de parfum. a love letter to morocco and its vibrant culture, the fragrance is entwined with fruity bergamot, oriental ylang ylang and whimsical tuberose to capture the essence of the designer's majorelle garden.top notes: bergamot, pink peppermiddle notes: ylang ylang, tuberosebase notes: woody notes, patchouli, amber

Title: Idole intense woman eau de parfum
Description:
here's to the ones who dream big a new generation of conquering women, strong, outspoken & empowered.
here’s to the leaders of tomorrow, glorious and luminous, igniting the flame of success and lighting the way for others.
here's to the new idoles, who daringly shine the path for others. to those, whose aura radiates with success and greatness, inspiring the idole that resides within each one of us.
now is your time, ignite this beam of light & become a trailblazing idole for others.
the world will shine brighter because when you succeed, you inspire others to ascend to new heights.
so ignite the flame that resides in you. it is your time to embrace your power, and inspire a generation. be your own idole.

Title: Libre intense woman eau de parfum
Description:
what it is

libre eau de parfum intense is the new, more sensual take on the iconic eau de parfum. the signature notes of lavender essence from france and moroccan orange blossom combine with glowing orchid and warm vanilla to push the perfume to the extreme. it is a long-lasting unique twist on the floral fragrance.

what it does

libre means free. it is a celebration of freedom: a fragrance for those who do what they want and dare to be exactly who they are. drawing inspiration from the couture runways, the it-bottle pushes its' couture statement further with a masculine camel color twisted in the most feminine way, amplifying the intensity of the original bottle.

Title: La vie est belle soleil cristal woman eau de parfum
Description:
happiness is more than a feeling, it is an aura that radiates all around like the sun on a warm summer's day. la vie est belle soleil cristal (crystal sun) eau de parfum captures the essence of a sunny summer day – warm yet fresh, made for those who live to bask in the sun.â€‹

encased within an iridescent botte, la vie est belle soleil cristal perfume sparkles like a ray of sunshine, bursting with fresh white florals radiating with top fragrance notes of sparkling mandarin and a warm luminous heart of ylang-ylang, vanilla, and coconut accords.

Title: Let you love me woman eau de parfum
Description:
a fragrance dedicated to a determined and sensual woman, who knows she can decide when to be loved and above all who to allow it. a conscious sensuality in the magnetic and captivating top notes of black pepper pure jungle essence, lavender and ylang-ylang that reveal a heart full of charisma and personality of orange blossom, geranium and mugane to end in a mix of seductive and spicy notes of patchouli, lorenox and vanilla.

the packaging shows its bold side thanks to the maison's iconic animalier texture. a sensual bow in animalier organza dresses a black & white bottle of the same texture also present on the external packaging.

Title: Into the jungle unisex eau de toilette
Description:
for more adventurous and thrill-seeking duckers who love nature, there is into the jungle, a luxurious and persistent fragrance created by marion costero, master perfumer of givaudan. thanks to a perfect blend of ingredients from italy, france, brazil, north africa, and haiti, into the jungle has the same exotic and erotic appeal of a big cat in its natural element: the jungle.
for marion costero, this perfume is an adventurous and exciting journey in search of the last splendors of nature. there are warm and fragrant essences from the mediterranean (italian lemon and french lavandin) enhanced by an unusual mix of green tangerine from brazil, north african rosemary, and rhubarb. the enticing ensemble of floral scents in the heart notes of the fragrance (peony, cherry blossom, gardenia, rose, and violet) is masterfully completed by the base notes: amber, oak moss accords, musk, and haitian vetiver.

scent fragrance: floral fresh
top notes: italian lemon, provençal lavender, brazilian green mandarin, north african rosemary, rhubarb
heart notes: peony, cherry blossom, gardenia, rose, violet
base notes: amber, oakmoss, musk, haitian vetiver

Title: Donna pink marina woman eau de toilette
Description:
a romantic, sparkling, and salty floral included in the trussardi family in june 2020. the latest flanker features the summery aura of trussardi donna launched under the license of angelini beauty in italy. perfume evoking a summer day at the seaside, where sparkling notes of pink grapefruit and joyful lemon blend with addictive hints of melon sorbet. floral notes of sea daffodil and broom are enriched by precious tonalities of neroli while a sea salt accord brings vibes and light. the sensual character of creamy sandalwood envelops the deep notes of patchouli and cedar wood creating an enveloping yet unique signature.

scent fragrance: floral fruity-fresh
top notes: lemon, pink grapefruit, melon sorbet
heart notes: sea salt, neroli, sea daffodil
base notes: sandalwood, patchouli, cedarwood

Title: Trussardi woman eau de parfum
Description:
empowered and new
trussardi is the new women's fragrance that has been created exclusively for us by julie massé and violaine collas, who have evoked an entirely italian olfactory pyramid through a series of quintessential ingredients. the top notes hit us with the freshness of mandarin intermingled with the bold scent of neroli, to melt into notes of lavender, jasmine and white dahlia. the free, contemporary femininity of this new trussardi women's scent is enhanced by the hypnotic and velvety base notes of a violet, patchouli and suede accord. the perfectly cylindrical bottle is decorated by glossy painted stripes in matte pink, black and white, with a golden metal lid, and is set to become a real piece of italian design.

scent fragrance: floral -fresh
notes: bold as the fresh top notes. brave as the lavender and jasmine absolute at the heart. feminine like the velvety base.

Title: Aqua allegoria pamplelune woman eau de toilette
Description:
pamplelune belongs to the aqua allegoria collection, the first collection of intensely fresh fragrances in perfumery created in 1999.

on the strength of the guerlain perfumer’s expertise dating back to the legendary eau de cologne impériale in 1853, the guerlain perfumer creates each of the aqua allegoria with the freshness of a cologne and the hold of a guerlain perfume. the guiding thread of the collection is bergamot, a precious citrus fruit, “calabrian green gold”, a key ingredient in the guerlinade.

pamplelune is a sparkling and sensual eau de toilette, a cheerful breeze over a radiant and tangy grapefruit.

create your own signature by pairing pamplelune with:
-bergamote calabria
spray each aqua allegoria on your skin one by one in equivalent quantities.

with its golden mesh, its pure, refined bottle is a tribute to the famous bee bottle.

Title: Aqua allegoria granada salvia woman eau de toilette
Description:
granada salvia is part of the aqua allegoria collection by guerlain, fresh eaux de toilette with sophisticated trails inviting you to a sensory escape. the collection offers a profusion of unexpected notes to reveal the beauty of bergamot, a precious citrus fruit and the “green gold of calabria”.

granada salvia is a sparkling eau de toilette recalling a warm andalusian garden, inviting us to bite into an exquisite pomegranate. this eau de toilette embodies the spirit of pomegranate, imbued with a twist of sage over a white musk background.

create your own signature by associating granada salvia with:
- bergamote calabria
- herba fresca
- rosa rossa
- flora cherrysia

to create your own olfactory signature, choose from among the suggested duos and perfume yourself successively, in equal amounts, with the two aqua allegoria fragrances of your choice.
with its gold honeycomb, the pure, refined bottle is an homage to the famous bee bottle.

Title: Giungle di seta unisex eau de parfum
Description:
storie di seta is the new line of fragrances inspired by the imaginary worlds of salvatore ferragamo's silk creations. a refined collection of four universal and fresh perfumes, each unique fragrance is bound by an exclusive mix.
a rich, exotic flora and green olfactory notes unveil giungle di seta, an eau de parfum inspired by mysterious, remote landscapes. a fresh and energetic perfume, salvatore ferragamo's new olfactory chapter opens a tear on the overwhelming atmospheres of wild jungles.

linked by an exclusive single accord, the four eau de parfums in the collection lend themselves to experimenting and layering. designed to be combined in endless ways, without rules, in a playful ritual that creates personalized, inimitable fragrances.

Description:
for him bleu noir

Title: For her pure musc  eau de parfum
Description: a singular olfactive composition renders the dual nature of a woman anew with a heightened immediacy. narciso rodriguez’s signature musc is reinterpreted and refined with a disarming purity and a rich depth. the sublime heart of musc is enhanced with a white floral bouquet while cashmeran lends warmth. a supremely addictive scent, for her pure musc eau de parfum teases the senses and envelops the body.

Title: For her pure musc  eau de parfum

Title: Narciso ne'roli ambre'e woman eau de toilette
Description:
narciso eau néroli ambrèe - eau de toilette.
narciso eau néroli ambrée è la nuova fragranza di narciso rodriguez che celebra il potere dell'attrazione e la raffinata arte della seduzione in un’essenza tanto audace quanto femminile.
un tributo al potere seduttivo del sole: questa nuova fragranza ne racchiude la sensualità e la luce radiosa in una sintesi di sfaccettature floreali luminose.
il cuore di muschio, firma olfattiva di narciso, è ulteriormente accentuato da un accordo di fiori d'arancio e frangipani.
la freschezza del neroli conferisce una calda e vibrante energia, mentre una ricca miscela di note legnose – legno di cedro e cashmeran – apporta profondità e sensualità. narciso eau néroli ambrée riflette una nuova e vibrante femminilità attraverso la sua caratteristica sfaccettatura floreale.
narciso eau néroli ambrée è racchiusa nel flacone iconico narciso. un delicato bagliore ambrato si irradia dall’interno dell’elegante cubo in vetro satinato, mentre il tappo trasparente riflette la pura luminosità di narciso eau neroli ambrée.
note di testa: olio di neroli & fiore di frangipani
note di cuore: cuore di muschio & accordo ambrato
note di fondo: legno di cedro & cashmeran

Title: Jeanne lanvin woman eau de parfum
Description: jeanne lanvin by lanvin perfume. enhance your charm and femininity when you spray on this sweet, fruity jeanne lanvin women's fragrance from the design house of lanvin. juicy notes of pear and lemon mingle in this refreshing bouquet, while delicate hints of freesia add refinement to this delightful aroma. this inspiring fragrance is completed with delicious notes of blackberry and raspberry. launched in 2008, this scent created by talented perfumer anne flipo is a charismatic choice for the woman who enjoys feeling youthful and positive.

Title: London dream woman eau de parfum
Description:
her london dream: a modern yet romantic, dream like moment, set in the heart of london.

effortlessly natural  the epitome of the burberry girl attitude  her london dream brings to life the beauty and freedom of hazy days in london. bright and intriguing, it embodies a relaxed and youthful sense of style. radiant and sparkling, the signature her scent evolves into her london dream, with ripe top notes of lemon and fresh ginger  vibrant and memorable. with a romantic rose and peony heart.

Title: Bois de amber man eau de toilette
Description:
bois d'ambra woody aromatic, sensual fragrance and contrast.

the bottle is in shades of light brown. clean, transparent cap tinted in amber colors. stylish black box with the effect of leather
texture.

ingredients:

head: orange bigarade, bergamot, plum
heart: sage, cedar, geranium
base: amber, tonka bean, guaiac wood

in creating the scent of bois d'ambre, i drew inspiration from the exceptional atmosphere that prevails during the collection of mediterranean roses cistus in andalusia.
the scent is built on the beauty and sensuality of amber and warm tones of tonka bean in combination with the modernity of radiant woods. fresh aromatic sage and gentle geranium complete the scent and give it a perfect final touch.

Title: Double serum eye
Description:
all the power of the iconic double serum, now for your eyes. a double anti-aging formula for the eyes in perfect organic harmony with the skin around the eye contour area, which draws its strength from a rich variety of plants (13 plant extracts including the powerful duo of organic cow parsley & turmeric extracts). a complete serum with 96% natural ingredients that effectively and visibly treats all signs of aging: it smooths wrinkles, reduces puffiness and dark circles, and strengthens the skin around the eyes. instantly, eyes appear more radiant and youthful.

specifications:

  • size: 20

  • unit: ml

  • country of origin: fr

  • kind: eye care

  • product series: double serum

Title: V shaping facial lift eye concentrate serum
Description: an eye serum that visibly tightens and reduces the appearance of puffiness and dark circles for a brighter,wide-awake look. clarins puffiness-targeting phyto complex : 3 plant extracts help to reduce the look of puffy-looking eyes. organic agropyron extract helps to visibly lift and redefine eye contours. lady’s mantle extract helps minimize the appearance of dark circles. high-tech cooling tip for a fresh-eyed look in seconds.

Title: Homme intense man eau de toilette
Description:
"discover the new kenzo homme men's fragrance, inspired by the intensity of bamboo and the serenity of the sea breeze.

kenzo homme eau de toilette intense, a woody and marine, signed quentin bisch. the freshness of a marine accord and pink berries on top give way to an addictive blend of fig wood and sandalwood accords, like a salty skin effect in the sun.

kenzo homme eau de toilette intense: a breath of woody and marine freshness.

kenzo homme has designed his new bottle in an intense blue and its verticality is an echo of the strength and flexibility of bamboo. its beveled cap evokes a cut in the katana, samurai sword.

kenzo parfums is committed to a more beautiful world, kenzo homme has been redesigned to save 34% on plastic and offers more generous formats."

Title: Sensual patchouli collection eau de parfum
Description: when one arrives at a beautiful, large oasis in the desert, the dizzying awe of immense open spaces assumes the colors and smells of a lush jungle. hamid merati-kashani takes us gradually from the spicy notes of black pepper to languid jasmine, ending with intense, woody patchouli in the base notes

Title: Scent of kiss my heart woman eau de toilette
Description:
the composition of the newest creation scent of kiss my heart is signed by the nose amandine clerc marie, who built a very complex olfactory score in which opposites attract, repel, and intertwine to find their irresistible harmony. scent of kiss my heart belongs to the oriental-vanilla and fruity family.
in the top notes, citrusy tones of tangerine refresh the sweetness of peach pulp which in turn enhances the tart hint of red apple. the heart notes — tonka bean, coconut, tiare flower and jasmine — ensure the extreme persistence of the blend. the base notes affirm the warm sensuality of vanilla with the gourmand tones of pralines and the woody notes of sandalwood.

Title: Scent of kiss poplove woman eau de toilette
Description:
aroma is positive, aroma is joy, aroma is energy. he makes you fall in love with himself, makes you rejoice at every moment, have fun and never lose heart.

armand basi scent of kiss #poplove is a perfume expression of a digital kiss. now the trend is to change a letter to a symbol. this makes communication extraordinary. hashtags, invite, likes, reposts, followers, monetization - all these terms are loved by a generation of buzzers. it is for them that a colorful composition with a touch of futurism will suit most of all. love has replaced the letter ""o"" with a heart (or like) - the perfect design for non-digital aborigines.

juicy ripe watermelon, bright green bergamot and caramel-honey pear open the newfangled composition. royal jasmine and multifaceted lily ignite her heart. musk and cashmeran accents form the base of the perfume creation.

Title: Emanuel ungaro intense for him eau de parfum
Description:
the edp intense for him is a modern fougère interpretation that invites you into the wildest depths, where nature has never been so stimulating!

characteristics of the perfume
eau de parfum intense for him is the free spirit that breaks down every barrier and every convection, showing his true nature. transparent flowers for a joyful and colorful creation, where nature has never been so vital and protective.

olfactory family
woody

olfactory pyramid
top notes: nutmeg, bergamot, grapefruit

heart notes: rosewood, cinnamon, iris rhizome

base notes: tonka bean, cedar, musk

format
100 ml

Title: Deep leather collection eau de parfum
Description: when galloping at breakneck speed on the beach, a horse and its rider seem one. the sense of freedom and energy from the sparkling notes of bergamot fades into the powerful masculinity of leather and then melds with the warm sweetness of vanilla. hamid merati-kashani creates the olfactory image of masculinity in a feminine fragrance.

Title: L'instant magic eau de parfum
Description:
l'instant magic transports you to a dream world, where the real world is transformed. with its immediately identifiable scent, it illustrates the instant when a dream suddenly becomes possible. l’instant magic is a light, soft fragrance, a mist that caresses on a bed of wood and musk.

embrace your perfume in the mythical bee bottle.
designed in 1853 by pierre-françois-pascal guerlain for the empress eugénie, wife of napoléon iii, this precious bottle is adorned with the symbol of the empire: the bee, which is now la maison guerlain’s emblem.

fragrance

after the bergamot top notes, l'instant magic reveals a musky floral with notes of freshness (rose, freesia). a trail of white musks worked as a "muscinade" (a nod to the celebrated guerlinade) is warmed by wood and a touch of almond.

ingredients

alcohol • parfum (fragrance) • aqua (water) • alpha-isomethyl ionone • limonene • linalool • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • geraniol • benzyl salicylate • coumarin • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • ethylhexyl salicylate • citronellol • bht • citral • citric acid • benzyl benzoate • cinnamal • farnesol • hydroxycitronellal • benzyl alcohol • eugenol • tocopherol • ci 14700 (red 4) • disodium edta • ci 60730 (ext. violet 2) • ci 19140 (yellow 5)

Title: Samsara eau de parfum
Description:
samsara is an elixir of seduction for a woman who has found harmony and balance, which is notably conveyed through the composition's raw materials :  the purest sandalwood and a jasmine used only for religious offerings until then.

fragrance

as samsara takes flight, it enwraps us in jasmine flower, which dominates the scent, before sunny ylang-ylang flower embellishes it, the better to unite it with the radiant and generous warmth of sandalwood. lastly, iris, tonka bean and vanilla harmonise and render sublime this blend with its remarkable trail.

ingredients

alcohol • parfum (fragrance) • aqua (water) • alpha-isomethyl ionone • limonene • coumarin • linalool • hexyl cinnamal • benzyl salicylate • citronellol • eugenol • benzyl benzoate • geraniol • bht • farnesol • citral • isoeugenol • benzyl alcohol • tocopherol

Title: Shalimar millesime iris woman eau de parfum
Description: as a declaration of love and a celebration of the incredible inspiration behind shalimar’s legendary fragrance, iris millésime puts iris center stage with a scent that follows in the fragrant footsteps of shalimar’s previous millésimes. intimately seductive and sensual, with this new composition, guerlain’s maison perfumers have created a fragrant caress. as soon as it touches the skin, iris brings hints of powder to the characteristically fresh bergamot usually found in shalimar and guerlinade. set alongside rose and white musk, it reveals its jewel-like facets and characteristic olfactory complexity to display floral, velvety notes that feel dreamily sensual on the body.

Title: Urban hero gold man eau de parfum
Description:
urban hero gold edition by jimmy choo is a woody fragrance for men. this is a new fragrance. urban hero gold edition was launched in 2021. the nose behind this fragrance is juliette karagueuzoglou.

top notes are blood orange and pineapple.

middle notes are tonka bean and lavender.

base notes are sandalwood and oakmoss.

Title: Flower by kenzo eau de parfum set
Description:
do you know the secret language of flowers? in japan, it is called hanakotoba. each flower has its own message: joie de vivre is given by the poppy, maternal love by the carnation, strength by the bamboo. for mother's day, transmit messages and emotions without saying a word. flower by kenzo eau de parfum: a bouquet of damascena roses and violets sublimated by vanilla and white musks. because kenzo is committed to a more beautiful world, our made in france giftsets are 100% cardboard from well-managed forests and other controlled fsc™-certified sources.

this women's giftset contains:
- flower by kenzo eau de parfum for women 50ml
- flower by kenzo eau de parfum body lotion 75ml
- a pouch

Title: Flower by kenzo eau de parfum set
Description:
do you know the secret language of flowers? in japan, it's called hanakotoba.
it's a way of symbolically expressing emotions, and each flower has its own message. this mother's day, send messages and emotions without saying a word.

flower by kenzo eau de parfum: a bouquet of damascena roses and violets enhanced by vanilla and white musks.

our mother's day gift sets are made in france, 100% cardboard from well-managed forests and other controlled fsc™ certified sources.

this women's box contains:
- flower by kenzo eau de parfum for women refillable 100ml
- flower by kenzo eau de parfum for women travel spray 10ml
- flower by kenzo body milk 75ml

Title: Beyond forever man eau de toilette
Description:
david beckham beyond forever is a woody aromatic fragrance for men. daring and stylish, beyond forever is dedicated to the elegant modern man who is fearless in the face of new challenges.

crafted of heavy glass with a refined metal cap, the beyond forever bottle is as elegant and masculine as the fragrance.

the importance david beckham places on looking after yourself is intertwined in his fragrances, and together you can share in that instinctive style and complement your distinctive look.

top notes: nutmeg, elemi and bergamot.

heart notes: violet, while immortelle flower and fern chords.

base notes: vetiver and patchouli and leather.

Title: Instinct man eau de tioelette
Description: allowing you to exude the same radiant power and talent of the iconic athlete, the instinct by beckham 75ml spray edt coats you in an aromatic fougere fragrance that lets you confidently go through your day.f

Title: Burberry her blossom woman eau toilette
Description: burberry her is the new pillar perfume line of the british fashion house burberry; the first under the new creative director riccardo tisci and the first one featuring the redesigned logo. its first flanker - burberry her blossom - comes out in the spring of 2019. francis kurkdjian created this new eau de toilette with a light floral and fruity character. top notes: mandarin, pink pepper heart: plum blossom, peony base: musk, sandalwood the face of the advertising campaign shot by juergen teller is model carla delavigne. burberry her blossom is available as a 30, 50 and 100 ml eau de toilette.

Title: Calm essentiel soothing emulsion
Description: a new range suited to the needs of sensitive and fragile skin. featuring 95% to 98% natural ingredients, these formulas have an excellent affinity with the skin. a truly enveloping treatment, the soothing emulsion calms sensations of skin discomfort (dryness, tightness). its creamy texture melts into the skin, intensely moisturizing and protecting it. the skin is quickly comforted and radiant—plus, its tolerance threshold improves day after day.

Title: Calm essential redness corrective gel
Description:
calm-essentiel redness corrective gel targets occasional redness whilst instantly soothing and hydrating the skin. the fresh, light green texture, combined with mother-of-pearl and scareolide camouflages redness and protect the sensorial receptors to reduce sensitivity.
95% of ingredients are of natural origin.

warm the product. palms open in front of the face, take a long, deep breath in through the nose, then exhale fully through the mouth. relax.
smooth the product over the face using light, calming movements, much like a caress, working from the middle of the face outwards, then over the neck working from top to bottom. then carry out light and gentle pressure using the length of the fingers working from the middle of the face outwards then on the neck working top to bottom.
place the fingers in front of the ears, near the temples, and carry out a relaxing ‘pressure-pause’ for 5 seconds.

Title: Calm essential restoring treatment oil
Description: a new range suited to the needs of sensitive and fragile skin. featuring 95% to 98% natural ingredients, these formulas have an exceptional affinity with the skin. with the restoring treatment oil, sensations of skin discomfort (dryness, tightness) are soothed. it intensely moisturizes, nourishes, and protects. the skin is comforted, supple, and soft—plus, its tolerance threshold improves day after day. and to truly renew the most reactive skin, we recommend using the oil alone as a treatment for 10 to 20 days, depending on your needs.

Title: Extra firming energy radiance boosting, winkle control day cream
Description:
energising radiance, firmness, anti-wrinkles

what it is
it’s the day cream that has it all for super active and often overwhelmed women in their 40s. this 2-in-1 treatment combines clarins expertise in firmness with the enhancing effect of a radiance cream. when the skin is subjected to a fast-paced lifestyle, it becomes dull, fatigued, and wrinkles appear... extra-firming energy is the answer, as it helps restore the skin's firmness and creates a revitalised, radiant complexion! and of course, each application provides a dose of well-being and a sensory experience, thanks to its creamy texture and fresh, energising scent. finally, a treatment that puts the spring back in your skin and your step! your firm skin will be positively glowing!
skin type: all skin types
texture: cream
use: apply to the face and neck every morning.
benefits
enhancing and energising effect. firmness and anti-wrinkles.
clarins plus
the secret: the [glow plus complex]: a concentrate of energising superfruits and 4 next-generation pearlescent pigments (green, blue, red, gold) that capture the natural light and reflect it on the skin. an instant enhancing effect on all skin tones!

ingredients
aqua/water/eau. glycerin. prunus armeniaca (apricot) kernel oil. dimethicone. caprylic/capric triglyceride. butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter. ci 77891/titanium dioxide. phenyl trimethicone. pentaerythrityl tetraethylhexanoate. ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp copolymer. synthetic fluorphlogopite. pentaerythrityl distearate. pentylene glycol. polyglyceryl-10 myristate. polyacrylate crosspolymer-6. parfum/fragrance. butylene glycol. sodium benzoate. anigozanthos flavidus extract. avena sativa (oat) kernel extract. disodium edta. tocopheryl acetate. citric acid. sodium hyaluronate. dimethiconol. betaine. sorbitol. capsicum annuum fruit extract. tin oxide. t-butyl alcohol. marrubium vulgare extract. lycium barbarum fruit extract. kalanchoe pinnata leaf extract. balanites roxburghii seed oil. mitracarpus scaber extract. malpighia emarginata (acerola) seed extract. phenethyl alcohol. ci 14700/red 4. furcellaria lumbricalis extract. helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil. potassium sorbate. tocopherol. lapsana communis flower/leaf/stem extract. maris sal/sea salt/sel marin. rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract [v3769a]
*for informational purposes only. every ingredient list is specific to an individual product reference. all formulas are subject to change. while we endeavor to keep this ingredient list accurate, we cannot guaranty that it is reliable, up-to-date, or error-free. please also refer to the ingredient list on the product's outer packaging for a complete, accurate, and up-to-date list.

Title: Nuit d'issey bois arctic eau de parfum
Description: the aurora borealis sets the sky alight with a pulsing radiant glow in a quasi-neon dominant shade of green. surprising and immersive, nature always reveals itself at issey miyake as an infinite source of inspiration and emotion. discover the new addition to the the nuits d’issey collection with bois arctic, the new masculine fragrance by issey miyake.

Title: Le parfum lumiere woman eau de parfum
Description:
elie saab le parfum lumière captures the sensual sparkle of light. the dawn. the time when night meets day, when a ray of light softly glides across the darkness and reveals the golden hues of daybreak. inspired by mediterranean sun rays, elie saab le parfum lumière is an ode to warm light.

a radiant, solar, and generous floral bouquet of white flowers structured by ambery woods.

at the heart of this bouquet, the natural jasmine sambac absolute from india has a distinct orange flower facet with fresher and more radiant undertones.

Title: Exfoliating body scrub for smooth skin
Description: refreshing body scrub that gently smoothes away dry cells, flakes, and impurities while nourishing and softening skin. formulated with naturally exfoliating bamboo powders and soothing extracts of mimosa tenuiflora and shea butter, this non-drying scrub leaves skin soft, supple, and smooth. preps skin to fully absorb the benefits of treatments to follow.

Title: Black opium extreme woman eau de parfum
Description:
black opium extreme by yves saint laurent is a amber vanilla fragrance for women. this is a new fragrance. black opium extreme was launched in 2021.

top notes are coffee and cacao.

middle notes are orange blossom and jasmine sambac.

base notes are patchouli and bourbon vanilla.

Title: Black opium extreme woman eau de parfum
Description:
black opium extreme by yves saint laurent is a amber vanilla fragrance for women. this is a new fragrance. black opium extreme was launched in 2021.

top notes are coffee and cacao.

middle notes are orange blossom and jasmine sambac.

base notes are patchouli and bourbon vanilla.

Title: Colour me abstract art man eau de parfum
Description: sparkling top notes of mandarin, lemon and fresh green mint with tantalising heart of coriander, ginger and invigorating pepper accords deepened with spicy cedar, nutmet and rich labdanum enveloped with a masculine tenacious base of amber, incense, patchouli and sandalwood.

Title: Her woman eau de toilette
Description:
introducing her eau de toilette, the free-spirited scent for the modern woman. a gourmand fragrance balancing joyful fruity notes over an addictive drydown.

a blooming peony scent, it blends juicy green pear top notes with strawberry, blackcurrant and pink peppercorn. enhanced with a honeysuckle heart, with lily of the valley and rose, it’s softened by an addictive musk and cedarwood base.

captivating, confident and effortlessly individual, her eau de toilette embodies the essence of the modern burberry woman as she explores the city. entranced, she sees her world from a new perspective. a break from expectation. a new discovery.

the bottle is luxurious yet understated, inspired by an archival burberry fragrance design. refreshed in pale green – a shade indicative of its green pear notes – it captures the spontaneous and spirited nature of the fragrance.

Title: Her woman eau de toilette
Description:
introducing her eau de toilette, the free-spirited scent for the modern woman. a gourmand fragrance balancing joyful fruity notes over an addictive drydown.

a blooming peony scent, it blends juicy green pear top notes with strawberry, blackcurrant and pink peppercorn. enhanced with a honeysuckle heart, with lily of the valley and rose, it’s softened by an addictive musk and cedarwood base.

captivating, confident and effortlessly individual, her eau de toilette embodies the essence of the modern burberry woman as she explores the city. entranced, she sees her world from a new perspective. a break from expectation. a new discovery.

the bottle is luxurious yet understated, inspired by an archival burberry fragrance design. refreshed in pale green – a shade indicative of its green pear notes – it captures the spontaneous and spirited nature of the fragrance.

Title: Eclat arpege sheer woman eau de toilette
Description: lanvin eclat arpege sheer is a floral woody musk fragrance for women. the opening brings light and delicate aquatic accords of lotus leaves, pithaya fruit and mandarin orange, creating a sophisticated harmony with radiant flowers in the core, gathering together water jasmine, peony and lily of the valley. shimmering flowers are wrapped in a creamy and comforting blend of white musk, cedar and amber in base. this fragrance was created as as a anthem to tenderness.

Title: Y man le parfum
Description:
what it is

y le parfum is a sensual and intoxicating men’s fragrance by yves saint laurent beauté.  an intense interpretation of the y signature scent, this men’s cologne is a new twist on the white and dark fougere that combines the bold, woody notes of geranium and cedarwood with fresh lavender.

what it does

the y le parfum fragrance bottle is an intense and deep version of the edgy & iconic y bottle, now dressed with an audacious black lacquer and shiny varnish finish to express absolute desire. a cologne for men with packaging that exudes luxury, intensity, and bold masculinity.

Title: For her musc noir rose eau de parfum
Description:
born from femininity and elegance, the for her line is narciso rodriguez's gift to women and a tribute to their inner beauty. the heart of musk, signature of each creation of the for her line, transports the wearer on a sensory journey.
in musc noir rose eau de parfum, the unmistakable musk heart of for her is wrapped in a delicate sensuality.
the fragrance pays homage to the true nature of every woman, an intimate moment in which it reveals her authenticity.
top notes characterized by the freshness of bergamot combine with the intense tuberose to create a radiant fragrance.
this is followed by the captivating heart of musk which enhances the floral bouquet of the fragrance, softening the base notes with warm oriental accents of vanilla.
with the sensual side of her, musc noir rose eau de parfum enriches the range of narcissus rodriguez for her.
the bottle

narciso rodriguez brings his design philosophy to the bottle. the graphic lines and smoky pink lacquer of the iconic for her bottle reveal a sensual pink hue in a shimmering play of transparencies.
layering
discover the art of layering with narciso rodriguez's iconic collection of fragrances for her.
originally from the middle east, layering is a technique that allows the wearer of the perfume to further personalize their olfactory signature.
by combining multiple scents, it is possible to create a totally personal fragrance.
with the introduction of for her pure musc, layering has become a central aspect of for her fragrances that allows you to customize your favorite for her scent for any occasion.
pure musc enhances the radiance of the sumptuous bouquet of musc noir rose, revealing the quintessence of orange blossom, jasmine and ylang-ylang for added sensuality.

olfactory family:
floral / musky

Description:

Title: Narciso for him bleu noir eau de parfum
Description:
narciso rodriguez for him bleu noir parfum.
for him bleu noir is a new creation for a man who defines his uniqueness.
mysterious and daring, this new bleu noir fragrance revisits masculine elegance by exploring a new complementary universe within the collection.
in this new fragrance, the suede is enhanced by the sensuality of the iris and made sweeter by the addition of the tonka bean.
the heart of musk, the brand's olfactory signature, evokes the sensuality and opulence of bleu noir.
for him bleu noir is a warm, oriental and absolutely addictive fragrance.
its trail is unforgettable, it is pure addiction.
as for the design, for the first time the iconic bottle of bleu noir is presented without internal lacquer, but in an elegant blue tone with transparent black external lacquer.
the matte navy blue cap then adds that final touch of sensuality.
an iconic design that expresses mystery and magnetism.
this new fragrance is embodied by roberto sipos.
combining magnetism and mystery, bleu noir parfum enriches the bleu noir range.

olfactory family:
floral / woody

Title: Le parfum woman eau de parfum
Description: just like an haute couture dress, le parfum celebrates a glowing femininity. a chypre and floral fragrance unveiling a radiant orange blossom and jasmine bouquet combined to an addictive honey rose. the patchouli heart and the woody accord bring strength and a long-lasting trail.

Title: Shampoo bar
Description:
eco-friendly shampoo bar provides nourishment, hydration, protection and shine for all hair types

what it is

this eco-friendly shampoo bar is formulated with 87% ingredients of natural origin, including nourishing organic argan and camellia oils. water-activates into a silky foam that rinses away excess oils and impurities for hair that is clean, soft, and super-shiny. the ph neutral formula is free of sulfates, additives, and preservatives, for extra-gentle cleansing that leaves hair moist and supple—never dry or brittle. infused with a sensorial coconut scent of 100% natural origin, the portable formula goes where you go—without risk of spilling—and is suitable for all hair types, making it an ideal choice for the entire family. eco-friendly design with zero plastic waste—one shampoo bar is the equivalent of two bottles* of liquid shampoo.

*compared to 250ml bottles.

results

visible results
100%*
hair is clean

91%* hair is soft
83%* hair is shiny
79%* hair is nourished
texture
98%* solid and effective
91%* rinses easily
88%* solid and foaming
*satisfaction test, results after 14 days of use, on 99 volunteers.

ingredients

disodium lauryl sulfosuccinate. sodium cocoyl isethionate. stearic acid. aqua/water/eau. maltodextrin. hydrogenated castor oil. cetyl alcohol. sodium stearate. parfum/fragrance. argania spinosa kernel oil. camellia oleifera seed oil. dicaprylyl ether. decyl glucoside. glyceryl oleate. citric acid. benzoic acid [stc3810]
*for informational purposes only. every ingredient list is specific to an individual product reference. all formulas are subject to change. while we endeavor to keep this ingredient list accurate, we cannot guarantee that it is reliable, up-to-date, or error-free. please also refer to the ingredient list on the product’s outer packaging for a complete, accurate, and up-to-date list. organic ingredients are produced in accordance with european regulation (ce 2018/848).

Title: Kenzo homme relift man eau de toilette
Description:
kenzo homme relift by kenzo .

kenzo celebrates its most timeless men's fragrance, kenzo homme eau de toilette, with a new design.
the fragrance does not change: rediscover the eau de toilette kenzo homme, a timeless woody marine fragrance created by christian matthieu.
the freshness of sea spray mingles with the green, woody scent of pine and sandalwood, evoking a walk by the sea along a tree-lined path.
an invigorating fragrance that caresses and refreshes the skin, like a breath of salty air.

the new deep green kenzo homme bottle is an ode to poetry. its shape reflects the strength of bamboo and its design has to do with verticality. its beveled cap evokes the cut of a katana, a sword used by samurai.

Title: Kenzo homme relift man eau de toilette
Description:
kenzo homme relift by kenzo .

kenzo celebrates its most timeless men's fragrance, kenzo homme eau de toilette, with a new design.

Title: Nutri lumiere revive
Description:
2-in-1 skin tone enhancing and revitalising day cream for mature skin.

what it is
nutri-lumière revive is a skin tone enhancing and revitalising day cream that illuminates and corrects any sallowness of the skin. it revives radiance whilst firming and plumping nutrient depleted skin .kaki extract helps to diminish yellow tones in the skin and the purple-tone of the formula boosts this by optically-correcting it even further.

skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily
texture: cream
benefits
revitalised, firm skin and smoothed wrinkles.
new vitality duo: the escin from horse chestnut & organic horse chestnut flower are perfect for nutrient depleted skin whilst the kaki extract brightens the skin.
illuminating purple pearls instantly revive radiance.
clarins plus
in chromotherapy, purple has an essential role in improving radiance by balancing out yellow tones. therefore, nutri-lumière revive’s slightly purple-toned finish works to even skin tone immediately through its optical effect.

ingredients
aqua/water/eau. caprylic/capric triglyceride. squalane. glycerin. simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil. dimethicone. propanediol. butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter. pentylene glycol. c14-22 alcohols. c12-16 alcohols. palmitic acid. ci 77891/titanium dioxide. hydrogenated lecithin. parfum/fragrance. fructose. synthetic fluorphlogopite. c12-20 alkyl glucoside. butylene glycol. acrylates/c10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer. hydroxyacetophenone. avena sativa (oat) kernel extract. disodium edta. escin. tocopheryl acetate. xanthan gum. sodium hydroxide. aesculus hippocastanum (horse chestnut) extract. tocopherol. kalanchoe pinnata leaf extract. marrubium vulgare extract. sodium benzoate. citric acid. harungana madagascariensis extract. balanites roxburghii seed oil. diospyros kaki fruit extract. phenethyl alcohol. potassium sorbate. furcellaria lumbricalis extract. ci 17200/red 33. undaria pinnatifida extract. ci 42090/blue 1. lapsana communis flower/leaf/stem extract. maris sal/sea salt/sel marin. acetyl tetrapeptide-2. dextran [v4048a]
*for informational purposes only. every ingredient list is specific to an individual product reference. all formulas are subject to change. while we endeavor to keep this ingredient list accurate, we cannot guaranty that it is reliable, up-to-date, or error-free. please also refer to the ingredient list on the product's outer packaging for a complete, accurate, and up-to-date list.

Title: Total eye contour gel
Description:
a cooling eye gel which helps to reduce puffiness and dark circles

what it is
clarins’ cooling, non-oily eye contour gel minimises the look of puffiness and dark circles—refreshing, hydrating and resting the delicate skin around eyes. formulated with purifying plant extracts and caffeine, it helps to erase signs of tiredness: the eye contour is toned and its radiance enhanced. this gel for dark circles is suitable for all eye types, even sensitive eyes.
skin type: normal, oily, combination, dry
texture: gel
benefits
puffiness is reduced.
dark circles are diminished.
brighter eyes.

results
88%*
of women say that their skin is soothed and relieved

78%* of women say that the heavy, puffy eyelids sensation is reduced
86%* of women say that their skin is refreshed

Title: Homme man eau de toilette
Description:
david beckham homme creates a fresh and aromatic atmosphere when worn. this masculine fragrance contains top notes of sichuan pepper, ginger and various citruses. rosemary, leather and cashmere wood make a soft and subtle heart. the base notes include mahogany wood, musk and patchouli. pierre negrin is the designer behind this cologne.

fragrance family: woody

concentration: eau de toilette

fragrance notes

top note: sichuan pepper, ginger and citruses

heart note: cashmere wood, leather and rosemary

base note: mahogany, musk and patchouli

Title: Les absolus dorient collection
Description: epices exquises is the evocation of a sensory journey. thierry wasser has captured the essence of an irresistibly oriental fragrance: the spicy aromas of cardamom coffee. like the warm and exhilarating wisps of this coffee, epices exquises blends a warm, full-bodied and sensual base, tinged with black pepper and woody notes of oud, patchouli and sandalwood, with refreshing, subtly overdosed facets of cardamom, notes of pink peppercorn and green and fresh angelica. a sublime and surprising contrast between hot and cold in an explosion of fine spices.

Title: Idole aura woman eau de parfum
Description:
idôle aura eau de parfum, the first sun-kissed scent by lancôme, teleports you to those late summer nights. this comforting and energizing fragrance eludes the essence of rose and dazzling jasmine, accented by a refreshing aroma of salted vanilla.

as unique and unstoppable as the energy that radiates from within every idôle - share the light of success with idôle aura as its ambience transfers from one idôle to another. from idôle aura to you and the idôle’s who surround you.

 together, there is no limit to our future and what we are capable of.

 together we are unstoppable, together we are all idôles.

Title: Libre woman eau de toilette
Description:
keywords

lavender essence orange blossom white tea accord

what it is
libre eau de toilette is a bright and floral women's fragrance. a fresh interpretation of the iconic eau de parfum, this feminine perfume has bursts of french lavender essence and moroccan orange blossom that combine with an icy white tea accord to create a modern and youthful scent.

what it does
drawing inspiration from the couture runways, the iconic ysl perfume packaging pushes its couture statement further with an elongated bottle & rose gold juice color, emphasizing the freshness and playfulness of this fragrance.

Title: Chloe leau woman eau de toilette
Description:
luminous and effortlessly feminine, l’eau is the essence of a woman at one with the infinite grace of nature and with herself.

an unforgettable blush coral in hue, the scent is a bright burst of rose, accented by the fresh and iridescent magnetism of magnolia.

pure and fresh.

top note: lychee, grapefruit
heart note: rose absolute, magnolia, moss
base note: cedarwood essence, musk, amber

Title: Nomade naturelle woman eau de parfum
Description:
chloé reinvents its free-spirited nomade fragrance in this 100% natural-origin eau de parfum. reflecting a quest for freedom and new encounters, the radiant, feminine fragrance celebrates the merging of cultures.

nomade eau de parfum naturelle centres on a gourmand jasmine heart. the essence of bergamot bursts through, while a smooth date accord complements the irresistible radiance of egyptian jasmine absolute. vanilla and sandalwood weave a warm, addictive base.

this vegan, 100% natural-origin eau de parfum contains no artificial colouring. it is formulated with naturally derived alcohol and water – nothing else. the main ingredient, jasmine, is harvested in egypt based on responsible practices.

the emblematic nomade bottle is reinvented in ochre tones inspired by nature. a braid, tied around the neck of the bottle, represents the bonds woven through travel and ongoing encounters. this symbolic motif is also engraved in the glass.

Title: Girl of now lovely woman eau de parfum
Description:
girl of now lovely, capturing the charming spirit of the 'now generation'. a colorful chapter in the girl of now story, celebrating the joy and optimism of hedonistic princesses of modern times. girl of now lovely is adorned with a new green anise flower design at its neck combined with a delicate and feminine coral pink juice. glamourous and sparkling, she is so lovely surrounded by extraordinary flowers !

a colorful blend for a true luminous addiction: a duo of sparkling mandarin and juicy pear lifted by a delicious blackcurrant scent. this bright opening is enlightened by an exclusive accord of orange flower and almond associated with the solar frangipani flower. this floral alchemy is softened by the divine sensuality of cashmeran and magnified by the addiction of tonka bean and patchouli heart for an unforgettable trail.

top notes
mandarin
pear
blackcurrant buds
absolute

heart notes
rose
frangipani
ormond flowers

base notes
cashmeran
patchouli
tonka bean

Title: Narciso cristal woman eau de parfum
Description:
narciso rodriguez presents narciso eau de parfum cristal, the new and luminous perfume for her from the iconic narciso collection. the fragrance is a tribute to radiant femininity, a reflection of the inner light of the narciso woman, just as the facets of a crystal emanate light revealing its natural beauty.

the scent
the new feminine fragrance captures the essence of inner light through its radiant top notes, pure and delicate heart and sensual base notes. in the top notes the radiant bergamot is combined with a lush bouquet of rose and white flower accords. the fragrance develops gradually until it reaches the base notes, made voluptuous by the iconic musk heart, the unmistakable signature of narciso fragrances. musk is enriched with sensual and amber facets of cedar wood and cashmeran, giving the fragrance a mysterious and delicate trail.
sublime alchemy between lightness and depth, the radiance of the perfume counterbalances its intensity.

a natural fragrance
narciso eau de parfum cristal introduces a new concept of naturalness, with over 85% of ingredients of natural origin. with ethically harvested italian bergamot and a note of rose obtained with a new distillation upcycling process.

the bottle
the iconic narciso bottle appears here in its purest form, where the clear glass is tinged with a delicate pink revealing the luminous fragrance within. finished by a contrasting opaque pink cap, this precious object radiates the same magnetic luminosity of the narciso woman.

Title: L`eau d`issey pour homme eau & cedre man eau de toilette
Description:
l’eau de toilette intense l’eau d’issey pour homme eau & cèdre is a vibrantly fresh fragrance. the strength of cedar wood enhanced by water.

a true encounter of the elements, water meets wood in this eau de toilette intense.
the freshness of water contrasts with the dry and vibrant cedar wood.
it shapes and reveals the energetic essence of its sap.

a minimalist bottle that gets back to the essential, adorned with a touch of khaki and topped with a wooden cap echoing the raw, untouched nature that has inspired it.

fragrance
l’eau d’issey eau & cèdre eau de toilette intense is a simple and vibrant composition.
the top notes consist of the fiery freshness of the cardamom.
the heart notes reveal an aquatic accord shaped by the roughness of cedarwood.
the base notes, meanwhile, comprise woody and majestic notes of vetiver and patchouli essences.

a commitment to nature
l’eau d’issey pour homme eau&cèdre bottle is made of 20% post-consumer recycled glass.
its juice is vegan and features 91% of naturally derived ingredients. notes of cardamom, vetiver, and patchouli are also sourced responsibly to the benefit of the communities where they are produced.
its 100% ashwood cap is composed of a single piece, avoiding the need for energy-consuming assembly. 95% water use was reduced compared to l’eau d’issey pour homme edt cap.

it’s a renewal of l’eau d’issey pour homme that celebrates its story, but also anchor the house as it turns towards tomorrow, forever seeking to innovate and serve nature.

Title: L`eau d`issey eau & magnolia  woman eau de toilette
Description:
a luminous and feminine eau de toilette intense

l’eau de toilette intense l’eau d’issey eau & magnolia is a radiant and delicate fragrance. the velvety softness of a magnolia petal enhanced by the freshness of water for a luminous infusion bursting with floral notes.

it all started with water, source of life, original element, raw material, source of endless possibilities. this journey continues now to encounter the aerial and delicately feminine magnolia flower.

a minimalist bottle that gets back to the essential, adorned with a touch of beige and topped with a wooden cap echoing the raw, untouched nature that has inspired it.

fragrance
l’eau d’issey eau & magnolia eau de toilette intense is a simple and radiant composition.
the freshness of the bergamot brings a touch of sparkle to the top notes.
while the heart of the fragrance boasts a floral bouquet bursting with water, where notes of magnolia are enhanced by an aquatic freshness.
a precious wood base brings the olfactory trail to its conclusion.

olfactive notes
magnolia
bergamot
sandalwood

Title: Hydra essentiel cooling gel normal to combination skin
Description:
an original and sensorial water-based cooling gel-cream that instantly melts into the skin.

what is it?
this fresh, non-greasy gel moisturiser cream restores the skin’s radiance and comfort, no matter the circumstances.
your skin’s capacity to retain water is restored through organic leaf of life extract, a powerful natural hydration activator that boosts the skin’s hyaluronic acid production, the “sponge molecule that is the skin’s natural water retention system. your skin is left intensely hydrated, radiant, and shine-free with daily use of this water gel-based moisturiser.
non-greasy, refreshing texture that feels matte after application. this hydrating moisturiser is suitable for normal, oily and combination skin.
skin type: combination, normal
texture: gel
use: apply morning and/or evening to the face and neck.

benefits
perfectly hydrated skin. fresh, matte skin. radiance is revived. clarins anti-pollution complex.

clarins plus
gel-based moisturiser that activates the hydration process at all levels of the skin, even in challenging environments.

ingredients
aqua/water/eau. glycerin. butylene glycol. propanediol. 1,2-hexanediol. sodium polyacrylate starch. ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp copolymer. xylitylglucoside. hydroxyacetophenone. anhydroxylitol. ethylhexylglycerin. parfum/fragrance. xylitol. pyridoxine hcl. silica. disodium edta. decylene glycol. glucose. kalanchoe pinnata leaf extract. zinc gluconate. citric acid. marrubium vulgare extract. alcohol. phenethyl alcohol. furcellaria lumbricalis extract. sodium benzoate. tris(tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) citrate. potassium sorbate. ci 42090/blue 1. lapsana communis flower/leaf/stem extract. maris sal/sea salt/sel marin. callicarpa japonica fruit extract [v2898b]

Title: Calm essential balm
Description:
calm-essentiel repairing soothing balm soothes, repairs and nourishes any areas of particularly sensitive, weakened or rough skin on the face and body. enriched with clary sage extract and shea butter, the soothing balm protects and soothes sensitive skin from occasional skin flare ups that cause redness, itchy irritation and warm sensations. immediately, your skin is soothed, as if wrapped in a protective veil. day after day, the skin is intensely nourished. feelings of discomfort are diminished, weakened areas are repaired. formulated with 95% of ingredients from natural origin.

ingredients
aqua/water/eau. butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter. glyceryl stearate se. caprylic/capric triglyceride. squalane. glycerin. propanediol. ppg-3 myristyl ether. sodium polyacrylate. disodium edta. ethylhexylglycerin. sclareolide. salicyloyl phytosphingosine [v3969a]

how to use
take up a little product on your fingertips. apply a thick layer directly to weakened areas and gently press down 2-3 times for a few seconds. gently smooth over skin to spread out product well. repeat as often as needed to all areas of weakened skin on the face and body.

Description:
what it is
skin type: normal, oily, combination, dry
texture: gel
