Title: Heritage man eau de parfum
Description:
herald of a new spirit
inspired by yesterday's generations, héritage is a fragrance dedicated to the men of tomorrow. it opens with aromatic freshness, succeeded by the subtlety of a warm spicy accord on a woody dry-down with shades of the orient.

héritage, for a man who is at once a trustee for tradition and a herald of a new spirit.

fragrance
spicy ambery.
refined, warm, authentic.
the exuberant freshness of lemon and bergamot top notes meets an aromatic breeze of lavender. then, the heart is enriched with fresh, spicy notes such as coriander and pink pepper. finally, with the patchouli there emerges a rich, ambery woody dry-down.

spicy ambery
refined, warm, authentic
the exuberant freshness of lemon and bergamot top notes meets an aromatic breeze of lavender. then, the heart is enriched with fresh, spicy notes such as coriander and pink pepper. finally, with the patchouli there emerges a rich, ambery woody dry-down.

ingredients
#16770 ingredients:
• alcohol
• aqua (water)
• parfum (fragrance)
• limonene
• linalool
• hydroxycitronellal
• butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane
• citronellol
• alpha-isomethyl ionone
• coumarin
• diethylamino hydroxybenzoyl hexyl benzoate
• benzyl benzoate
• citral

• pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate
• cinnamyl alcohol
• eugenol
• benzyl salicylate

• cinnamal

disclaimer : guerlain product ingredient listings are updated periodically. before using a guerlain product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

Title: Mavala stop pen
Description:
nail biting is a very bad habit that affects many people. this habit can quickly worsen the appearance of nails and their contour.
the mavala stop-pen has been specifically developed to help break the habit of putting fingers in the mouth, and restore and keep beautiful nails. it is an applicator pen moistened with a bitter tasting aqueous solution, enriched with a botanical extract that nourishes cuticles and soothes nail contour. nails and their contour will regain a beautiful and well-cared for appearance. a handy and nomadic format to take everywhere with you.

Title: Mavala prebiotic hand cream
Description:
the skin of the hands is at the front lines, suffering on a daily basis by constant washing and/or frequent disinfection, or even by handling household products without protective gloves. its microbiota is affected, the skin dries out, reddens, becomes rough and shows signs of ageing.

mavala prebiotic hand cream provides the necessary nutrients to maintain the balance and the microbiological activity of the skin, thanks to its natural prebiotics, a combination of yogurt and inulin, that preserve the balanced diversity of the microbiota.
an anti-drying glucidic complex, shea butter and cotton oil, which are nourishing and protective, complete this prebiotic action.
this expert care soothes tightness, reduces redness and brings immediate comfort to the most delicate and sensitive hands. hands are again supple, soft, perfectly hydrated and protected by a balanced flora and strengthened skin barrier.

Title: L`homme intense man eau de parfum
Description:
the magnetic & sensual elegance of a liquoirish woody scent

the modern true & intense man
the new l’homme eau de parfum is dedicated to a man as cool,
nonchalant, and magnetic as ever, that knows what’s edgy now is being
true to himself. rather than virtual connections, he craves real emotions.
confident enough to be open to his own feelings. and hers.
i want to know you.

the fragrance. the sensual warmth of an orange bourbon sour
the warmth of bourbon notes in tension with the bitterness of orange reinvents l’homme’s iconic woody signature in an even more powerful, intense version: l’homme eau de parfum. a sophisticated blend composed by a vibrant sparkling top of bitter orange infused with noble vetiver heart from haiti & a uniquely innovative ingredient, oakwood infusion. an upcycled ingredient distilled from the wood chips of oak casks crafted by seguin moreau in cognac. the oaks are sustainably sourced and selected for their superior aromatic profile. shake. succumb.

the bottle. infused with neo-vintage aesthetics. with its boldly oversized metallic hexagonal cap, l’homme eau de
parfum bottle reveals an ambery golden liquid in the rich tones of
smooth bourbon whisky. a reflection of the scent’s cool retro speakeasy
vibe, the warmth of its fragrant cocktail, and the intensity of its sensual
trail. class in a glass bottle.

how to apply

olfactory family
woody

olfactory sub-family
fruity

top note
bergamote accord, bitter orange essence,

heart note
geranium essence, lavandin heart

base note
vetiver essence cedarwood essence, oakwood infusion

key notes
bitter orange essence, vetiver essence, cedarwood essence, oakwood infusion

ingredients

â— alcohol 

â— aqua / water / eau 

â— parfum / fragrance 

â— limonene 

â— linalool

â— alpha-isomethyl ionone

â— tris(tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) citrate

â— cinnamal

â— isoeugenol 

â— eugenol

â— ci 42090 / blue 1

Title: La nuit tresor intense woman eau de parfum
Description:
are you ready to live an intense love story? feel a deep, passionate love with the opulent scent of la nuit trésor intense.

- an addictive floral ambery scent

- an exquisite ruby bottle

- a sustainably sourced rose damascena

fragrance notes

sensual damascena rose

at the heart, the sensual damascena rose radiates in all its intensity.

succulent black cherry

a succulent and juicy black cherry wraps the damascena rose in an addictive veil.

comforting almond milk

at the bottom, rich and creamy almond milk adds a finishing touch of comfort and softness.

Title: Kenzo homme relift man eau de parfum
Description:
kenzo homme eau de parfum, a new addictive marine woody fragrance for men by quentin bisch. a sensual interpretation of leather warmed by sunlight and brightened by spicy facets, in a bottle inspired by a katana-cut bamboo shoot.

a musical composition of clément beauvais and a special thanks to mangbo of the musical group "kebo iwa" who allowed the collaboration and recording of the iconic sound of the handmade bamboo instrument called "kul-kul" and which served as the basis for the original musical composition.

Title: Kenzo homme relift man eau de parfum
Description:
kenzo homme eau de parfum, a new addictive marine woody fragrance for men by quentin bisch. a sensual interpretation of leather warmed by sunlight and brightened by spicy facets, in a bottle inspired by a katana-cut bamboo shoot.

a musical composition of clément beauvais and a special thanks to mangbo of the musical group "kebo iwa" who allowed the collaboration and recording of the iconic sound of the handmade bamboo instrument called "kul-kul" and which served as the basis for the original musical composition.

Title: Man aqua
Description:
jimmy choo man aqua - a woody marine edt for men who embrace life head-on.

jimmy choo man aqua is like an olfactive ode to the ocean. it opens with stimulating spice, as the sweetness of cardamom rides a sparkling wave of grapefruit, before drying down to a fresh heart of icy geranium and clary sage, both of which mingle with the marine accord which sits at the heart of jimmy choo man aqua. at the base, patchouli and amber is afforded a soft, seafaring-inspired aspect with the addition of salted moss.

perfect for: a man looking for a refreshing all-year-round signature scent.

  • scent type: woody
  • top notes: grapefruit, cardamom
  • heart notes: marine accord, geranium, clary sage
  • base notes: amber, salty moss
  • a woody marine eau de toilette

Title: Insolence eau de toilette
Description:
insolence eau de toilette is a transfiguration, a totally new and yet familiar flower that will whisk you away to a world full of daring, irreverence and freedom.

embrace your perfume in the mythical bee bottle.
designed in 1853 by pierre-françois-pascal guerlain for the empress eugénie, wife of napoléon iii, this precious bottle is adorned with the symbol of the empire: the bee, which is now la maison guerlain’s emblem.

fragrance

a sensual philtre, this fruity floral scent takes you straight to the heart of the fragrance. it blends berry notes and feminine notes of violet and orange blossom with the smooth luxury of iris to form a fiery and voluptuous accord.

 ingredients

alcohol • parfum (fragrance) • aqua (water) • alpha-isomethyl ionone • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • limonene • linalool • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • butylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate • bht • coumarin • geraniol • hydroxycitronellal • isoeugenol • benzyl salicylate • benzyl benzoate • citronellol • citral • citric acid • farnesol • benzyl alcohol • methyl 2-octynoate • eugenol • ci 14700 (red 4) • ci 60730 (ext.violet 2) • disodium edta

Title: Narciso scented woman hair mist
Description:
• a lightweight, luxurious & heavenly perfumed hair mist

  • enriched with active ingredients that nurture & protect hair

  • infused with an intense, sensual & sophisticated fragrance

  • leaves hair soft, smooth & fresh

Description:
what it is
the eau extraordinaire comes in a moisturising body cream. its soft texture intensely nourishes and moisturises the skin, but that's not all! its eau extraordinaire-fragranced notes transform this treatment time into a revitalising moment of well-being that indulges the senses.

delicately scented skin.

Title: Solidarity hand and nail treatment cream
Description:
what is it?
hands can be particularly damaged and painful when exposed to the agressions of everyday life, such as the weather, water and the tasks we perform with them. so take time to care for them with clarins professional, emollient-rich moisturising hand cream - with soothing sesame oil and fortifying japanese mulberry. the moisturiser forms an invisible protective "glove" that shields hands from the elements, keeping skin smooth and silky and minimising signs of ageing. softens and comforts chapped, irritated and sore hands, and brings moisture relief t dry skin on hands. helps strengthen nails and condition cuticles for naturally clean, soft and youthful-looking hands.

skin type: all skin types
texture: cream
use: use in the morning and throughout the day.

what makes it so special?

softens the hands and hydrate. protects from environmental damage (cold, sun, hard water, chapping). diminishes dark spots. regenerates and strengthens the nails. this non-stickly cream spreads easily and absorbs instantly.

clarins plus
an invisible glove of beauty that takes care of the entire hand - the palm, the back of the hand and the nails.

ingredients
aqua/water/eau. c12-15 alkyl benzoate. pentylene glycol. butylene glycol. dimethicone. potassium cetyl phosphate. hydrogenated coco-glycerides. cetearyl alcohol. glyceryl myristate. cetyl alcohol. stearyl alcohol. stearyl heptanoate. glycerin. adansonia digitata seed oil. cetearyl glucoside. parfum/fragrance. allantoin. sesamum indicum (sesame) seed oil. tetrasodium edta. butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter. dehydroacetic acid. lecithin. sodium pca. tapioca starch. limonene. butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter unsaponifiables. palmitoyl myristyl serinate. caramel. morus alba root extract. citronellol. linalool. tocopherol. citral. eugenol. benzyl benzoate [c1473g]

Title: Flower by kenzo l   absolue woman eau de parfum
Description:
master perfumer alberto morillas transcends the poppy. with flower by kenzo l’absolue, he has signed a sophisticated and captivating spicy floral fragrance for women.
saffron, the most precious pistil, infuses a vibrant bouquet of orange blossom and damascena rose absolute. in the base notes, vanilla enveloped in white musks distills an addictive sensuality.
flower by kenzo l’absolue: the olfactory interpretation of a super-bloom.

activist femininity
masami charlotte lavault, an activist flower farmer and founder of the first flower farm in paris, is the face of the new women’s perfume flower by kenzo l’absolue.
with roots in france and japan, and a love for flowers, she is the perfect embodiment of the flower woman. a poetic activist, she draws her strength from nature, just like her totem flower.
kenzo stands with her for a common goal: to promote slow, low-impact flower farming and “make ecology irresistible”!

Title: Super restorative day cream all skin types
Description:
what it is:
a deeply replenishing, anti-aging day moisturizer for all skin types that minimizes the appearance of lines, wrinkles, and slackening caused by age-related hormonal changes, while evening skin tone—for a visibly smoother, firmer, plumper, and more youthful-looking complexion.

this next generation green beauty innovation is powered by 93% ingredients of natural origin. clarins’ proprietary new lift-replenish duo features wrinkle-fighting organic harungana extract—as effective as retinol* and gentle on the skin— to replenish and visibly minimize loss of density and new organic gorse extract, to visibly tighten and improve slackening caused by hormonal deficiencies linked to menopause. organic desert date extract and a vitamin c derivative promote a more even skin tone. organic sea lily extract intensely hydrates to leave skin feeling soft and comfortable. vegetal squalane extract protects and helps reinforce the skin's hydrolipidic film to shield from environmental pollution that leads to premature signs of aging. line-filling micro-pearls visibly plump to reduce the look of lines and wrinkles. clarins' plant-based anti-pollution complex features nipplewort, furcellaria & organic white horehound to protect from indoor and outdoor environmental pollution, including skin-aging blue light from electronics. skin appears more even, “lifted” and revitalized; lines and wrinkles are visibly reduced.

*in vitro test on collagen synthesis

  • skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily
  • texture: cream
  • use: apply each morning to clean face and neck.

benefits:

  • visibly minimizes lines, wrinkles, loss of density, and skin slackening
  • visibly lifts, firms, smoothes, and plumps
  • hydrates, comforts, and softens
  • helps even skin tone
  • clarins’ plant-based anti-pollution complex helps protect skin from indoor and outdoor pollution, including blue light from electronics

innovation and plant expertise
our propietary new lift-replenish duo combines two potent plant extracts, organic harungana—as effective as retinol* and gentle on the skin—and organic gorse, that work synergistically to minimize the appearance of lines, wrinkles and loss of density for visibly smoother, firmer, radiant skin with a “lifted” look. vegetal squalane extract helps protect and reinforce the skin’s delicate hydrolipidic film to help minimize damage from environmental pollution that can result in moisture loss.

clarins plus
by age 50, hormonal changes cause the fibroblast matrix to become thin and fragile, impeding the skin’s ability to protect itself during the day, and reenergize itself at night—resulting in slackening, wrinkles, dullness, dryness and an uneven skin tone. experts in anti-aging skincare since 1954, clarins has created a new generation formula to target these damaging effects of hormone depletion on the fibroblast network for more youthful-looking skin.

results:
91%*
supple skin immediately after use

88%** visibly plumper skin
86%* nourished skin immediately after use
85%** visibly firmer skin
85%** replenished skin
84%*** visibly smoother skin
84%*** fresher complexion
81%** formula minimizes the appearance of slackening
74%** visibly tighter, "lifted" skin
90%**** the perfect day and night duo to revitalize the skin
84%**** skin regains perfect balance for a visibly younger-looking appearance using the day and night duo
*consumer test - super restorative day cream, all skin types, 111 women
**consumer test - super restorative day cream, all skin types, 111 women - after 28 days.
***consumer test - super restorative day cream, all skin types, 111 women - after 7 days.
****consumer test - 111 women, 28 days super restorative day cream all skin types followed by 14 days in duo with super restorative night cream all skin types.

ingredients:
aqua/water/eau. caprylic/capric triglyceride. cetearyl alcohol. squalane*. pentylene glycol. glycerin. hydrogenated coco-glycerides. ascorbyl glucoside. butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter. glyceryl stearate. peg-100 stearate. cetearyl glucoside. dimethicone. hydroxyethyl acrylate/sodium acryloyldimethyl taurate copolymer. butylene glycol. carbomer. caprylyl glycol. sodium hydroxide. sucrose palmitate. xylitylglucoside. parfum/fragrance. sodium citrate. anhydroxylitol. tocopheryl acetate. ci 77891/titanium dioxide. synthetic fluorphlogopite. dimethiconol. xylitol. glyceryl linoleate. disodium edta. polysorbate 60. citric acid. sodium lactate. sorbitan isostearate. glucose. harungana madagascariensis extract. marrubium vulgare extract. potassium sorbate. propanediol. coco-glucoside. pectin. sodium hyaluronate. balanites roxburghii seed oil. guar hydroxypropyltrimonium chloride. phenethyl alcohol. furcellaria lumbricalis extract. pancratium maritimum extract. ulex europaeus leaf/root/stem extract. palmitoyl tripeptide-1. lapsana communis flower/leaf/stem extract. maris sal/sea salt/sel marin. ci 14700/red 4. palmitoyl tetrapeptide-7. [v3996a] *squalane végétal – vegetable squalane
*for informational purposes only. every ingredient list is specific to an individual product reference. all formulas are subject to change. while we endeavor to keep this ingredient list accurate, we cannot guarantee that it is reliable, up-to-date, or error-free. please also refer to the ingredient list on the product’s outer packaging for a complete, accurate, and up-to-date list. organic ingredients are produced in accordance with european regulation (ce 2018/848).

Title: Super restorative day cream spf15
Description:
what it is:
new innovation for menopausal skin. the super restorative day cream with spf15 protects the skin from pollutants thanks to the anti-pollution complex, protects the skin’s natural barrier with vegetal squalene and instantly smooths the skin thanks to line filing pearls. the addition of spf15 helps to shield the skin from uv rays.

the production of the hormone, oestrogen, is significantly impacted by menopause which leads to a slower production process within vital skin cells, such as fibroblasts.
fibroblasts are responsible for producing collagen, elastin, and the dermal matrix - the skin’s natural bounce. it immediately leaves the skin brighter-looking and smooth. day after day, face is replenished, lifted, radiant and with glowing skin.

  • skin type: all skin types
  • texture: cream
  • use: apply to a clean face and neck each morning, warm in your hands and press outwards over the face. over the top of your serum for best results 

benefits:

  • instantly illuminates and smooths.
  • restores density to the skin at all levels.
  • reduces the appearance of deep wrinkles.
  • lifts and combats sagging.
  • intensely nourishes and hydrates.
  • prevents and erases dark spots.
  • protects the skin from sun damage.
  • protects the skin from environmental damage.

clarins plus
new research has led to clarins’ discovery of organic harungana which has intensive replenishment and anti-ageing benefits and offers the same effect as retinol whilst being tolerated by all skin types.

organic harungana is combined with our new plant discovery, organic gorse extract, which helps improve the tone of fibroblasts by up to 89% and provides a firmer, more toned skin alongside other ingredients such as organic desert date extract, organic sea lily and vitamin c derivative.

the super restorative day & night formulas are adapted to the skin’s chronobiology by meeting it’s specific needs at different times, protecting during the day and reactivating at night.

ingredients:
aqua/water/eau. dicaprylyl carbonate. glycerin. butyloctyl salicylate. pentylene glycol. cetearyl alcohol. ascorbyl glucoside. potassium cetyl phosphate. squalane. dimethicone. parfum/fragrance. butylene glycol. cetearyl glucoside. acrylates/c10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer. sodium hydroxide. xylitylglucoside. hydroxyacetophenone. sodium citrate. anhydroxylitol. ethylhexylglycerin. tocopheryl acetate. xanthan gum. ci 77891/titanium dioxide. caprylic/capric triglyceride. synthetic fluorphlogopite. dimethiconol. xylitol. disodium edta. sodium lactate. sucrose palmitate. glucose. carbomer. citric acid. harungana madagascariensis extract. marrubium vulgare extract. coco-glucoside. balanites roxburghii seed oil. glyceryl linoleate. phenethyl alcohol. furcellaria lumbricalis extract. pancratium maritimum extract. tin oxide. ulex europaeus leaf/root/stem extract. tocopherol. potassium sorbate. propanediol. pectin. sodium hyaluronate. guar hydroxypropyltrimonium chloride. ci 14700/red 4. palmitoyl tripeptide-1. lapsana communis flower/leaf/stem extract. maris sal/sea salt/sel marin. palmitoyl tetrapeptide-7. [s4041a]

Title: Super restorative night cream for all skin types
Description:
what it is:
a deeply replenishing, anti-aging night moisturizer for all skin types that minimizes the appearance of lines, wrinkles, dullness, and slackening caused by age-related hormonal changes, while evening skin tone — for a visibly smoother, firmer, radiant, and more youthful-looking complexion.

this next generation green beauty innovation is powered by 91% ingredients of natural origin. clarins’ proprietary new lift-replenish duo features wrinkle-fighting organic harungana extract—as effective as retinol* and gentle on the skin— to replenish and visibly minimize loss of density and new organic gorse extract, to visibly tighten and improve slackening caused by hormonal deficiencies linked to menopause. organic desert date extract and a vitamin c derivative promote a more even skin tone. organic sea lily extract intensely hydrates to leave skin feeling soft and comfortable. organic service tree bud extract boosts microcirculation while you sleep for a radiant glow by morning. clarins' plant-based anti-pollution complex features nipplewort, furcellaria & organic white horehound to help minimize damage from environmental pollution that leads to premature signs of aging, including skin-aging blue light from electronics. skin appears more even, “lifted” and revitalized; lines and wrinkles are visibly reduced.

the rich, sensorial, pale pink cream melts into the skin providing an immediate feeling of comfort and well-being.

*in vitro test on collagen synthesis

  • skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily
  • texture: cream
  • use: apply each evening to clean face and neck.

benefits:

  • visibly minimizes lines, wrinkles, loss of density, and skin slackening
  • visibly lifts, firms, smoothes, and plumps
  • hydrates, comforts, and softens
  • boosts skin’s radiance
  • helps even skin tone
  • clarins’ plant-based anti-pollution complex helps minimize damage from environmental pollution that leads to premature signs of aging, including blue light from electronics

innovation and plant expertise
our propietary new lift-replenish duo combines two potent plant extracts, organic harungana—as effective as retinol* and gentle on the skin—and organic gorse, that work synergistically to minimize the appearance of lines, wrinkles and loss of density for visibly smoother, firmer, radiant skin with a “lifted” look. organic service tree bud extract boosts skin’s radiance, for a glowing, well-rested complexion by morning.

clarins plus
by age 50, hormonal changes cause the fibroblast matrix to become thin and fragile, impeding the skin’s ability to protect itself during the day, and reenergize itself at night—resulting in slackening, wrinkles, dullness, dryness and an uneven skin tone. experts in anti-aging skincare since 1954, clarins has created a new generation formula to target these damaging effects of hormone depletion on the fibroblast network for more youthful-looking skin.

results:
95%*
nourished skin immediately after use

92%* supple skin immediately after use
89%** visibly improved skin texture 
88%** visibly smoother skin
86%*** skin appears regenerated by morning
81%*** replenished skin
80%*** visibly tighter, “lifted” skin
90%**** the perfect day and night duo to revitalize the skin
84%**** skin regains perfect balance for a visibly younger-looking appearance using the day and night duo
*consumer test - super restorative night cream, all skin types, 111 women. 
**consumer test - super restorative night cream, all skin types, 111 women. 
***consumer test - super restorative night cream, all skin types, 111 women. 
****consumer test - 111 women, 28 days super restorative day cream all skin types followed by 14 days in duo with super restorative night cream all skin types.

ingredients:
aqua/water/eau. cetearyl isononanoate. dicaprylyl carbonate. glycerin. cetearyl alcohol. propanediol. ascorbyl glucoside. butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter. hydrogenated coco-glycerides. dimethicone. glyceryl stearate. peg-100 stearate. cetearyl glucoside. butylene glycol. carbomer. glyceryl caprylate. sodium hydroxide. parfum/fragrance. xylitylglucoside. hydroxyacetophenone. sodium citrate. anhydroxylitol. xanthan gum. tocopheryl acetate. caprylic/capric triglyceride. xylitol. disodium edta. alcohol. sodium lactate. glucose. citric acid. harungana madagascariensis extract. marrubium vulgare extract. coco-glucoside. balanites roxburghii seed oil. phenethyl alcohol. furcellaria lumbricalis extract. pancratium maritimum extract. pyrus sorbus bud extract. ulex europaeus leaf/root/stem extract. palmitoyl tripeptide-1. lapsana communis flower/leaf/stem extract. maris sal/sea salt/sel marin. ci 14700/red 4. palmitoyl tetrapeptide-7 [v3994a]

Title: Alien goddess woman eau de parfum
Description:
at a time when people seek light in the darkness, a solar goddess is paving the way to a miraculous but true destiny.
in perfect harmony with body and soul, she is ready to magnify the world around her with glory, generosity and benevolence.
bringing her life-giving power and beauty to a barren planet with her golden flower as a healing gift to the world and universal call to all women.

divine floral ambery woody eau de parfum, alien goddess is a sacred promise of femininity and hope. incandescent and generous solar embrace, mugler's new women's fragrance is the evocation of a mystical world that promises to change the unremarkable. worn by a woman who is out of this world and whose envelops her in a luminous and warm radiance of well-being wherever she goes.
shine in the light of the sun with alien goddess perfume and celebrate your femininity: your fragrance is as extraordinary as you are.

alien goddess, a universal call to all women.
create the extraordinary.

olfactory:
"an incandescent and generous solar embrace."
marie salamagne & nathalie lorson, alien goddess perfumers.

this floral ambery woody creation leaves behind a trail facetted by the most glorious ingredients in the perfumers palette that will mesmerize your senses. a solar floral bouquet sparkling with luminosity faceted around 3 revelations.

radiant revelation: the fragrance opens with the radiant revelation of a sparkling italian bergamot essence, recalling the first rays of sunlight. an intense burst of light that crosses the fragrance, similar to the positive energy of the solar goddess.
miraculous revelation: an intense solar flower propels alien goddess eau de parfum straight to the heights, giving all of its strength to its benevolent message. performing like a dazzling floral prism, it gives pride of place to a supreme flower: jasmine grandiflorum, a truly golden flower, symbol of femininity and sensuality. in the heart of alien goddess eau de parfum radiates a magnificent superinfusion of jasmine grandiflorum crafted for mugler. the superinfusion process gives the jasmine petals a modern facet, both fruity and petal-like, as well as a creamy texture. more radiating and modern than ever, spreading the ideals of the solar goddess.
mindful revelation: the conclusion to alien goddess’s message of peace and hope, the mindful revelation unveils the addictive fullness of a bourbon vanilla. crafted for mugler, this premium infusion is both smooth and enveloping like a veil of comforting silk. this consciously sourced premium extract is obtained through an extraction technology allowing to seize the complete organoleptic profile at the heart of the raw material. unveiling a delicious vanilla note with balsamic tonalities, it will delight your senses with deep mysterious warm vibrations.

the bottle:
the alien goddess eau de parfum bottle is imagined as a mesmerizing object with which alien goddess glorifies and elevates the world.

a new fascinating talisman bottle adorned in gold, both organic and dreamlike with stunning shaded metallic lacquering - evoking sunrise, on the outside. this bottle shines with all its intensity, inside and out. it encapsulates a luminous fragrance and radiates endlessly.

a mystical and precious bottle refillable thanks to the alien goddess refill bottle.

mugler is committed to a more responsible luxury by offering unique bottles, refillable thanks to the refill bottle.

ingredients:
alcohol, parfum / fragrance, aqua / water / eau, benzyl salicylate, linalool, benzyl alcohol, hydroxycitronellal, butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane, hexyl cinnamal, ethylhexyl salicylate, coumarin, limonene, citronellol, methyl anthranilate, geraniol, citral, tris(tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) citrate, benzyl benzoate, code fil: b275648/2, code formule: 2042172 05

Title: Amor amor woman eau de toilette
Description:
"after the tenderness of anaïs anaïs, the wisdom of noa and the vitality of gloria, cacharel makes a passionate declaration of love twice over: amor amor.

the ultimate fragrance of desire and impulse, everything about the composition of amor amor is designed to communicate the electric sensation of love at first sight: an instant spark, an immediate attraction and a sudden quickening of the pulse.

for the first time ever, cacharel introduces fruit accords in amor amor to create a dazzling fruity floral love potion that seduces from the first. amor amor is a rounded fragrance with an open structure where each ingredient is expressed equally from start to finish."

fruity floral

top notes: blackcurrant, orange, grapefruit
heart notes: rose, apricot, jasmine
base notes: vanilla, tonka bean, musk

ingredients:
alcohol, parfum / fragrance, aqua / water, butylphenyl methylpropional, limonene, hydroxycitronellal, citronellol, coumarin, bht, geraniol, linalool, anise alcohol, citral fil : b30456/1

Title: Eden woman eau de parfum
Description:
orange blossom and mimosa, cool fruits and patchouli... eden, for the first time ever, encompasses the exhilaration of spring with sensuality.

top notes: water lily, lotus flower, mandarin
heart notes: melon, pineapple, peach, violet, mimosa
base notes: patchouli leaf, sandalwood

ingredients:
alcohol, parfum / fragrance, aqua / water, limonene, linalool, alpha-isomethyl ionone, geraniol, coumarin, benzyl alcohol, benzyl salicylate, citral, citronellol, farnesol, hydroxycitronellal, hexyl cinnamal, bht, anise alcohol fil: b44508/2

Title: Loulou woman eau de parfum
Description:
mythical perfume, loulou is the combination of tenderness and seduction... from the bottle, inspired by a magic lamp, comes a sensual fragrance, oriental and floral.

oriental floral

top notes: jasmine, mimosa, orange, tiare lily
heart notes: iris
base notes: sandalwood, vanilla, incense

ingredients:
alcohol, parfum / fragrance, aqua / water, coumarin, alpha-isomethyl ionone, linalool, limonene, hydroxycitronellal, hexyl, cinnamal, benzyl alcohol, benzyl benzoate, citronellol, benzyl salicylate, anise alcohol, geraniol, bht, cinnamyl alcohol, citral, farnesol, isofugenol? eugenol fil : b164339/2

Title: Polo deep blue man eau de parfum
Description:
a sophisticated men's perfume that opens with a wave of citrus and a heart of aromatic cypress and clary sage, adding a level of sensuality. the intense fragrance for men finishes with a salty-mineral, deep-ocean accord that energizes and activates an even deeper level of freshness.

about the bottle:
inspired by the swell of an epic wave, the refreshing cologne for men is encapsulated in a luxe fragrance bottle echoing the energy and intensity of the sea and the glint of sun on the water with gradated blue-glass and silver accents.

about the fragrance:
a tribute to the cool deep ocean and lush island scents, this men's cologne is equally as refreshing as it is grounding. the powerful perfume for men contains the most highly concentrated level of fragrance for a long-lasting scent.

Title: Polo man eau de toilette
Description:
a masculine blend of tobacco, wood, and leather, energized with the refreshing scent of brilliant herbals. discover the classic men's fragrance by america's foremost designer, ralph lauren.

notes:
basil, chamomile, tobacco, patchouli, oakmoss.
style:
refreshing and masculine.

ingredients:
alcohol denat., acqua/ water, parfum/fragrance, eugenol, linalool, limonene, hydroxycitronellal, benzyl alcohol, benzyl salicylate, benzyl benzoate, isoeugenol, citronellol, geraniol, hydroxyisohexyl 3-cyclohexene carboxaldehyde, citral, hexyl cinnamal, evernia furfuracea/tremoss extract, benzyl cinnamate, ci 42090/blue 1, ci 15985/yellow 6.

how to use:
suggested usage:
-fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-after applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. this breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-if you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-replace fragrance after 12 months. expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

eau de toilette or eau de parfum?:
the difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. while edt contains five to nine percent, edp contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. edps, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

Title: Polo red man eau de parfum
Description:
fragrance family: warm & spicy

scent type: woody spices

key notes: red ginger, clary sage oil, natural woods

fragrance description: a sensual men's cologne crafted with a modern mix of warm ginger deepened with aromatic sage and rounded out by rich, natural woods and musk accord for a lasting impression of warm sensuality.

about the bottle: the luxe matte-red fragrance bottle is paired with a chrome cap, echoing the seductive men's perfume within.

about the fragrance: evoking a new level of luxury, seduction meets sophistication in this warm perfume for men. inspired by ralph lauren's automobile collection, this cologne captures the essence of the speed and adrenaline of auto racing.

ingredients:
alcohol, aqua/water, parfum/fragrance, limonene, linalool, citronellol, benzyl benzoate, geraniol, citral, alpha-isomethyl ionone, benzyl alcohol, methyl anthranilate.

Title: Anais anais woman eau de toilette
Description: cacharel anais anais eau de toilette spray is a tender and emotive blend of lightness, brightness, passion and purity. the fragrance opens with a light burst of hyacinth melting into the softness of orange blossom and then the radiant notes of jasmine and rose absolute. florentine iris mingles with the warmth of virginia cedar wood and bourbon vetiver and, to prolong the mystery, musky sandalwood rises up through a spiral of incense. a divine fragrance and perfect for a sweet women, feminine and sensual. its fragrance is a bouquet of white flowers, representing the purity and innocence of women. top notes: orange blossom, green notes, mandarin. heart notes: lily flower, jasmine from morocco, tuberose, may rose, iris from florence. base notes: sandalwood, cedar, amber, incense, vetiver.

Title: Anais anais woman eau de toilette
Description: cacharel anais anais eau de toilette spray is a tender and emotive blend of lightness, brightness, passion and purity. the fragrance opens with a light burst of hyacinth melting into the softness of orange blossom and then the radiant notes of jasmine and rose absolute. florentine iris mingles with the warmth of virginia cedar wood and bourbon vetiver and, to prolong the mystery, musky sandalwood rises up through a spiral of incense. a divine fragrance and perfect for a sweet women, feminine and sensual. its fragrance is a bouquet of white flowers, representing the purity and innocence of women. top notes: orange blossom, green notes, mandarin. heart notes: lily flower, jasmine from morocco, tuberose, may rose, iris from florence. base notes: sandalwood, cedar, amber, incense, vetiver.

Title: Angel nova woman eau de parfum
Description:
mugler dedicates angel nova to daring women who make their dreams come true. the angel nova woman embodies renewal through creativity and imagination. bold and inspiring, she rises by creating her own world. determined, she transcends reality. blossoming, she lives up to her dreams. almost thirty years after the creation of angel, mugler sheds new light on his iconic fragrance and the woman who embodies it.

angel nova is a captivating fruity floral woody eau de parfum.

angel nova, believe in dreams. *

refill your bottle anywhere with the unique angel nova refill bottle

Title: Les exceptions chyprissime
Description:
exploring new roads, mixing up genres and boldly creating unlikely combinations... inspired by its creator thierry mugler, who rejected conformity in order to create his own world, les exceptions reinterprets those grand olfactory families of la belle parfumerie in order to achieve the extraordinary.
mugler breaks with classic structures thanks to the creative and audacious combinations that include an unexpected ingredient. the most beautiful materials begin to take life, colliding and blending together in an intoxicating collection of fragrances with the most exceptional character. the quintessential mugler craftsmanship.

the legendary chypre, a harmony of bergamont orange, oak moss, and patchouli, is amplified by an unorthodox burst of dazzling pear. this surprising note transforms the classic chypre with a new brightness, creating a succulently sensual expression never experienced before.
elegant. radiant. sophisticated.

Title: Les exceptions hot cologne
Description:
exploring new roads, mixing up genres and boldly creating unlikely combinations... inspired by its creator thierry mugler, who rejected conformity in order to create his own world, les exceptions reinterprets those grand olfactory families of la belle parfumerie in order to achieve the extraordinary.
mugler breaks with classic structures thanks to the creative and audacious combinations that include an unexpected ingredient. the most beautiful materials begin to take life, colliding and blending together in an intoxicating collection of fragrances with the most exceptional character. the quintessential mugler craftsmanship.

luminous. fresh. warm.
discover hot cologne, the new bold and luxurious creation of the mugler les exceptions collection. hot cologne reinvents the traditional citrus structure of the cologne family with disruptive attributes, making for an unexpected and daring, warm-cool composition. drawing inspiration from an imaginary world of paradox and provocation, hot cologne takes a classic category to a new dimension.

notes: bergamot, lemon, mandarin, green coffee.

Title: Les exceptions mystic aromatic
Description:
exploring new roads, mixing up genres and boldly creating unlikely combinations... inspired by its creator thierry mugler, who rejected conformity in order to create his own world, les exceptions reinterprets those grand olfactory families of la belle parfumerie in order to achieve the extraordinary. mugler breaks with classic structures thanks to the creative and audacious combinations that include an unexpected ingredient. the most beautiful materials begin to take life, colliding and blending together in an intoxicating collection of fragrances with the most exceptional character. the quintessential mugler craftsmanship.

evoking a garden in the south of france, mystic aromatic dazzles with a stunning contrast of hot and cold: an intense aromatic freshness contrasted by the potent hot notes of peru balsam.

les exceptions mugler - mystic aromatic fragrance is captured in an art deco-inspired bottle that showcases the specific architectural elegance of the maison mugler.

Title: Les exceptions naughty fruity
Description:
exploring new roads, mixing up genres and boldly creating unlikely combinations... inspired by its creator thierry mugler, who rejected conformity in order to create his own world, les exceptions reinterprets those grand olfactory families of la belle parfumerie in order to achieve the extraordinary.
mugler breaks with classic structures thanks to the creative and audacious combinations that include an unexpected ingredient. the most beautiful materials begin to take life, colliding and blending together in an intoxicating collection of fragrances with the most exceptional character. the quintessential mugler craftsmanship.

a symbol of the old-fashioned, scrumptious joys of childhood, here the fruity fragrance family proves to be much less innocent.
naughty fruity embodies an all-new fruity fragrance that features both a delicious and illicit contrast of aromas: an overload of mirabelle plum reveals itself in different facets – sometimes round, velvety, juicy, or crisp – while blonde tobacco - both surprising and provocatively addictive - shakes up this fruity scent and subtly enrobes it in a hypnotic, leathery, smoky dimension.

the mugler les exceptions - naughty fruity fragrance is captured in an art deco-inspired bottle that showcases the specific architectural elegance of maison mugler.

a fruity woody fragrance.

Title: Les exceptions oriental extreme
Description:
exploring new roads, mixing up genres and boldly creating unlikely combinations... inspired by its creator thierry mugler, who rejected conformity in order to create his own world, les exceptions reinterprets those grand olfactory families of la belle parfumerie in order to achieve the extraordinary.
mugler breaks with classic structures thanks to the creative and audacious combinations that include an unexpected ingredient. the most beautiful materials begin to take life, colliding and blending together in an intoxicating collection of fragrances with the most exceptional character. the quintessential mugler craftsmanship.

creamy sandalwood and vanilla create an intensely sensual and addictive aroma. the first burst of crisp, green notes is strengthened by the vigor from the fresh spices, adding a bold contrast with unexpected character. this twist brings an original edginess to these classic oriental notes without losing its sumptuous opulence.
edgy. captivating. warm.

Title: Les exceptions supra floral
Description:
exploring new roads, mixing up genres and boldly creating unlikely combinations... inspired by its creator thierry mugler, who rejected conformity in order to create his own world, les exceptions reinterprets those grand olfactory families of la belle parfumerie in order to achieve the extraordinary.
mugler breaks with classic structures thanks to the creative and audacious combinations that include an unexpected ingredient. the most beautiful materials begin to take life, colliding and blending together in an intoxicating collection of fragrances with the most exceptional character. the quintessential mugler craftsmanship.

the remarkable hyacinth with its velvety, crisp green petals is rare in the perfume world. jostled by an unexpected addition of amber and incense, this scent evolves with unsuspected mystery and depth. supra floral reveals itself in a paroxysm of pure sensuality.
tantalizing. luminous. vibrant.

Title: Les exceptions wonder bouquet
Description:
exploring new roads, mixing up genres and boldly creating unlikely combinations... inspired by its creator thierry mugler, who rejected conformity in order to create his own world, les exceptions reinterprets those grand olfactory families of la belle parfumerie in order to achieve the extraordinary.
mugler breaks with classic structures thanks to the creative and audacious combinations that include an unexpected ingredient. the most beautiful materials begin to take life, colliding and blending together in an intoxicating collection of fragrances with the most exceptional character. the quintessential mugler craftsmanship.

wonder bouquet represents a bouquet of white flowers with top notes of orange blossom, lily of the valley and sambac jasmine, bound up with some deliciously unexpected notes rarely used in perfumery. blended with an addictive brioche accord, a cereal facet surrounds this floral elixir and creates a surprise: bran absolute. this combination conjures up the endlessly irresistible aroma of warm bread. the les exceptions mugler - wonder bouquet fragrance is captured in an art deco-inspired bottle that showcases the specific architectural elegance of the maison mugler.

Title: Les exceptions woodissime
Description:
exploring new roads, mixing up genres and boldly creating unlikely combinations... inspired by its creator thierry mugler, who rejected conformity in order to create his own world, les exceptions reinterprets those grand olfactory families of la belle parfumerie in order to achieve the extraordinary.
mugler breaks with classic structures thanks to the creative and audacious combinations that include an unexpected ingredient. the most beautiful materials begin to take life, colliding and blending together in an intoxicating collection of fragrances with the most exceptional character. the quintessential mugler craftsmanship.

woodissime explores the woody family in a surprising and innovating way. this new addition combines a surprising fruity accord, osmanthus flower, with a rich and distinctive blend of woody notes: cedarwood, patchouli, vetiver, sandalwood and the power and depth of oud wood.

the result, a powerful oud with a fruity twist. the art deco-inspired bottle showcases an architectural elegance that the house of mugler has made its own.

Title: Safari man eau de toilette
Description:
safari for men by ralph lauren is a woody aromatic fragrance for men. safari for men was launched in 1992.

top notes are lavender, bergamot, aldehydes, coriander, green notes, artemisia, neroli and lemon;

middle notes are carnation, cinnamon, tarragon, rose, cyclamen and jasmine;

Title: Aqua allegoria mandarine basilic woman eau de parfum
Description:
a woody fruity citrus
mandarine basilic forte, a golden mandarin paired with a vibrant basil, beautifully enhanced by the warmth of sandalwood and the delicious vanilla tincture.

aqua allegoria forte, the intense collection, is a warm and enveloping journey to the heart of the world’s wonders: eaux de parfum celebrating the intense beauty of nature, revealed by the golden rays of a setting sun.

a lively, tangy italian mandarin, bathed in the golden light of a setting sun, shines through in this fragrance. it blends with the enticing warmth of the vanilla tincture and the bewitching power of sandalwood to create a radiant fragrance trail.

a powerful symbol of guerlain's commitment to the planet, the aqua allegoria forte fragrances contain more than 90% natural origin*. the french beetroot alcohol used in their formulas comes from a network committed to responsible farming. *in accordance with the iso 16128, calculation including water.

Title: Mille et une roses by lancome maison collection eau de parfume
Description:
the essence and poetry of the domaine de la rose

to celebrate the opening of the domaine de la rose in grasse, lancôme revisits its historic fragrance mille et une roses, now made of 97% ingredients of natural origins, capturing the essence and poetry of our unique domaine. the quintessence of the rose. sublimated, natural and modern. unveiling its most surprising facets.

what makes the difference
at dawn, during the first days of may. the fields unveil their brightest sparkles of mandarine and bergamote. we take a moment to breath deeply into a bouquet of freshly picked roses. some are still blooming, others are thriving. their petals still beaded with dew. their perfume fills the air with fresh, vibrant notes, so particular to the lancôme rose.

what else you need to know
with 97% naturality, the reinvention of our long-loved fragrance is the promise of a refreshing floral journey. for the first time, lancôme created a natural fragrance, celebrating our exclusive rose.
mille et une roses has been formulated without any colorant, to let the natural color of juice stand our in a precious bottle, like a forever vase of 1001 roses dipped in pure gold. the heritage doors are engraved in the fragrance’s golden plate, taking you to where poetry hides, under the southern sun. an olfactive journey made golden. an invitation to pass through the golden doors of our domaine de la rose in grasse.

ingredients:
pass through the golden doors of our domaine de la rose in grasse, a bouquet of freshly picked roses carrying bright sparkles of mandarine and bergamote.

lancôme exclusive centifolia roses
one of the 6 natural roses is lancôme exclusive centifolia
roses, the finest, most fragrant of roses.
cultivated in our domaine de la rose in grasse, where the rich
soils and abundant biodiversity give to our rose its unique green,
luminous scent.

mandarine
mandarine and bergamote bring a breath of fresh air to this infinite rose garden.

ambrette seeds
veil our rose's luminous aura with a suave and exquisite sweetness.

Title: My clarins matifying blemish gel
Description:
this mattifying gel for youthful skin is the perfect ally for oily skin with imperfections. it helps to smooth the skin’s texture, visibly reduce shine and visibly fight against imperfections. formulated with [healthy plant complex]: organic coconut water and organic alpine rose extract for a healthy glow. enriched with hibiscus sabdariffa flower acids for smoother, clearer, matte skin. fresh, light, frosted gel texture with an immediate blurring effect.

skin type: combination, oily
texture: gel
use: every day, morning and night.

benefits
smooth, mattified skin.
visibly reduces imperfections

results
-32%*
women said their pores were 32% less visible.

women said their blemishes were 27% less visible*
*self-assessment, 101 women, 28 days

ingredients
aqua/water/eau. c9-12 alkane. butylene glycol. glycerin. propanediol. 1,2-hexanediol. silica. cocos nucifera (coconut) fruit juice. sodium carbomer. silica silylate. propylene glycol. ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp copolymer. hydroxyacetophenone. parfum/fragrance. tartaric acid. hibiscus sabdariffa flower extract. disodium edta. caprylic/capric triglyceride. tamarindus indica extract. sodium hydroxide. spiraea ulmaria extract. marrubium vulgare extract. lycium barbarum fruit extract. citric acid. ficus carica (fig) fruit extract. gentiana lutea extract. malpighia emarginata (acerola) seed extract. phenethyl alcohol. furcellaria lumbricalis extract. sodium benzoate. rhododendron ferrugineum extract. arbutus unedo fruit extract. potassium sorbate. sorbic acid. lapsana communis flower/leaf/stem extract. maris sal/sea salt/sel marin. ci 15985/yellow 6. ci 14700/red 4. Title: My clarins matifying hydrating cream
Description:
a daily moisturiser that is an energising morning blend of fruit extracts to visibly reduce pores and shine, while boosting skin’s hydration. the pink, matte-gel formula is infused with refreshing organic goji berry, fig, meadowsweet, organic strawberry tree fruit, acerola seed and tamarind pulp acids—plus detoxifying flower waters—to keep your skin healthy. your skin looks healthy, non-greasy, comforted and hydrated throughout the day.

my clarins exclusive healthy in & out complex is comprised of organic coconut water to put nutrients into the skin and alpenrose extract to flush out toxins and pollutants.

your vegan friendly recipe - free of phthalates, parabens, and sulfates - for skin that’s healthy, hydrated, and shine-free. my clarins is free of all animal-derived ingredients and was not tested on animals.

benefits

  • mattifying formula leaves skin healthy-looking, hydrated and shine-free
  • fights blemishes and visibly tightens pores
  • boosts radiance
  • plant-based anti-pollution complex helps protect skin from indoor and outdoor pollutants
  • healthy in & out complex feeds the skin with nutrients and helps flush out toxins and pollutants

Title: Extra firming firming treatment essence
Description:
this firming treatment essence, perfect for all skin types, combines powerful botanical ingredients and a hyaluronic acid complex to intensely moisturize skin for 8 hours*, while renewing and reenergizing it. its age-specific formula helps keep skin visibly firm and elastic. it also preps the skin to absorb skin care applied afterwards. a velvety texture that dives deep, leaving skin feeling plump and supple. its eco-designed bottle uses a minimum of 25% recycled plastic.
*clinical test, 25 women 

  • skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily

  • texture: lotion

  • use: every morning and/or night. 

 

benefits

  • hydrates skin.

  • leaves skin renewed and reenergized.

  • visibly firms.

clarins plus

our range of treatment essences is specially formulated to address age-specific concerns by infusing skin with potent anti-ageing plant extracts.

aqua/water/eau. glycerin. betaine. propanediol. pentylene glycol. sodium benzoate. anigozanthos flavidus extract. disodium edta. citric acid. sodium hyaluronate. ppg-26-buteth-26. xanthan gum. peg-40 hydrogenated castor oil. sorbitol. parfum/fragrance. mitracarpus scaber extract. panax ginseng root extract. jania rubens extract. ci 15985/yellow 6 [v3960a]

Title: Libre woman le parfum
Description:
keywords
floral lavender orange blossom saffron accord

what it is
libre le parfum is a luxurious warm and spicy interpretation on the classic eau de parfum with an endless floral trail. our most intense and long-lasting floral perfume for women enriched with fresh lavender, sensual orange blossom and rare warm saffron accord from the ysl beauty ourika community garden. the saffron accord is an olfactive tribute to the spicy ‘fleurs de feu’ praised by mr. saint laurent himself, creating an unapologetically sensual twist. the burning blend is the most concentrated and longest lasting perfume in the collection for a daring and bold woman. this iconic couture libre bottle is engineered like a piece of couture jewelry tinged in gold holding the amber colored flowers of fire.

ingredients

Title: Orchidee imperiale the molecular concentrate eye cream
Description:
what it is

a highly concentrated and rejuvenating eye cream to visibly lift the eye area and reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and expression lines

what it does

the rejuvenating power and lifting effect of an extraordinary new duo of orchids are concentrated in the new orchid totum molecular eye lift extract. it is propelled to the root of skin’s youth by a cutting-edge nano-concentration technology. highly rejuvenated, the eye contour appears visibly lifted, the appearance of lip contour and expression lines are immediately smoothed. complete with a ceramic eye applicator developed by the guerlain spa expert facialists, the massage tool's rounded form perfectly hugs the eye contour. the ceramic's cool feel delivers a deep, precise massage of the eye contour and expression lines with revitalizing and stimulating effects.

how to use it

apply: using fingertips and take a small amount of product and apply it to the eye contour. next, using the provided eye applicator, gently draw a circle around each eye to allow the product to penetrate into the skin. repeat this step three times. 2. relax: draw a figure of eight to warm up the muscles. repeat this step three times. 3. decongest: starting from the inner corner of the eye, glide over the dark circle up to the temple to boost circulation. do the same step above the eye, lifting the brow as much as possible. repeat the movement three times and then move onto the other eye. 4. smooth: rub along wrinkles in back-and-forth movements. begin on crow's feet wrinkles, then on frown lines in an upward movement. perform this step all over the forehead. lip contour: 1. apply: using the fingertips, take a small amount of product and apply around the lips. next, gently smooth the product into the skin using the provided eye applicator. 2. smooth: redefine the curve of the lips, following their natural outline in one direction and then the other. 3. replump: in back-and-forth movements along the creases in the skin extending from both sides of the nose to the corners of the mouth and marionette lines to reduce the appearance of wrinkles.

Title: Aqua allegoria forte rosa rossa woman eau de parfum
Description:
rosa rossa forte, majestically blooming sweet roses bathed in light, paired with a juicy white peach over a deliciously woody base.
aqua allegoria forte, the intense collection, is a warm and enveloping journey to the heart of the world’s wonders: eaux de parfum celebrating the intense beauty of nature, revealed by the golden rays of a setting sun.

known as the queen of flowers, the rose is a must-have in the guerlain perfumers' palette. composed in the form of an eau, essence and absolute, french, turkish and bulgarian roses come together in a powerful and enchanting trail. in an overdose, they combine their charms with a silky smooth white peach magnified by woody notes of sandalwood and patchouli.

a powerful symbol of guerlain's commitment to the planet, the aqua allegoria forte fragrances contain more than 90% natural origin*. the french beetroot alcohol used in their formulas comes from a network committed to responsible farming. *in accordance with the iso 16128, calculation including water.

Description:

Title: La petite robe noire eau de parfum intense
Description:
in la petite robe noire’s fragrance wardrobe, i’m the stylish dress.
an eau de parfum intense with a floral sillage fashioned with deliciously gourmand notes.

the glass of the legendary “upside-down heart” bottle has been tinted a magnetic and incredibly chic midnight blue. in silhouette, the new dress design is revealed – it leaves the shoulders bare and seems ready to take flight at the slightest movement!

i’m absolutely indispensable and totally irresistible.
i am guerlain’s chic and terribly glamorous fragrance creation.
i’m la petite robe noire.

fragrance

gourmand floral
gourmand, unforgettable, surprising.
a brand new melody, in which the candyfloss accord is enhanced by vanilla and bulgarian rose essence from the guerlinade. a dash of bergamot paired with a blueberry note, reveals all of the fragrance’s energy. they are accompanied by soft white musk and a woody sandalwood-patchouli accord with a stunning sillage that makes the scent unforgettable.

 ingredients

alcohol • parfum (fragrance) • aqua (water) • linalool • limonene • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • citronellol • coumarin • diethylamino hydroxybenzoyl hexyl benzoate • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • butylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate • bht • alpha-isomethyl ionone • geraniol • benzyl alcohol • isoeugenol • citral • eugenol • hydroxycitronellal • farnesol • benzyl benzoate • tocopherol • ci 60730 (ext.violet 2) • ci 42090 (blue 1) • ci 19140 (yellow 5) • benzyl salicylate

Title: Hero man eau de parfum
Description:
• burberry hero eau de parfum explores an enticing new side of heroism: the courage to embrace who you truly are. it presents a man on a journey to self-discovery. an explorative spirit with a centred sensibility. his energy exudes tender soulfulness, expressed by the presence of the horse, a powerful creature that represents our hero’s strength.

  • the fragrance features a trio of warm cedarwood oils as its signature base, culminating in a fresh and luminous crescendo. the vibrant opening of pine needles blends with benzoin and incense, creating an intense fusion of profound sensuality.

  • burberry hero eau de parfum is a modern reimagining of the burberry fragrance by riccardo tisci. featuring the thomas burberry monogram, the bottle is dressed in deep oak and gold tones inspired by our house codes, to express the intensity of the new fragrance within.

Title: Sculpture man parfum
Description: sculpture parfum by nikos is a amber fougere fragrance for men. this is a new fragrance. sculpture parfum was launched in 2022. the nose behind this fragrance is alienor massenet. top notes are bergamot, orange blossom, mandarin orange and lemon; middle notes are lily-of-the-valley, jasmine and geranium; base notes are tonka bean, amber, benzoin and cedar.

Title: Figues & agrumes by lancome maison collection eau de parfume
Description:
a bright assemblage evoking the fragrances of a mediterranean orchard.
the exhilarating freshness of sun-kissed green figs is bejewelled with sparkling citrus notes and sunny jasmine accents.

Title: Aqua allegoria nerolia vetiver woman eau de toilette
Description:
the floral radiance of calabrian neroli, accentuated by vetiver and refreshed by basil, fused with a delicious fig accord.

a powerful symbol of guerlain's commitment to the planet, the aqua allegoria fragrances contain up to 95% natural origin*. the french beetroot alcohol used in their formulas comes from a network committed to responsible farming. *90% to 95% ingredients of natural origin, in accordance with the iso 16128, calculation including water.

Title: Cool water reborn woman eau de toilette
Description: discover davidoff cool water reborn eau de toilette for her, where the sparkling notes of bergamot, locally distilled at our harvest site in italy, blend with the elegant sensuality of vetiver which is responsibly sourced on the island of haiti.

Title: White plus pure translucency brightening emulsion
Description:
specially formulated for asian skin, this light, melting emulsion can be applied day or night to bring brightness, moisture, and a feeling of well-being to the skin.

dark spots are visibly diminished and the skin is perfectly hydrated.
you'll maintain the appearance of a perfectly even skin tone.

directions for use
apply morning and evening to the face and neck.

Title: Polo black man eau de toilette
Description:
polo black eau de toilette is a unique, aromatic woody fragrance created for the sophisticated and confident man who lives a sleek, urban lifestyle.

top notes are iced mango, mandarin, lemon & cardamom; base notes jasmine accord & silver armoise. base are patchouli noir, tonka bean & cedarwood.

Title: Polo black man eau de toilette
Description:
polo black eau de toilette is a unique, aromatic woody fragrance created for the sophisticated and confident man who lives a sleek, urban lifestyle.

top notes are iced mango, mandarin, lemon & cardamom; base notes jasmine accord & silver armoise. base are patchouli noir, tonka bean & cedarwood.

Title: Aqua allegoria mandarine basilic forte  woman eau de parfum
Description:
mandarine basilic forte, a golden mandarin paired with a vibrant basil, beautifully enhanced by the warmth of sandalwood and the delicious vanilla tincture.

aqua allegoria forte, the intense collection, is a warm and enveloping journey to the heart of the world’s wonders: eaux de parfum celebrating the intense beauty of nature, revealed by the golden rays of a setting sun.

Title: Bocage deo spray alcohol free
Description:
a dry and mild deodorant spray that is sprayed at once and evaporates in a cloud on contact with the skin.
it is practical and precise and gives an instant fresh and comfortable feeling.
the deodorant works immediately and lasts a long time.

use every morning after showering, so you are protected and feel good all day.

Title: Bocage gentle caress roll-on for unisex
Description: lancome gentle caress roll-on deodorant (alcohol free) applies just the right amount of product for maximum comfort. leaves a delightful sensation of freshness for instant, effective, deodorant protection that truly lasts. this alcohol-free formula is fast, gentle and effective, perfect for use on sensitive or depilated skin.

Title: Pure focus face cream moisturizing fluid for oily skin
Description:
bienfait pure focus provides ideal moisturizing and perfect shine control thanks to this fresh, non-greasy, water-light fluid that absorbs immediately into the skin for a soft, powder fresh finish.
a pure caress for oily skin, leaving it perfectly hydrated all day long by targeting only those areas where hydration is needed.
leaves skin feeling fresh and matte all day long.

Title: Energie de vie pearly lotion
Description: the energie de vie pearly wake up lotion from lancome is like a wake up call for your skin. for mornings when your skin just won’t wake up pat a little all over you face before you apply moisturiser. tired skin is instantly moisturised and looks revitalised and refreshed.

Title: Absolue precious cells rose lotion
Description:
lancôme absolue precious cells rose lotion is a soothing gel that transforms into a refreshing liquid moisturiser to leave skin visibly plumper and revitalised with radiance.absolue precious cells rose lotion by lancôme is a soothing gel enriched with the power of rose extracts and the vitality of natural rose water. upon application, this lotion transforms into a refreshing liquid moisturiser to leave skin visibly plumper and revitalised with radiance. with a youthful glow, skin is primed to absorb the benefits of the following skincare routine.

benefits:

skin is soothed and nourished with moisture.

skin feels softsmooth and suppler.

skin looks radiant and refreshed.

created to deliver moisture and refreshing radiance, this face lotion helps revitalise the skin’s look

skin feels plumper and revitalised, ready for your serum and/or moisturiser.

Title: Signature rose intense woman eau de parfum
Description:
chloé rose naturelle intense is a new, even more powerful interpretation of the original chloé rose naturelle, which exalts the emblematic rose more than ever before.

rose naturelle intense is vegan and formulated with a 100% natural origin fragrance, naturally derived alcohol, and water. it contains neither filters nor artificial colouring – just high-quality materials selected with care.

created by the perfumer alexis dadier, this new woody rose eau de parfum opens with sweet, fresh bergamot, followed by pure, light neroli and hints of petals. noble and refined essence of organic rose forms a distinctive heart, tinted with a slightly smoky and vanilla-tinged oak wood. a base of creamy sandalwood lends fullness, while a touch of cedar steeps the fragrance in a timeless elegance.

this iconic bottle is further reinterpreted to be lower impact through reclaimed materials: 25% of the glass bottle and 100% of the ribbon are made with recycled materials, which also make up 40% of the cardboard box.

Title: Signature rose intense woman eau de parfum
Description:

Title: Chrome man eau de parfum
Description:
azzaro chrome eau de parfum

eau de parfum, available in 50 ml & 100 ml formats.

azzaro chrome presents a new interpretation of its iconic fragrance, a celebration of inheritance between father and son with an invigorating and intense freshness. with its woody notes, this unique eau de parfum plunges deep into the heart of a mediterranean pine forest. the ultimate celebration of joie de vivre, it invites you to share in intense and unique moments.

Title: The most wanted man le parfum
Description:
the most wanted

fragrance, available in 50 ml and 100 ml formats

even more playful. even more intense. the azzaro wanted man makes a comeback, and he’s more playful than ever. his formidable weapon? a spicy and incredibly addictive fragrance: the new azzaro the most wanted parfum.

Title: Alien woman hair & body mist
Description: thierry mugler alien woman hair and body mist 100ml

Title: Polo blue man parfum
Description:
composition
upcycled oakwood derived from the creation of french cognac barrels takes one luxury product and repurposes it into another.
this woody accord combines with sparkling mandarin and clary sage and deepens with the natural earthiness of sustainably sourced patchouli heart.
vetiver adds a smooth, yet smoky effect.
the result is an enveloping, yet rich and seductive men's fragrance.
about the bottle: the fresh fragrance is presented in a rich navy blue, consciously designed, refillable cologne bottle with a modern silhouette and gunmetal accents
fragrance family
fresh woods
key notes
top - mandarin oil, cardamom oil, pink pepper
middle - vetiver, clary sage heart, lavandin heart, jasmine accord
base - upcycled oakwood, olibanum oil, patchouli heart

Title: Pour homme man eau de toilette
Description:
fashioned by italian elegance and refinement, reflecting its creator loris azzaro, this sleek fragrance with its lively, powerful sillage combines natural sensuality and instinctive elegance; its iconic “fougère aromatic woody” signature endows men with a timeless, charismatic virility.
 this creation combines luminosity (citrus notes and star anise), seduction (the “fougère” accord) and timeless virility (patchouli, vetiver, sandalwood). 
family: fougère aromatic woody

Title: Polo cologne intense man eau de parfum
Description:
a new polo for a new generation. the iconic men’s polo scent is reinvented with a new fresh intensity.

a masculine blend of fresh grapefruit and cooling sage is balanced with the signature smooth tones of intense patchouli. the new classic.

Title: Alien goddess intense woman eau de parfum
Description:
at a time when people seek light in the darkness, a solar goddess is paving the way to a miraculous but true destiny.
in perfect harmony with body and soul, she is ready to magnify the world around her with glory, generosity and benevolence.
bringing her life-giving power and beauty to a barren planet with her golden flower as a healing gift to the world and universal call to all women.

divine floral ambery woody eau de parfum, alien goddess is a sacred promise of femininity and hope. incandescent and generous solar embrace, mugler's new women's fragrance is the evocation of a mystical world that promises to change the unremarkable. worn by a woman who is out of this world and whose envelops her in a luminous and warm radiance of well-being wherever she goes.
shine in the light of the sun with alien goddess perfume and celebrate your femininity: your fragrance is as extraordinary as you are.

Title: Alien goddess intense woman eau de parfum
Description:
at a time when people seek light in the darkness, a solar goddess is paving the way to a miraculous but true destiny.
in perfect harmony with body and soul, she is ready to magnify the world around her with glory, generosity and benevolence.

shine in the light of the sun with alien goddess perfume and celebrate your femininity: your fragrance is as extraordinary as you are.

Title: Le vie di milano alba sui navigli collection eau de parfum
Description: the alba sui navigli unisex scent springs forth with notes of precious oils: bitter orange, lime and basil. the middle notes enclose a zesty spritz accord, which is warmed up by the juniper oil and taken to new heights by the petitgrain bigarade. the finish regales you with the richness of ambroxan, vetiver oil and succan absolute, which is tempered by musk.

Title: Le vie di milano aperitivo milanese porta nuova collection eau de parfum
Description: iconic, unisex fragrances distinguish the new trussardi scents: a journey that begins far away to relive the unique atmosphere of the streets of milan. the notes of mandarin leaves, italian neroli and calabrian bergamot open the bouquet of aperitivo milanese porta nuova. the middle notes are occupied by the depth of heliotrope, with amaretto and iris, which mix with the sweet base notes of vanilla, benzoin and amber. the satin glass bottle comes in a distinctive shade of grey with a sculptural golden metal cap that accurately reproduces a miniature version of the head of the italian levriero, the trussardi greyhound.

Title: La vie di milano the courtyards of castello sforzesco collection eau de parfum intense
Description: the unisex the courtyards of castello sforzesco scent opens in the most sumptuous of ways with a bergamot, saffron and incense embrace. the heart notes reveal a floral tango of dawn rose, moroccan rose absolute and geranium, enveloped by the sweetness of honey and sealed with pink peppercorn. hints of labdanum, benzoin and clearwood, a woody, amber molecule, provide the finish.

Title: Le vie di milano italian artists in via solferino collection eau de parfum
Description: the unisex via solferino scent opens with a mineral accord that paves the way for the freshness of the maté and yuzu citrus. the heart reveals an unexpected symphony of floral notes, with peony, magnolia and osmanthus, on a base of red ginger. the base notes combine delicate heliotrope with sensual patchouli, accentuated by suede accords.

Title: Le vie di milano walking in porta venezia collection eau de parfum
Description: the unisex porta venezia scent reveals head notes of aromatic star anise, enhanced by lemon oil, black pepper and the floral belanis. the heart contains fine artemisia, wormwood and madagascar geranium oils, enveloped in sensual violet leaves. the grand finale is created by woody hints of patchouli, fir balsam and cedar oil, softened by madagascar bourbon vanilla.

Title: Le vie di milano walking on via fiori oscur collection eau de parfum
Description: <span style=""color:" rgb(0,="" 0,="" 0);="" font-family:="" trussardigrotesk,="" sans-serif;"="">the unisex via fiori oscuri scent opens with the citrussy hints of madagascar mandarin and bergamot, which lead to the floral complexity of lilybelle. the heart is a crescendo of floral notes with mimosa absolute, magnolia oil, rose and heliotrope. the base notes are both powerful and delicate, with rice powder, tonka bean, bourbon vanilla and madagascar vetiver.

Title: Les eaux mon petit chou
Description:
• a floral fragrance for women.

  • crisp, sweet, delicate, cheerful, enticing & powdery.

  • top notes of coconut, bergamot & mandarin orange.

  • middle notes of lily of the valley, freesia & jasmine.

  • base notes of cereals, vanilla, musk & cedar.

  • launched in 2022.

  • recommended for daytime or warmer seasons wear.

Title: Angel star woman eau de parfum
Description:
a perfume full of feeling, a daily enchantment, angel by mugler continues to sparkle in the heavens of the greatest perfumes and to endlessly renew its charm.  with its sweet, indulgent, entrancing trail, angel builds a unique story with the woman who wears it, and is now available in a new upright star bottle. this translucent faceted bottle stretches up infinitely in a sky-high 100ml format. 

olfactory family: oriental indulgence
