Title: Angel hair & body mist
Description: angel hair mist by mugler is a amber vanilla fragrance for women.

Title: The most wanted intense man eau de parfum
Description:
azzaro the most wanted, an unpredictable masculine fragrance with an intense kick. a perfume for men that captures the scent of a fougere ambery accord, blended with woody notes. explore the sensations the azzarro new fragrance creates – play the game and never play by the rules. with its distinctive black barrel bottle and imposing aura, azzaro for men invites you to flirt with danger and live life to the full.

rich and powerful, the most wanted eau de parfum by azzaro is the signature scent of the man who knows he can have it all.

Title: Idole nectar woman eau de parfum
Description: idôle l'eau de parfum nectar is an olfactory treat, a reinvention of the sweet and floral fragrance. a unique, avant-garde scent which marries a faceted rose bouquet with a sweet blast of popcorn deliciousness, idôle nectar cannot be ignored, and rather is meant to stand out. with sustainably sourced ingredients like the isparta rose and bourbon vanilla, this attention grabbing fragrance stands for the future of perfumery and of our planet.

Title: Idole nectar woman eau de parfum
Description: idôle l'eau de parfum nectar is an olfactory treat, a reinvention of the sweet and floral fragrance. a unique, avant-garde scent which marries a faceted rose bouquet with a sweet blast of popcorn deliciousness, idôle nectar cannot be ignored, and rather is meant to stand out. with sustainably sourced ingredients like the isparta rose and bourbon vanilla, this attention grabbing fragrance stands for the future of perfumery and of our planet.

Title: Absolue extrait ultimate lotion
Description:
absolue l'extrait ultimate beautifying lotion is the first essential step in the absolue l'extrait skincare ritual.

the superfine hydrating mist contains natural rosewater, known for its ability to soften, hydrate and revive the radiance of skin. each spritz releases the luminous scent of a rose garden in the morning as it envelops skin in freshness and comfort.

instantly the skin feels hydrated and more supple. day after day, skin's texture looks improved and feels delicately soft and even. with its reviving efficacy, skin's complexion looks less dull and more luminous, revealing a beautiful rosy glow: our classic "teint de rose."

Title: Pepe jeans cocktail man eau de toilette
Description: top notes: ginger, grapefruit. heart notes: yuzu, cardamom. base notes: woody notes. design house: pepe jeans london. scent name: cocktail for him.

Title: Oud bouquet by lancome collection eau de parfum
Description: notes: saffron, rose, oud, vanilla, praline. design house: lancome. scent name: oud bouquet. gender: ladies. category: perfume.

Title: Nomade jasmin naturel intense woman eau de parfum
Description:
nomade, the promise of an enchanting voyage… inviting to sweep you away. the opportunity to discover life elsewhere... everywhere else. for the nomade woman, each new escapade is a unique adventure.
chloé nomade jasmin naturel intense eau de parfum intense is a feminine and addictive eau de parfum intense for women with a solar jasmine gourmand that stays on all day. a captivating escapade that instantly draws the imagination into a grandiose landscape where the desert borders on the mountains.

perfumer caroline dumur chose egyptian jasmine, hand-picked at sunrise and responsibly harvested, to imbue this eau de parfum intense for women. as the night falls, a jasmine floral perfume begins to emerge, contrasting with the sweet fragrance notes of a date and pear accord to reveal its full richness and complexity.
its delicate sensuousness is enhanced by enveloping tones of vanilla and creamy sandalwood. a touch of patchouli perfects the composition, infusing the chloé fragrance with its radiance and perennially fashionable elegance, perfect for all occasions.

nomade jasmin naturel intense eau de parfum intense contains no artificial colouring. the vegan perfume is formulated with a 100% natural origin fragrance.

the emblematic nomade bottle is reinvented in shades inspired by nature. a brown braid is tied around the neck of the bottle, representing the ties that we create through our travels. this symbolic motif is also engraved into the glass of the chloé nomade fragrance bottle.

revamped to help to reduce the impact on the environment, the new design of this signature scent includes recycled materials, which make up 15% of the glass bottle and 40% of the cardboard box.

how to apply :

spritz the intense women's eau de parfum intense on your wrists and neck. don't rub, let it dry naturally

nomade jasmin naturel intense eau de parfum intense contains no artificial colouring. the vegan perfume is formulated with a 100% natural origin fragrance.

the emblematic nomade bottle is reinvented in shades inspired by nature. a brown braid is tied around the neck of the bottle, representing the ties that we create through our travels. this symbolic motif is also engraved into the glass of the chloé nomade fragrance bottle.

revamped to help to reduce the impact on the environment, the new design of this signature scent includes recycled materials, which make up 15% of the glass bottle and 40% of the cardboard box.

how to apply :

spritz the intense women's eau de parfum intense on your wrists and neck. don't rub, let it dry naturally

Title: Uomo levriero limited edition collection eau de parfum
Donna levriero intense collection eau de parfum
Description: trussardi donna eau de parfum intense by trussardi is a oriental floral fragrance for women. this is a new fragrance. trussardi donna eau de parfum intense was launched in 2019. the nose behind this fragrance is nathalie lorson. top notes are yuzu, citron and water fruit; middle notes are orange blossom, jasmine tea and water lily; base notes are patchouli, cedar, sandalwood and vanilla.

Title: Pure jasmine
Description: trussardi announces the release of a "new eau de parfum for iconic women," called trussardi pure jasmine. it is a new addition to the trussardi feminine collection and is dedicated to the values of modern femininity. pure jasmine was specifically composed for women born in the 1980s and who understand that today's feminist means "following the rules of behavior and language based on individualism, sustainability, and inclusiveness," according to the brand.

Title: Ralph`s club man parfum
Description:
ralph's club parfum by ralph lauren is a woody spicy fragrance for men.

this is a new fragrance. ralph's club parfum was launched in 2022. the nose behind this fragrance is dominique ropion.

top notes are lavender, apple and grapefruit

middle notes are geranium, clary sage and orange blossom

base notes are patchouli, vetiver, virginia cedar and cashmeran.

Title: The duckers resort lovers unisex eau de toilette
Description:
immerse yourself in the total relaxation of a balinese spa,
only quiet and pure nature around you, close your eyes and enjoy the moment. resort lovers perfume by mandarina duck, resort lovers is an aquatic unisex fragrance that evokes the lazy, relaxing days spent at a spa. the top note of bergamot is warm, sunny, and welcoming. as the opening blends into the heart, the middle floral notes come to the fore. they provide a sweet freshness to the center of the scent. rounding out the bottom are the bass notes of tonka bean and patchouli, giving the dry down a nice, earthy richness. this fragrance has a lighter sillage, making it perfect for hot days and warm nights. it has average longevity, so you may wish to reapply after a long day.

Title: Aqua allegoria mandarine basilic harvest woman eau de toilette
Description:
harvested before they are completely ripe, marzolo mandarins from calabria (italy), give mandarine basilic harvest its bitter sweetness, combined with the freshness of basil leaves on a generous bed of green tea and woody base notes.

aqua allegoria harvest: an exceptional, limited-edition collection made from exclusive harvests. guerlain selects their exceptional raw materials from ingredients that stem from relationships built over generations, with partners who cultivate their products in a sustainable, environmentally responsible manner.

a powerful symbol of guerlain's commitment to the planet, the aqua allegoria harvest fragrances contain up to 95% natural origin*. the french beetroot alcohol used in their formulas comes from a network committed to responsible farming.

*90% to 95% natural origin. in accordance with the iso 16128, calculation including water.

Title: Aqua allegoria nerolia vetiver forte woman eau de parfum
Description:
discover nerolia vetiver forte, a neroli radiated with light, enveloped by the generosity of a creamy fig accord, the warmth of vetiver and the almond notes of the tonka bean. “i created a neroli gilded by the rays of a setting sun, and awakened by the power of vetiver." - delphine jelk, guerlain perfumer. aqua allegoria forte, the intense collection, is a warm and enveloping journey to the heart of the world’s wonders: eaux de parfum celebrating the intense beauty of nature, revealed by the golden rays of a setting sun. a powerful symbol of guerlain's commitment to the planet, the aqua allegoria forte fragrances contain more than 90% natural origin. the 200 ml refill extends the life cycle of the aqua allegoria bottle without compromising on quality. it cannot be used alone and is only compatible with refillable 75 ml bottles.

  • top notes: bergamot, fig leaf, petit grain

  • heart notes: fig accord, neroli, rose

  • base notes: cedar, vetiver, tonka bean

  • 75 ml

  • made in france

Title: Aqua allegoria nerolvet harvest woman eau de toilette
Description:
a delicious harvest of orange blossom honey from guerlain's own beehives in calabria (italy), gives nerolia vetiver harvest its soft floral notes enveloped in luminously bright neroli and warmed with the woody inflections of vetiver.

our perfumer-explorers travel the world tirelessly, in search of extraordinary raw materials. for aqua allegoria harvest they have chosen their materials from a selection of very specific, ethical harvests that are unique in the way they reflect exceptional terroirs.

Title: Chrome man parfum
Description: azzaro chrome parfum azzaro

Title: Burberry her elixir woman eau de parfum
Description:
• burberry her elixir de parfum: a bold and sensual fragrance for women. moving beyond the adventurous spirit of the burberry her eau de parfum, the scent is the latest chapter in the intensifying story of burberry her. designed for women who dare to explore the unknown, the elixir is for the free-spirited woman seeking the excitement of her next adventure. sensual, irresistible and not held back by boundaries, she possesses an addictive persona.

  • a newly intense addition to the burberry her family, her elixir de parfum for women offers signature fruity gourmand notes alongside a daring burst of dark red berries with jasmine, rounded with sensual and addictive vanilla and amber.

  • the elixir deepens the pink of the eau de parfum bottle, transforming it into an opaque finish representing the intensity of the fragrance inside and its confident and sensual nature. the outer design features raised burberry lettering at the base.

Title: Abielle royale double r renew & repair eye serum
Description:
inspired by dermo-cosmetic care, double r renew & repair eye serum combines the power of two exclusive technologies to illuminate and resculpt the eye area – eye contour, eyelids and eyelashes – in a single step. the eye area is brighter, all types of dark circles (pigmented and sunken) and puffiness are visibly reduced. wrinkles and fine lines are smoothed, the eye contour appears resculpted and lashes seem denser. formulated with 95% naturally-derived ingredients¹.

¹calculation based on the international iso standard 16128, including water. the remaining 5% help to optimising the formula's integrity over time and its sensorial texture.

Title: Eau ressourcante body cream
Description:
what it is:
moisturizing body cream with aromatherapy properties that nourishes, soothes, and perfumes skin with a comforting, woody-floral scent. this rich yet refreshing cream with extracts of sarsaparilla, robinia, and longan melts into skin and leaves it soft and silky-smooth. formulated with relaxing aromatic essential oils of eau ressourçante—basil, florentine iris, benzoin siam, and cedarwood—its soothing fragrance activates with the heat of your body to create a feeling of calm that lasts all day.

to minimize our carbon footprint, eau ressourçante comforting silky body cream packaging is eco-designed, 100% recyclable, and made with less plastic.

skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily
texture: cream
use: apply morning and/or evening.

benefits
nourishes, softens, and soothes skin
perfumes skin with a comforting, woody-floral scent
aromatherapy properties promote a feeling of calm
refreshing, melting texture
gentle and non-photosensitizing
innovation and plant expertise
vegetal squalane boosts the skin’s protective barrier to seal in moisture for soft, supple skin.
clarins plus
clarins aroma care formulas contain a minimum of 92% ingredients of natural origin—the perfect synergy of fragrant essential oils and precious plant extracts to soothe your skin and boost your mood for a total feeling of comfort and well-being. create an at-home spa with aromatherapeutic treatments for every inch of skin—clarins’ holistic vision for body and mind since 1954.

results:
after 28 days of use:
92%*
protects skin from becoming dry

90%* skin is deeply hydrated
immediately after application:
76%* promotes feelings of well-being immediately
*satisfaction test - 110 women - after 28 days of use

Title: Bright plus gel cream
Description:
what it is

a lightweight, hydrating gel-cream moisturizer formulated with vitamin c, two radiance-boosting superfruits—organic acerola seed and rose myrtle—plus potent, dark spot-targeting plant extracts, for perfectly hydrated, even and healthy-looking skin. red jania extract promotes a glowing complexion. bisabolol extract helps soothe irritations. organic lady’s mantle, acerola fruit, and sea lily extracts visibly minimize the appearance of dark spots, gently and effectively. the refreshing, sensorial, non-sticky texture leaves skin with a matte finish. perfect for combination to oily skin types—even for the most sensitive skin.

skin type: oily, combination
texture: cream-gel
use: use each morning and evening.

benefits
boosts radiance
targets dark spots
hydrates and mattifies
innovation and plant expertise
pollution and uv rays can take a toll on skin compromising its radiance and creating dark spots. bright plus moisturizing gel cream contains powerful, organic, dark spot-targeting plant extracts—lady’s mantle, sea lily, and acerola fruit —plus glow-boosting extracts of organic acerola seed, rose myrtle, and vitamin c, for an even, flawless complexion.

clarins plus
every day, the clarins laboratories look to nature for inspiration. new bright plus moisturizing gel cream is a product of that vision—a formula infused with potent organic plant actives deeply hydrate skin while safely targeting dark spots to promote a radiant, even complexion.

results
instantly:
89%*
skin looks more radiant

after 28 days:
97%** skin looks more radiant
*consumer study – 100 women – after application
**consumer study – 100 women – after 28 days

Title: Hydra essentiel cream
Description:
what it is
intensely hydrating, silky face cream delivers a boost of moisture for immediate and long-lasting results—plumper skin in just 60 seconds* and 24-hour hydration.** the sensorial, fresh texture melts right in for skin that feels soft, plump, radiant, and perfectly hydrated. ideal for normal to dry skin.

clarins’ plant-based anti-pollution complex made with nipplewort, furcellaria and organic white horehound, helps minimize the skin-aging effects of environmental aggressors and pollution, including blue lights from electronics.

*for 75% of women, skin is visibly plumped - consumer test, hydra-essentiel silky cream, reported by 107 women after 60 seconds.
**clinical test, 30 women, after 24 hours

skin type: dry, normal
texture: cream
use: use each morning.

benefits
plumper skin in 60 seconds* and 24-hour hydration**
nourishes, comforts, and softens
helps minimize damage from environmental aggresors and pollution that lead to premature signs of aging
innovation and plant expertise
our new hyaluronic power complex combines super-quenching organic leaf of life extract, which provides a long-lasting boost of hydration, with [ha²]—a double dose of hyaluronic acid in both high and low molecular weights to visibly plump skin instantly while supporting its barrier to keep moisture in and lock environmental aggressors out.

clarins plus
hyaluronic acid, a molecule capable of retaining up to 1,000 times its weight in water, locks in moisture to provide an instant plumping effect while boosting radiance. organic leaf of life extract powers the skin’s natural hydration and enhances its ability to retain moisture with glowing, long-lasting results.

plumper skin in 60 seconds*
24-hour hydration**
99%*** skin is softer immediately
98%*** skin feels more comfortable immediately
95%*** skin is more hydrated immediately
97%**** skin is supple after 14 days
92%**** skin is nourished after 14 days
silky cream + night cream duo:
97%***** skin appears better hydrated

Title: Hydra essentiel night cream
Description:
what it is
our research on chronobiology shows that skin is most vulnerable to moisture loss at 1 am, leading to dullness, tightness, and fine lines. hydra-essentiel night cream adapts to the skin’s nighttime rhythms—hydrating, plumping and sealing in moisture while you sleep to relieve discomfort and visibly reduce dehydration lines.

intensely hydrating, cocooning night cream—with hyaluronic power complex and hyaluronic acid-enriched, line-filling pearls—delivers a boost of moisture for immediate and long-lasting results: plumper skin in just 60 seconds* and 24-hour hydration.** the sumptuous, creamy texture melts right in for skin that feels comfortable, plump, radiant and perfectly hydrated. ideal for all skin types.

clarins’ plant-based anti-pollution complex, made with nipplewort, furcellaria and organic white horehound, helps minimize the skin-aging effects of environmental pollution, including blue lights from electronics.

*for 76% of women, skin is visibly plumped - consumer test, hydra-essentiel night cream, reported by 110 women after 60 seconds.
**clinical test, 30 women, after 24 hours

skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily
texture: cream
use: use each evening.

benefits
plumper skin in 60 seconds * and 24-hour hydration**
nourishes, comforts, and smoothes
helps minimize damage from environmental aggressors and pollution that lead to premature signs of aging
innovation and plant expertise
our new hyaluronic power complex combines a double dose of 100% natural hyaluronic acid [ha²] in high and low molecular weights for instant hydration with super-quenching organic leaf of life extract for long-lasting results. vegetal squalane reinforces skin’s barrier against dehydration. hyaluronic acid-filled pearls visibly plump skin overnight.

clarins plus
hydra-essentiel night was formulated to meet skin's needs overnight with vegetal squalane, hyaluronic acid-enriched pearls, high & low molecular weight hyaluronic acid and organic leaf of life for a visibly plump, smooth, and radiant complexion by morning.

results
plumper skin in 60 seconds *
24-hour hydration **
96%*** skin is more supple upon waking
95%**** skin is more comfortable immediately
94%****skin is less tight immediately
91%*** skin is nourished
silky cream + night cream duo:
97%***** skin appears better hydrated
92%***** skin is visibly more plumped
*for 76% of women, skin is visibly plumped - consumer test, hydra-essentiel night cream, reported by 110 women after 60 seconds.
**clinical test, 30 women, after 24 hours
***consumer test, hydra-essentiel night cream, 106 women, upon waking
****consumer test, hydra-essentiel night cream, 110 women, immediately after application.
*****consumer test, 102 women after 28 days of using hydra-essentiel night cream, then 14 days of using it with hydra-essentiel silky cream

ingredients
aqua/water/eau. glycerin. betaine. caprylic/capric triglyceride. butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter. cetearyl alcohol. squalane. 1,2-hexanediol. dimethicone. hydroxyethyl acrylate/sodium acryloyldimethyl taurate copolymer. sodium polyacrylate starch. cetearyl glucoside. glyceryl stearate. peg-100 stearate. sucrose palmitate. parfum/fragrance. sodium hyaluronate. boron nitride. hydroxyacetophenone. tocopheryl acetate. ethylhexylglycerin. glyceryl linoleate. disodium edta. butylene glycol. citric acid. kalanchoe pinnata leaf extract. marrubium vulgare extract. potassium sorbate. propanediol. pectin. guar hydroxypropyltrimonium chloride. phenethyl alcohol. furcellaria lumbricalis extract. sodium benzoate. lapsana communis flower/leaf/stem extract. maris sal/sea salt/sel marin. Title: Relax bath & shower gel
Description:
what it is
tension-melting gel body wash that leaves every inch of skin soft, clean, and beautifully conditioned. soothes the senses with the new, stress-relieving scent of lavender and orange flower—plus the comforting aromatic essential oils of basil, bitter orange, organic geranium, organic camomile, and organic elderberry extract. sensorial gel formula water-activates into a fine, lightweight foam that rinses easily—leaving skin soft, smooth, and lightly perfumed with a refreshing, woody-floral scent. silky lather is gentle enough for the most sensitive skin.

to minimize our carbon footprint, relaxing bath & shower gel concentrate packaging is eco-designed, 100% recyclable, and made with less plastic.

follow with relax body treatment oil and eau ressourçante treatment fragrance to create a complete at-home spa retreat.

skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily
use: apply to moist skin in shower or bath.

benefits
gently cleanses
softens and hydrates
helps relieve tension
soothes tired muscles
innovation and plant expertise
this formula contains a minimum of 96% ingredients of natural origin, including new foaming agents that are more sustainable and just as effective and sensorial as those used previously in clarins bath & shower concentrates.

clarins plus
clarins aroma care formulas contain a minimum of 92% ingredients of natural origin—the perfect synergy of fragrant essential oils and precious plant extracts to soothe your skin and boost your mood for a total feeling of comfort and well-being. create an at-home spa with aromatherapeutic treatments for every inch of skin—clarins’ holistic vision for body and mind since 1954.

Title: Y intense man  eau de parfum
Description:
keywords
earthy & woody scent citrus & woods blue juniper berries lavender patchouli

what it is
introducing y eau de parfum intense, a cologne for men with a powerful and highly sensual interpretation of the y signature scent.

y eau de parfum intense amplifies the iconic blend to the extreme by spicing it up with blue juniper berries. vibrant lavender from france is contrasted by the deep and rich woody notes of patchouli from bali for a fresh fragrance that is intensely powerful. a deep blue sexy and clean scent with all-day long intensity in a spray.

about the fragrance
the iconic y bottle takes on a bold, luxe twist with y eau de parfum intense. a deep, night-blue shade amplifies the classic design and emphasizes the freshness and intensity of the fragrance. the bright silver y slashes through the square-shouldered bottle for an ultra-desirable piece of luxury. a statement of cool and elegance.

Title: Black opium woman le parfum
Description:
what it is

black opium le parfum is a long-lasting perfume for women with the most intense and warm interpretation of the original eau de parfum. this intense perfume radiates an unexpected rush of four precious vanillas, twisting the emblematic signature into something radical. a warm vanilla perfume complemented by iconic coffee notes and a sensual bouquet of white flowers, creating a unique and desirable bold floral fragrance for women for those searching for never-ending nights.

the iconic le parfum bottle glams it up for the night in a bottle as shiny as a couture black vinyl dress by yves saint laurent. the glitter heart reminds us of thrilling city nights, creating a new symbol that is bold, wild, and powerful.

Title: Drakkar intense man eau de parfum
Description:
feel the power of seduction

daring to spread an irresistible and addictive power, drakkar intense embodies a greater thirst for danger.
the fragrance explores the depths of the drakkar man, with new oriental accords, immediately releasing spicy notes of bergamot while aromatic sage, warm suede and vanilla exalt the audacious sensuality that inhabits him.
just as one is drawn to the intoxicating glow of fire. a uniquely seductive fragrance for an intoxicating impression of attraction, threat and power.

Title: Libre woman hair mist
Description:
the iconic scent of libre now in a new smell care: the hair mist

 

sensoriality & benefits

an innovative air like formula delicately refreshing & perfuming the hair with the scent of libre. the original eau de parfum enriched with pomegranate extract from the ysl ourika community gardens. the product leaves the hair brighter, softer and with a natural silk like finish.

olfaction

libre, the original eau de parfum. the iconic scent of libre eau de parfum, where the burning sensuality of noble orange blossom from morocco contrasts with the aromatic freshness of sustainably sourced diva lavender heart from france

Title: Elixir woman eau de parfum
Description:
an enchanting fragrance
the new signature scent conjures a captivating woman who wears her feminity with ease.

a trail of intense femininity
elixir is a sumptuous oriental floral bouquet whose every facets evoke the elie saab haute couture creations.
the iris at the heart of the note is inspired by the cedretti iris, a variety that blooms in the cedar region of lebanon.
the note is intensified thanks to the 'love accord', created exclusively for elixir stimulating a very strong feeling of attachment and seduction.

the essence of pure sensuality
the marriage between opulent iris florality and the 'love accord' results in a deliciously addictive note illuminated by a radiant duo of lebanese neroli and italian mandarin.
a carnal accord, with amber and balsam tones of myrrh and benzoin, warms the note while a vanilla and musk accord unfold the infinite sensuality of this fragrance.

how to use
spray onto your pulse points (on wrists, neck, behind ears).

Title: Paloma picasso woman eau de parfum
Description:
paloma picasso eau de parfum is an elegant, woody fragrance for women. the wide range of floral and woody notes create the perfect harmony.  

top notes: bergamot, lemon, hyacinth, ylang-ylang, clove, angelica root 

heart notes: iris (orris), jasmine, lily of the valley (muguet), mimosa, rose (may rose or rose de mai), coriander 

base notes: cedarwood, patchouli, sandalwood, vetiver, oakmoss, amber, castoreum, civet, musk, tobacco

Description:

Title: Polo red man parfum
Description:
ralph lauren fragrances introduces polo red parfum –  a confident and sensual fragrance that will immerse you in the seductive and thrilling feeling of the open road.   

featuring actor angus cloud, content creator sharl, and model varsha thapa, the polo red parfum campaign was captured in the california desert and embodies the exhilarating journey into the desert expanse: the heat captivates you; the golden-hour horizon beckons – vast, mysterious, and yours to discover. 


created for those who embrace the unexpected, ralph lauren’s polo red parfum is an into-the-night, long-lasting and undeniably intense scent. 


cloud captures the essence of polo red parfum best, saying, for him, the fragrance is “classy, yet casual, but distinguished for any occasion… and the key—it lasts all day.” 

  

master perfumers christophe renaud and olivier gillotin brought a new level of intensity to polo red parfum with the intoxication of absinthe and opulent orris to soften the edge. sustainable bergamot and diva lavender heart merge to refine the scent, and the classic masculinity of cedarwood finishes the trip with seductive ruggedness.  


the captivating blend of notes includes: 

·       top notes: sustainable bergamot heart, blood orange oil, pink peppercorn  

·       mid notes: absinthe oil, orris, sustainable diva lavender heart 

·       base notes: musk accord, cedarwood heart, opoponax accord 


consciously designed, the refillable bottle was crafted in a rich, sensual red with a modern silhouette and gunmetal accents and cap.

Title: Black soul man eau de toilette
Description:
• a woody spicy fragrance for men.

  • deep, fresh, minty, earthy, warm & masculine.

  • contains notes of spearmint, cardamom, neroli, bergamot, cinnamon & medjool date.

  • blended with raisin, saffron, tolu balm, gaiacwood, chinese cedarwood & musk.

  • launched in 2009.

  • perfect for all occasions.

Title: Gentle exfoliator brightening toner
Description: the gentle exfoliant brightening toner is described as a fresh fluid exfoliating lotion that brightens, smooths and softens the skin. regular use of the toner is said to help strengthen the skin’s resistance to wrinkles and maintain the balance between preventing a build-up of dead cells and encouraging cell renewal. the toner contains tamarind fruit acids which work to eliminate impurities and dead skin cells as well as boosting cellular renewal, and white nettle extract to tighten the pores.

Title: Skin smoothing eye mask
Description: soothes instantly, refreshes. for normal, dry, combination, oily skin types. cream texture. up all night? this is the treatment to reach for. clarins intensive, 5-minute spa mask energises tired eyes—minimising signs of fatigue and stress. a refreshing blend of wild rose, apricot and rose water helps decongest, smooth and tone eye contours for an immediate feeling of well-being. creates a smooth surface for eye make-up application.

Title: Extra-firming neck anti-wrinkle rejuvenating cream
Description:
a non-oily, lightweight neck cream containing powerful green seaweed extracts and sunflower auxins, combined with clarins patented extra-firming complex to soften, smooth and firm the neck and decollete.

  • age range: adult

  • colour: no colour

  • size: 50ml

  • combined with clarins patented extra-firming complex to soften, smooth and firm the neck and decollete

  • perfect for all skin types

  • dermatologist tested and 100 percent authentic

  • keep in cool dry place. avoid contact with eyes

  • water, dimethicone, cetearyl isononanoate, glycerin, alcohol, cetearyl alcohol, cetearyl ethylhexanoate, cetearyl glucoside, phenoxyethanol, trimethylol hexyllactone crosspolymer, carbomer, tromethamine, tocopheryl acetate, ethylhexylglycerin, avena sativa (oat) kernel extract, hydrolyzed ulva lactuca extract, potassium cetyl phosphate, musa sapientum (banana) fruit extract, helianthus annuus (sunflower) extract, silica, thymus citriodorus leaf extract, sodium benzoate, and potassium sorbate.

Title: Perfumers choice no.4 phoenix woman eau de parfum
Description: unisex fragrance with fresh citrus peach top notes on a sparkling jasmin floral heart enveloped with a rich amber and saffron accord and warm cedarwood and musk base notes.

Title: Colour me dark red man eau de parfum
Description: rich, elegant and sophisticated. colour me dark red is an elegant unisex fragrance that blends fruity, floral notes with warm tenacious notes of rich resins and musks.

Title: Perfumers choice leo no.11 man eau de parfum
Description:
aromatic, fougere, woody

top notes: pepper, citrus, bergamot
middle notes: fougere, lavender, spicy
base notes: amber, woody, musk
a fresh and invigorating masculine fragrance with radiant top notes of crisp bergamot and exotic peppers, enhanced with a warm aromatic floral heart of lavendar, geranium and rich spicy woody notes of vetiver and patchouli, enveloped with strong and tenacious base notes of cedar, labdanum and amber.

Title: Flower ikebana  woman eau de parfum
Description:
flower ikebana by kenzo pays tribute to kenzo takada's love of flowers and the art of living.

this woody floral fragrance for women, flower ikebana, is shaped like an ikebana, the japanese floral art whose balance is based on three notes: sobacha tea, sakura blossom with tuberose from india and sandalwood from australia.

exceptional raw materials for an eau de parfum composed of 90% ingredients of natural origin*. our perfume is entirely made in france and for the first time, kenzo parfums is innovating with a precious glass cap.

 

an eau de parfum for women at the crossroads of two aesthetics: floral composition and olfactory creation.

olfactory family: floral woody

scent pyramid:

top notes: sobacha tea

heart notes: sakura blossom, indian tuberose absolute

base notes: australian sandalwood essence, cedar wood essence, vetiver wood essence

Title: Kenzo homme marine man eau de toilette
Description:
kenzo homme eau de toilette marine, the new fragrance for men with the sunny, salty scent of a summer day. inspired by the sensuality of skin emerging from the ocean, fresh and covered in salt, it transports us to a place of letting go and escape.

kenzo homme eau de toilette marine is the freshest, but also the sunniest of the four scents created by master perfumer quentin bisch. the energising freshness of a marine accord meets luminous ylang-ylang, warmed by creamy sandalwood and comfortable musks. continuing the house's commitment, kenzo homme marine eau de toilette is composed of 95% ingredients of natural origin*.

the translucent green bottle of kenzo homme eau de toilette marine evokes the colour of the sea merging with the horizon. its shape, echoing the strength and flexibility of bamboo, has been designed to be vertical. its bevelled cap evokes a katana cut, the sword of the samurai.

because kenzo parfums is committed to a more beautiful world, kenzo homme has redesigned its caps to save 34% of plastic and has introduced 15% recycled glass in its bottles. the latter is surrounded by a paper sleeve made from well-managed fsc (forest stewardship council) certified forests.

Title: Kenzo homme marine man eau de toilette
Description:
kenzo homme eau de toilette marine, the new fragrance for men with the sunny, salty scent of a summer day. inspired by the sensuality of skin emerging from the ocean, fresh and covered in salt, it transports us to a place of letting go and escape.

kenzo homme eau de toilette marine is the freshest, but also the sunniest of the four scents created by master perfumer quentin bisch. the energising freshness of a marine accord meets luminous ylang-ylang, warmed by creamy sandalwood and comfortable musks. continuing the house's commitment, kenzo homme marine eau de toilette is composed of 95% ingredients of natural origin*.

the translucent green bottle of kenzo homme eau de toilette marine evokes the colour of the sea merging with the horizon. its shape, echoing the strength and flexibility of bamboo, has been designed to be vertical. its bevelled cap evokes a katana cut, the sword of the samurai.

because kenzo parfums is committed to a more beautiful world, kenzo homme has redesigned its caps to save 34% of plastic and has introduced 15% recycled glass in its bottles. the latter is surrounded by a paper sleeve made from well-managed fsc (forest stewardship council) certified forests.

Title: Flower by kenzo couture edition woman eau de parfum
Description:
top notes : pink pepper essence, blackcurrant
middle notes : damask rose
base notes : white musk, vanilla


spring is a festival in japan. his name is hanami. this tradition is an invitation to gather under the blossoming cherry trees and enjoy the beauty of the season. one ties a ribbon to the branches of the tree with a wish for love or happiness.

kenzo took inspiration from this custom for the new limited edition flower by kenzo. the bottle of the eau de parfum for women is wrapped in a red ribbon decorated with a delicate floral print. the powdery-floral sillage of the fragrance follows at every turn. pink peppercorns illuminate the top note, then the fragrance unfolds into a bouquet of green and fruity facets of damask rose. vanilla and white musk complete the charming and unique composition.

Title: Aqua plus multi moisturizing featherlight cream
Description:
dehydrated skin lacks moisture. it feels tight and wrinkles appear prematurely. less protected by a thinner cutaneous barrier, it is more reactive and more likely to redden.

aqua plus multi-moisturizing featherlight cream provides 24h non-stop hydration.
highly concentrated in dermo-soothing mallow flower and in pure hyaluronic acids of three different molecular weights, its formula penetrates the layers of the epidermis to intensely re-infuse skin with moisture.
1.100% swiss, the kind of mallow flower that our laboratories selected, managed to flourish in wild areas and in extreme conditions, where few other plants survive. we use it distilled in steam, to preserve its entire dermo-soothing benefits for the skin.
2. biomimetic and biodegradable, hyaluronic acid is the most important moisturizing ingredient in cosmetology. naturally present in the skin, it is capable of attracting up to 1000 times its weight in water and intensely and lastingly retains water in the heart of the skin. aqua plus line contains three different molecular weights:
- the highest molecular weight acts as a "protective coat". its surface action is immediate and helps prevent water loss.
- particles fragmented in medium and low molecular weights deeply penetrate all the epidermis layers to replenish cells with moisture.

how to use
apply 1 or 2 pumps of product once or twice a day on clean face and neck, or after aqua plus intensive serum for a perfect synergy of multi-moisturizing ingredients.
wait until complete absorption by skin before applying your make-up.
avoid rubbing skin.
in case of intense dehydration, apply a second layer of cream after penetration of the first one.

 its texture
fresh and lightweight.

 expected results
skin is lastingly hydrated, soft and supple. better protected thanks to a stronger cutaneous barrier, it regains comfort and resistance.

remark
its tube with pump with airless closing preserves the formula, before, during and after application.

Title: Super restorative balm for abdomen and waist
Description:
what it is

this balm targets sagging and helps to redefine the stomach and waist to give them shape. because women's bodies change from the age of 50 onwards, a suitable reshaping product can significantly help to firm the abdominal area. organic cryptomeria extract, an active ingredient derived from gemmotherapy, has shown its effectiveness in anti-lipogenesis action targeted on the storage and distribution of fat. it helps to reduce excess 11ß-hsd1 enzyme, the protein responsible for abdominal storage during menopause. formula with 94% natural ingredients. 

  • skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily

  • texture: balm

  • use: every day, morning and night. 

benefits

  • slimmed, sculpted and toned waist.

  • toned figure.

  • intensely moisturized, supple and firm skin.

innovation and plant expertise

organic cryptomeria extract is derived from the buds of japanese cedar. these buds contain all the nutrients, vitamins and minerals that enable the plants to grow and regenerate. the essence of nature concentrated in the super restorative balm for abdomen and waist.

Title: Hydra essentiel emulsion
Description:
what it is

this emulsion, enriched with hyaluronic acid, organic leaf of life extract and organic damascus rose water moisturises and intensely plumps the skin, while softening it. at the heart of its formula, the hyaluronic power complex developed by clarins laboratories helps boost the skin's natural self-hydration mechanisms and preserve its moisture reserves. its fresh, liquid texture melts instantly into the skin to leave it plump, soft and comfortable. 

  • skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily

  • texture: emulsion

  • use: every morning after cleansing and applying your favourite serum.

Title: Eau extraordinaire shower milk
Description:
what it is

revitalizing body wash leaves every inch of skin clean, smooth, and beautifully conditioned while promoting inner strength with invigorating essential oils of jasmine, patchouli, red ginger plus comforting bergamot and sandalwood. sensorial milky formula deeply nourishes with organic sweet almond oil and rinses easily, leaving skin soft, smooth and lightly perfumed with a sparkling citrus scent. gentle enough for the most sensitive skin.

to minimize our carbon footprint, eau extraordinaire revitalizing shower milk packaging is eco-designed, 100% recyclable, and made with less plastic.

follow with eau extraordinaire silky body cream and eau extraordinaire treatment fragrance to fill your day with positive energy. 

  • skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily

  • texture: milk

  • use: apply to moist skin in the shower.

Title: Eau dynamisante shower gel
Description:
what it is

the iconic eau dynamisante comes in a shower gel to cleanse the skin in the shower or bath. feel energised with this cleansing skincare, which combines the invigorating scent of the eau dynamisante essential oils with hydrating organic aloe vera extract. its gel texture gently cleanses and hydrates the skin, while leaving it delicately scented. 92% natural ingredients. 

  • skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily

  • texture: gel

  • use: every day, morning and/or night.

Title: Eau des jardins shower gel
Description:
what it is

clarins eau des jardins comes in a mood-boosting shower gel. this cleansing skincare combines the uplifting fragrance of eau des jardins essential oils with hydrating organic aloe vera extract. its gel texture gently cleanses and hydrates the skin, while leaving it delicately scented. 92% natural ingredients. 

  • skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily

  • texture: gel

  • use: every day, morning and/or night.

Title: Eau ressourcante shower milk
Description:
what it is

eau ressourçante comes in a soft, smooth shower cream to cleanse the skin in the bath or shower. find some serenity with this skincare that combines the soothing scent of eau ressourçante essential oils with nourishing organic sweet almond oil. its creamy texture gently cleanses and nourishes the skin, while leaving it delicately scented. 92% natural ingredients. 
  • skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily
  • texture: milk
  • use: every day, morning and/or night.

Title: Polo blue man eau de toilette
Description:
polo blue features an invigorating blend of melon de cavaillon, basil, verbena, and washed suede, evoking the freedom of the big, blue sky, the energy of open waters and an invigorating blast of fresh air.

  • top notes: cantaloupe melon accord, cucumber accord, watery melon accord, and bergamot oil.
  • middle notes: aquatic accord, clary sage oil, geranium oil, and basil verbena oil.
  • base notes: washed suede accord, patchouli heart, and sheer musk accord.
  • eau de toilette spray.
  • this item is not eligible for promotional discounts.
  • style number: 111518

Title: Cool water oceanic woman eau de toilette
Description: escape the everyday and dive into the wild sea with davidoff's new fragrance cool water eau de toilette ocean edition for her. it is a natural perfume suitable for any situation. the scent's stunning and bright rose accord surrounds the saltiness of the driftwood. the result is a beautiful combination that will receive compliments everywhere. it is uniquely floral and woody, contains 93% naturally derived ingredients and is 100% vegan.

Title: Cool water oceanic man eau de toilette
Description: escape the everyday and dive into the wild sea with davidoff's new fragrance cool water eau de toilette ocean edition. it is a woody and fougere natural perfume suitable for any occasion. let yourself be carried away by the saltiness and freshness of the driftwood accord, contrasted with the elegant and masculine vetiver. the result is a pleasant combination that will receive compliments everywhere. the aftershave is unprecedentedly fresh and woody, contains 95% natural ingredients and is 100% vegan.

Title: Annicke collection unisex eau de parfum
Description:
the prestigious perfume house eight & bob has created a luxurious set containing 30ml bottles of all six annicke collection fragrances. they are inspired by the breathtaking moments and experiences shared between perfumer albert fouquet, founder of the brand back in the 1930's, and his beloved annicke.

all the fragrances are exquisite and audacious perfume formulas resulting from combining the best raw materials with the savoir-faire and life experiences of their creator.

enjoy discovering the different notes and accords captured within these six edps that have enchanted all those who have had the opportunity to try them. the set is housed in a beautiful presentation box that comes protected in a luxury black cotton bag.

Title: Candle lord howe & holder
Description: a collection inspired by the most exclusive landscapes worldwide. eight & bob candles are made through a delicate handmade process. their exclusivity is based on a demanding selection of 100% vegetable wax based on a paraffin-free formulation.

Title: Candle telluride
Description: a luxurious, heavenly scented candle warms your living space with a soft, heavenly scent creates an ambience of serenity & purity made from 100% vegetable wax burns for up to 60 hours elegantly packaged in a chic monochrome box caution burn on a heat resistant surface. do not drop foreign matter or wick-trimmings into candle. burn in open area away from drafts. keep candle burning within sight. keep out of reach of children & pets

Title: Diffuser lord howe round
Description: the lord howe fragrance, named after the volcanic island in the tasman sea, has top notes of pepper, grapefruit and geranium that give way to a floral heart of jasmine, gardenia and cyclamen. a base of patchouli, cedarwood and musk rounds out this citrus/floral fragrance.

Title: Diffuser sagaponack round
Description: the sagaponack fragrance, named after the exclusive small town in the hamptons on long island, has top notes of lychee, peach and orange that give way to a floral heart of jasmine, rose and lily of the valley. a base of vanilla, musk and vetiver rounds out this floriental/woody/fruity fragrance.

Title: Diffuser tanganika round
Description: the tanganika fragrance, named after the area of africa that is now tanzania, has top notes of calabrian bergamot and orange that give way to a floral heart of jasmine, rose and iris. a base of patchouli, cedarwood and musk rounds out this chypre/fruity fragrance

Title: Diffuser telluride round
Description: the telluride fragrance, named after the old mining town turned ski resort in colorado, has top notes of lemon and caramelised apple that give way to a floral heart of peony and lily of the valley. a base of vanilla, sandalwood and praline rounds out this floriental/fruity fragrance.

Title: Diffuser varenna round
Description: the varenna fragrance, named after a town on lake como, has top notes of juniper, leafy greens and geranium that give way to a floral heart of white flowers, rose and lily of the valley. a base of patchouli, musk and amber rounds out this green/floral/woody fragrance.

Title: Iconic collection unisex eau de parfum
Description:
the prestigious perfume house eight & bob has created a luxurious set containing 30ml bottles of all six iconic collection fragrances. they are inspired by the breathtaking journeys and experiences of perfumer albert fouquet, founder of the brand back in the 1930's. all fragrances are unique olfactory gems resulting from combining the most exquisite raw materials with the savoir-faire of their creator.

enjoy discovering the different notes and accords captured within the original, egypt, cap d'antibes, nuit de megeve and champs de provence edps as well as the memoires de mustique edt. the set is housed in a beautiful presentation box that comes protected in a luxury black cotton bag.

Title: Agneta unisex extrait de parfum
Description:
prized oud wood is the star of this creation of great contrasts. a blend of aromas that brings the exquisiteness of this wood to the fore; a material as valued for its scarcity as for its long evolution process. it takes more than 75 years before the best oud resin can be extracted.

a fragrant composition that carries us away to the wooden deck of agneta, the sailing boat belonging to gianni agnelli who represents eight & bob’s values of elegance and lifestyle so well.

lively, spicy opening notes with a hint of roasted coffee are shrouded in amber which adds an addictive, modern touch. a mysterious masterpiece that evokes feelings of nostalgia.

agneta is an enigmatic and discreet yet spirited fragrance in which a sense of calm and an addictive, mysterious veil arouse the desire to be at one with the sea, body and soul.

extrait de parfum.
volume 50 ml / 1.7 fl. oz.

Title: Guethary unisex extrait de parfum
Description: guethary is the name of the charming and romantic french village that inspires this fragrance. a place of disconnection, savoir- vivre and exclusivity. a place imbued with salty and floral aromas that for many years has been the resting place of the parisian creme de la creme. an ode to ambergris stranded on the atlantic coasts that enhances the mysterious addiction of this fragrance, where the seductive facets of tagete flower and powdery pear blossom merge with its addictive creaminess. an atelier of passion inspired by a lifestyle, with a scent that transports you to tranquility and serenity. an exaltation to ambrox, extremely powerful and elegant with musky and woody tones. a fragrance that reveals a unique personality that plays with the tension between freshness and intensity.

Title: Cap dantebes unisex eau de parfum
Description:
a fragrance inspired by summer days in the french riviera.
this splendidly fresh scent transforms throughout its wear. notes of mint and birch create an intense blast of sea greens, which is softened by the tranquil, therapeutic aroma of violet leaves. a steady wave of cinnamon and vanilla rolls in, to produce a sweet, earthy ambiance. cedar and incense nourish the woody accent that burns at the heart of this dynamic scent.
top notes birch – mint – violet leaves
heart notes aromatic notes– cinnamon – moss
base notes cedar – incense – vanilla

shop online eight & bob cap d'antibes eau de parfum spray 100ml at best price.
product features:
- gender: men
- fragance: eau de parfum
- texture/format: spray

Title: Champs de provence unisex eau de parfum
Description:
immerse yourself in the freedom of the french countryside with champs de provence. fresh, green, and citrusy, this fragrance captures the mystical beauty of the provence. 

notes of musk and mate emphasize the crisp earthy hues of the wilderness. the flawless entanglement of bergamot, orange, pear, and rose brings to life the sweet and tangy aroma of fruit trees surrounded by gentle wild flowers. perfect for a free spirit who appreciates the tantalizing aroma of mother nature.

Title: Egypt unisex  eau de parfum
Description:
a perfume inspired by ancient egyptian culture.
the scent of egypt provides an olfactory experience that will take you on a journey through time. stroll through sunny ancient egypt. breathe in the exotic aromas of the marketplace.
nutmeg and warm spices compliment the earthy undertones of patchouli and sandalwood. the lavish scent of lavender radiates from the beautiful women in ornate, vibrantly colored cloths.
transcend the ordinary with this warm, tranquil, earthy blend of lavender, nutmeg, moss, and patchouli.
top notes lavender – lemon – moss
heart notes cardamom – nutmeg
base notes leather – patchouli – sandalwood

shop online eight & bob egypt eau de parfum spray 100ml at best price.
product features:
- gender: men
- fragance: eau de parfum
- texture/format: spray

Title: Memoires de mustique unisex eau de parfum
Description:
a tribute to the magic of the unique caribbean island of mustique.

bask in the beauty of this tropical scent. sweet elegant notes of orange blossom blend seamlessly with the citrus floral notes of neroli, capturing the essence of this private island aroma.

notes of petitgrain and bergamot highlight the citrus flavours of native caribbean fruits. a subtle hint of earthy tones of precious woods and white musk honour the lush greenery in the background.

notes of amber compliment the scent, like rich elegant sunsets over crystalline waters. dig your toes into the warm white sand and enjoy a tropical retreat with this wonderful combination of earthy, fruity, and floral. 

mémoires de mustique is a tribute to those who shared the magic of this caribbean island and for those who once dreamed of being part of something unique.

the scent is inspired by memories of its crystalline waters, the eternity of its sunsets and its landscapes which remain unchanged throughout its history. a trip to the past to capture its essence in its purest form.

albert fouquet passed away before he was able to finish ‘mémoires de mustique’, so with the help of the very talented eight & bob perfumer, the fragrance is now complete.

Title: nuit de megeve unisex eau de parfum
Description:
escape to a log cabin in the woods of the snowcapped mountains of france with nuit de megeve.  complex earthy, woodsy notes of vetiver mingle with the subtle sweetness of tobacco to set a cozy tone. notes of petitgrain fill the air with the scent of dried leaves & twigs waiting their turn to fuel the fire crackling in the fireplace. a soothing aroma emanates from the hot cup between your hands, as bitter notes of freshly brewed black coffee blend with the sweet vanilla notes of tonka beans. retreat from the cold, crisp, mountain air with this tender comforting scent.

top notes   black coffee – orris – tonka beans
heart notes   moss – tobacco – vetiver
base notes   clove buds – grapefruit – petitgrain

Title: Original unisex unisex eau de parfum
Description:
the original, the most exclusive perfume created by albert fouquet, now available in a 150 ml size. an exclusive format for the original fragrance lovers.

designed for both men and women alike, this classic scent is suitable for a modern-day aristocrat.  rosy notes of pink pepper blended with the subtle spice of cardamom and garnished with the zesty hint of lemon, evoke a contemporary tone; while notes of labdanum emit an intricacy reminiscent of the sweet, fruity, woody aromas of twentieth century paris. amber and sandalwood undertones accentuate the warmth of this refined scent.

Title: Original unisex unisex eau de parfum
Description:
the original, the most exclusive perfume created by albert fouquet, now available in a 150 ml size. an exclusive format for the original fragrance lovers.

designed for both men and women alike, this classic scent is suitable for a modern-day aristocrat.  rosy notes of pink pepper blended with the subtle spice of cardamom and garnished with the zesty hint of lemon, evoke a contemporary tone; while notes of labdanum emit an intricacy reminiscent of the sweet, fruity, woody aromas of twentieth century paris. amber and sandalwood undertones accentuate the warmth of this refined scent.

Title: Annicke 1 unisex eau de parfum
Description:
the sweet rosy notes of peony are intoxicating. uplifting and sensual notes of mandarin leave a distinguished floral trail while enchanting driftwood adds a light, earthy, warm undertone.

schönbrun garden (vienna).
pure, soft and juicy.

Title: Annicke 2 unisex eau de parfum
Description:
a tribute to elegant yet deliberate sensuality. 

notes of fig offer a fruity impression while hazelnut adds a delicate touch of sugar. sweet and herbaceous notes of immortelle entice him with a fascinatingly rich, sexy, desirable aroma. heavy yet sweet and fruity floral notes of ylang ylang evoke an innocently erotic aura. gentle, effortless notes of sandalwood caress this assortment of sweetness, creating an undeniable allure.

inspired by the luxembourg garden (paris).
warm pleasure and interior elegance.

Title: Annicke 3 unisex eau de parfum
Description:
spicy floral notes of bergamot are reminiscent of the decadence of the early 1920’s.  the room smells of wood and amber as notes of cashmeran accentuate the warmth of the room.

notes of white rose emit an air of vintage femininity while exotic notes of jasmine intoxicate men on the dance floor. from the dessert table, subtle hints of tangy red berries drizzled over sweet creamy meringue captivate the senses.  this extravagant fragrance will leave everyone in its path mesmerized.

inspired by the giverny garden (paris).
refined, elegant and very feminine.

Title: Annicke 6 unisex eau de parfum
Description:
a beautifully blended elixir that personifies the complex dimensions of a woman.

top notes of bergamot and carnation represent her classy sophistication juxtaposed by sichuan pepper to accentuate her sassy side. heart notes of rose and ambre 84 dl soften the tone.

base notes of warm, rich indian sandalwood couple with tenacious labdanum to round out this well-balanced mixture.  garnished with highly desired benzoin, this unique aroma embodies the true value of its components.

inspired by the pavillion de la guyane (paris).
bewitching, exquisite and elegant.

Title: Annicke 4 unisex eau de parfum
Description:
stand beneath a luscious enchanted tree.  brush your fingertips across the rough bark of her trunk as you breathe in the woody, earthy, mossy undertones of cashmeran and oakmoss.

a cool breeze flutters past as floral notes of rose and ylang ylang are carried away. succulent, enticing notes of nectarine mesh with light, complex notes of fruity blackcurrant buds, making your mouth water. immerse yourself in this voluptuous melody of arborous scents.

inspired by the bagatelle rose garden (paris).
precious and delicate.

Title: Annicke 5 unisex eau de parfum
Description:
annicke 5 is a seductive heady floriental fragrance.

a dash of luscious plum, a hint of vanilla, and a touch of caramel create an unexpected intense scent that leaves behind a sensual oriental trace.

inspired by the burggarten garden (vienna).
warm, elegant and mysterious.

Title: Renergie eye cream
Description:
discover the high-performance anti-ageing rénergie eye cream, formulated for your delicate undereye skin.

our unique concentration of peptides and fan-favourite hyaluronic acid.

your eye contour will feel instantly refreshed, and with regular use, the cream will help to reduce the appearance of wrinkles, improve firmness of eyelids, and brighten dark circles***.

benefits

nourishment

instant boost of hydration**.

75% of women agree eye contour feels fresher after use**.

clinically proven to reduce appearance of wrinkles***.

eyelid lifting effect

clinically proven lifting effect on eyelids***.

brightens appearance of dark circles

clinically proven improvement on visibility of dark circles***

*instrumental test, 26 women
**self-assessment, 53 women
***clinical results, 43 women.

what makes the difference

suitable for use with makeup.

absorbs fast, without pilling.

92% of women agree texture is pleasant, without residue or leaving skin sticky.

what else you need to know

tested under dermatological and ophthalmological control.

all skin types - even sensitive skin.

ingredients

hyaluronic acid
selected for its smaller molecular weight which works effectively on the finer skin of the eye contour.
known to absorb its weight in water, hyaluronic acid helps fill skin with moisture to correct the appearance of wrinkles and volumes.

biotech linseed extract
our formula which contains gluco-peptides from linseed extract helps to compensate the loss of collagen.lifting eye cream

Title: Renergie h.p.n. 300 peptide cream
Description:

skin regenerates faster, even as you age

faster skin cell renewal for women aged 40-59 years.*

for our first time, lancôme concentrates over 300 types of peptides, hyaluronic acid and niacinamide in one unique cream.

in a study, among women aged 40 to 59, skin renews faster with rénergie h.p.n. 300-peptide cream than without it, proving the cream provides the environment to allow the skin to regenerate faster.

targets appearance of dark spots

what else you need to know
in a new refillable design.
for face and neck. tested under dermatological control.
all skin tones and skin types - even sensitive skin.

refillable
our new highly concentrated formula in a refillable jar.

Title: Vienna opera man eau de toilette
Description:
this fragrance showcases a beautiful and timeless fougère surrounded by precious woods. for centuries, vienna - the prestigious world capital of art and intellectuals - has welcomed writers, musicians, painters and architects. it is a city that pays homage to the freethinkers of the previous century. 

in the top notes, the peppery freshness of white grapefruit sets the stage for a daring contrast. in the heart, the note continues with a fresh and luminous juicy apple note. in the base notes, this fougère is shrouded in comforting woods, cedar and sandalwood, to lend warmth without losing any of its legendary intensity.

  • fragrances size - ml: 60ml

  • scent type: spicy

  • top notes: white grapefruit, basil, black pepper

  • heart notes: lavender, sage, apple

  • base notes: sandalwood, cedarwood, vetiver

  • a spicy eau de toilette

Title: Tokyo shibuya woman eau de parfum
Description:
karl tokyo shibuya by karl lagerfeld is a floral woody musk fragrance for women. this is a new fragrance. karl tokyo shibuya was launched in 2021. the nose behind this fragrance is emilie (bevierre) coppermann. top notes are watery notes, citruses and rhubarb; middle notes are magnolia, peony and cherry blossom; base notes are white musk, cedar and amber.

product ingredients: alcohol, parfum / fragrance, aqua/water/eau, dipropylene glycol, limonene, linalool, benzyl salicylate, benzyl alcohol, butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane, hydroxicitronellal, methyl anthranilate, citronellol, alpha-isomethyl ionone, coumarin, geraniol, isoeugenol, benzyl benzoate, citral, trie(tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) citrate, eugenol, farnesol, ci 60730 / ext. violet 2, ci 17200 / red 33. 560528 07.please be aware that ingredient lists for the products of our brand are updated regularly. please refer to the ingredient list on your product package for the most up to date list of ingredients to ensure it is suitable to your personal use.

Title: Paris 21 rue saint guillaume woman eau de parfum
Description:
introducing karl lagerfeld's karl paris 21 rue saint-guillaume femme 100ml, a beautiful fragrance for women that is perfect for any occasion. this luxurious scent opens with top notes of bergamot and orange blossom, followed by a heart of jasmine, rose, and ylang-ylang. the base notes of amber, patchouli, and musk round out this exquisite fragrance. whether you're looking for a signature scent or a new fragrance to add to your collection, karl lagerfeld's karl paris 21 rue saint-guillaume femme 100ml is sure to impress.

about the brand:

karl lagerfeld is a world-renowned fashion designer and creative director of the fashion house fendi. he is also the namesake of his own fashion label, karl lagerfeld. his signature style includes dark sunglasses, white hair and high-collared shirts. lagerfeld has created a number of fragrances for both men and women. his most popular scent for women is chanel no. 5, which was created in collaboration with the house of chanel. for men, his signature scent is bleu de chanel, a woody and fresh fragrance that has become a bestseller.

ingredients:

this perfume is a beautiful blend of grapefruit, mandarin orange and violet leaf. the addition of jasmine, rose and gardenia give it a truly unique scent that is perfect for any occasion. the sandalwood, patchouli and musk provide a long-lasting, intoxicating aroma that is sure to please anyone who smells it.

top notes:

grapefruit, mandarin orange and violet leaf.

Title: New york mercer street  woman eau de toilette
Description:
karl lagerfeld karl new york mercer street eau de toilette is part of the new fragrance line places by karl that traces karl lagerfeld's travels to his favourite places around the world.  karl new york mercer street eau de toilette presents a citrus explosion fused with the heat of white pepper and herbal basil top notes with green rhubarb framed by aromatic florals at the heart. the base of woody and cotton musk notes adds irresistible character.

top notes: basil, lime, pepper (white)

heart notes: geranium, jasmine, rhubarb

base notes: musk, vetiver, woods (white)

Title: Kate spade cherie woman eau de parfum
Description: introducing cherie, our new fragrance inspired by the spirit of enchanting adventure. meaning "sweetheart" or "dearest" in french, cherie combines the joyful energy of new york with the timeless romance of paris. opening with fruity top notes of redcurrant and raspberry, the scent centers around a floral blend of sweet pea and jasmine sambac. anchored by base notes of sensual white woods and ambrofix, cherie leaves you with an intimate trail of warmth and optimism thanks to a dose of comforting musks.

Title: Tommy hilfiger now man eau de toilette
Description: tommy hilfiger men's fragrance. top notes of tommy now include bergamot and mandarin, middle notes of geranium, ginger, and cardamom oil and base notes of amberwood and moss for a new refreshing scent for men.

Title: Tommy hilfiger impact man eau de toilette
Description: tommy hilfiger men’s fragrance. featured exclusively on tommy.com, impact is the newest aromatic scent for men supported by striking citrus, smoky aromatics and a trio of wood notes. impact empowers the next generation of visionaries through a captivating cocao leaf accord and balancing akigalawood, a spicy, woody extract of patchouli. bold and dynamic, impacts awakens the senses and encourages you to go after your own great story.

Title: Idole now woman eau de parfum
Description:
a unique florality inspired by nature, augmented by science.

a rich, bold new fragrance, idôle now merges high quality natural ingredients with science. at the heart of this new fragrance lies a powerful trio of iconic ingredients inspired by nature and augmented by science. formulated with upcycled rose, safely extracted malaysian orchid accord, and sustainably sourced vanilla infused with repurposed biotech vanillin, idôle now inspires the future of bold yet sustainable perfumery.

Title: Idole now woman eau de parfum

Title: Rose passion woman eau de parfum
Description: inspired by the allure of the french riviera, rose passion is a beautifully rich scent that captures the essence of glamour. opening with the freshness of coconut water and the exotic bloom of the frangipani flower, you’ll discover notes of orchid and jasmine complemented by sandalwood and exotic vanilla. captured in a fuchsia pink bottle with a dégrade finish and our signature jc emblem.

Title: A*men rubber eau de toilette
Description:
a * men, the first male fragrance created by mugler, materializes the contemporary hero, a man who imposes himself by his inner strength, his desire to win. it is the scent of the confident and adventurous man.

a * men eau de toilette belongs to the ambery woody vigourous family.

Title: Angel elixir woman eau de parfum
Description:
it’s the angel you don’t expect, expressing the augmented femininity of today’s fearless supra-women. innocent yet powerful. grounded yet extraordinary. ultra-edgy yet embracing. the new elixir’s woody floral gourmand scent reinvents what makes angel so unique. imagine a floral milky way captured in mugler’s iconic star-shaped perfume bottle, morphed into a captivating deep blue… more than a fragrance, angel elixir is the catalyst to reinvent your reality. because the real world is not enough…

angel elixir eau de parfum : what is the difference with angel edp ?
angel elixir eau de parfum reinvents this structure in bright, creamy tones. sweet gourmandise gives way to a radiant white floral bouquet that illuminates the fragrance with its rich petally texture. vibrant, amber woods empower a luscious vanilla infusion for a seductive and fearless effect.

the soul of angel, reinvented. angel elixir, the new fragrance.

Title: Alien goddess supra florale woman eau de parfum
Description:
she is luminous. fearless. fierce in her desire to re-enchant the world. as her power radiates all around her, the goddess makes wonders, setting free an extraordinary floral energy…
alien goddess eau de parfum supra florale turns the signature solar jasmine of the original scent into a monumental, otherworldly supra flower. shapeshifting, fascinating, the new bloom is the symbol of the augmented femininity embodied by alien goddess. the future of florality, infused in a daring and avant-garde eau de parfum.
more than a scent, this is a supra-sensorial experience. let it bloom.

alien edp supra florale: what is the difference with alien edp and edp intense?
three incarnations of alien goddess. three visions of augmented femininity, exalting the divine gift of the jasmine grandiflorum superinfusion, wrapped in ambery golden benevolence…

alien goddess eau de parfum supra florale takes the original scent’s florality and sets it free to reinvent itself. in this luminous floral ambery women's fragrance, the original eau de parfum’s golden flower turns into a mercurial flower that blends three blooms. a fresh green cactus flower accord, the signature jasmine grandiflorum superinfusion heart, and the salty, ambery everlasting flower.

Title: Abeille royal honey treatment day cream
Description:
the revitalizing power of expert age-defying care inspired by clinical honey bandages

inspired by clinical honey bandages, honey treatment day cream concentrates the most powerful bee products chosen by guerlain research to correct 4 visible marks of collagen loss linked to aging. day after day, wrinkles are visibly reduced and skin’s firmness, smooth appearance and radiance are restored. skin is revitalized and looks visibly younger. its formula contains 94% naturally-derived ingredients¹. it is manufactured using a formulation protocol² creating a shaping texture with a bandage effect. it seamlessly becomes one with skin, impregnating the epidermis with revitalizing functional ingredients. honey treatment day cream is refillable.

Title: Abeille royal honey treatment night cream
Description:
<p aria-label=""the" youth="" revitalizing="" power="" of="" expert="" age-defying="" care="" inspired="" by="" clinical="" honey="" bandages"="">the youth revitalizing power of expert age-defying care inspired by clinical honey bandages

inspired by clinical revitalizing honey bandages, honey treatment night cream concentrates the bee products chosen by guerlain research to correct 4 visible marks of everyday collagen loss linked to aging. wrinkles are visibly reduced, skin becomes denser and recovers its plumpness. the face is redefined and looks visibly younger. its formula contains 95% naturally-derived ingredients¹. it is manufactured using a formulation protocol creating a filler texture with a bandage effect that seamlessly becomes one with skin, impregnating the epidermis with revitalizing functional ingredients. honey treatment night cream is refillable.

Title: Aqua allegoria woody forte  bosca vanilla woman eau de parfum
Description:
the intensity of a sun-kissed vanilla, wrapped in a driftwood accord

bosca vanilla forte, the meeting between a driftwood accord with hints of the sea and the warmth of vanilla and everlasting flower with sunny, enveloping accents.

aqua allegoria forte, the intense collection, is a warm and enveloping journey to the heart of the world’s wonders: eaux de parfum celebrating the intense beauty of nature, revealed by the golden rays of a setting sun.

Title: Aqua allegoria woody forte oyuz woman eau de parfum
Description:
<p aria-label=""a" powerful="" oud="" wood="" illuminated="" by="" a="" sparkling="" yuzu"="">a powerful oud wood illuminated by a sparkling yuzu

oud yuzu forte, the unexpected contrast between the sacred whorls of oud wood and the mischievous acerbity of yuzu. wood and citrus meet to give a fragrance that plays with light and shadow.

aqua allegoria forte, the intense collection, is a warm and enveloping journey to the heart of the world’s wonders: eaux de parfum celebrating the intense beauty of nature, revealed by the golden rays of a setting sun.

Title: Aqua allegoria woody forte rsa palissand woman eau de parfum
Description:
rosewood beautifully enhanced by the delicacy of turkish rose

rosa palissandro forte, the spicy freshness of rosewood meets both the delicacy of rose and the intensity of patchouli. the flower and wood combine to give a fragrance blending strength and sophistication.

aqua allegoria forte, the intense collection, is a warm and enveloping journey to the heart of the world’s wonders: eaux de parfum celebrating the intense beauty of nature, revealed by the golden rays of a setting sun.

Title: Myslf man eau de parfum
Description:
what it is
myslf, the refillable men's fragrance by yves saint laurent. the first ysl beauty woody floral fragrance with a unique, long-lasting trail of modernity. on top, a fresh & vibrant accord with sparkling bergamot, followed by a rich and intense orange blossom absolute heart from tunisia. at the base, the scent is balanced by warm and sensual woods, including indonesian patchouli and musky ambrofix™. a statement of modern masculinity to celebrate your true self. unapologetically. proudly. a fragrance that seamlessly fuses with your skin, revealing a distinct signature for each individual. my scent, myslf.

myslf is the expression of the man you are, with all of your emotions and nuances. a distinctly unique fragrance for those redefining what it means to be a man. a floral twist on a traditional woody fragrance. my scent, myslf.

about the fragrance
top notes: fresh accord
middle notes: orange blossom absolute heart
base notes: woods accord

a ysl silhouette in a bottle. luxurious and timeless, with a couture black lacquer finish and the iconic yves saint laurent cassandre logo embedded directly in the glass. the sleek edges and monolith structure embrace the unique woody floral fragrance inside.

ysl beauty is committed to reducing its impact on the environment. the glass bottle contains recycled glass and boxes are fsc™ mix certified. all formats of myslf are refillable, allowing for less packaging material.

Title: Libre absolu platine woman eau de parfum
Description:
what it is

this feminine perfume brings absolute intensity and a long-lasting trail of freedom with the highest concentration ever on ysl libre. the burning sensuality of an orange blossom from morocco & the boldness of a diva lavender from france perfectly blend with a new exclusive and irresistible sensual white lavender accord to create a warm, floral fragrance. the ultimate sensual fragrance crafted with captivating tension that harmonizes fire and ice when it graces the skin.

Title: Narciso rodriguez all of me woman eau de parfum
Description:
all of me by narciso rodriguez parfums is a multi-faceted fragrance created for a new generation of women, who confidently embrace all that makes them unique – their beauty, their grace and their power.

a celebration of individuality and self-expression, all of me eau de parfum reinvents floral fragrance by fusing precious rose centifolia with bold geranium bourbon, a note usually found in men's fragrances.

this distinctive duet of rose and geranium is combined with essence of white peony, powdery black iris and bewitching tuberose to form a faceted blend of florals that unfurls to a heart of delicate pure white muscs.

the heart of musc is reveinted with six different musc notes blend together to create an addictive, second-skin quality, each one bringing a distinct dimension to the scent and expressing a different facet of the wearer.

in the base of the fragrance, warm sandalwood and velvety amber notes create a rich, enveloping trail that lingers on the skin.

ingredients

alcohol, parfum (fragrance), aqua (water), benzyl salicylate, hydroxycitronellal, butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane, linalool, ethylhexyl salicylate, citronellol, geraniol, hexyl cinnamal, coumarin, alpha-isomethyl ionone, cinnamyl alcohol, eugenol, limonene, citral, farnesol, isoeugenol, benzyl benzoate, benzyl alcohol, ci 14700 (red 4), ci 60730 (ext. violet 2), ci 19140 (yellow 5)

in the base of the fragrance, warm sandalwood and velvety amber notes create a rich, enveloping trail that lingers on the skin.
