alcohol, parfum (fragrance), aqua (water), benzyl salicylate, hydroxycitronellal, butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane, linalool, ethylhexyl salicylate, citronellol, geraniol, hexyl cinnamal, coumarin, alpha-isomethyl ionone, cinnamyl alcohol, eugenol, limonene, citral, farnesol, isoeugenol, benzyl benzoate, benzyl alcohol, ci 14700 (red 4), ci 60730 (ext. violet 2), ci 19140 (yellow 5)

Title: Eau dynamisante deodorant
Description:
clarins eau dynamisante deodorant is the perfect way to stay fresh and odor-free throughout the day. this iconic scent helps prevent and neutralize odors while leaving a delicate scent on the skin. with its invigorating notes, this deodorant will ensure that you are always feeling your best. the unique combination of fresh and energizing eau de traitement will leave you feeling energized and confident in your everyday moments. clarins has created an innovative experience with its long-lasting effects that can be experienced throughout the day. with this spray, you can now maintain an odor-free atmosphere on a daily basis, no matter what life throws at you!

shop online clarins eau dynamisante deodorant spray 100ml at best price.
product features:
- bath and shower: deodorants, deodorants
- skin types: dry, normal, greasy
- format: spray

Title: Extra firming emulsion
Description:
what it is

skin gets the spring power the extra-firming range promises and optimum hydration but with a lighter delivery system. because of its water base, it seeps easily into the deeper layers of the epidermis, offering all skin types and especially oil-prone complexions or women living in warmer climates, a firming formula that’s just as effective but lots more lightweight. it’s powered by kangaroo flower and mitracarpus extracts to help visibly plump skin, reduce the look of wrinkles and leave skin visibly firmer. dry skin types can use our emulsion in combination with extra-firming cream to optimize firming results. it features the same addictive camellia and rose-scented that the extra-

firming is loved for.

  • skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily

  • texture: emulsion

  • use: every morning and night. 

benefits

  • visibly plumps & prevents skin slackening.

  • visibly smoothes wrinkles & firms.

  • moisturizes intensely.

Title: Cool water reborn woman eau de parfum
Description: cool water reborn for her is a new perfume by davidoff for women and was released in 2022. the scent is fresh-floral

Title: Cool water reborn man eau de parfum
Description:
"they say you only live once. but they never say how many times you can be reborn." "born" 30 years ago, davidoff cool water fragrances led a revolution in perfumery. a legendary signature fragrance that combines freshness, power and hedonism.

  • top note: galbanum
  • heart notes: cedarwood
  • base notes: upcycled vetiver

since that auspicious birth, davidoff cool water man has been renewed again and again. now davidoff cool water is reborn in the form of a seductive fougère fragrance. discover cool water reborn eau de parfum for him, the elevation of a fresh, aromatic, woody fragrance. the combination of galbanum and cedarwood fuses with the elegant sensuality of vetiver responsibly sourced in haiti.

application: spray davidoff fragrance for him on wrists, inside elbows, biceps and chest for an irresistible scent that lasts all day and is ideal for going out, special occasions and all other occasions.

Title: Atelier des fleurs violet woman eau de parfum
Description:
one flower, one name, one natural extract

two new scents will join the atelier des fleurs collection: violette and santalum. both are formulated with 100% natural-origin raw materials, natural alcohol, and water – all high-quality materials selected with care. vegan and free of artificial colourings and filters, each scent is perfectly aligned with chloé’s determination to reduce its environmental impact.

Title: Colour me aqua woman eau de parfum
Description:
elegant, vibrant and fresh: colour me aqua is an elegant fragrance full of succulent fruity notes, enhanced by a warm blend of sandalwoods and gourmand, creating a perfect sensual perfume for women.

floral, fruity, woody

top notes

bergamot, tropical fruit

middle notes

jasmin, floral, pepper

base notes

sandalwood, musk, gourmand

perfumers notes

a vibrant and rich floral fruity fragrance.

the fresh bergamot citrus and succulent mango top notes lift the elegant heart of jasmin white florals and sparkling pink peppercorn enriched with orange flower and rose accords.

the base notes are warm and tenacious sandalwoods, gourmand, oriental musks and vanilla.

Title: Fleur de pivoine woman eau de parfum
Description:
fleur de pivoine, a fragrance created to be the essential piece in an olfactory wardrobe. the quintessence of style, where fragrance is the material.

“for me, the queen of flowers is a coral-pink peony tinged with optimism and full of joy with its sublime petals. i imagined this creation around a peony granita to highlight the delicacy of this graphic flower while revealing its sparkling and tangy dimension" - perfume, aliénor massenet.

how to use

hold the fragrance 5 inches away and spray your skin, focusing on pulse points (neck and wrists). alternatively, spray generously in front of you and walk through for a full coverage. don’t rub the fragrance in, as it will affect the trail.

hazards and cautions

flammable

ingredients

alcohol denat. (sd alcohol 39-c), parfum (fragrance), aqua (water), ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, ethylhexyl salicylate, butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane, disodium edta, bht, citral, coumarin, hexyl cinnamal, limonene, linalool, ci 60730 (ext v iolet 2), ci 14700 (red 4), ci 19140 (yellow 5)

Title: bois de cypres man eau de toilette
Description:
bois de cypres, a fragrance created to be the essential piece in an olfactory wardrobe. the quintessence of style, where fragrance is the material.

“to create this perfume i was inspired by the beautiful landscapes of tuscany. i remember the cypress trees that proudly decorate the hills around siena. caressed by the sun, they assert their powerful character and bring a touch of freshness to the tuscan countryside" - perfumer, alexandra carlin

how to use

hold the fragrance 5 inches away and spray your skin, focusing on pulse points (neck and wrists). alternatively, spray generously in front of you and walk through for a full coverage. don’t rub the fragrance in, as it will affect the trail.

hazards and cautions

flammable

Title: Orchidee imperiale rich lotion
Description:
the essence-in-lotion is the first step in guerlain's orchidée impériale complete age-defying ritual. it is enriched with the orchidée essential water complex, coupled with the regenerative power of cell respiration™ technology.

combining the freshness and delicacy of a lotion with the roundness and power of an essence, the essence-in-lotion possesses a unique sense enriching quality typical of guerlain skincare. with remarkable efficacy, it intensively moisturises and boosts the natural hydration of the skin deep inside. perfectly plumped, the skin is smooth, supple, soft and radiant, ready to receive the beneficial effects of the imperial ritual.

from first use
women find their skin 22% smoother¹.

after six hours
women find their skin 56% more moisturized².

after 28 days
women find their skin 40% more radiant³ and the visibility of pores 21% reduced³.

the women questioned reported that their skin felt soothed³ and ready for the next step of the imperial ritual¹.

¹self-assessment by scoring, 41 women, immediately. ²instrumental test, 10 women, after 6 hours. ³self-assessment by scoring, 41 women, after 28 days, twice daily application

Title: Polo oud man eau de parfum
Description:
created to make an unforgettable statement, polo oud combines the depth and richness of rose with the freshness of orange flower to reveal this precious oud with elegant nuance and texture.

experience the sensual, exotic intensity of polo oud.

Title: Champs elysees woman eau de parfum
Description: a walk along the most beautiful avenue in the world under the late afternoon sun. two eyes meet, laughter and the desire to escape for a few impromptu hours follows. lighting the way for this fast-paced life that’s open to spontaneity, is champs élysées’ fragrant sillage. as a tribute to guerlain's legendary address on the champs élysées, it embodies all the vibrancy of a city in perpetual motion, a place for encounters and of women’s liberated desire to play the game of life. underneath rose’s transparency, yellow mimosa gleams through with luminosity. rounded by the softness of almond wood, champs élysées dances with light, bringing a smiling caress to the skin.

Title: Signature lumineuse woman eau de parfum
Description:
chloé eau de parfum lumineuse celebrates natural femininity in this radiant expression of the maison’s emblematic rose.

perfumer ane ayo has created a warm, delicate rose with a sensual spirit that is both feminine and elegant. the 100% natural-origin eau de parfum mingles this full and complex rose with the velvety accents of sambac jasmine. vanilla exalts the floral heart, while balmy amber tones lend a generous, addictive roundness.

the fragrance is enclosed in a pleated glass bottle anchored in the maison’s dna. for the first time, it echoes the maison’s distinctive stitching in the delicate pink thread that trims the beige ribbon tied at the bottle’s neck.

details
a warm, sensual floral eau de parfum
top: sambac jasmine
heart: rose
base: vanilla

Title: Tommy hilfiger impact spark man eau de toilette
Description:
impact spark is an energising new addition to the tommy hilfiger fragrance line. it's a spirited blend of fruity and woodsy notes that evokes the invigorating feeling of bold new ideas. zesty italian bergamot and green fig ignite your inspiration, blending with mid notes of spiced cardamom for diffused, long-lasting freshness. the akigalawood note – a spicy, earthy extract of patchouli – contrasts the citrussy sweetness, providing a solid base for the scent.

highlights
• eau de toilette
• spray application
• top note: italian bergamot
• middle note: green fig
• base note: akigalawood®
• presented in gift box
• tommy hilfiger branding

heart notes: cinnamon, ylang ylang, vanilla orchid.

top notes: sandalwood?, patchouli?, orcanox™

Title: Le parfum bridal woman eau de parfum
Description:
as delicate as lace edging on a bridal gown, elie saab le parfum bridal edp is a floral woody musky fragrance that inspires and brings your most precious moments to life.

inspired by a floral wedding bouquet, this captivating fragrance induces a petal-filled contrast with ylang-ylang and orange blossom notes. the iconic le parfum bottle is adorned with a warm and sensual beige hue and airy lace that evokes the softness and delicacy of a bridal veil. enhanced by a hint of pink, this luminous beige evokes both the silky fabrics of a wedding gown, the amber light of a sunbeam, and the shimmer of embroidery, revealing the sensuality of the skin. a floral lace motif delicately decorates the crystalline facets of the bottle.

Title: Le parfum bridal woman eau de parfum
Description:
as delicate as lace edging on a bridal gown, elie saab le parfum bridal edp is a floral woody musky fragrance that inspires and brings your most precious moments to life.

inspired by a floral wedding bouquet, this captivating fragrance induces a petal-filled contrast with ylang-ylang and orange blossom notes. the iconic le parfum bottle is adorned with a warm and sensual beige hue and airy lace that evokes the softness and delicacy of a bridal veil. enhanced by a hint of pink, this luminous beige evokes both the silky fabrics of a wedding gown, the amber light of a sunbeam, and the shimmer of embroidery, revealing the sensuality of the skin. a floral lace motif delicately decorates the crystalline facets of the bottle.

Title: Le vie di milano district of nolo collection eau de parfum
Description:
district of nolo eau de parfum from the le vie di milano collection by trussardi opens with fresh notes of lemon. the reinterpretation of the traditional and luminous iris flower in the top note is enlivened by a juicy and tasty pear. vanilla and musk give the composition a warm base. a tribute to italian creativity, the eau de parfum showcases one of the most prized ingredients in the perfumery palette - the sublime and mysterious iris absolute.

nolo (an acronym for "north of loreto") is the trendy neighborhood in north-east milan. "discover" the district with its sights and art with this perfume.

fragrance pyramid
top: lemon oil from italy, pear accord, violet leaf accord
heart: iris absolute from italy, rose absolute, pear granita accord, hedione
base: ambroxan, musk, vanilla absolute from madagascar

olfactory family: citrusy, floral, woody, fruity

Title: Homme intense man eau de toilette set
Description: kenzo invites you to contemplate the beauty of the sky in the moonlight. this gift set encloses kenzo homme eau de toilette intense 110ml with its body milk 75ml and its travel spray 10ml.

Title: Homme eau de toilette intense set
Description:
do you know the secret language of flowers? in japan, it's called hanakotoba.
it's a way of symbolically expressing emotions, and each flower has its own message: joie de vivre is conveyed by the poppy, maternal love by the carnation, strength by the bamboo. for father's day, convey messages and emotions without saying a word.

kenzo homme eau de toilette intense: a marine accord and pink berries at the top give way to an addictive accord combining figwood and sandalwood.

our made in france gift sets are 100% cardboard from well-managed forests and other controlled sources certified fsc™.

this men's box contains: 
- kenzo homme eau de toilette intense for men 110ml
- kenzo homme eau de toilette intense for men reusable travel spray 10ml
- kenzo homme shower gel 75ml

aqua/water/eau. glycerin. cetearyl ethylhexanoate. butylene glycol. 1,2-hexanediol. hydroxyethyl acrylate/sodium acryloyldimethyl taurate copolymer. prunus armeniaca (apricot) kernel oil. silica. cocos nucifera (coconut) fruit juice. propylene glycol. xylitylglucoside. acrylates/c10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer. anhydroxylitol. ethylhexylglycerin. parfum/fragrance. xylitol. sodium hydroxide. tartaric acid. disodium edta. glucose. tamarindus indica extract. marrubium vulgare extract. lycium barbarum fruit extract. citric acid. ficus carica (fig) fruit extract. malpighia emarginata (acerola) seed extract. phenethyl alcohol. furcellaria lumbricalis extract. sodium benzoate. rhododendron ferrugineum extract. potassium sorbate. sorbic acid. lapsana communis flower/leaf/stem extract. maris sal/sea salt/sel marin. ci 14700/red 4. [v3146b]
*for informational purposes only. every ingredient list is specific to an individual product reference. all formulas are subject to change. while we endeavor to keep this ingredient list accurate, we cannot guaranty that it is reliable, up-to-date, or error-free. please also refer to the ingredient list on the product's outer packaging for a complete, accurate, and up-to-date list.

Title: Divine passion woman eau de toilette
Description:
divine passion adorns itself in a red dress which reveals the enchanting silhouette of gardenia.

its juicy, raspberry red mouth embraces the indulgence of dulce de leche.

fragrance notes

top notes: pear, raspberry, blackcurrant
heart notes: gardenia, lily of the valley, peach
base notes: benzoin resin, dulce de leche, vanilla

fragrance family 

fruity floral gourmand

Title: Rumba fever woman eau de toilette
Description:
a perfume with a red heart for daring women who live intensely.

mesmerizing and dangerously addictive latin energy. inspired by red, the ultimate color of passion and temptation, rumba fever raises the temperature and revisits this dance of charm and attraction to the rhythm of the sensual movements of warming bodies.


olfactory family: floral gourmand


olfactory pyramid:

top notes: blackcurrant, mandarin
heart notes: rose, orange blossom, jasmine
base notes: dulce de leche, vanilla, ambe

Title: Seduction vibes woman eau de toilette
Description:
ted lapidus seduction vibes plays the sensual melody of tangy blackcurrant which dances with a gang of bold flowers. an irresistibly addictive ambiance.

fragrance notes:
top notes: apple, blackcurrant, pink peppercorns
heart notes: rose, tuberose, orris, butterfly pea
base notes: vetiver, vanilla, chocolate truffle

fragrance family:
amber floral

Title: Sensual hero man eau de toilette
Description:
sensual hero injects the freshness of a playful caipirinha which contrasts with smouldering spices. a woody fusion brought to a fever pitch.

fragrance notes

top notes:  pepper, bergamot, caipirinha accord, cardamom
heart notes: aromatic cocktail, violet leaf, nutmeg
base notes: patchouli, cedarwood, vetiver

 
fragrance family 

woody spice

Title: Sexy muse woman eau de toilette
Description:
ted lapidus sexy muse reveals the innocence of delicious marshmallow swept up in a hypnotic whirlwind of scandalous morello cherry and enchanting sandalwood.

fragrance notes:

top notes: peach, plum, morello cherry
middle notes: jasmine, lily of the valley, freesia, marshmallow
base notes: sandalwood, vanilla, praline, tonka bean


fragrance family:

fruity floral

Title: Suave skin woman eau de toilette
Description:
suave skin caresses sensually musky skin, tingling under the influence of blood orange, where a peony petal heart brings out its femininity.

fragrance notes

top notes: pear, lemon, blood orange
heart notes: peony, lily of the valley, violet leaf
base notes: musks, orcanox™, cashmeran
 
fragrance family 

floral, woody, musk

Description:
ted lapidus supreme desire suggests the vibrations of a night out.

fragrance notes:

heart notes: clary sage, lavender, jasmine
base notes: guaiac wood, pine, rosewood moss

Title: Torrid tempo man eau de toilette
Description:
torrid tempo invites bodies to get a little closer. for a taste of the forbidden fruit, a zesty apple and  uninhibited orris  are wrapped in the warmth of patchouli.

heart notes: jasmine, cinnamon, orris
base notes: cedar, patchouli, tonka beans, vanilla

Title: Rumba passion woman eau de toilette
Description:
rumba passion by ted lapidus is a amber floral fragrance for women. top note is orange blossom; middle notes are rose and jasmine; base notes are honey, patchouli and vanilla.

rumba passion by ted lapidus is an amber floral fragrance for women. a flanker to the original rumba fragrance first launched by balenciaga and currently produced by ted lapidus, rumba passion features a top note of orange blossom; middle notes of jasmine and rose and base notes of patchouli, vanilla and honey.

Title: Rumba woman eau de toilette
Description: rumba is a passionate dance with notes of exotic trees and a classic, warm trail of musk and vanilla. the composition opens with a rich, fruity bouquet: mirabelle, peach, plum. the heart is oriental-floral, composed of orchid, magnolia, jasmine and tuberose. the perfume closes with equally intensive notes of amber, vanilla, moss and leather.

Title: Lapidus pour homme man eau de toilette
Description:
top notes are pineapple, lavender, artemisia, juniper berries, lemon, basil and bergamot;

middle notes are honey, incense, pine tree, rose, brazilian rosewood, jasmine, caraway, orris root, lily-of-the-valley and petitgrain;

base notes are tobacco, patchouli, oakmoss, musk, amber, sandalwood, tonka bean and cedar.

Title: Pepe jeans sobold man eau de parfum
Description:
product details

- 100 ml eau de parfum
- fragrance with character, power and rebellion
- top notes: bergamot, mandarin, aromas that evoke a freshly washed t-shirt
- middle notes: lavender, clary sage, violet leaf absolute
- base notes: tobacco, white leather, toasted tonka, vetiver

Title: Absolue extrait regenerating ultimate elixir
Description:
an exceptional elixir exists. it contains up to 2 million lancôme rose native cells.

experience lancôme’s revolutionary skincare innovation lancôme rose native cells.

extracted from the heart of the rare and resilient lancôme rose using an exclusive, state-of-the-art biotechnological process, these native cells are proven to extend their own exceptional properties to enhance skin’s apperarance.

each jar of absolue l’extrait contains up to 2 million of these precious native cells. absolue l’extrait helps reveal firmer, more elastic, more radiant skin for fascinating beauty.

absolue l’extrait. a masterpiece of rejuvenation.

dermatologist tested
suitable for sensitive skin

through a state-of-the-art biotechnological extraction process comes a line of lancôme rose native cells. fermogenesis™, an exclusive process, preserves their capacities intact to perpetuate their integrity.

absolue l’extrait was evaluated during a clinical study on several age-defining parameters**. at eleven weeks of use, a significant improvement in each of these major signs was noted***.

offering the best in lancome skincare, absolue l’extrait represents our brands ideology, now and in the future. convinced that luxury and environmental sustainability should co-exist, absolue l’extrait takes us on an environmental journey, for more ecological and ethical sustainability.

Title: Eau de jardins
Description: eau des jardins is a surprising combination of essential oils and plant extracts with phytotherapeutic benefits. the sparkling freshness of fruity skins, an integrating note with wild rose and the scent of delicious wood.

Title: Gentle refiner exfoliating cream
Description: it’s good to glow! clarins exfoliating cream with microbeads has a dual-action formula containing two types of microbeads to exfoliate and polish the skin. the creamy texture gently scrubs away impurities and dead skin cells, and tightens pores. skin emerges fresh, smooth and refined. applying this exfoliating cream twice a week delivers the most radiant results.

Title: Eau ressourcante treatment fragrance
Description:
relaxing treatment fragrance that combines the aromatherapy and skincare benefits of concentrated plant extracts to refresh, soothe, and perfume skin. formulated with aromatic essential oils of basil, florentine iris, benzoin siam and cedarwood—this woody-floral fragrance promotes a total feeling of calm, while soothing the skin with a delicate veil of scented moisture. natural plant extracts—sarsaparilla, longan, and robinia—leave skin feeling soft, smooth and refreshed. gentle, non-photosensitizing formula. bottle is made of 40% recycled glass.

  • skin type: normal, oily, combination, dry

  • texture: liquid

  • use: spray onto skin throughout the day.

Title: Essence of dreams cosmic wood woman eau de parfum
Description:
create the impression of class and sophistication with tory burch cosmic wood eau de parfum, an eau de parfum with an intimate scent that avoids being overpowering. capturing the essence of magic, this distinctive fragrance is part of the essence of dreams collection.

the cosmic wood fragrance features top notes of cardamom and ambrette and includes heart notes of jasmine and sage. the base note of this scent is vetiver from sources that reinvest in the local community.

packaged in compostable cellophane and forest stewardship council certified paper, tory burch cosmic wood eau de parfum is a personal fragrance with a spicy, woody fragrance. the tory burch foundation is dedicated to empowering women and female entrepreneurs.

key benefits

a spicy, woody fragrance
features top notes of cardamom and ambrette
includes heart notes of jasmine and sage
base note of responsibly sourced vetiver
intimate scent that avoids being overpowering

Title: Jacadi toute petit boy alcohol free eau de toilette

this bottle of perfume exudes a soft and subtle fragrance specially formulated for baby's delicate skin. awaken baby's senses with a fresh and lightweight perfume featuring a blend of lemon, bergamot, and neroli notes for a sparkling opening. fruity and floral heart notes combining orange blossoms and granny smith apples rest on a warm and soothing backdrop of musk and cedar. the perfect newborn gift, you won't get enough of this baby fragrance.

Title: A drop d`issey essentielle woman eau de parfum
Description:
a drop d’issey eau de parfum essentielle tells a new story of water infused with lightweight floral and vegetal notes.

discover a luminous and ethereal fragrance inspired by morning mist. follow the journey of a raindrop through nature, capturing the vegetal and floral notes it encounters along its way before it finally evaporates at dawn with the first rays of the sun.

Title: For her musc nude eau deparfum
Description:
discover for her musc nude eau de parfum — the new vegan perfume for women by narciso rodriguez that’s filled with sensuality. enveloping the body in a soft breeze, the fragrance wraps around you like a protective armour that’s as tender as a second skin. a celebration of eternal femininity, it’s a peaceful breath of perfume that brings a gentle rhythm to your inner symphony. a hidden secret to form part of a caring daily ritual like a most precious treasure. 

with for her musc nude, renowned perfumer sonia constant — nose for some of the most iconic for her scents — has created a new interpretation of the chypre fragrance family. the eau de parfum is composed around an elegant and timeless olfactive structure, enhanced with solar facets and the signature narciso rodriguez heart of musk. a piquant pink peppercorn accord meets an abstract floral bouquet of delicate white flowers as the fragrance gently caresses the skin. at the perfume’s core, the for her heart of musk is infused with floral notes of precious rose oil and orange blossom. as the fragrance dries down, rich tonka bean absolute blends with the softness of cedarwood and patchouli, embracing you in a feeling of caring warmth. 

a nude pink perfume bottle, for her musc nude revisits the iconic for her bottle with an all-over nude pink in a frosted finish and a matte cap in a matching shade — for a design that is as softly enveloping as the fragrance within. reflecting the perfume’s elegance, the bottle’s sophisticated lines create a precious object of aesthetic harmony. a more eco-conscious approach to fragrance, for her musc nude takes a more eco-friendly approach to perfume. the packaging is also eco-conscious, with no internal lacquering for the bottle. 

top notes - pink peppercorn, abstract floral bouquet, fresh jasmine 

middle notes - heart of musc, rose oil, orange flower 

bottom notes - tonka bean absolute, cashmeran, patchouli

Title: For her musc nude eau deparfum

Title: Narciso for him vetiver musc eau de tiolette
Description:
for him vetiver musc, the new men's perfume by narciso rodriguez...

this new vegan eau de toilette for men from narciso rodriguez is a green woody fragrance that invites you to reconnect with the elements. a true ode to the roots, this perfume symbolizes a return to the essential for men attracted by the peaceful harmony of nature. inviting one to take refuge in a place stripped of all artifice, this juice is the incarnate definition of authenticity, a new masculinity encapsulated in a perfume.

a woody aromatic masculine fragrance that dives into the depths of nature narciso rodriguez collaborated with the famous nose mathilde bijaoui to compose this new elegant woody aromatic fragrance for men. its dazzling composition opens with a combination of lively top notes of spicy nutmeg and cypress, enhanced by the freshness of cardamom. in the center, the fragrance plunges into aromatic and mineral abysses. a heart of sensual musk, narciso rodriguez's emblematic signature, nuances the fresh and floral facets of bourbon geranium, infused with red algae. the woody base notes are expressed through the intensity of vetiver combined with the marked texture of cedar wood and the warmth of patchouli.

a perfume bottle with sea green shades. for this new opus, the bottle of for him vetiver musk is adorned with the colors of nature: a transparent sea green which echoes the mineral character of the perfume it contains. its refreshing aesthetic breaks the codes by reinterpreting the iconic black blue for him bottle by narciso rodriguez. its refined design is topped with a matching hood and enhanced with a decidedly elegant matte finish.

a more eco-responsible approach the packaging of for him vetiver musc consists of a 100% fsctm paper case and a bottle without interior lacquering.

olfactory family: woody aromatic

olfactory pyramid:

top notes: cardamom

heart notes: heart of musk

base notes: vetiver

Title: Abeille royal clarify & repair cream
Description: the abeille royale clarify & repair moisturizing cream is enriched with powerful honeys from dynamic blackbee repair technology paired with a brightness-activating concentrate combining anti-dark spot vitamin c and light-restoring white honey, with a clarifying efficacy comparable to niacinamide (a benchmark clarifying active ingredient). day after day, the most visible pigmentation disorders, dark spots are reduced, skin texture is refined, wrinkles are smoothed, and skin looks visibly younger. clarify & repair creme is refillable and formulated with 93% naturally-derived ingredients.

Title: Oudess eau de parfum
Description:
<p aria-label=""a" stirring="" oud="" with="" sensual="" accents"="">a stirring oud with sensual accents

oud essentiel is a homage to the most sumptuous facets of oud wood. in the darkness of night, this legendary rare wood is revealed in all its strength and depth on contact with smooth rose notes and mysterious leather notes.
absolus allegoria, the absolute fragrance collection, is an enchanting and mysterious journey to the heart of the world’s wonders once night falls: fragrance trails celebrating deep and powerful nature, revealed by striking contrasts by moonlight.

oud

worked majestically, oud displays its power and sensuality to help create a fragrance which lingers with all the opulence and mystery of nature at twilight.

powerful leather
sensual through and through, the leather note within this fragrance captivates with its sheer power and animal facets.

a powerful symbol of guerlain's commitment to the planet, the absolus allegoria fragrances contain up to 90% natural-origin* ingredients. the french beetroot alcohol used in their formulas comes from a network committed to responsible farming.
*90% to 94% of ingredients are of natural origin, in accordance with iso 16128, calculation includes water.

Title: Patch ardent woman eau de parfum
Description:
patchouli ardent is the luminous and captivating reinterpretation of patchouli. traditionally woody, dark and mysterious, it reveals its most radiant facets on contact with rose and a majestic leather and musk accord.
absolus allegoria, the absolute fragrance collection, is an enchanting and mysterious journey to the heart of the world’s wonders once night falls: fragrance trails celebrating deep and powerful nature, revealed by striking contrasts by moonlight.

the unrivalled refinement of patchouli
this noble ingredient from the east, whose sensual plumes of scent have crossed borders and intoxicated the world, illuminates this exquisite fragrance with some of its most dazzling facets. dried patchouli leaves release a powerful faceted woody scent that evokes exoticism and pure refinement.

a sublime rose
within the heart of the fragrance, perfumery’s emblematic rose melds with patchouli, accentuating it to form a sensually captivating pairing.

a powerful symbol of guerlain's commitment to the planet, the absolus allegoria fragrances contain up to 90% natural-origin* ingredients. the french beetroot alcohol used in their formulas comes from a network committed to responsible farming.
*90% to 94% of ingredients are of natural origin, in accordance with iso 16128, calculation includes water.

Title: La petite robe noire eau de parfum absolue
Description:
the intense floral fruity trail of la petite robe noire eau de parfum absolue is a vibrant tribute to the rose. the intensity of an eau de parfum intense, the refinement of an absolu de parfum and a rose embroidered with the woody scent of patchouli that leaves a uniquely elegant yet powerful scent on the skin.

la petite robe noire eau de parfum absolue takes rose’s bewitching power to captivatingly fragrant new heights. accented with a hint of fresh-as-dew bergamot, the rose’s charm is first revealed through a velvety soft evocation of its delicate petals, using the powdery effects of iris. all to be finally embellished with the woody scent of patchouli, and a deep leather-enhanced, smoky tea accord. the queen of flowers leaves a uniquely elegant yet powerful scent on the skin.

Title: Multi active emulsion
Description:
day and night, the skin needs to maintain its level of energy and resistance to cope with an intense daily lifestyle. this rich, lightweight emulsion, with 93% natural ingredients, contains an innovative technology:

• [skin charger complex]: niacinamide, combined with sea holly extract, form a powerful duo that helps to reduce the first visible signs of aging. the skin's barrier function is strengthened, its radiance revived and its youth preserved.
• teasel extract, with its revitalising properties, energises the skin.
• cassava root extract helps mattify the skin.
• strawberry tree extract helps improve skin texture and reduce the appearance of pores.

result: the skin seems smoothed, radiant and perfectly hydrated. the skin texture is refined.

  • texture: emulsion
  • mattifying action.
  • boosted radiance.
  • <li style=""box-sizing:" border-box;"="">clarins anti-pollution complex

Title: Multi active night cream all skin type
Description:
multi-active helps tackle the first visible signs of aging as well as the damaging effects of stress brought on by lack of sleep, fatigue, and a fast-paced lifestyle - a phenomenon known as stress aging¹ which accelerates the aging process. this overnight skin-renewing moisturizer provides 24-hour hydration³ and delivers a smooth, refined complexion, and a visibly rejuvenated glow upon waking.

powered by clarins’ new skin charger complex—a blend of 2% niacinamide and our exclusive new organic sea holly bio-extract*—this moisturizer targets the 8 signs of stress aging: fine lines, wrinkles, enlarged pores, dehydration, dullness, uneven skin tone, loss of firmness, and signs of fatigue. niacinamide, also known as vitamin b3, visibly smoothes fine lines, and refines skin texture. organic sea holly bio-extract* helps to reinforce the skin’s moisture barrier and target the first visible signs of aging. together, this supercharged complex delivers an immediate healthy-looking glow, while visibly reducing lines and wrinkles by 25% after 28 days of use.² anti-aging tetrapeptides help visibly renew skin overnight.

multi-active night’s soft, cocooning texture is infused with a soothing, calming scent of bergamot, rose, jasmin, hyacinth, orris, musk, cedarwood, and amber to help you get a good night's rest.

¹phenomenon responsible for skin aging related to stress induced by an intense lifestyle
²self evaluation - multi-active night cream all skin types - 100 women - 28 days
³clinical study - night cream, all skin types - 30 women - 24-hour
*organic ingredients are produced in accordance with european regulation (ce 2018/848).

  • skin type: normal, oily, combination, dry

  • texture: cream

  • use: apply to clean skin each evening

benefits

  • visibly smoothes lines, refines texture, and boosts radiance

  • helps reinforce skin's moisture barrier

  • evens skin tone and visibly tightens pores

  • helps rejuvenate and renew skin overnight

  • targets first lines and wrinkles

  • provides 24-hour hydration³

Title: Multi active day cream spf15
Description:
experience the ultimate youth-boosting skincare with our niacinamide face cream enriched with spf 15. perfect for those with busy lifestyles, this innovative formula not only shields your skin with sun protection but also harnesses the power of niacinamide for anti-ageing benefits. enjoy a daily dose of hydration and defence against harmful uv rays while promoting a smoother, more youthful complexion. elevate your skincare routine with this all-in-one solution, designed to simplify your regimen without compromising on effectiveness. this skin smoothing, radiance-boosting anti-ageing cream features a brand new technology:
• [skin charger complex]: niacinamide, combined with sea holly extract, form a powerful duo that helps to reduce the first visible signs of ageing, as well as signs of stress and fatigue on the skin. the skin's barrier function is strengthened, while the anti-ageing benefits of the formula deliver a beautiful, youthful glow.
• teasel extract, with its revitalising properties, energises the skin.
• strawberry tree extract helps to improve skin texture and reduce the appearance of pores.
• spf 15 protects the skin from harmful uv damage. overall, the skin is energised, smoother to the touch and is hydrated. the skin’s texture is improved, radiance is revived.

  • skin type: normal, oily, combination, dry
  • texture: cream
  • use: apply each morning after cleansing.
benefits
  • smoother skin.
  • uv protected skin.
  • refined texture.
  • boosted radiance.
  • clarins anti-pollution complex.

Title: Aqua allegoria mandarine basilic harvest woman eau de toilette  set
Description:
discover the new limited edition aqua allegoria mandarine basilic eau de toilette set. for mother's day, give her a colorful floral box, specially designed by the artist duo oniriq. 

in an explosion of dots, thousands of flowers appear to say i love you to infinity.

this chest contains:

- eau de toilette - 125 ml

- eau de toilette - 7.5 ml

- body milk - 75 ml

the fragrance, an aromatic, sparkling and luminous hesperide.

the juicy and tangy pulp of the mandarin is enhanced by the aromatic freshness of the basil and then energized by the green tea on a background of woody notes.

Title: This is her  woman eau de parfum
Description: perfume this is her!, sensual, free and casual, unexpected and spicy floral bouquet, based on sambac jasmine and pink berry, sweet note of chestnut associated with that of vanilla, without forgetting the power of sandalwood, signature of maison zadig & voltaire.

Title: This is her vibes of freedom woman eau de parfum
Description:
the new eau de parfum for women by zadig&voltaire is a fresh & floral shot of positivity, bringing good vibes!
freedom is an instinct that vibes deep down inside us and resonates with nature. it’s a vibe to reconnect with.

the vibes of freedom woman is at first sight solar and sexy. deep down, a modern and sparkling woman, releasing lots of positive vibes. deep inside, we feel the vibe.

a floral and fruity shot conveyed by a blooming peony and a juicy pear. a radiant and vibrant sensation offered by the sun exposure of jasmine and rose. smooth and addictive memories left by an everlasting signature of sensual chestnut cream.

Title: This is her undressed woman eau de parfum
Description: the new this is her! undressed eau de parfum perfectly embodies the zadig woman: elegant in spite of herself, fresh and solar. as sparkling as its notes of ginger and orange blossom, she shines and is simply unforgettable. an intimate fragrance with sensual accords, enveloped in ylang-ylang and underlined by a musk and sandalwood signature.

Title: This is her undressed woman eau de parfum
Description: the new this is her! undressed eau de parfum perfectly embodies the zadig woman: elegant in spite of herself, fresh and solar. as sparkling as its notes of ginger and orange blossom, she shines and is simply unforgettable. an intimate fragrance with sensual accords, enveloped in ylang-ylang and underlined by a musk and sandalwood signature.

Title: This is really her woman eau de parfum intense
Description:
this is really her! it is the new and intense perfume for women.

a bold new chapter in the love story of this is!, a fragrance that takes you from day to night and from night to day, like a metallic leather jacket from zadig. for a daring adventure without limits, wherever life takes you.

a bold floral-amber fragrance

a new amber floral fragrance with bold intensity, this is really her! it shines with notes of pink berries illuminated by the green accents of rose basil notes.

a magnetic metallic accord of rose and chestnut creates a resplendently seductive heart. the addictive base reveals the warm depths of notes of honey, patchouli and amber or a sensual sillage that goes from dawn to dusk.

a more ecological perfume

the this is really her! bottle created with 15% recycled glass, with a lightening of 13%.

a perfume bottle with metallic design

the avant-garde design of this is really her! it is inspired by fashion, with a day and night look in metallic leather. the dazzling gold crystal evokes the twinkling lights of a nighttime adventure in paris and is embellished with an evocative metallic effect for an edgy finishing touch.

Title: This is him man eau de toilette
Description:
the this is him! fragrance is the epitome of a rock “n” roll gentleman with an assured style.
this urban adventurer emphasises his confidence with spicy incense, grapefruit and black pepper.
a manly heart note reveals itself with a duo of vanilla and incense. a free spirit, a wild instinct: the resolutely rock trail is underlined by zadig&voltaire’s signature sandalwood. - zadig&voltaire men’s this is him! fragrance

Title: This is him vibes of freedom man eau de toilette
Description:
zadig&voltaire this is him! vibes of freedom eau de toilette is a fougere fragrance for men. the fragrance is an olfactory invitation to escape, a sip of freedom that one dreams of in the murderous silence and boredom of a city apartment. finally, passivity is defeated, says an energetic composition, the world is changing, the time has come for the awakening of creative forces.

the starting note from provence: the fresh spice of lavender with a cheerful hint of tangerine. heart: the mystical power of frankincense in the lemon nuances of cardamom. the base is noble cedar and dark patchouli.

freedom is beyond gender, that's why the fragrance is created in two versions, male and female: this is him! vibes of freedom and this is her! vibes of freedom.

associative series: summer is in full swing, a group of friends is enjoying a vacation. they are young and carefree, cheerfully communicate with each other, laugh and enthusiastically exchange impressions.

Title: This is him undressed man eau de toilette
Description: the new this is him! undressed eau de toilette perfectly embodies the zadig man: sensual and charismatic, he above all loves making the most of every moment. this bold and lively men’s fragrance reveals vibrant and aromatic notes of grapefruit, pink pepper and orange blossom. it leaves in its wake a totally addictive combination of musk and salty accords, and an unforgettable woody, amber-tinged memory.

Title: This is him undressed man eau de toilette
Description: the new this is him! undressed eau de toilette perfectly embodies the zadig man: sensual and charismatic, he above all loves making the most of every moment. this bold and lively men’s fragrance reveals vibrant and aromatic notes of grapefruit, pink pepper and orange blossom. it leaves in its wake a totally addictive combination of musk and salty accords, and an unforgettable woody, amber-tinged memory.

Title: This is really him man eau de toilette intense
Description: a fragrance for lovers who embark on a passionate adventure through the streets of paris as day turns to night and then back to day. a story about burning desires and impulses that flare up around the clock. this is really him! embodies the feeling of eternal youth, complete freedom and madly in love. a fragrance that celebrates life in style, zadig is the equivalent of that sassy leather jacket with a metallic shimmer in your wardrobe that accompanies you from morning to night and beyond.

Title: This is really him man eau de toilette intense

Title: Flower ikebana mimosa woman eau de parfum
Description:
flower ikebana mimosa, the new blooming sunshine bouquet, arranges the highest quality of mimosa, tanneron mimosa, alongside exceptional raw ingredients to create an eau de parfum composed of 91% ingredients of natural origin*.
its outerpack is inspired by the japanese kakemono** and a dreamlike mimosa flower adorns the long, slim glass bottle.
flower ikebana perfume bottles feature a precious glass cap, which can be recycled***. this perfume reflects the maison's commitments to a more beautiful world, with an outerpack fully made in france, the use of 15% recycled glass****, a paper outerpack from well-managed fsc certified forests and other controlled sources and bio-based inks.

Title: Flower ikebana mimosa woman eau de parfum
Description:
flower ikebana mimosa, the new blooming sunshine bouquet, arranges the highest quality of mimosa, tanneron mimosa, alongside exceptional raw ingredients to create an eau de parfum composed of 91% ingredients of natural origin*.
its outerpack is inspired by the japanese kakemono** and a dreamlike mimosa flower adorns the long, slim glass bottle.

Title: Nomade nuit d`egypte woman eau de parfum
Description:
the scent: chloé nomade nuit d'égypte is a sensory masterpiece, carefully crafted with age-old inspirations in mind.

inspired by the ancient kyphi, the first-known perfume to humankind, this alluring eau de parfum weaves a timeless tale of age-old allure and modern refinement. powerful accents of myrrh appear instantly, seamlessly blending with the spicy scents of cinnamon and ginger, followed by honeyed hues of broomflower nectar and supremely round, balsamic and ambery undertones of cypriol and opopanax. at the very heart of this chloé nomade nuit d'egypte eau de parfum for women, the exquisite kyphi accord is paired with an opulent orange blossom absolute, sourced from the heart of egypt itself. finally, a sensuous touch of warm vanilla completes the base note of this beautiful fragrance composed with 90% naturally sourced ingredients.

the bottle: the iconic bottle of the chloé nomade fragrance line takes on a brand-new braid tied around its mystery-tinged hue of deep blue, the famous 'egyptian blue'. reflecting chloé’s commitment, the packaging includes recycled materials, which make up 15% recycled glass used for the bottle and 40% recycled cardboard used for the fsc-certified box.

background behind the fragrance: driven by a constant yearning for discovery, chloé celebrates authentic splendours both near and far. embarking on a new adventure, nomade nuit d’egypte women’s eau de parfum pays tribute to egypt. it was in egypt that the first perfume known to humankind - kyphi - was created. to compose nomade nuit d’égypte, perfumer juliette karagueuzoglou has revisited kyphi with a modern, refined approach, constructing it around a selection of base ingredients mentioned in ancient recipes for the elixir.

fragrance occasion: this ambery orange blossom fragrance is a perfect high-intensity scent for any occasion. the perfect gift for an adventurous woman or a luxurious treat for yourself.

how to use:

spray this chloé nomade nuit d'egypte eau de parfum for women onto your wrists, décolleté and neck and allow it to dry in naturally.

Title: Hero man parfum
Description: burberry hero parfum portrays a modern man. sincere yet courageous, he constantly surpasses himself in every challenge. no longer held back by preconceptions, he connects with his inner self to embrace the extraordinary within. hero parfum is the latest burberry fragrance for men. intense and powerful, the scent is led by a base of warm cedarwood oils. on top, notes of amyris and cypriol oil enliven the aroma for a deep woody finish. housed in an angular glass bottle detailed with the burberry logo. intense and powerful, burberry hero parfum.

Title: Colour me indigo woman eau de parfum
Description:
sophisticated, elegant and fresh. an elegant fragrance with fresh top notes of citrus orange blossom with blackcurrant fruit accords on a rich floral heart of jasmin, tuberose and bulgarian rose. the sophisticated base notes of of cacao, tonka bean and amber are complimented with warm and tenacious sandalwood, cedarwood, patchouli and vanilla musk.

floral, amber, woody

top notes:
bergamot, blackcurrant, almond

middle notes:
peach, jasmine, tuberose

base notes:
tonka bean, amber, cedarwood

perfumers notes:
an elegant fragrance with fresh top notes of citrus orange blossom with blackcurrant fruit accords on a rich floral heart of jasmin, tuberose and bulgarian rose. the sophisticated base notes of of cacao, tonka bean and amber are complimented with warm and tenacious sandalwood, cedarwood, patchouli and vanilla musk.

Title: La musique de chris unisex extrait de parfum
Description:
experience the essence of glyndebourne: a musical journey
a fragrant ode to glyndebourne experience the essence of glyndebourne with "la musique de christie" by eight & bob. inspired by the prestigious opera festival, this fragrance captures the elegance and passion of open-air opera under the starry summer nights.
crafted with luxurious greek saffron, leather, moss, nutmeg, musk, and patchouli, each note intertwines to create a harmonious symphony of scent. joining the iconic extracts of eight & bob, "la musique de christie" pays tribute to the creator of glyndebourne, offering a contemporary celebration of luxury and passion in every drop.
 
indulge in the essence of glyndebourne with "la musique de christie" and let the fragrance transport you to the enchanting world of opera under the moonlight.

Title: Le geste d`edmond unisex extrait de parfum
Description:
at the entrance of eight & bob's edmond fragrance, we can undoubtedly appreciate the mysterious oriental facet of seductive bourbon vanilla, one of the most prized plants since its arrival in europe in the 16th century, to delve into the heart of an essence that will surprise us with a spicy touch due to the stimulating ginger and the warmest embrace of cinnamon.

the beauty and elegance of these carefully selected raw materials have the ability to treasure emotions and vivid memories. the interesting history of edmond albius serves as the background for eight & bob's newest extract, “le geste d’edmond”, whose main essence is vanilla, one of europe’s most sought-after plants.

Title: Grooming collection set
Description:
this superlative six-piece kit is designed to take your daily routine to the next level by providing an indulgent sensory experience that's hard to beat. 

each product has been carefully crafted to provide deep nourishment and hydration for your skin, all while enveloping you in an exclusive aroma that oozes luxury and sophistication. 

and the best part? eight & bob's products are made with the highest quality standards and a commitment to preserving the environment.the set includes a shower gel, body lotion, aftershave balm, hand cream, lip balm, and a shampoo – everything you need to pamper yourself and take care of your body.

inspired by the freshness of the exuberant notes of the orange blossom, pear and bergamot that bloom in the region of calabria. the exquisite blend of arabian jasmine, white musk and neroli will take you on a mysterious journey across crystal-clear waters reflecting a stunning sunset. eight & bob has created the les essentiels range to surround you with objects that add a touch of warmth and pleasure to your everyday life. it’s all about creating special moments and connecting with our inner self. made in spain. 300ml

Title: Alien hypersense woman eau de parfum
Description:
refillable mugler alien hypersense eau de parfum

mugler alien hypersense eau de parfum is unapologetically vibrant.  a hyper-modern hypnotic fragrance for women that unleashes your inner alien.  hyper-feminine, hyper-sensual, hyper-edgy. an extraordinarily thrilling parfum revelling in the inner light and creative force in every woman.

this fragrance takes the captivating essence of the original alien fragrance and drives it into a new hyperbolic and hypnotic territory. a scent beyond just a perfume; an invitation to sense the extraordinary through 3 captivating and revealing notes.

alien hypersense opens with the hyper-vibrant temptation of arousing green mandarin superessence and the crisp ripeness of juicy pear.  the hypnotic floral jasmine sambac heart, harvested from mugler’s own field in india adds an exceptionally sensual, hypnotic femininity this this palatial and opulent scent.  while the radiant electricity of woody cashmere in the base reveals the salty, sexy, sun-kissed tinge of amber woods; their smooth, musky, silkiness developing a powerfully seductive and lasting trail.

the bottle

hypersense takes the iconic alien flacon and re-invents it in glorious technicolor ultraviolet, with luminous reflections in deep red and scarlet orange halo.  a hypnotic, multi-faceted talisman as edgy and desirable as the fragrance within. a supra-solar ray of light; a vibrant bottle glowing with the name of the fragrance in otherworldly gold.

fragrance family: floral wood

key notes:
top: green mandarin, pear
middle: jasmine sambac
base: cashmere


how to use:

for light intensity: spray in a cloud around your head and shoulders, let the fragrance fall gently around you.
for medium intensity: spray in a y-shape across your body, beginning at one shoulder and finishing at the other. if you are wearing jewellery it is a great alternative to spraying your neck.
for added intensity: apply perfume directly to your pulse points and / or hot spots (wrist, inner elbow and lower neck). here the heat of your body will allow the fragrance to reveal its full trail. include shoulders and back to intensify your perfume trail

Description: mugler alien hypersense, 1 pc, sets for women for women, when you want to make someone really happy, a luxury fragrance is always the right choice. and mugler alien hypersense perfume set for women in a gorgeous packaging will bring even more joy. trust the magic of a perfect matching set that will enchant any woman. characteristics: fragrance miniature is ideal to keep in your handbag set comes in a gorgeous eye-catching packaging amazing as a gift the set contains: mugler alien hypersense edp eau de parfum for women 60 ml mugler alien hypersense edp eau de parfum for women 10 ml

Title: The most wanted intense man eau de tiolette
Description:
azzaro the most wanted eau de toilette intense, the new fragrance for men, infinitely sensual, fresh and powerful, for perfect hold for 9 hours (tested and approved*).

 

for azzaro wanted, in every seducer there is a player. this new intense eau de toilette blows hot and cold and invites you to explore all your facets. a woody aromatic fougere with a bold trail that creates an unexpected alliance by pushing the limits of the classic fougère. green mediterranean bergamot combines with explosive lavender from provence and a woody moss liqueur accord.

 

olfactory family: aromatic fern

 

olfactory pyramid:

top notes: bergamot essence from calabria, italy**

heart notes: lavender from provence, france**

base notes: mousse liqueur accord

 

*perfume staying power evaluated by a panel of 65 men during a consumer test.

**raw materials from sustainable development practices, carefully selected with its partners.

Title: Burberry gold woman eau de parfum
Description:
the power within. burberry gold eau de parfum for women tells a story of self-discovery.
the new campaign follows emma mackey and a pride of lionesses. radiating confidence, strength and kindness, emma embodies the spirit of burberry gold.

this unique gourmand fragrance is made with a vegan formula led by a powerful trio of vanillas. on top, a vanilla infusion with woody tonalities; at the heart, a vanilla caviar with a rich sweetness; and at the base, a vanilla absolute enriched with luminous lavender.

an elegant design, burberry gold eau de parfum is housed in a square-shaped bottle. pale pink packaging adorned with an archive-inspired gold label references the brand’s rich heritage.

directions for use:
spray the burberry gold perfume generously onto pulse points such as the neck, wrists and décolletage to increase the longevity of this refined burberry scent.|gently press onto the skin to preserve the essence of the fragrance.

olfactory notes:
on top, a vanilla infusion with woody tonalities; at the heart, a vanilla caviar with a rich sweetness; and at the base, a vanilla absolute enriched with luminous lavender.

Title: Idole woman eau de tiolette
Description:
idôle eau de toilette is a perfume that combines the freshness and energy of green tea into a memorable trail, enclosed in an elegant and sleek bottle.

 

idôle eau de toilette is the perfect encounter between strong notes and a subtle, surprising freshness. this green tea perfume opens with a vibrant green tea accord , followed by a duo of roses, with green notes and rose damascena essence, combined with a fresh bergamot that adds juicy and fresh tones.

 

fragrance notes

green tea

a green tea accord captures energy into this scent, created through carefully crafted and blended tea of the harvest

 

blooming roses

discover the refreshing floral notes of rose damascena essence

 

fresh bergamot

bergamot adds a juicy freshness and a strong citrus heart to this fragrance

 

bottle

idôle eau de toilette stands strong in a sleek, thin bottle with golden metallic frames. idôle eau de toilette is now unscrewable, opening endless opportunities to customize it and give it a second life, as a true object of design.

 

how to apply

this unforgettable fresh and energizing green tea perfume is intensified by the warmth of your own body. apply on your neck and wrist, as well as in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

 

ingredients

1278533 08 • ingredients : alcohol • parfum / fragrance • aqua / water / eau • limonene • linalool • citronellol • benzyl salicylate • butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane • benzyl alcohol • hydroxycitronellal • geraniol • citral • coumarin • tris (tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) citrate • methyl 2-octynoate • eugenol • methyl anthranilate • ci 14700 / red 4 • ci 19140 / yellow 5 • (f.i.l. : n70032838/3)

Title: Rouge woman eau de parfum
Description:
unique, modern and captivating: karl lagerfeld rouge combines countless contrasting facets and cannot be pigeonholed! soft and austere, avant-garde and classic - the rouge fragrance is inspired by karl lagerfeld's creative duality. this is also reflected in the name: red was not only the fashion designer's favorite color, but also symbolizes a woman's willpower and self-confidence. the heart note opens with a bouquet of jasmine and orange blossom, enveloped by a hint of patchouli. followed by a sparkling and fruity trio of blackcurrant, pear and peach. cashmere wood and ambrox join creamy, beguiling vanilla and caramel in the base note, lending the composition a sweet warmth. the design of the bottle is also in no way inferior to the luxury fragrance: timeless lines in perfect, monolithic geometry are adorned by a transparent cap with a metal ring. elegant and modern, just like the karl lagerfeld rouge perfume itself.

 

top notes: blackcurrant, pear, peach

heart notes: jasmine, orange blossom, patchouli

base notes: ambroxan, cashmere wood, vanilla, caramel

presented in a distinctive bottle celebrating the legendary personality of karl lagerfeld, this bold eau de parfum explores the statement ingredient of the tonka bean with inspired combinations of sage, ginger, mandarin leaf, coconut wood and sandalwood to create an innovative, signature masculine scent.

 

details

Title: Wild leather collection eau de parfum
Description:
what it is

a vibrant woody and leathery unisex fragrance blending spicy sensuality and parisian edginess.

what it does

no one owns leather like yves saint laurent. on the eve of the swinging sixties, the couturier was the first to show a black leather jacket in a haute couture collection. wildly couture, wild leather takes on a new sophistication to this wardrobe essential. with this infamous, all-black “beatnik” collection of 1960, the young couturier shocked and rocked the world of fashion. ever since, saint laurent has gone wild for leather’s ambiguous, provocative tension between tough masculinity and feminine sensuality. and now, that sexy, untameable leather has a scent: wild leather. a fragrant tribute to the iconic saint laurent matter blending warm and arousing leather accord with a vibrant and mysterious guaiac wood. wildly couture, wild leather takes on a new sophistication to this wardrobe essential takes on a new sophistication to this wardrobe essential.

Title: Le sel d`issey man eau de tiolette
Description:
le sel d’issey by issey miyake is the new masculine eau de toilette with a powerful freshness. the fragrance of eternal movement, from the sea to the land, expressed by two olfactive polarities. a vibrant salt accord enhanced by intense woody notes.

vegan-certified, le sel d’issey is made with 95% natural origin ingredients and is refillable.

the bottle, designed by tokujin yoshioka, features a pure aesthetic, capturing the vitality of salt.

Title: Narciso rodriguez all of me woman eau de parfum intense
Description:
all of me by narciso rodriguez parfums is a multi-faceted fragrance created for a new generation of women, who confidently embrace all that makes them unique – their beauty, their grace and their power.

a celebration of individuality and self-expression, all of me eau de parfum reinvents floral fragrance by fusing precious rose centifolia with bold geranium bourbon, a note usually found in men's fragrances.

this distinctive duet of rose and geranium is combined with essence of white peony, powdery black iris and bewitching tuberose to form a faceted blend of florals that unfurls to a heart of delicate pure white muscs.

the heart of musc is reveinted with six different musc notes blend together to create an addictive, second-skin quality, each one bringing a distinct dimension to the scent and expressing a different facet of the wearer.

in the base of the fragrance, warm sandalwood and velvety amber notes create a rich, enveloping trail that lingers on the skin.

Title: Absolue the eye cream
Description:
product benefits

 

visibly youthful eyes

correct and now delay the appearance of fine lines, powered by absolue's new iconic and exclusive active, t12 biotech pearl, selected from 4 trillion potential actives by ai for its superior smoothing action.

 

a new golden era of visible eye wrinkle correction

 

- smoother and firmer eye contour overnight

 

- improve 6 eye parameters

 

- delay appearance of fine lines

 

 

what makes the difference

after 5 years of research, absolue makes a scientific breakthrough. leveraging artificial intelligence to isolate a unique molecular sequence, new, absolue exclusive t12 biotech pearl, coded to target visible wrinkle correction. shown to help boost skin's youthful appearance and increase skin's visible density.

 

 

what else you need to know

proven to improve 6 visible eye parameters*

+43% tonicity**

-26% undereye bags

-25% glabellar wrinkles

+22% firmness

-25% undereye wrinkles

-24% crow's feet

*clinical test, 41 women, 8 weeks. **instrumental test, 41 women.

Title: La vie est belle rose extraordinaire eau de parfum
Description:
product benefits

la vie est belle rose extraordinaire

la vie est belle rose extraordinaire is a reinterpretation of the rose, lancôme's iconic flower. the new floral eau de parfum is composed of a heart built around iris concrete and three different rose extracts: fresh rose water, sensual damascena absolue and space rose accord. its floral heart is enhanced by an enveloping signature with woody musk undertones.

 

- bright & modern

- feminine & floral

 

what makes it different

the iconic smile of la vie est belle is reinvented by the renowned artist catherine krunas, making way for a sculpted rose at the heart of the bottle. each petal pays tribute to all the facets of women. in the hands of three french master perfumers in pursuit of the perfect rose, la vie est belle rose extraordinaire emerges as a modern interpretation of the iconic flower of perfumery. 'la vie est belle rose extraordinaire is a modern interpretation of the rose, the iconic flower of perfumery,' as beautifully put by anne flippo, perfumer. it's a testament to the dedication and artistry of those who crafted this extraordinary fragrance.

 

what else you need to know

inspired by rose petals, the wings of la vie est belle rose extraordinaire transition from white to pink, accentuated with a touch of silver glitter.

 

ingredients:

 

fresh rose water - space rose accord - rose damascena absolue

a synergy of three different roses, united, to create the perfect one. each extract highlights a different facet of the rose, from vegetal freshness to sensual opulence.

iris concrete

the iconic signature of la vie est belle, the iris heightens la vie est belle rose extraordinaire with its rich, floral and noble powdery note.

woody musk

woody musk is a sophisticated and timeless fragrance note, known for its warm, earthy, and sensuous qualities. it lends depth and longevity to perfumes, creating an indulgent scent experience.

Title: Myslf man le parfum
Description:
keywords

bourbon scent, vanilla fragrance, intense cologne, spicy fragance

 

type

men's fragrance

 

benefits

long-lasting fragrance

 

what it is

myslf le parfum, the intense masculine fragrance by yves saint laurent. a long-lasting, woody-floral, & spicy vanilla bourbon fragrance born from the unexpected encounter of rich orange blossom, warm woods, spicy black pepper, and enhanced by velvety vanilla bourbon for a sensual & warm ambery trail. at first, a vibrant & spicy accord made of black pepper essence. at the heart, a radiant & rich orange blossom absolute heart from tunisia crafted for ysl beauty. at last, sensual & warm woods meet an addictive & velvety vanilla bourbon infusion. a statement of modern masculinity, a fragrance that seamlessly fuses with your skin to reveal a distinct signature for each individual. myslf, no matter what.

 

about the fragrance

a radicalized ysl silhouette in a bottle. a couture bold matte black bottle contrasted by a shiny lacquered black ysl cassandre embedded within the glass.

 

ysl beauty is committed to reducing its impact on the environment. the glass bottle contains recycled glass and boxes are fsc™ mix certified.

Title: Aspen man eau de cologne
Description: aspen for men by coty is a aromatic fougere fragrance for men. aspen for men was launched in 1989. top notes are green notes, bergamot, lemon and galbanum; middle notes are lavender, juniper, geranium, coriander, cyclamen, orange blossom and jasmine; base notes are balsam fir, cedar, oakmoss, musk and amber.

Title: Classic homme man eau de toilette
Description:
david beckham classic homme eau de toilette represents a modern view on a men’s fragrance. inspired by david's strong personal values and contemporary take on masculinity, this timeless scent is an aromatic blend of warm, smoky tones with fresh spicy notes. for modern men who are true to their beliefs.

the classic collection is a captivating reinterpretation of the power of classics; each scent has been carefully crafted with specially selected ingredients that have stood the test of time.

an aromatic blend of warm, smoky tones and fresh spicy notes, classic homme eau de toilette spray is a woody and gently spiced scent. the fragrance opens with the freshness of pink grapefruit and rosemary with a hint of fiery pepper. the heart sees a signature fusion of cashmere wood, leather, and black dahlia, creating a rich and manly appeal that’s enhanced by the base of mahogany wood, patchouli, and a sensual musk accord.

Title: Instinct man eau de parfum
Description:
discover the allure of david beckham's instinct, a fragrance that has captivated since its launch in 2005. designed for the modern man, this aromatic fougere scent is a perfect blend of elegance and boldness. with a 2.5 oz bottle, this eau de parfum spray is the ideal size for everyday use or special occasions.

instinct opens with refreshing top notes of bergamot and mandarin orange, instantly awakening your senses. the heart of the fragrance features a unique blend of star anise, pimento, and cardamom, creating a spicy yet sophisticated aroma. finally, the base notes of vetiver, patchouli, and white amber provide a lasting, earthy finish that exudes confidence and depth.

as a product of the renowned design house of david beckham, this celebrity-endorsed fragrance stands out in any collection. whether you're heading to a business meeting or a night out, david beckham instinct is your go-to scent for making a memorable impression.

Title: True instinct man eau de parfum
Description: david beckham true instinct eau de parfum is a captivating, long-lasting perfume for confident men who know who they are and own it. evoking a liberating sense of freedom, this seductive scent encourages men to stay true to themselves. the inspiring fragrance composition opens with a green, resinous note of pine needles, creating an immediate, fresh vibrancy, contrasting with the warm and sensuous heart built around masculine tones of cedarwood. finally, in the dry down, vetiver adds a seductive, earthy depth to the memorable signature of this david beckham perfume. with its clean lines, heavy black cap, and striking holographic label, the fragrance bottle exudes contemporary elegance.

Title: Jovan white musk man eau de cologne
Description:
unpredictable in spirit, pure in its essence. exquisite in its delicacy. alluring jasmine, ylang-ylang, and honeysuckle blend with sensual musk, soft words, and amber. the result is a warm and purely feminine fragrance.

fragrance family: fougere woody

top notes jasmine, ylang-ylang

heart notes honeysuckle

base notes musk and amber

Title: Jovan musk oil woman eau de parfum
Description: Jovan musk oil woman eau de parfum

Title: Nautica pure blue man eau de tiolette
Description:
nautica pure blue is a clean and refreshing scent for those who desire to reconnect with nature and the ocean. with an environmentally-conscious design and packaging, this long-lasting eau de toilette is structured around fougere and marine notes like the vibrant energy of blue eucalyptus and warm madagascar vanilla.

  • 1.6 fl. oz.
  • top notes: blue eucalyptus accord, lime, and orange.
  • base notes: madagascar vanilla, clean musk, and cedarwood.
  • imported.

Title: Nautica voyage man eau de tiolette
Description:
nautica voyage by nautica is a woody aquatic fragrance for men. nautica voyage was launched in 2006. the nose behind this fragrance is maurice roucel. top notes are green leaves and apple; middle notes are lotus and mimosa; base notes are musk, cedar, oakmoss and amber.

nautica voyage is a fresh and salty sea breeze,that carries romantic scents of coastal herbs and woods, and awakes the man's instinct to measure his power with wild nature. this is a fragrance for an active and romantic man who lives by his own rules. the face of the scent is tv host caster oosterhouse, a truly romantic person and a good nautician.

the composition opens with cold, green notes of leaves and apple. there is a tender dewy mimose in the heart, which is blended with watery note of lotus and an interesting accord of linen sail of a yacht. the composition is laid on a woody base, combined of cedar, moss, musk and amber. the nose behind the perfume is maurice roucel. the fragrance was launched in 2006.

Title: Nautica blue man eau de tiolette
Description: nautica blue by nautica is a aromatic aquatic fragrance for men. nautica blue was launched in 2005. the nose behind this fragrance is maurice roucel. top notes are pineapple, bergamot and peach; middle notes are water lily and jasmine; base notes are sandalwood, musk and cedar.

Title: Tommy girl forever woman eau de tiolette
Description: tommy girl forever eau de toilette pays homage to the iconic tommy girl fragrance and emphasizes the cool, american style represented by the brand. the composition opens with spicy bergamot and fresh, juicy pear. the heart develops a blooming bouquet of white jasmine and modern peony. creamy sandalwood and intense, musky amber delicately complete the scent.

Title: Tommy girl forever woman eau de tiolette
Description: tommy girl forever eau de toilette pays homage to the iconic tommy girl fragrance and emphasizes the cool, american style represented by the brand. the composition opens with spicy bergamot and fresh, juicy pear. the heart develops a blooming bouquet of white jasmine and modern peony. creamy sandalwood and intense, musky amber delicately complete the scent.

Title: Tommy forever man eau de tiolette
Description: tommy forever by tommy hilfiger is a aromatic fougere fragrance for men. this is a new fragrance. tommy forever was launched in 2024. top notes are lemon, ginger and black pepper; middle notes are lavender, sage and cinnamon; base notes are driftwood, musk and patchouli.

Title: Tommy forever man eau de tiolette
Description: tommy forever by tommy hilfiger is a aromatic fougere fragrance for men. this is a new fragrance. tommy forever was launched in 2024. top notes are lemon, ginger and black pepper; middle notes are lavender, sage and cinnamon; base notes are driftwood, musk and patchouli.

Title: I want choo woman le parfum
Description:
i want choo le parfum is a sumptuous and playful amber floral woody fragrance, offering a scent personality fit for any occasion with one unified desire; to capture the powerful and celebratory spirit at the heart of jimmy choo’s dna. the scent journey begins with vibrant, lifting top notes of pear, golden gardenia and blackberry followed with a creamy, warm heart with notes of jasmine, patchouli and ambrette, and is rounded off with base notes of moss amber, sandalwood and praline accord for an evocative blend of fragrance excellence.  

 

top notes: pear, golden gardenia, blackberry

middle notes: jasmine, patchouli, ambrette

base notes: moss amber, sandalwood, praline accord

 

ingredients

alcohol denat. (sd alcohol 40-b) - parfum (fragrance) – aqua (water) – benzyl salicylate - butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane – linalool – citronellol – limonene - benzyl alcohol - alpha-isomethyl ionone – citral – farnesol - geraniol

Title: Libre flowers & flames woman eau de parfum florale
Description:
product details

key notes:
coco-palm tree flower accord, lily flower accord, orange blossom, diva lavender heart

fragrance family:
floral

about the fragrance:
a warm and sensual sun-kissed interpretation of the iconic warm floral libre scent. at the heart of this fragrance blooms a sun-kissed and creamy coco-palm tree flower melted with a spicy and solar lily flower. beneath this blazing floral blast, rich vanilla adds warmth and an unforgettable long-lasting effect. this women's perfume represents an endless bloom of freedom.

the sexy perfume bottle sets fire to the classic codes of florality. lit up by a golden sand color, this floral gem reflects the radiance and warmth of its olfactory notes. an elegant hue to keep in your wardrobe.

how to use it:
- fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.
- after applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. that breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly.
- if you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, because that tends to rinse off the scent.
- replace fragrance after 12 months. expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Title: Perfumers choice no.9 victor man boy spray
Description:
no.9 victor by milton lloyd is a citrus fragrance for men.

top notes: fruity notes and citruses

middle notes: woody notes and floral notes

base notes: oakmoss, musk and vanilla.

Title: Perfumers choice no.4 phoenix woman body spray
Description:
elegant, oriental and exotic. no.4 by phoenix is an invigorating rich fragrance for women.

top notes: white peach & jasmine

middle notes: floral & saffron

base notes: cedarwood, musk & balsamic resins

Title: Artliner
Description:
create a winged eye look or intense lines with lancôme’s liquid eyeliner, artliner.

with a soft foam tip, artliner helps you apply eyeliner with precision. the combination of our formula of rich colour pigments and clever technology makes every eye look last.

how to apply artliner
• shake gently prior to use. 
• dab onto the base of the upper eyelashes. 
• apply gently for a fine line. 
• apply extra pressure for thicker line.

benefits

• precise & easy application
• defines eyes
• long lasting

what make the difference

its soft foam tip

ingredients

aqua / water / eau • propylene glycol • acrylates copolymer • polyester-5 • alcohol denat. • trilaureth-4 phosphate • tin oxide • calcium sodium borosilicate silica • xanthan gum • synthetic fluorphlogopite • imidazolidinyl urea • methylparaben • sodium dehydroacetate • propylparaben • [+/- may contain ci 429 / blue 1 lake • ci 7547 / carmine • ci 777 / ultramarines • ci 77163 / bismuth oxychloride • ci 77288 / chromium oxide greens • ci 774 / bronze powder • ci 77491 • ci 77492 • ci 77499 / iron oxides • ci 7751 / ferric ferrocyanide • ci 77891 / titanium dioxide • mica]

Title: Le crayon khol
Description:
easily define and contour your eyes with crayon khôl eyeliner.

create a sophisticated, razor sharp look, or build a sultry, dramatic smoky eye to make an intense, bold statement.

the creamy, ultra-blendable eyeliner pencil delivers high definition colour and precise application in one swipe.

choose from a range of colours to complement your unique look.

how to apply crayon khôl
• enhance a smoky eye look by gently pulling down the lower lid and gliding the pencil along the inner part of the eyelid. 
• define the upper lash-line staying as close to the roots of the lashes as possible. 
• extend the line just past the outer corner of the eye to elongate the eye contour.

pro tip
if you are finding it tricky to create a seamless line, dot the pencil along the lash line and blend together with a brush.

benefits

• precise application 
• creamy & blendable
• sultry & dramatic eye looks
• natural & sophisticated makeup
• high definition, contours eyes

what make the difference

its creamy, ultra-blendable eyeliner pencil

ingredients

c1-18 triglycerides • behenyl alcohol • talc • isopropyl myristate • stearalkonium hectorite • silica • propylene carbonate • tocopherol • ascorbyl palmitate • [+/- may contain ci 7547 / carmine • ci 77 / aluminum powder • ci 777 / ultramarines • ci 77163 / bismuth oxychloride • ci 77491 • ci 77492 • ci 77499 / iron oxides • ci 7751 / ferric ferrocyanide • ci 77742 / manganese violet • ci 77891 / titanium dioxide • mica]
