Title: Monsieur big brow
Description:
meet monsieur big brow : full looking brows in a flash!
this double-ended brow multi-tasker combines a coned tip crayon with a built-in blending brush. its creamy texture glides on smoothly and stays put all day, no matter what happens.
the soft brush is ideal to seamlessly blend color for intense yet natural-looking brows. 

no faux-pas guaranteed in 2 steps: 
1- fill in your brows using the crayon tip, with soft, short strokes.
2 - blend the formula with the brush

benefits

• 2-in-1 brow crayon and blending brush
• creamy & blendable formula
• up to 24 hour wear
• instant brow filling effect

technology

film-forming waxes for comfort and an easy-gliding application.

polymers to texturize brows.

powder-pigments dispersing-agent for intense, instant effect on brows.

no-water formula for a soft and longwear finish.

what make the difference

it's 2-in-1!
the cone-tipped crayon instanly fills in brows while the built-in brush effortlessly blends the formula for a natural finish.
result: big brows, all day…and all night long !

Title: Belle de teint
Description:
because a healthy glow always starts with healthy skin, and because a beautiful and smooth skin reflects the light better, lancôme unveils belle de teint – lancôme's first healthy skin powder that instantly blurs all imperfections with natural coverage, both adding colour to the complexion and improving skin texture.

the incredible results of belle de teint
1. radiance: radiant and luminous complexion, dazzling
2. anti-fatigue: tiredness is stamped out, skin is refreshed, relaxed lines
3. healthy look: weightless healthy glow makeup result
4. evenness: perfectly flawless skin, zero redness
5. smoothing: smooth and velvety skin, visibly reduced pores (blurring technology)
6. protection: skin protected against daily external aggressions

belle de teint ultra fine powder comes in 8 “pastel tan” shades that reveal natural light for every skin tone.

smart tips: 
• the warm shades help create healthy skin that feels bare to the touch.
• the cool shade 01 is ideal for neutralising warm skin tones and mattifying after applying foundation.

benefits

• radiant and luminous complexion, dazzling
• refreshed skin
• relaxed lines
• weightless healthy glow makeup result
• perfectly flawless skin, zero redness
• smooth and velvety skin, visibly reduced pores (blurring technology)

technology

• rose petal powder, the secret of this new powder, has a very powerful radiance booster effect.
• caffeine energy boosting ingredient.
• apricot-tomato duo oils help the skin protect itself against environmental aggressions.

what make the difference

its exclusive fine powder full of active ingredients

Title: Blush subtil long lasting powder blusher
Description:
ultra fine and long lasting, blush subtil is available in a wide range of colours, from neutral to intense tones.

how to apply blush subtil
inspired by tips & techniques from some of the most famous makeup artists, lancôme shows you three simple and expert ways to enhance and brighten the look of your complexion using blush subtil:

• how to brighten cheeks?
apply blush subtil to the apples of the cheeks, lightly sweeping towards the temples. tip: smile to find the apples of your cheeks. 

• how to highlight cheekbones?
apply blush subtil to the upper cheekbones and around the outer corner of the eye to the brow bones. tip: blend a lighter shade of blush in this area to create a more defined look.

• how to sculpt cheekbones?
sweep blush subtil from the top corner of the ear direclty under the cheekbones, parallel to the jawline. tip: purse your lips to find the natural contour area beneath the cheekbone.

benefits

• natural-looking and long-lasting color
• suitable for all skin types

technology

• a silky-soft, micro-bubble formula glides on easily and evenly
• moisture-balancing and oil-absorbing properties from mica keep skin comfortable and color true

ingredients

ptfe • dimethicone • nylon-12 • zinc stearate • boron nitride • tin oxide • calcium aluminum borosilicate • calcium stearate • dimethiconol • triisocetyl citrate • silica • trimethylsiloxysilicate • alumina • isopropyl titanium triisostearate • acrylates copolymer • cetyl dimethicone • isobutylparaben • methylparaben • phenoxyethanol • propylparaben • ethylparaben • butylparaben • parfum / fragrance • linalool • geraniol • alpha-isomethyl ionone • coumarin • limonene • citronellol • benzyl alcohol • [+/- may contain ci 1585 / red 7 • ci 1585 / red 7 lake • ci 1635 / red 4 lake • ci 1914 / yellow 5 lake • ci 429 / blue 1 lake • ci 7336 / red 3 • ci 7547 / carmine • ci 777 / ultramarines • ci 7712 / barium sulfate • ci 77163 / bismuth oxychloride • ci 77491 • ci 77492 • ci 77499 / iron oxides • ci 7751 / ferric ferrocyanide • ci 77742 / manganese violet • ci 77891 / titanium dioxide • ci 77947 / zinc oxide • mica]

Title: Miracle cushion all-in-one & refill
Description:
effortless perfection in seconds anytime, anywhere.

lancôme creates an innovative formula for beauty makeup look, an all-in-one liquid foundation that comes with the fresh touch puff, an advanced face applicator that delivers cooling & moist sensation, as well as easy blend on skin.

the miracle cushion compact enables a perfect control of the amount of formula pick-up.

how to apply miracle cushion
• apply by pressing the foundation sponge into the moistened liquid cushion and patting onto the face.

• for more coverage, press firmly into the cushion to get more product. use gentle taps on the cushion to add formula to the surface of the pad. tap the pad from the centre of the forehead to the exterior of the face.

• repeat everywhere as needed, using the tapping method from the centre of the face outwards.

benefits

• buildable foundation coverage light to medium
• perfect skin
• freshness & luminosity
• dewy glow effect

what make the difference

its advanced, tap-tap applicator

Title: Teint idole ultra cushion
Description:
reveal instantly flawless-looking skin with teint idole ultra high-coverage compact liquid foundation cushion. the exclusive polar cushion technology allows for precise application and longer hold. 
there’s no need to retouch your makeup — seal in long-lasting skin perfection with a luminous, vibrant glow, and recharge it when empty. touch to make a lasting impression.

benefits

long-lasting foundation - full-coverage makeup - flawless & quick application - portable & refillable compact liquid foundation - fresh & comfortable

technology

thanks to teint idole ultra’s exclusive polar cushion technology, lancôme introduces its first long-lasting, full-coverage compact and refillable liquid foundation cushion. the lightweight and refreshing makeup instantly hydrates and brightens skin for a flawless and velvety complexion. the velvet puff applicator provides even, precise, and buffered dosage for high coverage and longer hold.

Title: All hours concealer
Description:
description & benefits

ysl all hours concealer has you covered for endless nights: full coverage in a blendable, liquid texture. the richly pigmented formula hides dark circles, working as an under-eye concealer, and to help camouflage imperfections with no compromise on comfort.

a lightweight, creamy full coverage concealer with a velvet, matte finish that is transfer-resistant, sweat-resistant and is not cakey. suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. dermatologically tested. non-comedogenic.

apply with the pointed end of the all hours blender, deisgned for concealer application in hard to reach areas. for a full, matte finish, use with all hours liquid foundation.

application

ysl flawless matte complexion routine:

1. apply a thin layer of all hours primer using fingertips, a mattifying primer to increase foundation wear & hold.
2. apply all hours foundation using all hours blender for full coverage with a flawless, polished finish.
3. conceal dark circles & imperfections with all hours concealer, a creamy full coverage concealer with 16 hour long-wear.
4. finish with all hours compact, a velvet balm-to-powder texture for a flawless, matte complexion night & day.
pro tip: apply a thin layer of all hours compact in between each of these steps for an ultra-matte finish.

pro finishers:

touche eclat glow shot
three shades of strobing cream for a dewy, highlighted finish, apply on the parts of the face that would naturally catch sunlight.

couture contouring palette
swipe and blend the taupe, matte powder underneath cheek bones to create a natural-looking contour & sweep the highlighter over cheekbones to accentuate facial features.

rouge pur couture the mats
a seductive, matte lip is the perfect complement to a flawless, matte complexion, select your perfect shade of rouge pur couture the mats.

Title: Touche eclat all-over brightening pen
Description:
description & benefits

8 hours of beauty sleep in a click!

expertly developed by ysl beauté, touche éclat illuminating pen helps to disguise dark circles whilst highlighting your best features without shimmer or glitter, giving a natural, luminous finish. 

our light-reflecting pigment helps hide the appearance of wrinkles around the eye area and makes your face appear more vibrant and healthy – consider it your secret weapon to conquer the art of complexion. 

this must-have pen used by ysl makeup artists worldwide is the one beauty essential that no woman should be without. 

buildable sheer to medium coverage, designed for many skin colours and skin tones.

application

apply on bare skin or over the touche éclat foundation, then blend with the fingertips or a brush for instant radiance and a fresh, glowing makeup look. when using your touche éclat pen for the first time, you will need to click the pen up to 20 times to allow product to come through. 

expert makeup artist tips 
• ‘wake me up’ effect: blend the touche éclat pen under your eyes to cover dark circles and help give the appearance of a great night’s sleep. blend along the brow bones to highlight and define the brows, and give a bright-eyed appearance. 
• highlight and contour: sweep a light shade of touche éclat along the top of the cheek bones to highlight. use a darker shade below the cheek bones to contour cheeks and add definition to your face. 
• get the glow: sweep a light shade of touche éclat along the bridge of your nose, in a small triangle on your forehead, and across your upper cheekbones to give a radiant glow. 
• lip styler: add a dab of touche éclat in the cupid’s bow of your lips. 
• eyeshadow base: blend touche éclat across the eyelid to even out skin tone, great to use as a primer for any eyeshadow. 
• define eyebrows: apply a light shade of touche éclat onto the outside half of the top of the brow and blend in with fingers to illuminate and define. 
• top up on the go: ideal for touching up for a long-lasting flawless look, erasing traces of mascara flakes, eyeshadow fallout, or smudged lipstick.

ingredients

aqua (water) . cyclomethicone . glycerin . talc . paraffinum liquidum (mineral oil) . peg/ ppg-18/18 dimethicone . magnesium sulfate . trideceth-3 . methicone . methylparaben . squalane . [+/- may contain : ci 77891 (titanium dioxide) . ci 77019 (mica) . ci 77492 (iron oxide) . ci 77491 (iron oxide) . ci 77499 (iron oxide) . ci 77007 (ultramarines) . ci 77510 (ferric ferrocyanide) . ci 77742 (manganese violet) . ci 75470 (carmine) . “nf8897” .

Description:
description & benefits

dessin du regard stylo waterproof eyeliner
precise long wear twist-up eyeliner with built-in sharpener
4 rich, intense shades. 8h - hold.

benefits:
ultra precise, the soft and creamy formula makes for an addictive, super glide sensation.

format: stick
texture: cream
waterproof, oil-free

application

no budge, no smudge, dessin du regard waterproof stylo dynamically dresses the eyes in either a super thin or dramatic bold signature that stays the distance for 8 hours.

ingredients

cyclopentasiloxane â— hydrogenated olive oil stearyl esters â— polyethylene â— polybutene â— silica silylate â— candelilla cera / candelilla wax â— cera microcristallina / microcrystalline wax â— octyldodecanol â— theobroma grandiflorum seed butter â— sodium ascorbyl phosphate â— pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate â— echium plantagineum seed oil â— tocopheryl nicotinate â— aqua / water â— helianthus annuus seed oil unsaponifiables / sunflower seed oil unsaponifiables â— zinc gluconate â— magnesium aspartate â— sodium hyaluronate â— cardiospermum halicacabum flower/leaf/vine extract â— copper gluconate â— tocopherol â— ascorbyl palmitate â— lecithin â— [+/- may contain ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 / iron oxides â— ci 77007 / ultramarines â— ci 77891 / titanium dioxide â— mica â— ci 77163 / bismuth oxychloride â— ci 77742 / manganese violet â— ci 77510 / ferric ferrocyanide â— ci 77266 / black 2 â—]

Title: Double serum
Description:
the only dual-phase hydric and lipidic anti-ageing treatment* rich in [20+1] plant extracts. it stimulates the five vital functions of the skin, and, for the first time, has decoded the language of youthfulness. its unique universal and bio-inspired dual formula combines 20 of the most powerful anti-ageing plant extracts with turmeric extract, which is concentrated in turmerone to effectively and visibly treat the signs of ageing.
firms skin, visibly smoothes wrinkles
restores complexion radiance and evenness
diminishes appearance of pores

how to apply:

rotate the dial to select the appropriate dose for your skin. press down. mix the two phases in your hand. apply to the face and neck in the morning and/or at night before applying your regular day/night cream.

Title: Hydra essentiel bi-phase serum - normal to dry skin
Description:
refreshing lightweight serum for thirsty skin that feels tight, lacks radiance and is prematurely lined. shields skin from the dehydrating effects of daily thermic shocks that can leave it looking dry and weathered: sudden temperature changes, indoor and outdoor pollutants and environmental stress. quenches skin with organic leaf of life extract—a succulent plant that enhances the skin’s ability to retain precious moisture—leaving it plump, radiant and perfectly hydrated.
pair bi-phase serum with your hydra-essentiel moisturizer to experience the ultimate super-quenching duo.

Title: Hydra essentiel bi-phase serum - normal to dry skin
Description:
refreshing lightweight serum for thirsty skin that feels tight, lacks radiance and is prematurely lined. shields skin from the dehydrating effects of daily thermic shocks that can leave it looking dry and weathered: sudden temperature changes, indoor and outdoor pollutants and environmental stress. quenches skin with organic leaf of life extract—a succulent plant that enhances the skin’s ability to retain precious moisture—leaving it plump, radiant and perfectly hydrated.
pair bi-phase serum with your hydra-essentiel moisturizer to experience the ultimate super-quenching duo.

Title: Supra volume mascara
Description:
the care and make-up mascara that intensifies and enhances eyelashes, immediately and every day.
the volume is immediate and the colour intense thanks to the cassia flower wax. with regular application, the volume of eyelashes increases due to the "volume boost" complex: +17.6%* after 4 weeks of use.

* clinical study: evaluation of the treatment effect on bare lashes – 30 women – 4 weeks

how to apply

apply the mascara from the root to the end of the lashes.

ingredients

• cassia flower wax: intense volume that is immediately visible and long-lasting
• panthenol: helps strengthen the lashes

Title: Wonder perfection
Description:
this multi-dimensional 3-in-1 mascara coats lashes from roots to tip, delivering maximum length, curl and volume! lashes look incredibly glamorous with intense colour and long-lasting hold. thanks to the wonder-perfect complex, you will experience visibly fuller, longer, curled and intensely colored lashes after just one application.

how to apply

apply from lash base to tip by brushing upwards in a gentle zigzag movement to increase volume, curl and colour intensity. extra tip: don?t ?pump? mascara tube. it lets in air and dries out mascara quickly.

Description: lasts 300 kisses!* finally, lip color that won’t kiss off. discover 4 sheer-to-stay shades that are moisturizing, stray-proof, smooch-proof, and fade-proof. formulated with all the benefits of a lip treatment, water lip stain leaves lips soft, hydrated and incredibly comfortable. you customize the result—from a just-kissed look to high voltage color. the more coats, the deeper the color intensity. kiss-kiss, hooray!

Title: Radiance-plus golden glow booster
Description:
add customised radiance and a healthy glow to your daily skin care routine with clarins new radiance-plus golden glow booster.

simply mix the self tanner with any clarins face care product to add an extra self-tanning benefit to all of the hydrating, anti-ageing and firming actions of your usual day and night creams.

benefits:

radiant sun-kissed glow that is incredibly natural-looking and adjustable.

can be tailored to your desired level of self-tan by adding 1, 2 or 3 drops.

a sublime self-tanning effect

Title: Clarinsmen fresh moisture toner
Description: this can be used as the main step in your routine after cleaning and shaving. this toner will make your skin soft and prepare for it's daily cleaning. this toner targets combination and oily skin.

Title: Clarinsmen line-control eye balm
Description:
this is a real shock treatment specifically for the treatment and prevention of wrinkles around the eyes, to avoid the much hated hen's paw!
this revitalizing balm tightens the skin, visibly tightens wrinkles, tightens the skin and eliminates the unsightly swelling.
to be applied every morning and evening, with an opaque effect and absolutely not fat.
it should be applied with fingertips, gently tapping, from the inside out of the eye, it is very easy to use!

Title: Sparkle shadow
Description:
a sparkling powder eyeshadow that glides on like a dream, with a sensorial formula that soothes, nourishes and protects the delicate skin on eyelids—while delivering an intense and immediate color payoff. 

bold, stay-put metallic color pigments smooth on with fingertips—without flaking onto cheeks.

available in 3 lustrous shades.

Title: Waterproof eye pencil
Description:
a waterproof, extreme-wear gel eye pencil that lines and defines in 6 high-intensity hues that stay vivid and transfer-proof for 8 full hours.*

infused with skin-loving pure plant extracts—the rich pigments and soft texture glide on effortlessly delivering a fluid line and an immediate, intense color payoff. 

the pencil’s sleek design assures precision control. it includes a fine retractable tip for structured lining, a built-in sharpener, and a smudger for creating smoky eye looks.

benefits

  • rich color pigments deliver an intense color payoff

  • transfer-proof for 8 hours

  • fine retractable pencil, built-in sharpener, and smudging tip for smoky eye looks

  • sleek design for precision control

Title: Instant lip perfecting base
Description:
a new innovative lip base which instantly smoothes lips and sets lipstick to ensure long-lasting make-up hold for a perfect finish. a moisturising transparent primer for your lips. both a treatment and make-up, this transparent base enriched with acacia micro-pearls and vegetable waxes serves as a primer for lipstick, while smoothing and nourishing the lips. with an extra sweet fragrance carrying vanilla notes.

benefits

  • sets lipstick
  • nourishes and smooths
  • hydrates and protects

Title: Lip liner pencil
Description:
clarins takes lip-lining to a new level of luxury and expertise with 3 nude lipliner pencils for every skin tone and lipstick shade.
jojoba oil-enriched formula glides on flawlessly—defining lip contours with a barely-there effect. promotes longer-wearing lipstick, while holding the line on “bleeding”. non-drying formula leaves lips soft and comfortable. dermatologist-tested.

how to apply

promotes long-lasting lipstick hold. diy and see! just line your lip contours; then fingertip-smudge over lips and top with your favorite lipstick.

Title: Touche eclat high cover radiant concealer
Description:
description & benefits
touche éclat high cover is a radiant high coverage concealer to immediately conceal dark circles and uneven skintone. for the first time, the iconic radiance of touche éclat illuminating pen is available in a high coverage concealer.

• inspired by the original face illuminator by ysl
• high coverage
• natural luminous finish
• longwear radiance
• formula contains calendula extract & vitamin e, plus caffeine

eyes: use around the eye area to help conceal dark circles due to lack of skintone uniformity
imperfections: use on dark spots or scars to help cover imperfections
nose: use around the nose to help cover redness

this product is not the original touche éclat illuminating pen. shop the original touche éclat illuminating pen to bring light and volume to the face. this is a radiant, high coverage concealer for traditional concealer usage to cover dark circles or imperfections.

Title: My clarins re-move purifying cleansing gel
Description:
this purifying cleansing gel for young skin effectively eliminates impurities and excess sebum that cause blemishes. it leaves the skin clearer, purified and rebalanced. the skin is more radiant and feels smoother.
formulated with meadowsweet extract (organic plant) with purifying properties, moringa extract to cleanse the skin's surface and eliminate traces of pollution, and organic orange blossom flower water to soften the skin. rebalanced, the skin can breathe again. purer and clearer. its completely frosted blue formula respects all skin types, even the most fragile.

skin type: combination, oily
texture: gel
use: every day, morning and night.

benefits
purified skin
softened skin

results
+33%*
women said their skin was 33% purer.

women said their skin was 38% more radiant*
*self-assessment, 112 women, 14 days

ingredients
aqua/water/eau. glycerin. sodium lauryl glucose carboxylate. sodium cocoyl amino acids. lauryl glucoside. decyl glucoside. acrylates/c10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer. cocamidopropyl betaine. citrus aurantium amara (bitter orange) flower water. butylene glycol. hexylene glycol. parfum/fragrance. citric acid. sodium benzoate. disodium edta. sorbic acid. synthetic fluorphlogopite. tetrasodium glutamate diacetate. ci 77891/titanium dioxide. maltodextrin. moringa oleifera seed extract. spiraea ulmaria extract. potassium sorbate. tin oxide. ci 42090/blue 1. [v3150b]
*for informational purposes only. every ingredient list is specific to an individual product reference. all formulas are subject to change. while we endeavor to keep this ingredient list accurate, we cannot guaranty that it is reliable, up-to-date, or error-free. please also refer to the ingredient list on the product's outer packaging for a complete, accurate, and up-to-date list.

Title: My clarins re-charge relaxing sleep mask
Description:
a relaxing herbal infusion that works as a night cream or overnight mask to quench, plump and recharge skin’s batteries while you sleep, so it looks radiant and refreshed by morning. cream-gel formula, delicately fragranced with notes of jasmine, refuels skin with a rebalancing blend of huang qi, fig and acerola seed extracts—plus detoxifying flower waters—for a healthy-looking, rosy glow.

my clarins exclusive healthy in & out complex is comprised of organic coconut water to put nutrients into the skin and alpenrose extract to flush out toxins and pollutants.

your vegan friendly recipe - free of phthalates, parabens, and sulfates - for healthy, radiant, balanced skin by morning. my clarins is free of all animal-derived ingredients and was not tested on animals.

benefits:

  • hydrates, smoothes and plumps
  • promotes a healthy-looking, rosy glow by morning
  • gently removes pollutants and toxins
  • 2-in-1 use
  • plant-based anti-pollution complex
  • healthy in & out complex
  • dermatologist tested

how to use:

2-in-1 use:

  • apply each night to clean, dry skin on face and neck.
  • apply a second layer of product to use 1-3 times a week as a relaxing sleep mask. no need to rinse.

Title: V shaping facial lift
Description:
the pioneering serum that helps redefine the shape of your face.

benefits

  • slims and sculpts the shape and profile of the face.

  • reduces the appearance of puffiness and double chin.

  • lifts and firms the shape of the face, sculpts the features, redefines the v-shape.

  • hydrates and leaves the skin feeling comfortable.

Title: Sun care body cream uva/uvb 30
Description:
high sun protection for all types of skin in all conditions for any destination and activity.

benefits

  • protects the skin from damage caused by the sun and free radicals for a gorgeous tan.

  • hydrates.

  • absorbs quickly without white streaks.

  • smooth melting texture. dry velvety soft finish.

Title: Clarinsmen super moisture gel
Description: a super-moisturizing non-sticky gel that intensely hydrates and strengthens men's skin. this product is ideal for soothing the burning sensation due to shaving. it gives the face freshness and further hydration. this gel also has a protective action against possible external aggression. it has an ultra light gel texture and is suitable for all skin types.

Title: Clarinsmen super moisture gel
Description: a super-moisturizing non-sticky gel that intensely hydrates and strengthens men's skin. this product is ideal for soothing the burning sensation due to shaving. it gives the face freshness and further hydration. this gel also has a protective action against possible external aggression. it has an ultra light gel texture and is suitable for all skin types.

Title: Clarinsmen super moisture lotion spf20
Description: super hydrating light and fresh fluid that leaves no trace and intensely hydrates and strengthens men's skin. this product is ideal for soothing the burning sensation due to shaving and to soothe dry skin, provide comfort and relieve any tension and roughness. this gel also has a protective action against possible external aggression. it has a light texture and is easily absorbed.

Title: White plus pure translucency
Description:
• a highly concentrated roll-on spot treatment gel.

  • powered by plant-based anti-pollution complex.

  • perfectly targets localized & visible dark spots.

  • relieves dryness redness & discomfort while nourishing skin.

  • small precise & easy-to-use design ideal for retouches at any moment of the day.

  • unveils a clearer more radiant & translucent complexion.

  • perfect for all skin types.

  • dermatologist tested.

Description:
clarins mineral sun care compact uva/uvb 30

enriched with antioxidants

skin type all skin types

use apply 15 minutes before sun exposure. reapply often on sensitive areas.

water and sweat resistant

the antioxidant high-protection tinted liquid suitable for all types of skin, even the most sensitive. it has a portable case and washable sponge for applying anywhere you go.

velvety soft to the touch.

Title: Extra-firming phyto-serum
Description: fito serum tonicity, lifting effect. a double lifting effect for more toned skin and refined skin grains. thanks to its gelled active texture it gives the skin a tensor effect that gently lifts the facial features and tones them. the kangaroo flower extract helps to improve the plumped appearance of the skin and counteracts its relaxation.

Title: Sun care body gel-in-oil uva/uvb 30
Description:
the high-protection body sun care oil for all types of skin in all conditions for any destination and activity.

benefits

  • its unique silky gel texture applies evenly, even on wet skin.

  • protects the skin from damage caused by the sun for a gorgeous tan.

  • hydrates.

  • non-greasy satiny finish. no white streaks.

Title: Fresh scrub
Description:
the cream exfoliant that thirsty skin cannot live without...fresh scrub gives your skin a blast of freshness and radiance as it removes impurities and dead skin cells. it contains two sizes of natural cellulose beads derived from wood. the larger ones exfoliate as the smaller ones polish the surface.

how to 

thoroughly cleanse your face, then moisten. warm up a dollop of scrub between your hands. without rubbing or applying pressure, gently massage in avoiding the eye area. rinse with water.

Title: Joli blush
Description:
with ultra-pigmented color and a ph reactant, joli blush will be your go-to for a customized pop of color. from subtle to intense, matte to shimmering. this blush is featherlight and smooth, with each application.

clarins' first powder blush enriched with powerful ingredients like hazelnut oil and clarins' exclusive anti-pollution complex, cheeks are comforted, hydrated, and protected throughout the day!

how to use

wear alone or over foundation for a natural flush. apply to the apples of your cheeks using your fingers or clarins' blush brush.

Title: Sequin crush mono eyeshadow
Description: create a dazzling eye look with the yves saint laurent sequin crush mono glitter shot eyeshadow. the couture mono eyeshadow features brilliant colour pigments, embellished with 3d effect glitter that sparkles like stars against a night sky. the ultra-reflective formula is infused with a high concentration of shimmer and mother-of-pearl effect particles for the ultimate wet-look shine. the intensity of the eyeshadow can be built up to take your look from day to night. sequin crush is designed by tom pécheux, ysl international makeup director, to give your eyes the same mesmerising qualities as an opulent couture gown.

Title: Couture blush
Description:
the 1st weightless blendable blush by ysl: buildable color with a seamless long-lasting finish. available in 10 shades, from satin to shimmer.

due to the innovative ysl powder technology, the ultra-fine smooth yet concentrated texture is extremely lightweight, delivering a high color impact without over-applying.

radiant stay-true colors, never dull.

benefits

long-wear color
buildable make-up result
comfortable finish
weight texture
mistake-proof application

Title: Double serum collection
Description:
set includes:

  • 1 x 50ml double serum [hydric + lipidic system]

  • 1 x 15ml beauty flash balm 

  • 1 x 1.4ml lip comfort oil 

  • 1 x 0.9 double serum eye

double serum targets the visible signs of ageing thanks to its double formula enriched with 21 anti-ageing plant extracts, while double serum eye targets the eye area. beauty flash balm is formulated with 96% naturally-sourced ingredients for a powerful radiance-boosting cocktail. acerola seed extract helps energise the skin for a radiant, glowing complexion and prickly pear extract helps activate cell renewal to restore the skin's radiance. it is also enriched with organic oat sugars with toning action, which help to immediately tighten and smooth facial features: they are rested and smoother. signs of fatigue and wrinkles are diminished. use by itself as a day treatment over your regular day cream, mixed in with your clarins liquid foundation, or as a mask. lip comfort oil is a great base for colour: it doesn’t compromise on shine, nourishment and comfort.

Title: Maxi blush
Description: lightweight powder blush gives cheeks a burst of colour and a healthy looking glow.

Title: Rose sorbet cryo-mask
Description:
perfect your skin canvas with a fresh touch in 5 minutes. this cryo-mask, formulated with salicylic acid, rose water and sunflower seed oil, helps visibly reduce the appearance of pores, smooth skin texture and illuminate skin tone for an instantly glowing skin. with an irresistible cooling sorbet texture, this rose face mask refreshes skin to revitalize the appearance of tired, dull skin.

application:
how to apply this face mask: apply the face mask by gently patting a generous layer on clean face. do not rub in or massage. rinse off with lukewarm water after 5 minutes. use the face mask 2 times a week.

the custom exfoliating powder that gently removes impurities, helping to dislodge blackheads and reveal smooth, clean, radiant skin.

contains moringa extract that detoxifies the skin's surface and eliminates traces of pollution, enhancing  the removal of pollution particles.
its gentle lightweight texture blends with water or the my clarins re-move purifying cleansing gel to create a personalised scrub.

skins texture is refined and smoothed for a complexion that is fresh and luminous.

Title: My clarins clear-out blackhead expert stick + mask
Description:
this duo uses two complementary actions to draw out blackheads and leave your skin more beautiful, even close up.

the stick exfoliates the t-zone to drive away blackheads and the purifying mask detoxifies the skin to reduce visible pores and blackheads, and eliminate shine.

this plant powered treatment contains mattifying green clay and detoxifying moringa extract which both help to cleanse skin and target blackheads. meadowsweet and bamboo work to purify skin, strawberry tree fruit reduces shine and pores, and tamarind pulp acids refi ne skin texture.

benefits:

  • purifies and mattifies the skin
  • tightens pores and improves the skin's texture
  • visibly absorbs excess sebum
  • eco-conscious packaging
  • vegan-friendly - clear skin, clear conscience

Title: Bright plus serum
Description: a powerful, advanced brightening serum helps visibly revive skin dullness and targets all types of dark spots caused by pollution, harmful uv rays, and blemishes. the innovative formula blended with potent fruit extracts - new rose-myrtle and acerola cherry seed, rich in vitamin c - visibly brightens, boosts radiance, and helps reveal even-toned skin.

Title: Ready in a flash eyes & brows palette
Description: color palette of eye shadows and eyebrows, which will allow you to create different looks for special moments, 3 steps that illuminate the look, open the look and outline the eyebrows, 2 matte tones, 2 satin tones and 2 special eyebrow tones.

Title: Plant gold
Description: clarins drew inspiration from pro techniques used by its salon estheticians and innovated with a twin-bottled formula specially developed for plant gold. a one-of-a-kind dual formula featuring legendary clarins blue orchid oil and a melting emulsion that blend together into a lightweight non-greasy texture on application to give your skin comfort, vitality and radiance.

Title: Le monochromatique
Description:
monochromatic: essential for your eyes, cheeks and lips. 
this multi-use formula allows flexible coverage and leaves a magnificent touch of color on your face. 
discover 5 shades ranging from nude pink to intense plum, from a velvet mat finish to an explosive glitter finish! 
apply first on your eyelids with a clean applicator and then on your lips and cheeks, with a different applicator, for a colorful effect. you will soon be able to do without it!

benefits

• multi-use: eyes, cheeks and lips 
• 5 shades 
• different finishes

Title: Teint idole ultra wear camouflage
Description:
an ultra-pigmented, full-coverage concealer that camouflages imperfections with a weightless, comfortable feel. one drop is all it takes. won’t cake or crease.

which skin type is it good for? 
âœ” normal 
âœ” combination 
âœ” oily 
âœ” dry

conceal imperfections all day with this high-pigment, full-coverage, lightweight concealer. it is easily blendable and buildable to reveal an even skintone with a natural matte finish. a little goes a long way! 

non-comedogenic
tested under dermatological control

in an independent consumer study after 1 week: 
- 89% of consumers felt this product was long-wearing
- 80% of consumers agreed this product provided full coverage
- 80% of consumers thought this formula made imperfections and flaws appear camouflaged

how to

- squeeze a pea-sized amount of concealer on the back of your hand, use your fingers to warm up the product before application. careful, a little goes a long way! 

- use your favorite applicator- a concealer brush, beauty blender, or your fingers- to dab the concealer on skin. wait a few seconds, then blend the edges into your skin. 

ingredients

bis-diglyceryl polyacyladipate-2 hydrogenated polyisobutene isotridecyl isononanoate cera microcristallina / microcrystalline wax / cire microcristalline caprylic/capric triglyceride silica silylate boron nitride sorbitan sesquiisostearate lauroyl lysine triethylhexanoin chamomilla recutita flower extract / matricaria flower extract cucumis sativus fruit extract / cucumber fruit extract salvia officinalis leaf / sage leaf extract stearalkonium hectorite aqua / water / eau sorbitan sesquioleate glyceryl behenate alumina aluminum hydroxide propylene carbonate propylene glycol caprylyl glycol polyglyceryl-6 octastearate bht tocopheryl acetate [+/- may contain / peut contenir ci 15850 / red 7 ci 42090 / blue 1 lake ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 / iron oxides ci 77891 / titanium dioxide ]

Title: Blush subtil
Description:
why you'll love it

with the new blush subtil, you have infinite choices to effortlessly enhance your complexion and create a healthy, glowing skin look.

ultra fine, this luxuriously silky powder blush fuses with the skin for a fresh and natural-looking complexion and long lasting comfort.
silky, superfine micronized powder pigments in matte, shimmering and sparkling shades ensure irresistibly soft, blendable application.
a palette of vivid colors to flatter all skin tones, easy to apply thanks to its precision brush.

choose among a sparkling blush, a shimmer blush or a matte blush for versatile finish never looks dry or dull and skin feels comfortable all day long.
ideal for all skin tones.

benefits

  • natural-looking complexion
  • long-lasting comfort
  • suitable for all skintones
  • easy to apply thanks to its precision blush brush

 

how to apply
start by pressing the enclosed brush from compact against the back of your hands to loosen the bristles, then apply to face, or use a brush and apply liberally to enhance your cheeks.

Title: Advanced genifique hydrogel melting sheet mask
Description:
what it is:
a hydrogel sheet mask that gives skin instant radiance, smoothness, and plumpness in as little as ten minutes.

what it does:
need a quick skin fix? instantly plump, glow, and smooth skin with this hydrogel sheet mask, which feels like the mask is melting onto skin for a flexible, cocooned feeling. this mask, which contains cult-favorite advanced genifique serum's bifidus extract, helps to strengthen and protect skin's moisture barrier. each mask contains the same amount of bifidus extract found in one full 30ml bottle of advanced genifique serum. in as little as ten minutes, skin is left feeling hydrated, and fresher. skin looks more radiant, fine lines, and pores appear visibly reduced, skin texture appears refined, and skin looks rested for a younger-looking appearance. this sheet mask won't leave skin feeling sticky or shiny.

Title: Luna fofo
Description:
luna fofo

get to know your skin with 100% personalized cleansing

start enjoying a skincare routine that’s as unique as you are! discover luna fofo, the world’s first app-connected skin analysis and custom cleansing tool. this smart device features body-safe silicone and 24k gold-plated skin sensors that reveal your skin type and hydration level in seconds. a customized cleansing routine is then created in the foreo for you app and synced with luna fofo in one simple step.

reveal a radiant, clear, selfie-ready look

gentle enough for all skin types, luna fofo’s smart skincare routine changes with your skin to always deliver the best cleansing treatment and bring out your skin’s natural glow. this battery-powered personalized cleansing brush is fully waterproof and never requires a brush head change. enjoy smoother, enviably beautiful and younger-looking skin every day.

benefits

  • deep yet gentle cleanse for glowing skin

  • 35% more hygienic than nylon brushes

  • skin sensors measure moisture levels, skin age, and skin type - cleansing routine automatically adjusted based on the input

  • boosts the absorption of your favourite skincare products

bullets

  • device for skin analysis and facial cleansing

  • luna fofo operates with “foreo for you” app available for android and ios devices

  • skin sensors measure moisture levels, skin age, and skin type

  • intensity and cleansing time adjusted automatically based on skin condition

  • rechargeable and 100% waterproof

  • up to 400 facial treatments per battery charge

  • one-time cost, no replacement brush heads required

  • made from body-safe silicone, free of phthalates and bpa

  • package includes luna fofo (aaa battery included), basic manual, magnetic scratch card

how to use

  1. download foreo for you app and connect your luna fofo device.

  2. follow the instructions for skin analysis. skincare routine will be automatically synced to the device

  3. apply your favourite cleanser and wet luna fofo. cleanse using circular movements on cheeks and forehead, gliding up and down the nose.

  4. rinse and dry your face and device.

Title: Joli rouge velvet
Description:
introducing new joli rouge velvet. clarins has put a new matte finish on its legendary joli rouge lipstick in a luxuriously hydrating formula that strikes a seamless balance between non-drying lipstick and a flawless velvet look.

its velvety texture is light and creamy, gliding gently onto lips for extremely easy application: the intense matte colour instantly illuminates the lips and cares for them too. 

available in 20 irresistible matte shades.
which one will you choose?

benefits

 

matte, luminous finish

keeps lips hydrated for up to 6 hours*

comforts and softens

*effectiveness test - hydration kinetics - 10 women - 6 hours

ingredients

diisostearyl malate, methyl methacrylate crosspolymer, dicaprylyl carbonate, coco-caprylate/caprate, dimethicone, neopentyl glycol diheptanoate, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed wax, cera alba/beeswax/cire dï¿½abeille, paraffin, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, polyethylene, prunus armeniaca (apricot) kernel oil, disteardimonium hectorite, synthetic wax, octyldodecyl pca, tocopheryl acetate, caprylic/capric triglyceride, parfum/fragrance, ethylhexyl palmitate, propylene carbonate, hydrogenated microcrystalline wax, ammonium glycyrrhizate, tribehenin, alumina, sorbitan isostearate, salicornia herbacea extract, glycerin, lactic acid, palmitoyl tripeptide-1, 

+/- may contain/peut contenir: mica, tin oxide, silica, calcium aluminum borosilicate, calcium sodium borosilicate, synthetic fluorphlogopite, ci 77891/titanium dioxide, ci 77491/ci 77492/ci 77499/iron oxides, ci 15850/red 6/red 6 lake/red 7/red 7 lake, ci 15985/yellow 6 lake, ci 42090/blue 1 lake/blue 1, ci 75470/carmine, ci 19140/ yellow 5/ yellow 5 lake, ci 45410/red 27/red 27 lake/red 28/red 28 lake, ci 73360/red 30 lake, ci 17200/red 33 lake, ci 45380/red 21/red 22 lake, ci 77742/manganese violet [m3081a]

Title: Joli rouge velvet
Description:
introducing new joli rouge velvet. clarins has put a new matte finish on its legendary joli rouge lipstick in a luxuriously hydrating formula that strikes a seamless balance between non-drying lipstick and a flawless velvet look.

its velvety texture is light and creamy, gliding gently onto lips for extremely easy application: the intense matte colour instantly illuminates the lips and cares for them too. 

available in 20 irresistible matte shades.
which one will you choose?

benefits

 

matte, luminous finish

keeps lips hydrated for up to 6 hours*

comforts and softens

*effectiveness test - hydration kinetics - 10 women - 6 hours

diisostearyl malate, methyl methacrylate crosspolymer, dicaprylyl carbonate, coco-caprylate/caprate, dimethicone, neopentyl glycol diheptanoate, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed wax, cera alba/beeswax/cire dï¿½abeille, paraffin, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, polyethylene, prunus armeniaca (apricot) kernel oil, disteardimonium hectorite, synthetic wax, octyldodecyl pca, tocopheryl acetate, caprylic/capric triglyceride, parfum/fragrance, ethylhexyl palmitate, propylene carbonate, hydrogenated microcrystalline wax, ammonium glycyrrhizate, tribehenin, alumina, sorbitan isostearate, salicornia herbacea extract, glycerin, lactic acid, palmitoyl tripeptide-1, 

+/- may contain/peut contenir: mica, tin oxide, silica, calcium aluminum borosilicate, calcium sodium borosilicate, synthetic fluorphlogopite, ci 77891/titanium dioxide, ci 77491/ci 77492/ci 77499/iron oxides, ci 15850/red 6/red 6 lake/red 7/red 7 lake, ci 15985/yellow 6 lake, ci 42090/blue 1 lake/blue 1, ci 75470/carmine, ci 19140/ yellow 5/ yellow 5 lake, ci 45410/red 27/red 27 lake/red 28/red 28 lake, ci 73360/red 30 lake, ci 17200/red 33 lake, ci 45380/red 21/red 22 lake, ci 77742/manganese violet [m3081a]

Title: Joli rouge velvet
Description:
introducing new joli rouge velvet. clarins has put a new matte finish on its legendary joli rouge lipstick in a luxuriously hydrating formula that strikes a seamless balance between non-drying lipstick and a flawless velvet look.

its velvety texture is light and creamy, gliding gently onto lips for extremely easy application: the intense matte colour instantly illuminates the lips and cares for them too. 

available in 20 irresistible matte shades.
which one will you choose?

benefits

 

matte, luminous finish

keeps lips hydrated for up to 6 hours*

comforts and softens

*effectiveness test - hydration kinetics - 10 women - 6 hours

ingredients

diisostearyl malate, methyl methacrylate crosspolymer, dicaprylyl carbonate, coco-caprylate/caprate, dimethicone, neopentyl glycol diheptanoate, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed wax, cera alba/beeswax/cire dï¿½abeille, paraffin, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, polyethylene, prunus armeniaca (apricot) kernel oil, disteardimonium hectorite, synthetic wax, octyldodecyl pca, tocopheryl acetate, caprylic/capric triglyceride, parfum/fragrance, ethylhexyl palmitate, propylene carbonate, hydrogenated microcrystalline wax, ammonium glycyrrhizate, tribehenin, alumina, sorbitan isostearate, salicornia herbacea extract, glycerin, lactic acid, palmitoyl tripeptide-1, 

+/- may contain/peut contenir: mica, tin oxide, silica, calcium aluminum borosilicate, calcium sodium borosilicate, synthetic fluorphlogopite, ci 77891/titanium dioxide, ci 77491/ci 77492/ci 77499/iron oxides, ci 15850/red 6/red 6 lake/red 7/red 7 lake, ci 15985/yellow 6 lake, ci 42090/blue 1 lake/blue 1, ci 75470/carmine, ci 19140/ yellow 5/ yellow 5 lake, ci 45410/red 27/red 27 lake/red 28/red 28 lake, ci 73360/red 30 lake, ci 17200/red 33 lake, ci 45380/red 21/red 22 lake, ci 77742/manganese violet [m3081a]

Title: Joli rouge
Description:
sheer, sparking color—plus 6 hours of non-stop moisture your lips will feel good about.* enriched with super-hydrating organic marsh samphire extract, nourishing mango oil, and clarins’ exclusive shine booster+ complex to leave lips plump, luminous and luscious.

how to apply

lip-hugging design. joli rouge is sculpted to fit the contours of lips—for precise application and generous colour payoff.

apply from center of lips, to corners of mouth.

ingredients

organic marsh samphire
rich in vitamins c and a, organic marsh samphire helps protect and strengthen the skin's natural moisture barrier, providing immediate and long-lasting hydration.
mango oil
rich in fatty acids, mango oil helps protect skin from dehydration. provides nourishment, comfort and suppleness.

Title: Natural lip perfector
Description:
a softly textured lip gel with a deliciously sweet scent and 3d shimmer. experience the lusciously smooth, shiny and fuller lips you've always dreamed of. sheer, but shaded enough to wear alone or to complement your favorite lip shade.

how to apply

for smoother, more luscious, kiss-me lips! apply alone or over lipstick.

Title: Rouge g de guerlain the lipstick shade
Description:
what it is:

a customisable matte lipstick refill with a double mirror.

what it does:

guerlain has sealed intense colour and luscious lip care into a jewel formula. enriched with plant-based polymers and silver microcrystals with a reflective power, this formula beautifully enhances lips, cloaking them in intense and luminous long-lasting colour. jojoba and mango butter help to nourish the lips, offering them instant and lasting comfort. hyaluronic acid and guggul resin help to smooth and plump up your lips. choose your shade from a wide range of matte colours, from the most nude to the most extravagant.

what it includes:

  • this product is a lipstick refill only and does not come with a portable case.

how to use:

  • the double mirror case allows you to apply directly to the lips.
  • the bullet’s ergonomic design allows ultra-precise application for a flawless lip-enhancing result.

Title: Rouge g de guerlain the lipstick shade
Description:
choose your shade

every woman is unique so guerlain brings you the ultimate luxury of customizable lips. discover rouge g de guerlain, the first jewel lipstick to customize to your style. 

create your lipstick:
1. first, choose your lipstick from a wide range of shades and finishes to match your look: from the most nude to the most extravagant, from satin to semi-matte or even metallic (also exists in a sheer shine finish). 
2. choose your case from an array of styles – from the most timeless to the most trendy – to create your complete lipstick. 
3. customize your lipstick and collect countless versions of rouge g de guerlain!

for this exceptional lipstick, guerlain has sealed luscious lip care and intense colour into a jewel formula for instant and lasting comfort. your lips are infused with luminous, long-wear colour.

discover the rouge g de guerlain stunning gems* collection, inspired by the art of fine jewelry making. this collection is composed of 7 natural sheer colors with a creamy gem-like facetted bullet and 8 exceptional jewel cases.

*collection  inspired by gemstones

fragrance

the sweet, enveloping scent of a vanilla “floriental” leaves its incomparable mark on rouge g de guerlain. top notes sparkle with a lemon, orange and bergamot accord. the rose and iris heart exudes sweetness. the vanilla and tonka bean drydown gives rouge g de guerlain all of its intensity.

ingredients

diisostearyl malate • polyglyceryl-10 decaisostearate • jojoba esters • synthetic wax • bis-behenyl/isostearyl/phytosteryl dimer dilinoleyl dimer dilinoleate • isostearyl hydroxystearate • hydrogenated microcrystalline wax • silica • hydrogenated styrene/methyl styrene/indene copolymer • octyldodecanol • ethylhexyl palmitate • irvingia gabonensis kernel butter • calcium aluminum borosilicate • disteardimonium hectorite • hydrogenated coco-glycerides • caprylic/capric triglyceride • parfum (fragrance) • ethylhexyl hydroxystearate • commiphora mukul resin extract • bht • trihydroxystearin • propyl gallate • pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate • butylene glycol • caprylyl glycol • tocopherol • phenoxyethanol • sodium hyaluronate • hexylene glycol • [+/- ci 77891 (titanium dioxide) • ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides) • ci 45410 (red 28 lake) • ci 19140 (yellow 5 lake) • ci 77163 (bismuth oxychloride) • ci 15850 (red 7, red 7 lake) • ci 15985 (yellow 6 lake) • ci 42090 (blue 1 lake)]

Title: Abeille royale daily repair serum g2
Description:
the unique texture of the daily repair serum delivers a repairing concentrate, made with guerlain exclusive royal jelly and pure ouessant honey, that acts continuously on every key level of the skin* for complete firmness.
from the cutaneous tissue through to the surface the skin fills out. elasticity – tone – reshaping – wrinkles : the skin looks younger from the very 1st drops and the face is lastingly remodeled.

ingredients

the exceptional repairing power of bee products. exceptional active ingredients, exclusive to guerlain. : guerlain royal jelly, made exclusively in france, is combined with the purest black bee honey from the island of ouessant.

Title: Advanced genifique serum
Description:
a serum designed for every woman: all ethnicities, ages, and skin types - dry, combination/normal and oily.

inspired by microbiome science, not only does our iconic face serum's already contain hyaluronic acid for instant radiance, but the new formula is enriched with a new complex of 7 prebiotic and probiotic-derived extracts that works in optimal affinity with skin. skin's barrier recovery is improved and skin looks healthier and younger.

an important first step of every beauty routine. reveal your skin’s glow by using it morning and night. after one application, skin’s natural barrier is reinforced.

major signs of aging appear visibly improved: radiance, fine lines, face firming, uneven skin tone and uneven skin texture.

please note: reviews dated before 29th august refer to a previous formula. reviews dated 29th august or later may refer to a previous formula or the new formula enriched with 7 prebiotic and probiotic-derived extracts.

benefits

discover the benefits of our face serum for every skin type (dry, combination/normal, oily):

• helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles • improves the look of skin’s radiance, clarity and texture.
• helps strengthen the skin’s natural barrier.

Title: Super aqua-serum
Description:
super aqua-serum, an iconic serum-infused cream, provides intense skin hydration and preserves a youthful appearance. fine lines and wrinkles appears visibly filled out, and the skin looks smooth, radiant, revitalized and plumped. 
aquacomplex advance is the latest skincare technology that promotes the flow of water to the heart of the skin to enable the skin to instantly rehydrate itself*. day after day, the moisturized skin is protected against the risk of future dehydration, a major cause of skin-ageing.
apply every morning and evening.

*in-vitro tests on ingredients

fragrance

a fragrance with fresh dewy notes and aquatic flower, ylang-ylang and jasmine facets.

ingredients

aqua (water) • glycerin • squalane • isohexadecane • butylene glycol • cera alba (beeswax) • propanediol • steareth-20 • jojoba esters • c12-15 alkyl benzoate • caprylic/capric/succinic triglyceride • glyceryl stearate • polymethyl methacrylate • sodium pca • phenoxyethanol • cetyl alcohol • stearyl alcohol • xanthan gum • lactic acid • tromethamine • caprylyl glycol • laureth-23 • tocopheryl acetate • polyacrylate-13 • sodium hyaluronate • stearalkonium hectorite • parfum (fragrance) • polyisobutene • viola tricolor extract • malva sylvestris (mallow) extract • propylene carbonate • centella asiatica leaf extract • adenosine • citronellol • sorbitan isostearate • polysorbate 20 • sodium carrageenan • geraniol • hexyl cinnamal • nymphaea odorata root extract • benzyl salicylate • linalool • ethylhexylglycerin • tocopherol • benzyl benzoate • maris sal (sea salt) • bht

Title: Abeille royale double r - renew & repair serum
Description:
guerlain’s double r renew & repair serum combines the ultimate anti-ageing corrective technology from abeille royale with a soft-peel treatment for highly effective action on the visible signs of ageing: loss of skin elasticity and firmness, wrinkles, dull skin, imperfections, large pores.
- its "lifting-effect" formula offers the skin exceptional benefits from our exclusive active ingredients: guerlain's royal jelly and black bee honey from island of ouessant. 
- its soft-peel formula provides a "new skin" effect which promotes the renewal cycle of the epidermis without irritating the skin. 
the results: the face looks fuller and its contours become more refined. the skin texture is smoothed, wrinkles and pores are minimized, and the complexion glows. day after day, the skin becomes more radiant. 
application: apply to the face and neck in the morning and evening before using your cream.


fragrance


a sun-drenched nectar by the guerlain nose thierry wasser: fresh and airy honeyed scents.

ingredients


aqua (water) • glycerin • alcohol • propanediol • butylene glycol • mel (honey) • isotridecyl isononanoate • caprylic/capric triglyceride • squalane • royal jelly • decyloxazolidinone • lauroyl lysine • polyacrylate crosspolymer-6 • peg-8 • pentylene glycol • diglycerin • phenoxyethanol • parfum (fragrance) • glycolic acid • dimethicone • steareth-2 • steareth-21 • sodium hydroxide • avena sativa (oat) kernel extract • carbomer • ppg-26-buteth-26 • lactic acid • sodium magnesium silicate • citric acid • xanthan gum • sodium hyaluronate • tetrasodium edta • peg-40 hydrogenated castor oil • albizia julibrissin bark extract • sodium benzoate • hydrolyzed soy flour • adenosine • rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract • caramel • biosaccharide gum-2 • limonene • benzyl salicylate • ophiopogon japonicus root extract • geraniol • malva sylvestris (mallow) extract • hydroxycitronellal • alpha-isomethyl ionone • citronellol • linalool • citral • bht • ci 19140 (yellow 5) • ci 14700 (red 4) • tocopherol

Title: Kisskiss smoothing lip primer
Description:
the indispensable partner to lipstick, the kisskiss liplift smoothing base in stick form redefines your lip contour, smoothes and prepares the lips for long-lasting make-up. with its creamy, rich and supple texture and neutral translucent shade, it preserves and enhances the colour of your lipstick.
lips are smooth and silky soft. their contour is more defined. lipstick is easy to apply. it offers lasting hold for guaranteed high-fidelity make-up without feathering.

fragrance

its subtle vanilla-violet fragrance delicately intertwines with the sparkling scent of berries.

Title: Parure gold precious light concealer
Description:
like a magic wand, the guerlain precious light pen instantly conceals dark areas and visible signs of ageing. enriched with a rejuvenating effect precious complex and brightened by gold burst pigments, precious light reveals a refreshed natural complexion, providing the skin with the glow of renewed youth day after day. in a few brush strokes, dark areas are lightened. the face appears luminous and well-rested, and it radiates light and vitality. visible signs of fatigue are diminished, and the eye contour appears refreshed. the complexion glows with a youthful halo and is enhanced by subtle golden undertones.

ingredients

aqua (water) • cyclopentasiloxane • butylene glycol • cetyl peg/ppg-10/1 dimethicone • c12-15 alkyl benzoate • pentylene glycol • propylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate • phenoxyethanol • phenyl trimethicone • silica • disteardimonium hectorite • tribehenin • sodium myristoyl glutamate • synthetic fluorphlogopite • propylene carbonate • diphenyl dimethicone • centella asiatica leaf extract • commiphora myrrha resin extract • ceramide ng • aluminum hydroxide • peg-10 phytosterol • lactic acid • tin oxide • hibiscus esculentus fruit extract • palmitoyl hexapeptide-12 • pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate • [+/- ci 77891 (titanium dioxide) • ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides)]

Title: Parure gold precious light concealer
Description:
like a magic wand, the guerlain precious light pen instantly conceals dark areas and visible signs of ageing. enriched with a rejuvenating effect precious complex and brightened by gold burst pigments, precious light reveals a refreshed natural complexion, providing the skin with the glow of renewed youth day after day. in a few brush strokes, dark areas are lightened. the face appears luminous and well-rested, and it radiates light and vitality. visible signs of fatigue are diminished, and the eye contour appears refreshed. the complexion glows with a youthful halo and is enhanced by subtle golden undertones.

ingredients

aqua (water) • cyclopentasiloxane • butylene glycol • cetyl peg/ppg-10/1 dimethicone • c12-15 alkyl benzoate • pentylene glycol • propylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate • phenoxyethanol • phenyl trimethicone • silica • disteardimonium hectorite • tribehenin • sodium myristoyl glutamate • synthetic fluorphlogopite • propylene carbonate • diphenyl dimethicone • centella asiatica leaf extract • commiphora myrrha resin extract • ceramide ng • aluminum hydroxide • peg-10 phytosterol • lactic acid • tin oxide • hibiscus esculentus fruit extract • palmitoyl hexapeptide-12 • pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate • [+/- ci 77891 (titanium dioxide) • ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides)]

Title: Rouge g de guerlain the double mirror case
Description:
discover the rouge g de guerlain stunning gems* collection, inspired by the art of fine jewelry making. this collection is composed of 7 natural sheer shine colors with a creamy gem-like facetted bullet and 8 exceptional jewel cases.
 
choose your case
 
every woman is unique so guerlain brings you the ultimate luxury of customizable lips. discover rouge g de guerlain, the first jewel lipstick to customize to your style. 
 
create your lipstick:
1. first, choose your lipstick from a wide range of shades and finishes to match your look: from the most nude to the most extravagant, from sheer shine to satin and to semi-matte to even metallic.
2. choose your case from an array of styles – from the most timeless to the most trendy – to create your complete lipstick. 
3. customize your lipstick and collect countless versions of rouge g de guerlain! 
 
for this exceptional lipstick, guerlain has sealed luscious lip care and intense colour into a jewel formula for instant and lasting comfort. your lips are infused with luminous, long-wear colour.
 
*collection inspired by gemstones

Title: Instant concealer
Description: a long-wearing & hydrating concealer for all skin types. helps instantly brighten, conceal imperfections & diminishes signs of fatigue. offers customizable correction to all types of dark circles to brighten the undereye area. fluid texture blends flawlessly & smoothes eye contours for a crease-free coverage. contains caffeine extract to refresh & reduce the appearance of puffiness in the undereye area.

Title: Everlasting foundation spf15
Description:
impeccable coverage morning to night without caking thanks to a new generation formula. this impeccable coverage, ultra-light foundation corrects spots and imperfections. whilst providing absolute comfort for your skin.
• 18 hours* of coverage: mattifying bamboo powder combined with high fidelity system+ technology delivers a long-lasting flawless complexion that stays put from morning to night.

• 18 hours* of comfort: extract of organic quinoa preserves the skin's suppleness and helps boost the moisturising action of the plant micropatch.

• exclusive clarins triple anti-pollution, anti-radical and anti-uv protection.

*satisfaction test carried out with 60 women

Title: Nutri-lumiere treatment essence
Description:
a nutrient-rich, anti-aging essence lotion formulated with plant-based ingredients to naturally exfoliate and energize, preparing mature skin to fully absorb all benefits of nutri-lumière treatments that follow. the refreshing essence lotion is the first step towards achieving a luminous, healthy-looking complexion.

clarins nutrition innovation
clarins' nutrient-powered plant discovery is the horse chestnut plant - known for its incredible longevity, strength, resistance, and rebirth every spring. two potent parts of the horse chestnut plant - organic flower extract and active fruit molecule, escin - take action to help revive skin. together, this revitalizing duo provides nourishment and luminosity for healthy-looking skin.

clarins scientific discovery
the micro-nutrient network is responsible for supplying nutrients and maintaining the skin's youthfulness. with age, the micro-nutrient network depletes and slows down, resulting in dullness, deep-wrinkles, dark spots, and dry and fragile skin.

+ clarins natural plant-based expertise
nutri-lumière collection is formulated with 10 organic ingredients.*
plant squalane promotes supple, youthful-looking skin. hibiscus sabdariffa flower acids gently exfoliates to remove dead skin cells for a smooth texture. ginseng and green coffee extracts energize skin. an organic plant-based blend of harungana, oat sugars, and leaf of life extracts take complete action to help deeply hydrate, visibly lift, and smooth slackened skin.

morning and night, follow with either your nutri-lumière day or night creams to boost results and reactivate skin's luminosity.

*nutri-lumière treatment essence contains 4 organic ingredients.

Title: Mission perfection serum
Description:
age spots, discolouration, dark areas, marks from acne, dullness, redness… this innovative anti-dark-spot serum corrects skin pigment disorders without altering the skin's natural tone.

how to apply:

a light illuminating and smoothing lotion applied morning and night. suitable for all skin tones.
for optimal results and extra anti-dark-spot protection, use along with uv plus anti-pollution spf 50 sunscreen.

Title: Clarinsmen super moisture balm
Description:
need some moisture and comfort? winter cold irritating and drying out your skin? super moisture balm to the rescue: a moisturising cream for men that's incredibly comfortable, invisible and non-greasy.

benefits

hydrates deep down even in extreme conditions and strengthens men’s skin.

Title: Clarinsmen line-control balm
Description:
make smoothing-out deep lines and wrinkles your goal—while tightening up sagging skin around your chin. clarinsmen’s lightweight, line-fighting cream—with energising bison grass and chinese galanga—lifts and firms in all the right places. helps block skin-damaging pollutants, too. apply after clarinsmen active face wash. non-greasy, for a fresh matte finish.

benenfts:

  • reduces creases and wrinkles
  • firms up the skin and visibly tightens slackened features
  • contains an anti-pollution complex

Title: Iris
Description:
iris

say goodbye to dark circles, fine lines and bags under your eyes with the iris illuminating eye massager from swedish beauty brand foreo. designed to help relieve tired eyes by using soothing t-sonic technology, iris provides a gentle eye massage to reduce visible signs of ageing and fatigue and leave your eyes feeling refreshed and looking bright. alternating t-sonic technology was specially developed as an answer to the strains the eye contour undergoes to bring every user refreshed and younger-looking eyes.

• eye massager to fight visible signs of ageing and fatigue and reduce under-eye puffiness and dark circles

• stimulates the skin to smooth the appearance of crow’s feet, fine lines and wrinkles

• increases the absorption of eye creams and serums

• soft smooth silicone is perfect for the delicate eye area

• 2 modes: pure mode and spa mode

• built-in timer and 8 speed intensities for each mode

• 1 hour charge lasts up to 140 uses

• hypoallergenic, body-safe and non-porous silicone is easy to clean and prevents bacteria build-up

• lightweight and easy to carry

• fully waterproof

• 2-year limited warranty

 

how to use

1. apply

use and spread your regular eye cream or eye serum.

2. left eye

apply iris on the eye contour for 30 seconds on the left eye.

3. right eye

apply iris on the eye contour for 30 seconds on the right eye.

Title: Iris
Description:
iris

say goodbye to dark circles, fine lines and bags under your eyes with the iris illuminating eye massager from swedish beauty brand foreo. designed to help relieve tired eyes by using soothing t-sonic technology, iris provides a gentle eye massage to reduce visible signs of ageing and fatigue and leave your eyes feeling refreshed and looking bright. alternating t-sonic technology was specially developed as an answer to the strains the eye contour undergoes to bring every user refreshed and younger-looking eyes.

• eye massager to fight visible signs of ageing and fatigue and reduce under-eye puffiness and dark circles

• stimulates the skin to smooth the appearance of crow’s feet, fine lines and wrinkles

• increases the absorption of eye creams and serums

• soft smooth silicone is perfect for the delicate eye area

• 2 modes: pure mode and spa mode

• built-in timer and 8 speed intensities for each mode

• 1 hour charge lasts up to 140 uses

• hypoallergenic, body-safe and non-porous silicone is easy to clean and prevents bacteria build-up

• lightweight and easy to carry

• fully waterproof

• 2-year limited warranty

 

how to use

1. apply

use and spread your regular eye cream or eye serum.

2. left eye

apply iris on the eye contour for 30 seconds on the left eye.

3. right eye

apply iris on the eye contour for 30 seconds on the right eye.

Title: Abeille royale cleansing oil anti-pollution
Description:
the cleansing oil gently removes all types of makeup, even waterproof, from face, eyes and lips, and helps rid the skin of impurities and pollutant particles.
the oil is applied directly to dry skin with the hands and gently massaged in to make makeup removal a moment of pure pleasure. its ultra-fine texture with honeyed scents transforms on contact with water into a milky emulsion that rinses off easily, without leaving a greasy film.
the skin is left fresh, supple and comfortable. ready to begin the abeille royale skincare ritual.

Title: Joli rouge crayon
Description:
a 2-in-1 lip liner pen that works as hard as you do! joli rouge crayon defines and fills lips in one easy step while keeping them hydrated for up to 6 hours* with color that lasts. the creamy texture can be used two ways: sculpt and line lips before applying lipstick, or completely fill-in lips for an intensely bold, matte coverage.

color that cares - this non-drying, lightweight formula gently glides on and deeply hydrates leaving lips soft, smooth, and comfortable. the easy-to-use crayon has a built in sharpener, for a twistable tip that's always precise. 

the joli rouge crayon is the perfect lip liner to throw in your purse for quick touch-ups throughout the day.

available in 4 vibrant shades: 
705c soft berry
742c joli rouge (red)
744c plum
757c nude brick
 

benefits

2-in-1 liner defines and fills

bold, matte finish

6-hour* hydration

smooth, creamy texture

built-in sharpener for precision lining

Title: Twist to glow
Description:
healthy glow powder for a tinted luminous complexion. this 2-in-1 product brightens up the eyes and cheeks. its handy portable size can go with you anywhere. it has a screen that transforms it from a solid to an ultra-fine powder that can be used any time you want.

benefits

  • instantly brightens up the eyes and cheeks
  • colour and a healthy glow

how to

use the small screen to grate the product from a solid to an ultra-fine powder. create as much as you want and adjust at will, apply anywhere any time.

Title: Lip twist duo water tint & balm
Description:
with this 2-in-1 pen, you're just two steps away from gorgeous lips. one end has a tint-effect pen that stains the lips with warm shades. the other end is a balm that perfects your colour and adds shine and sparkle. your lips are infused with matte tattoo-effect colour and finished with an irresistible shine. it has a unique, light-as-water texture that feels like there's nothing on your lips.

benefits

pen:

  • tattoo effect
  • buildable matte finish
  • barely-there feeling

balm:

  • glimmering finish
  • transforms make-up results

how to

start by applying the pen end to lips to infuse them with colour. then use the balm tip to make them shine.

Title: Lip twist duo water tint & balm
Description:
with this 2-in-1 pen, you're just two steps away from gorgeous lips. one end has a tint-effect pen that stains the lips with warm shades. the other end is a balm that perfects your colour and adds shine and sparkle. your lips are infused with matte tattoo-effect colour and finished with an irresistible shine. it has a unique, light-as-water texture that feels like there's nothing on your lips.
