Title: Wonder perfect mascara 4d waterproof
Description:
all-in-one, 4d mascara that takes lashes to bold new dimensions: visibly lengthened, curled, defined and volumized—now in a waterproof formula that can withstand rain, sweat, and even tears.

this unique formula combines natural, carbon-black mineral pigments with blue lotus wax to form a flexible, waterproof film that locks onto each lash. delivers an intense, 4d makeup result that is flake-proof and smudge-proof—even in the face of humidity, sweat, or watery eyes.

contains clarins’ exclusive lash boosting complex formulated with sphingosine and panthenol to help protect lashes and promote visibly thicker, longer-looking lashes even after you've removed your mascara.

clarins' exclusive precision brush allows for the perfect balance of volume & definition so no lash goes unnoticed.

benefits:

  • visibly lengthens, curls, defines, and volumizes
  • waterproof formula resists humidity, sweat, and watery eyes
  • delivers intense, flake-proof, and smudge-proof color
  • gentle on eyes

Title: Tonic body treatment oil arthritis set
Description:
feel good and do good with our plant-powered, limited-edition tonic body oil collection—presented in partnership with champion tennis player caroline wozniacki, who was diagnosed with rheumatoid polyarthritis in 2018.

with every sale of this gift set, clarins will make a donation to fondation arthritis to help find a cure. together, we can ace arthritis research!

this set contains:

tonic body treatment oil
full size, 3.4 fl. oz.
our best-selling, toning body treatment oil is formulated with 100% plant extracts to visibly firm, tone and improve the appearance of elasticity.

tonic bath & shower concentrate with essential oils
travel size, 1 fl. oz.
invigorating body wash—with aromatic essences of pure rosemary, mint and geranium—leaves skin soft, clean, and perfectly refreshed.

tennis-themed cosmetic bag

Title: After sun shower gel
Description:
refreshing post-sun cleansing gel for face, body and hair.

clarins’ refreshing, 3-in-1 after sun cleansing gel for face, body, and hair removes sunscreens, salt, sand, chlorine odors, and pollution—without drying. perfect after a day at the beach, swimming, or playing sports.

clarins innovation and natural plant-based expertise
with over 65 years of skincare expertise, the clarins laboratories have created a proprietary after sun formula that cleanses every inch of skin, and hair, in one time-saving step. moisture-packed organic aloe vera extract softens, soothes and smoothes. gentle organic soapwort extract creates a dense, creamy lather that rinses instantly for a refreshing head-to-toe feel.

green packaging. new sensoriality.
with respect to the enivronment, the tube packaging is made up of recycled plastic and the outer cartons and inserts are printed on paper from sustainably managed forests. the ultra-sensorial, lightweight texture leaves face, body and hair feeling soft, comfortable and refreshed. an aromatic scent—a tropical woody floral with a sparkling twist of citrus—is sure to brighten your day.

benefits:

  • 3-in-1 formula gently cleanses face, body, and hair
  • eliminates uv filters, salt, sand, chlorine odors, and pollution
  • leaves skin and hair soft and silky
  • sleek, take-along tube is made from recycled plastic
  • tropical woody-floral scent with a twist of citrus

Title: Sun care gel-to-oil spf50
Description:
with this sun care product, you can fully enjoy swimming, the beach and the pool. it can be applied to dry or wet skin because it's formulated to "repel" drops of water and spread evenly over the skin. plus, the silky moisturising texture won't leave white streaks. its eco-designed packaging makes it an eco-friendly sun care product.

benefits:

  • protects against sun damage
  • moisturises

Title: Sun care water mist spf50+
Description:
this protection body care creates a wonderful sensory experience, is easy to apply and feels great going on. its misting action makes it quickly absorb into the skin. the lightweight aqueous texture sprays on evenly and stays invisible.

benefits:

  • protects against sun damage

Title: After sun sos sunburn soother mask
Description:
this cream-gel mask with instant cooling effect comforts the skin after exposure to the sun. it relieves and minimises burning sensations with sunflower extract. it moisturises intensely for 48 hours with organic aloe vera extract and nourishes the skin with shea oil. it also protects against free radicals with mimosa tenuiflora extract.

benefits:

  • soothes and comforts after sun exposure.
  • soothes burning sensations.

Title: Mad eyes mascara buildable volume lash by lash
Description:
mad eyes mascara offers lash-by-lash buildable volume: +112%* volume in an instant. lashes are thicker, longer and with more curl for 24 hours**. the soft fibre brush is calibrated to increase the density of each lash after every stroke, for spectacular volume and 24-hour**, water-resistant wear. the product’s unique formula infuses the lashes with skincare properties for ever-more beautiful lashes application after application. after four weeks of use, even without makeup, lash fibres are longer, thicker and with boosted curl. its formula is resistant to tears and humidity.
*instrumental test, 15 panellists.
**instrumental test, 22 women.

fragrance

set against a background of enveloping notes of benzoin resin and white musk, the floral fragrance of rose is studded with a touch of jasmine and sparkling fruity notes of raspberry and peach.

ingredients

#14671   ingredients: aqua (water) • cera alba (beeswax) • propanediol • glyceryl stearate • polyacrylate-21 • bis-diglyceryl polyacyladipate-2 • alcohol • candelilla cera (euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax) • cera carnauba (copernicia cerifera (carnauba) wax) • steareth-21 • vp/eicosene copolymer • palmitic acid • stearic acid • argania spinosa kernel oil • pvp • steareth-2 • butylene glycol • aminomethyl propanediol • panthenol • sodium dehydroacetate • parfum (fragrance) • ethylhexylglycerin • caprylyl glycol • hydroxyethylcellulose • trideceth-6 phosphate • tocopheryl acetate • gossypium herbaceum (cotton) extract • dipropylene glycol • linalool • citronellol • glyceryl caprylate • alpha-isomethyl ionone • geraniol • disodium phosphate • sodium phosphate • limonene • polysorbate 60 • citral • tocopherol • [+/- ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides) • ci 77891 (titanium dioxide)]

Title: Mad eyes intense liner
Description:
mad eyes intense liner, a liquid eyeliner offering a graphic, intense and long-lasting line from the very first stroke of the brush. the exceptionally fine tip, inspired by calligraphy brushes, can trace any line you wish. its supple, richly pigmented texture is resistant to water and humidity, and guarantees lasting 24-hour* wear.
for simple, one-step application, just dip the brush into the container to load it with the exact amount of product required. easy to remove.
*clinical evaluation, 20 women.

ingredients

#14667   ingredients: aqua (water) • polyacrylate-21 • glycerin • pentylene glycol • pullulan • silica • mica • butylene glycol • alcohol • synthetic fluorphlogopite • ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp copolymer • panthenol • sodium dehydroacetate • trideceth-6 phosphate • caprylyl glycol • ethylhexylglycerin • xanthan gum • dipropylene glycol • gossypium herbaceum (cotton) extract • glyceryl caprylate • alumina • tocopherol • [+/- ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides) • ci 77891 (titanium dioxide)]

Title: Mad eyes intense liner
Description:
mad eyes intense liner, a liquid eyeliner offering a graphic, intense and long-lasting line from the very first stroke of the brush. the exceptionally fine tip, inspired by calligraphy brushes, can trace any line you wish. its supple, richly pigmented texture is resistant to water and humidity, and guarantees lasting 24-hour* wear.
for simple, one-step application, just dip the brush into the container to load it with the exact amount of product required. easy to remove.

ingredients

#14667   ingredients: aqua (water) • polyacrylate-21 • glycerin • pentylene glycol • pullulan • silica • mica • butylene glycol • alcohol • synthetic fluorphlogopite • ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp copolymer • panthenol • sodium dehydroacetate • trideceth-6 phosphate • caprylyl glycol • ethylhexylglycerin • xanthan gum • dipropylene glycol • gossypium herbaceum (cotton) extract • glyceryl caprylate • alumina • tocopherol • [+/- ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides) • ci 77891 (titanium dioxide)]

Title: Mad eyes felt eyeliner
Description:
mad eyes precise liner, an eyeliner pen with an ultra-precise, intensely matte and easy-to-apply graphic line for a perfectly mastered cat-eye look. its fine, flexible tip lets you adjust the thickness of the line, as fine or as dense as you please, with an intensity that adapts to the pressure used. the shade remains matte for 24 hours*, with a long-lasting line that does not bleed over the course of the day. it is resistant to tears and humidity, and is easy to remove. *instrumental test, 20 women.

ingredients

#14417   ingredients: aqua (water) • ci 77266 [nano] (black 2) • methylpropanediol • styrene/acrylates copolymer • styrene/acrylates/ammonium methacrylate copolymer • cellulose • peg-60 hydrogenated castor oil • coco-glucoside • poloxamer 407 • citric acid • phenoxyethanol • potassium sorbate • phenylpropanol • sodium benzoate • sodium laureth-12 sulfate • sodium lauryl sulfate • caprylyl glycol • sodium dehydroacetate • bht

Title: Clarinsmen antiperspirant deo roll on
Description:
clarins approaches the problem of perspiration from a skincare treatment perspective, so this roll-on helps control the body's natural perspiration and odour for hours while respecting its natural process. it provides long-lasting odour control with a non-sticky, alcohol free formulation. tired of sprays? if so, you should be using this fresh deodorant roll with its hint of aloe to protect your skin.

ingredients

aqua/water/eau, sodium laureth sulfate, cetearyl alcohol, cellulose, cocamidopropyl betaine, cocamide mipa, glycol distearate, glycerin, cetearyl glucoside, acrylates/c10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer, tea-cocoyl glutamate, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, citrus aurantium dulcis (orange) fruit water, silica, parfum/fragrance, phenoxyisopropanol, sodium chloride, sodium hydroxide, benzophenone-4, disodium edta, moringa pterygosperma seed extract, phenoxyethanol, disodium phosphate, citric acid, methylchloroisothiazolinone, methylisothiazolinone, benzyl salicylate, butylphenyl methylpropional, limonene, linalool, ci 15985/yellow 6, [v0606f]

Title: Mask sos hydration - dehydrated skin
Description:
a moisturising bath for thirsty skin. this ultra-refreshing gel-cream mask helps skin find its ideal moisture level in just 10 minutes*. deeply quenches for skin that is supple, refreshed, smooth and toned.  

*subject to results of satisfaction and effectiveness tests on the finished product.

Title: Brow duo
Description:
this new must-have 2-in-1 product sculpt and enhances the eyebrows, creating full brows while setting and intensifying them.

first, a coloured powder texture that turns into a water-based creamy texture as soon as it is applied. it visibly defines, shapes, and grooms brows into place.

next, a long-lasting mascara that sets and intensifies the shade for perfectly shaped eyebrows

benefits:

  •  easy 2-in-1 application
  •  powder: colours and thickens
  •  tinted mascara: tames and fixes
  •  flexible and precise applicators
  •  long-lasting

Title: Everlasting concealer
Description:
this high-coverage corrector withstands all tests. rich in horse chestnut aescin, quinoa and oat sugar extracts, everlasting concealer hides dark circles, brightens the eyes and blends into the skin thanks to its ultra-light texture.

benefits:

high coverage
 matte finish
 extreme comfort

Title: Everlasting concealer
Description:
this high-coverage corrector withstands all tests. rich in horse chestnut aescin, quinoa and oat sugar extracts, everlasting concealer hides dark circles, brightens the eyes and blends into the skin thanks to its ultra-light texture.

Title: Everlasting concealer
Description:
this high-coverage corrector withstands all tests. rich in horse chestnut aescin, quinoa and oat sugar extracts, everlasting concealer hides dark circles, brightens the eyes and blends into the skin thanks to its ultra-light texture.

benefits:

 matte finish
 extreme comfort

Title: My clarins my perfect eyebrow palette
Description:
an eyebrow shaping kit—contains nourishing organic coconut oil powders—lets you highlight and define your ideal brows: visibly thicker, more even, and perfectly arched.

two palettes get the job done: 01 for blonde or light brown hair; 02 for dark brown or black hair. each comes with two vegan brow powders, a universal highlighter, and a double-ended applicator with a brow brush on one side; an angled shadow brush on the other.

benefits:

  • visibly defines and shapes brows
  • complete brow grooming kit with double-ended applicator
  • plant-enriched formula
  • vegan & cruelty free

Title: My clarins micellar cleansing water
Description:
a plant-based micellar cleansing water for clean, clear, refreshed skin in one step - no need to rinse. formulated with tiny micellar cleansing spheres to gently cleanse and dissolve makeup, oil, and impurities from face, eyes, and lips. mild enough for the most sensitive skin.
soothing formula, with fruity-floral notes, contains a refreshing cocktail of pollution-fighting moringa, and calming organic golden gentian extract to keep your skin healthy-looking, radiant, and refined.
your vegan friendly recipe - free of phthalates, parabens, and sulfates - to leave skin instantly clean, soothed, and refreshed. my clarins is free of all animal-derived ingredients and was not tested on animals.

benefits:

  • cleanses face, eyes, and lips in one quick step
  • gently dissolves makeup, oil, and impurities
  • soothes and softens the skin
  • refreshing, plant-based formula
  • vegan formula free of phthalates, parabens, and sulfates

Title: Kisskiss tender matte
Description:
guerlain reveals all the tenderness of matte with kisskiss tender matte, the luminous matte lipstick as tender as a kiss.
at the heart of the formula, a trio of active ingredients: hyaluronic acid, shea butter and rose petal extract, to nourish and flawlessly shape the lips with no compromise on comfort for 16h*.
a second-skin texture for a light, bare-lip sensation like no other. the secret? mattifying powders coated in shea butter to sensually glide over lips and bathe them in luminous matte colour that lasts 12h**.
say goodbye to that tight, dry sensation and give your lips the ultimate comfort of this tender matte.
for lips that beg to be kissed…

fragrance

the light, delicate scent of a vanilla "floriental" leaves its incomparable mark on kisskiss. top notes sparkle with a lemon, orange and bergamot accord. the rose and iris heart exudes sweetness. the vanilla and tonka bean dry-down gives kisskiss all of its intensity.

Title: 4 colour all in one eyes & lips pen
Description: introducing a nostalgic clarins innovation, the 4-colour pen. this easy to apply automatic pen features 3 retractable eye liners and 1 retractable lip liner pen, all enriched in sunflower wax complex, jojoba and black acacia to nourish and comfort eyes and lips.

Title: 4 colour all in one eyes & lips pen

Title: Kit sourcils pro perfect eyes & brows palette

the magnetic look with perfect eyebrows.
extremely easy to use, this kit allows you to draw and even out eyebrows and eyelids like a true professional: black, brown and blond eyebrow powder, fixing wax for perfect hold, nude eyeshadow, toothbrush, double applicator and tweezers.

Title: The essentials palette
Description:
clarins the essential eye shadow make up palette

inside the palette you’ll find 10 eyeshadows featuring clarins’ signature mineral and plant extract blend, which has fantastic glide and even more fantastic staying power.

the shadows are blendable without being dusty, and once blended out they adhere to the skin beautifully with a refined, ultra-smooth finish.
also included in the palette is a mirror, a double-ended applicator (one side for applying and finer detail, the other for blending and larger areas), and a handy almost ‘paint by numbers’ inspired guide thatshows you how to wear your new colours.

the palette is presented in a sleek yet durable recyclable cardboard casing.
clarins forgoes a magnetic clasp in favour of an elasticated band, which is really reliable in keeping the palette closed tight when not in use.

Title: Cleansing micellar water
Description: clarins new range of cleansers are tailored to your texture preference. the cleansing micellar water is a fresh, lightweight water ideal for anyone looking for a quick cleansing solution, even those with the most sensitive skin. enriched with micelles, this floral fruity scented water contains a gentle complex, harvested from le domaine clarins, made up of organic yellow gentian extract and organic lemon balm extract to help soothe and calm the skin and preserve the skin microbiota.

Title: Pore control pore minimizing serum
Description: dream of perfect skin with tighter skin texture rendering pores practically invisible, even close up? this expert serum is up to the challenge. upon application, its evanescent texture with blurring effect masks pores and reveals an even, velvety, and rad

Title: Soothing toning lotion
Description: clarins new range of toners are tailored to your skin type and concerns. the soothing toning lotion balances very dry or sensitive skin types whilst also removing excess cleanser residue. the fruity floral toner is created with a combination of camomile and purple coneflower which work together to sooth tight skin, ease discomfort and reduce redness.

Title: Super restorative serum
Description: clarins super restorative series. a new serum that helps to lift facial features, rejuvenate the skin, reshape and redefine facial features while also reducing the appearance of age spots. it is an expert solution for the visible signs of aging, with eye-catching results.

Title: Uv plus rose
Description: clarins' 1st uv and pollution protection against 5 pollutants encountered in everyday life: atmospheric, indoor, pollen, blue light and photo-pollution. a lightweight, easily-absorbed gel cream for an instant rosy glow. powered by organic mango leaf extract, it enhances the skin's self-defence by 64%*. hydrates and cares for skin, thanks to its 74%** skin-caring ingredients.

Title: Uv plus translucent spf50
Description:
what it is
clarins' uv and pollution screen protects against 5 pollutants encountered in everyday life: atmospheric, indoor, pollen, blue light and photo-pollution. a lightweight, easily-absorbed gel cream for an instant dewy glow.

powered by organic mango leaf extract, it enhances skin's self-defense by 64%*. hydrates and cares for skin, thanks to 74%** skin-caring ingredients.

*ex vivo test on photo-pollution – measurement of loricrine. **excluding filters, preservatives and colourants contributing to 26% of the formula.

skin type: all skin types
texture: gel / fluid
benefits
protects against uv rays & 5 types of pollution, including blue light.
moisturises skin
clarins plus
our pioneering city screen, now more advanced than ever. formulated with 30 years of expertise in uv and pollution protection.

ingredients
aqua/water/eau. diisopropyl adipate. homosalate. ethylhexyl salicylate. diethylamino hydroxybenzoyl hexyl benzoate. butylene glycol. diisopropyl sebacate. ethylhexyl triazone. polyglyceryl-6 stearate. bis-ethylhexyloxyphenol methoxyphenyl triazine. titanium dioxide [nano]. potassium cetyl phosphate. 1,2-hexanediol. cellulose. talc. triacontanyl pvp. glycerin. ci 77891/titanium dioxide. parfum/fragrance. glyceryl caprylate. polyacrylate crosspolymer-6. silica. synthetic fluorphlogopite. polyglyceryl-6 behenate. ethylhexylglycerin. tocopheryl acetate. c30-45 olefin. disodium edta. tocopherol. dimethicone. mangifera indica (mango) leaf extract. marrubium vulgare extract. kalanchoe pinnata leaf extract. t-butyl alcohol. phenethyl alcohol. tin oxide. citric acid. furcellaria lumbricalis extract. sodium benzoate. potassium sorbate. lapsana communis flower/leaf/stem extract. maris sal/sea salt/sel marin [s3682a]

Title: Cils booster xl
Description:
what it is
the #1 lash-conditioning and mascara primer all-in-one.

what it does
plush, voluminous, healthy lashes can be yours with just a sweep of this innovative mascara primer. gliding on smoothly and evenly, each coat creates an even surface layer to maximize the results of your favorite mascara. with a conditioning formula for visible performance, infused with micro-fibers, vitamin b5 and vitamin e, lashes appear longer and fuller. this revitalizing lash primer will improve lash results, thickness and curl over time.

white in color, cils booster xl leaves lashes feeling luxurious and soft, while allowing the pigment of your favorite mascara to stand out, thus, creating an intense and rich false-lash look.

Title: Effacernes
Description: smoothing, long-wearing concealer. spf 30 this natural coverage concealer instantly hides the signs of stress and fatigue. it provides full and natural coverage, evens out skin tone, covers dark circles and lightens fine lines around the eyes to achieve a flawless finish.

Title: Effacernes
Description: smoothing, long-wearing concealer. spf 30 this natural coverage concealer instantly hides the signs of stress and fatigue. it provides full and natural coverage, evens out skin tone, covers dark circles and lightens fine lines around the eyes to achieve a flawless finish.

Title: Teint idole ultra wear 24h spf15
Description: our best-selling liquid foundation teint idole ultra wear is now available in 45 shades, making it easier than ever to find your perfect shade match.  this liquid foundation is long lasting and provides full coverage without feeling cakey, leaving skin feeling comfortable all day. with great staying power, our 24 hour foundation allows you to go out and be your best without needing to retouch on the go. teint idole ultra wear is transfer free and smudge free, giving you confidence to carry on with your day and maximise your power.

Title: Couture eye palette
Description:
what it is
dare to reinvent self-expression and femininity with ysl’s sexy tomboy palette, a limited edition eye palette inspired by the couture runway. a 6-shade eyeshadow palette featuring the perfect balance of bold and neutral colors.

what it does
inspired by the famous color signature of ysl global beauty director, tom pecheux, this palette features five highly pigmented matte shades and a glamorous gold shimmer shade. the stunning runway inspired outer case houses these 6 versatile shades that work together to create any subtle to bold eye look.

Title: Flash lash primer
Description:
what it is
a nourishing lash primer that seamlessly amplifies the effect of all ysl mascaras.

what it does
take lashes to the next level with our flash lash primer, ysl’s first mascara base and secret ingredient for eye-catching flawless lashes. the flash primer’s pink formula dries down clear on lashes and creates added length and volume for mascara to adhere to. application of this primer is clean and seamless thanks to the unique brush technology of the elastomer comb. achieve the ideal full fan effect as this lash primer creates unrivaled length, curl and standout volume. enhance the effect of any ysl mascara with ysl’s newest best-kept secret.

Title: Brow this way eyebrow sculpting kit
Description:
want the london look? stunning brows are at your fingertips! brow this way eyebrow sculpting kit from rimmel london is a powder and wax duo with which to define, fill, and fix your eyebrows. packaged in a remarkably compact kit that includes a double-sided brush and a mascara style grooming brush, the brow this way kit is easy to use and small enough to pop in your makeup bag and keep with you for brow emergencies. when you want exquisite eyebrows that’ll wow your girlfriends and make your colleagues swoon with envy choose the brow this way eyebrow sculpting kit. use the wax first to set and tidy your brows and give them definition. then apply the powder to fill in any sparse areas and give your brows a natural tint, without any shiny, waxy residue. for a natural brow look so stunning you’ll be jealous of yourself, the brow this way eyebrow sculpting kit deserves a spot in your makeup kit. a lovely gift for a girlfriend, sister or mum! rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving.
rimmel is not perfection or intimidating,  it is like  london : young, urban, eclectic, edgy.
it is expression with no rules, it is real, it is accessible. get the london look.

Description:

Title: Professional eyebrow pencil
Description:
want the london look? discover a subtle pencil that won’t spoil your natural look. the professional eyebrow pencil in dark brown from rimmel london is a kohl pencil with which to enhance and refine the shape of your eyebrows. use it to fill gaps or lengthen the arc of the eyebrow for a stunning natural look. the lid doubles as a little brush so you can brush your eyebrow hairs before and after filling them in – super handy! when you want perfectly groomed eyebrows to balance your features and frame your eyes, choose the professional eyebrow pencil in dark brown from rimmel london! apply directly onto eyebrows. the brush is great for filling in any gaps, spreading out the colour a bit, and softening the look. use short, light strokes to fill in that outer third perfectly and make your eyebrows look naturally full. blend with fingertips and use the brush applicator to brush hairs evenly. perfect for those who are just starting out with filling in their eyebrows as the professional eyebrow pencil is easy to use and blends well with the brush. a lovely gift for a girlfriend, sister – or mum! rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving.

Title: Scandaleyes mascara
Description:
want the london look? for lashes so big, it's almost criminal! with 3 times more collagen and 3 times more keratin than most formulas, scandaleyes black mascara from rimmel london is a “one stroke volume revealing mascara”. our maxdensity brush is 50% larger with 12 times more volume and is perfect for coating all your lashes, even the tiny inner eye ones without getting mascara all over your eyelids. scandaleyesblack mascara leaves no clumps and stays on all day without drooping lashes, smudges, or flakes for scandalous eyelash volume!  so whether you looking for an everyday work mascara or something special to wow the world when you out on the town, this is the perfect mascara! apply at the roots of your lashes for maximum definition. the big applicator brush is perfect for coating all your lashes, even the inner eye ones. when applying multiple coats, wait a few minutes between each. with three coats, you will have the most amazing length and volume ever achieved with mascara! if you want lashes that look longer, darker, and thicker in a single stroke, try scandaleyes black mascara from rimmel london. a lovely gift for a girlfriend, sister – or mum! rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving.

Description:

Title: Scandaleyes waterproof kohl kajal liner
Description:
want the london look? outline your eyes with waterproof, smudge proof drama. rimmel london brings you scandaleyes kohl kajal liner in intense, sexy black. the long lasting colour won't run or smudge from day to night. this soft, precision kohl kajal liner glides on smooth and creamy. the waterproof formula withstands tears, sweat, humidity, rubbing - and whatever else the night might throw at you! apply scandaleyes kohl kajal liner around the top and bottom of your lash line. for an edgy look, blur the line over the eyelid, then blend with your favourite rimmel london eyeshadow. you're ready for a night of clubbing! black kohl eyeliner is an essential makeup tool that no girl should be without. scandaleyes kohl kajal liner adds extra drama to eyes, with no runnin, no smudgeing. what a great little present for your bff, your sister or your mum! rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving.
rimmel is not perfection or intimidating,  it is like  london : young, urban, eclectic, edgy.
it is expression with no rules, it is real, it is accessible. live the london look

Title: Ultimate kohl kajal eyeliner
Description: want the london look? get the perfect sultry look with the new ultimate kohl kajal. say good by to racoon eyes ! its unique waterproof formula gives you 24hr wear without smudging. the conical tip applicator and the creamy, easy glide-on formula allows you to create a defined, subtle look or even to build a bold, dramatic result. use black obsidian to bear an enhanced and impactful eye look day and night apply ultimate kohl kajal around the top and bottom of your lash line. for an edgy look, blur the line over the eyelid, then blend with your favourite rimmel london eyeshadow. you're ready for a night of clubbing! ultimate kohl kajal black obsidian is an essential makeup tool that no girl should be without. scandaleyes kohl kajal liner adds extra drama to eyes, with no running, no smudging. what a great little present for your bff, your sister or your mum! rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving. rimmel is not perfection or intimidating, it is like london : young, urban, eclectic, edgy. it is expression with no rules, it is real, it is accessible. get the london look.

Title: Brow this way fill & sculpt eyebrow definer
Description: want the london look? define, fill and fix brows with brow this way fill & sculpt brow definer. double ended eyebrow definer with a precise triangular tip and a spoolie brush to blend easily and define intense natural-looking brows. last 12hrs, and does not transfer or fade. when you want perfected and sculpted brows and get a wow eye look step 1 : apply the buildable formula to fill your brows step 2 : use the spoolie brush to shape your brows for those who want instantly fuller, defined yet natural-looking eyebrows. ideal for those who are strapped for time and need an easy-to-use, colour-lasting formula. rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving. rimmel is not perfection or intimidating, it is like london : young, urban, eclectic, edgy. it is expression with no rules, it is real, it is accessible. live the london look.

Title: Scandaleyes wow wings
Description: want the london look? free your wow with scandaleyes wow wings mascara from rimmel london. get instant wow lashes thanks to its unique 2-side brush : load up with the winged side, flare out with the curved side. up to 11 times the volume ! when you want instant ultimate volume, step 1 : use the winged side to instantly load your lashes. step 2 : use the curved side to define and achieve a full fan effect. if your lashes have been missing that special wow effect lately then turn to scandaleyes wow wings mascara for ultra volumised & winged out lashes rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving. rimmel is not perfection or intimidating, it is like london : young, urban, eclectic, edgy. it is expression with no rules, it is real, it is accessible. live the london look.

Title: Wonder'full brow
Description: live the london look! colour, fill and tame your brows with wonder'full brow from rimmel london. infused with 4 luxurious oils, the creamy coloured formula with fibres gives you that natural yet 'plumped' makeup effect. it doesn’t smudge or fade, for fuller-looking brows that stay put for up to 24 hours. so whether you're working, shopping, on a special occasion, or out with the girls you will be ready for everything! wonder'full brow in medium brown is the ideal brow product to use daily. its tiny tapered brush gives you ideal precision, for easy, quick and mess-free application. for daily brow perfection, wonder'full brow is the perfect addition to your makeup kit. and it would make a lovely gift for a girlfriend, sister or even your mum! rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving. rimmel is not perfection or intimidating, it is like london : young, urban, eclectic, beautiful. it is expression with no rules, it is real, it is accessible. live the london look!

Title: Wonder'proof eyeliner
Description:
from rimmel london, comes wonder'proof liner, true copper. the best of colour + waterproof technologies in 1 liquid liner. no more compromise, one stroke, one full day of colour!
this innovative formula delivers intense colour while being fully waterproof for up to 24hr!
with it's new flexible flock applicator for quick and easy colour looks, the bold liner look has never been so easy. just live you wonder life!
 so whether you're working, shopping, on a special occasion, or out with the girls you will be ready for everything.  gently apply as a normal liquid eye liner on the eyelid to reveal highly pigmented colours and an intense bold look! wonder'proof liner, true copper is the perfect gift if you were looking to share your make up secrets and enjoyment of rimmel london with others. create edgy, on-trend eye-styles with a single product.  rimmel is the uk’s number 1 make-up brand and the face of london style. we live for the riot of colour on the streets, for the vibrant clubs and the hidden bars. we devour the music and the energy and come back for more. rimmel believes in fashion without rules and values every individual interpretation of beauty.

Title: Wonder eyeliner
Description: want the london look? swipe for drama with the new wonder'swipe 2-in-1 liner to shadow by rimmel london. its breakthrough 2-in-1 formula will take your eye look to the next level ! transform your bold metallic liner into a sparkle shadow with the stroke of a finger ! a true multi-tasking wonder ! wonder’swipe has an extensive palette of 16 statement-making shades ranging from opulent metal tones to brilliant brights to deliciously dark hues. layer and combine them all to create unique, show-stopping looks that lasts up to 10 hours ! whenever you want ! wonder'swipe is a true multi-tasking wonder. apply as a normal liquid eye liner on the eyelid. to reveal the sparkle shadow, blend it with a brush or your finger, whilst still wet. create edgy, on-trend eye-styles with a single product. eye liner or eyeshadow? metallic or glittery? you choose! swipe the formula to reveal the potential. #youswipeyouchoose rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving. rimmel is not perfection or intimidating, it is like london : young, urban, eclectic, edgy. it is expression with no rules, it is real, it is accessible. live the london look

Title: Scandaleyes
Description: amplify your mascara with ultimate boost volume primer from rimmel london. the first step of your routine is to prep and boost your lashes. you'll find it primes lashes to maximise results, enhancing the look of your mascara and adding extra length and thickness to eyelashes. lashes feel strengthened, nourished, and extremely conditioned over time. ultimate boost volume primer from rimmel london feels lightweight and smoothes lashes whilst providing an instant lash boost for visible performance. apply the primer from root to tip and leave 30 seconds to dry. next, find and apply your favourite rimmel london mascara to build gorgeous lashes. live the london look!

Title: Brow pro micro
Description: define, fill, and shape your eyebrows with brow pro micro ultra-fine precision pencil from rimmel london in blonde. you'll find the 1.5mm tip is perfect for ultra-precise application for a natural yet noticeably perfected look. this waterproof and smudge-proof formula leaves you with brows that won't budge and last all day. to apply, use the spoolie brush to comb eyebrows into shape, then use the ultra-fine nib to shape and fill in sparse areas. for the finishing touch, use the spoolie brush to comb through your brows once more to help blend for a natural finish. you'll find that it's easy to remove at the end of the day, too. get full, naturally defined brows that last with brow pro micro ultra-fine precision pencil. live the london look.

Title: Scandaleyes volume on demand
Description: build your lashes with the scandal'eyes volume on demand mascara from rimmel london. you'll find that this easy to build volume mascara lets you customise your look and build your lashes throughout the day, without clumping. the ultra-smooth conditioning formula is endlessly buildable meaning you won't regret your last stroke, so you can amp your lash look as desired, from feathered to full blast. with scandal'eyes volume on demand mascara, you can build and customise your volume whenever and wherever you want making it the ultimate day to night mascara. it's smudge-proof, flake-proof, and easy to remove. the unique soft, waxy bristle brush separates lashes from root to tip to reveal a fan of longer, fuller lashes and volumizes even the smallest, thinnest lashes. live the london look.

Title: Scandaleyes volume on demand

Title: White plus pure translucency brightening aqua treatment lotion
Description:
this treatment lotion is essential for preparing for the next skin care steps. a refreshing lotion that feels like water on the skin and is quickly absorbed.

  • the complexion is more even and brighter looking.
  • the skin is left toned and refreshed.

ingredients

composition* : aqua/water/eau, butylene glycol, glycerin, ascorbyl glucoside, tromethamine, phenoxyethanol, sodium citrate, ppg-26-buteth-26, ethylhexylglycerin, peg-40 hydrogenated castor oil, biotin, parfum/fragrance, spergularia rubra extract, citric acid, malpighia e

Title: White plus pure brightening revive night mask-gel
Description:
refreshing night gel works 3 ways to promote an even skin tone and boost skin luminosity:

1. regular night gel—to help skin recover from dullness resulting from daily aggressors
2. sleeping mask—to help restore clarity and radiance while you sleep
3. intensive 10-minute mask—as a quick pick-me-up to brighten and revive skin any time it needs it

benefits

  • boosts luminosity
  • revives radiance
  • refreshes and hydrates

Title: Lip comfort oil shimmer
Description: lip comfort oil shimmer offers bright colour and 3d shine thanks to its combination of intense pigments and highly-concentrated fine shimmer: your lips are visibly plumped and enhanced. it also doesn't sacrifice care: its ultra-rich trio of oils nourishes, comforts and protects the lips.

Title: Lip comfort oil shimmer
Description: lip comfort oil shimmer offers bright colour and 3d shine thanks to its combination of intense pigments and highly-concentrated fine shimmer: your lips are visibly plumped and enhanced. it also doesn't sacrifice care: its ultra-rich trio of oils nourishes, comforts and protects the lips.

the set contains four important expert treatments that preserve the youthful appearance of the face and eyes. double serum targets the visible signs of aging with extracts of 21 of some of the most effective plants. double serum eye is targeted at the eye area. the extra-firming day & night duo, containing extract of regenerative kangaroo flower, tightens and plumps the skin, reduces the appearance of wrinkles and has an immediate calming effect. the complexion becomes more uniform and the skin acquires a beautiful glow. for ages 40+.

Title: Hydrating gentle foaming cleanser
Description:
clarins new gentle foaming hydrating cleanser gently and effectively cleanses normal to dry skin, removes traces of make-up, ridding the skin of impurities and promoting the removal of pollution particles. in addition to removing make-up and ridding the skin of impurities, this gentle foaming cleanser helps preserve the skin's microbiota during cleansing! thanks to the vegetable squalane present in its formula, the skin's hydrolipidic film is reinforced.
the secret of this gentle foaming cleanser?
a real cocktail of plants that takes care of the skin and makes it more beautiful day after day:
- the gentle complex, which combines two soothing active ingredients (organic yellow gentian & organic melissa) grown in clarins' own estate, helps to soothe, calm and soften the skin with each make-up removal.
- organic saponaria extract, a plant with self-foaming power, has cleansing and emulsifying properties, ideal for gently cleansing the skin...gently,
- moringa extract, helps to eliminate pollution particles
- the anti-pollution complex: vegetable squalane, thus reinforces the hydrolipidic film.
- the organic aloe vera extract brings moisture, suppleness and softness to the skin.
the plus of this gentle foaming cleanser?
the gentle complex contained in the formula of this gentle foaming cleanser combines two plants cultivated in clarins' estate: organic yellow gentian and organic lemon balm.
the clarins estate: an open-air laboratory
a unique and preserved site, nestled at an altitude of 1,400 metres in the heart of the alps where plants grow with the rhythm of the seasons. a veritable treasure trove of purity without air and soil pollution, where clarins elaborates its own plant extracts full of active ingredients: pure ingredients. naturally effective.

Title: Gentle renewing cleansing mousse
Description:
clarins gentle renewing cleansing mousse is suitable for all skin types. the tamarind pulp extract creates an exfoliating action on the skins texture by breaking the links between the cells to remove dead skin cells. the anti-pollution formula is now even greener than ever with the two key alpine herb ingredients, gentian and lemon balm now being harvested from the domaine clarins, the open-air laboratory in the heart of the alps. the clear liquid texture lathers upon contact with water to remove all traces of make-up and impurities, whilst also protecting from dehydration and helping to limit the drying effects of hard water. skin is left feeling soft and soothed.

apply morning and/or night. lather on wet skin by massaging onto the face and neck using circular motions. rinse carefully with cool water in the mornings or warm water at night.

Title: Soothing gentle foaming cleanser
Description:
clarins new range of gentle foaming cleansers are tailored to your skin type and concerns. soothing gentle foaming cleanser is suitable for very dry or sensitive skin types thanks to shea butter and chamomile extract which comfort and soothe the skin. the anti-pollution formula is now even greener than ever with the two key alpine herb ingredients, gentian and lemon balm now being harvested from the domaine clarins, the open-air laboratory in the heart of the alps. the thick cream texture lathers upon contact with water to remove all traces of make-up and impurities, whilst also protecting from dehydration and helping to limit the drying effects of hard water. skin is left feeling soft and soothed.

apply morning and/or night. lather on wet skin by massaging onto the face and neck using circular motions. rinse with water.

Title: Clarinsmen energizing gel
Description: clarinsmen energizing gel is the ideal treatment for men who lead an intense life. a real dose of energy, vitality and hydration for tired skin. the powerful action of organic red ginseng extract contributes to the energy production of the skin to energize, stimulate it and allow it to resist all kinds of aggressions (extreme temperatures, exhaustion and stress). for a radiant complexion and rested skin, without features of fatigue, and more toned.

Title: Kisskiss shine bloom
Description:
guerlain presents kisskiss shine bloom, the new bright lipstick with 95% ingredients of natural origin *.

a formula with a glossy finish that makes no compromises in terms of sensor technology or performance. the extremely melting texture glides over the lips and dresses them in a full-bodied color with a “watery” sheen **. a flowery, nourishing lipstick with 24 hours of moisture ***, in which the ingredients of natural origin nourish the lips day after day.

the glossy lipstick kisskiss shine bloom is available in 20 radiant, irresistible and pleasant to wear shades. inspired by the color world of flowers, these tones create a trendy and lively result for natural beauty, whatever your mood.

Title: Scandaleyes exaggerate eye definer
Description:
scandaleyes exaggerate eye definer from rimmel is an eyeliner pen that glides on effortlessly and gives high colour impact to instantly define and enhance eyes. the buttery-soft, water-repellent eye makeup formula provides extreme wear for up to 24 hours. available in 6 stunning shades.

features and benefits:
- eyeliner with super-rich colour pigments for a high impact look
- ultra-creamy texture glides on for effortless application
- retractable automatic tip for easy storage
- use on the waterline to create bold lines
- waterproof, transfer-proof and smudge-proof formula for 24-hour wear
how to apply
step 1: apply your shade of scandaleyes exaggerate waterproof eye definer to the upper lash line, gliding lightly across from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eye.
step 2: using fingers, lightly blend over the line to smoke eyeliner upwards and outwards.
step 3: retrace eyeliner over the upper lash line to add definition to this smokey look. then, add mascara to finish.

Title: Matt obsess
Description:
matt’obsess liquid lipsticks provide a homogeneous and very long-lasting, ultra-matt effect to the lips.

renewable sources such as sugar and coconut also ensure hydration, and excellent spreadibility, ruling out feathering and dryness.

Title: Luna 3
Description:
supreme facial cleansing for a radiant complexion

luna™ 3 is the latest generation of the world’s first silicone t-sonic™ facial cleansing massager, now offering a bigger brush head, longer and softer touchpoints to ensure an even deeper, more thorough cleanse. in addition to cleansing, luna™ 3 offers a variety of massage routines that target specific areas of your face. available exclusively via foreo app, each massage tightens the skin for a refined, younger-looking complexion.

Title: Luna mini 3
Description:
facial spa massager and cleanser in one

luna™ mini 2 is an enhanced t-sonic™ facial cleansing massager with eight adjustable massage intensities for a fully customizable spa-like experience. the updated 3-zone design is optimized for all skin types and comes in six exciting new colors.

Title: Luna mini 3
Description:
facial spa massager and cleanser in one

luna™ mini 2 is an enhanced t-sonic™ facial cleansing massager with eight adjustable massage intensities for a fully customizable spa-like experience. the updated 3-zone design is optimized for all skin types and comes in six exciting new colors.

Title: Ombre 4 colour eye palette golden hour gradation
Description:
make your eyes stand out with this exceptional 4-colour eye palette! its customisable bronzing shades allows you to create intense or natural looks and play with the different finishes: velvet, satin, metallic or an ultra-shiny glossy effect. 
a 2-in-1 blush with an integrated base!
key ingredient: bamboo powder – known to improve make-up wear

shop online clarins ombre 4 colour eye palette golden hour gradation 4,2g at best price.
product features:
- eyes: eyeshadow palette

Title: Self tan glow for booster face
Description:
easy-to-apply self tanning booster for the face—formulated with 99% ingredients of natural origin—delivers an even, long-lasting tan 365 days a year. the concentrated formula builds in intensity with every drop, so you control the glow—from sun-touched to deep bronze—for natural-looking, customizable results. just 2-3 tanning drops mixed with any face moisturizer, and you’re golden!

clarins innovation and natural plant-based expertise
created with over 40 years of sun care expertise, clarins’ radiance-plus golden glow booster for face is formulated with our exclusive self tan complex—a blend of dha + erythrulose, two 100% naturally sourced plant sugars—to produce made-to-measure results. moisture-rich aloe vera extract and glycerin help leave skin supple, radiant, and perfectly hydrated.

mix 2-3 tanning drops with your face moisturizer for a long-lasting, mistake-proof tan. fragrance-free. must be mixed with moisturizer; never use alone.

eco-friendly packaging
clarins’ self tanning range reflects our commitment to responsible beauty. tubes are made of recycled plastic; caps are lightweight, cartons and inserts are printed on paper from sustainably managed forests, packaging is recyclable.

Title: Self tan glow booster for body
Description:
easy-to-apply self tanning booster for the body—formulated with 99% ingredients of natural origin— delivers an even, long-lasting tan 365 days a year. the concentrated formula builds in intensity with every drop, so you control the glow—from sun-touched to deep bronze—for natural-looking, customizable results. just 4-6 tanning drops mixed with any body moisturizer, and you’re golden!

clarins innovation and natural plant-based expertise
created with over 40 years of sun care expertise, clarins’ radiance-plus golden glow booster for body is formulated with our exclusive self tan complex—a blend of dha + erythrulose, two 100% naturally sourced plant sugars—to produce made-to-measure results. moisture-rich aloe vera extract and glycerin help leave skin supple, radiant, and perfectly hydrated.

mix 4-6 tanning drops with your body moisturizer for a long-lasting, mistake-proof tan. fragrance-free. must be mixed with body moisturizer; never use alone.

eco-friendly packaging
clarins’ self tanning range reflects our commitment to responsible beauty. tubes are made of recycled plastic; caps are lightweight, cartons and inserts are printed on paper from sustainably managed forests, packaging is recyclable.

Title: Multi-tasker concealer
Description: cover up blemishes, dark circles or any skin imperfections with this innovative concealer by rimmel. the super-sized soft-touch wand with a built-in product reservoir lets you add precise full coverage wherever you need it. the buildable high-pigment makeup formula glides on and blends into the skin perfectly to create a brighter-looking, smooth, even canvas. furthermore, it lasts all day.

Title: Supra lift & curl mascara
Description:
a 2-in-1 mascara that visibly lifts, curls, lengthens, volumizes, and cares for your lashes—for an open, wide-eyed look.

this lightweight, water-resistant formula won’t smudge, clump, or budge even on hot summer days. formulated with our lash lifting complex—a blend of natural polymers—this mascara delivers a visible lift and curl effect. our exclusive lash boosting complex protects lashes and provides visibly thicker, longer-looking lashes while the curved mascara brush, with unique fibers, delivers a controlled dose with each application to define every last lash. together, you get a professional lash-lift effect from home—no eyelash curler required!

Title: Wonder'extension mascara
Description: rimmel wonder'extension mascara is a lash-lengthening mascara that gives the effect of lash extensions, leaving full, long and defined lashes. formula is built with stretchy texture extends beyond the tips of your lashes. lash grabbing brush lifts and extends as it lengthens. clump-free, long lasting, smudge-proof, flake-proof and easy to remove.

Title: Lasting finish exaggerate automatic lipliner
Description: long lasting precise contour colour. full volume colour and definition. soft texture. fine tipped automatic liner.

Title: Lasting finish exaggerate automatic lipliner
Description: long lasting precise contour colour. full volume colour and definition. soft texture. fine tipped automatic liner.

Title: Abeille royale intense repair oil in balm
Description:
this oil-in-balm has been specially formulated to instantly comfort and revitalize even dry or weakened skin*.
its non-greasy formula combines dynamic blackbee repair technology, concentrated in black bee honey from ouessant island**, with a powerful complex composed of soothing and fortifying active ingredients: cicawax. in one hour, the skin barrier is restored***.

in 7 days, skin's youth recovery is visible.****
skin is visibly smoother, firmer and more radiant.

95% naturally-derived ingredients*****

use: morning and/or evening on the face, neck and décolleté. for intense comfort, apply as a mask.
may also be used to revitalize dry or weakened areas of the body.

*apply to healthy skin. **in a honey blend ***instrumental test, 32 women, 1 hour after application.
****self-satisfaction test in china, 104 women, 7 days after twice-daily application.
*****calculation based on the international iso standard 16128, including water. the remaining 5% contributes to optimizing the formula's integrity over time and its sensorial texture.

Title: Kind & free hydrating concealer
Description:
our first clean makeup that works, no compromises. 100% vegan & kind to animals. free from fragrance*, mineral oils, animal derived ingredients*. vegan & clean lightweight formula conceals and brightens under eye. • lightweight, medium buildable coverage formulated with an antioxidant complex of vitamin e & pro-vitamin b5 and aloe vera. • made with 80% ingredients of natural origin. • dewy finish and all day long hydration. • d5 free formula without perfumes. • packaging made with recycled materials.

how to apply

step 1: apply to face straight from the wand. simply swipe where you desire coverage: under eyes, blemishes or to even skin tone.

step 2: once applied, gently blend with finger tips, a brush or a sponge.

Title: My clarins re boost instant reviving mask
Description:
a vegan, icy cream-gel face mask that instantly hydrates, revives radiance, and diminishes signs of fatigue.

what it is

a refreshing, 10-minute face mask that intensely hydrates the skin, visibly reduces signs of fatigue, and restores radiance. the icy, cream-gel mask is formulated with 88% natural ingredients—including super-quenching organic leaf of life and organic quinoa extracts, plus radiance-boosting escin from horse chestnut—to awaken tired skin that looks dull and puffy due to lack of sleep. my clarins exclusive healthy in & out complex of nourishing organic coconut water and detoxifying organic alpenrose extract leaves skin looking healthy, hydrated, and revived. the blue, creamy gel with a moisture-rich texture delivers an invigorating, cooling effect upon contact.
your vegan recipe—free of phthalates, parabens, and sulfates—to minimize signs of fatigue for refreshed, radiant skin. my clarins is free of all animal-derived ingredients and was not tested on animals.
skin type: all skin types
texture: cream-gel
use: use 1-2 times per week, as needed.
benefits
intensely hydrates and revives radiance
awakens dull, tired skin and diminishes signs of fatigue
icy, cooling texture instantly refreshes
healthy in & out complex feeds the skin with nutrients and helps flush out toxins and pollutants
innovation and plant expertise
my clarins exclusive healthy in & out complex is comprised of organic coconut water to put nutrients into the skin and alpenrose extract to flush out toxins and pollutants.
clarins plus
a vegan recipe free of phthalates, parabens, and sulfates. my clarins is free of all animal-derived ingredients and was not tested on animals.

results

97%*
the complexion feels fresh

97%* the mask offers a wave of moisture that allows skin to regain suppleness and comfort
95%** skin is deeply hydrated
*consumer test - 80 women - ages 18-32 - after 14 days use
**consumer test - 80 women - ages 18-32 - immediately after application

ingredients

Title: My clarins purifying and matifying toner

vegan, mattifying toner that balances, de-shines, and refines skin texture in just one step.

what it is

a refreshing, mattifying toning lotion that balances, refines, and takes down shine for a clean, clear complexion. this gentle, plant-enriched formula contains 96% ingredients of natural origin—including my clarins exclusive healthy in & out complex of nourishing organic coconut water and detoxifying organic alpenrose extract, plus purifying organic meadowsweet extract—to keep your skin balanced, and shine-free throughout the day. tamarind pulp extract, rich in ahas, gently exfoliates to smooth the skin's texture. organic golden gentian and organic fig extracts soothe and hydrate.

your vegan recipe—free of phthalates, parabens, and sulfates—for skin that looks healthy, shine-free, and refined. an essential step in your my clarins mattifying routine.

skin type: normal, oily, combination, dry

use: every day, morning and/or evening.

Title: Bright plus dark spot targeting moisturising emulsion
Description:
a moisturizing day lotion for all skin types that deeply hydrates, targets dull skin, and dark spots for a visibly brighter-looking, more even skin tone.

what it is

a gentle moisturizing day lotion for all skin types—even the most sensitive—that targets dullness and dark spots for a visibly brighter, more even skin tone. formulated with 96% ingredients of natural origin, this breakthrough skincare innovation is powered by clarins’ advanced brightening complex of organic lady’s mantle, organic sea lily extracts, and a vitamin c derivative to visibly brighten and reduce the appearance of dark spots. two powerful superfruits—a blend of rose myrtle and vitamin c-rich organic acerola seed extracts—deliver a double shot of oxygen to promote healthy-looking, radiant skin. organic apricot oil deeply hydrates and comforts. the sensorial lotion cocoons skin in moisture for a soft, smooth, supple complexion. apply after bright plus serum for best results.

use: apply to clean face and neck each morning and evening.

clarins plus
sensorial emulsion is formulated without colorants, silicone, or alcohol and is gentle enough for the most sensitive skin.

Title: Double serum eye collection
Description:
this perfect mother's day gift set contains: 

  • double serum eye 20ml

  • wonder perfect 4d mascara in shade 01 perfect black 3ml

  • total cleansing oil 50ml

how to use:
double serum eye: 
adjust the dial according to the desired amount of serum. mix the two phases with your fingertips. then press onto the eyelids and the under-eye area moving from the inner corner out to the temples. finally, apply the serum with slight pressure between your brows.

total cleansing oil:
1. apply total cleansing oil to dry skin and mix with water to emulsify into a white milk.
2. rinse with water.

wonder perfect 4d mascara 01 perfect black:
apply your mascara from the roots of your eyelashes to the tips to fully coat them. apply a second coat of mascara for a more dramatic make-up look.

Title: Orchidee imperiale brightening the global uv protector
Description: the orchidée impériale brightening global uv protector concentrates orchids' exceptional regenerating and illuminating powers in an spf 50-pa+++ high-protection fluid. it helps to fight external aggressors that dull the epidermis, in order to reveal the most imperial light of all and elevate the skin’s youthful beauty. a technological marvel in an imperceptible veil to perfect and correct skin.

Title: Kisskiss bee glow lip balm
Description:
guerlain introduces kisskiss bee glow, a tinted lip balm infused with honey and made of 98% naturally-derived ingredients¹. it revives the natural color of the lips with a touch of glowing shine, by offering a 24-hour hydrating² care. creamy and addictive, its incredibly melting texture glides onto the lips for long-lasting comfort. the formula combines honey and melting active ingredients for soothed, softened, nourished and plumped lips, more beautiful day after day.

kisskiss bee glow is available in six floral shades with a syrupy, sheer finish for a radiant, irresistible and vibrant smile, one which celebrates nature, ready to be kissed!

Title: Beauty flash peel
Description:
what it is
beauty flash peel works on all levels of the skin to effectively and visibly target a lack of radiance, uneven skin and visible wrinkles. it exfoliates the skin to boost skin regeneration and restore radiance and suppleness. a new quick, convenient and effective way to renew your skin at home.
warning: this product contains alpha hydroxy acid (aah), which may increase sensitivity to the sun and cause the skin to burn. wear sun protection, protective clothing and limit sun exposure when using this product and for at least a week after using it. follow the instructions. avoid contact with eyes, if irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician.

use: 2-3 times per week, in the evening.

benefits
instant glow.
refreshing and energizing effect.

clarins plus
the aromatic essences of pure plant extracts—including almond, freesia, pear, magnolia, peony, violet, cedar, and musk—make it your go-to, at-home spa treatment for glowing skin. the perfect way to perk up dull, tired-looking skin affected by pollution, stress, lack of sleep, toxins, and harsh environmental influences.

results
93%* of women noticed their skin looked renewed.

91%** of women say their complexion is revived.
*consumer test – 103 women, after 14 days of use. **consumer test – 103 women, after 28 days of use.

Title: 24h drama liqui pencil waterproof
Description:
bold liquid gel liner in a pencil
these ultra-gliding gel eyeliner pencils provide long-lasting intense color payoff in one stroke, with a range of matte, metallic and glitter finishes.
get all day-long dramatic eye looks with up to 24h drama liqui-pencil eyeliner.
these ultra-gliding gel eyeliner pencils provide long-lasting intense color payoff in one stroke, with a range of matte, metallic and glitter finishes.
with its unique gel formula, this long lasting eyeliner has the high-intensity color payoff of a liquid liner, with the easy application of a pencil. the texture, rich with pure color pigment, is smudgeable when first applied, sets quickly, and once set, it will not smudge, rub or move, for extreme longwear.
apply with light strokes of the liner for flawless precise lines, or to smudge immediately for an instant eyeshadow or smokey eye effect.

benefits
• up to 24h wear
• intense color in one stroke.
• waterproof

how to apply
- apply your liner as close to lashes as possible for a tight line or gradually increase and build-out a dramatic cat-eye or smokey eye makeup look.
- use the tip of the pencil to fill in any gaps between lashes.
- smudge immediately after application when creating a soft or smokey look since this gel eyeliner formula is ultra-waterproof and sets quickly.

pro tip!
for those with brown eyes, try the warm and golden toned colors such as blue (#6 parisian night), violet (#7 purple cabaret) and teal (#5 seine sparkles).
for those with green eyes, line the lower lash line with black to offset any redness, and try purple (#7 purple cabaret), olive (#3 green metropolitan) and copper (#2 french chocolate) hues.
for those with blue eyes, try brown and bronze tones as well as gold (#4 leading lights) or navy blue (#6 parisian night).

for those with blue eyes, try brown and bronze tones as well as gold (#4 leading lights) or navy blue (#6 parisian night).

Title: 24h drama liqui pencil waterproof
Description:
bold liquid gel liner in a pencil
these ultra-gliding gel eyeliner pencils provide long-lasting intense color payoff in one stroke, with a range of matte, metallic and glitter finishes.
get all day-long dramatic eye looks with up to 24h drama liqui-pencil eyeliner.
these ultra-gliding gel eyeliner pencils provide long-lasting intense color payoff in one stroke, with a range of matte, metallic and glitter finishes.
with its unique gel formula, this long lasting eyeliner has the high-intensity color payoff of a liquid liner, with the easy application of a pencil. the texture, rich with pure color pigment, is smudgeable when first applied, sets quickly, and once set, it will not smudge, rub or move, for extreme longwear.
apply with light strokes of the liner for flawless precise lines, or to smudge immediately for an instant eyeshadow or smokey eye effect.

benefits
• up to 24h wear
• intense color in one stroke.
• waterproof

how to apply
- apply your liner as close to lashes as possible for a tight line or gradually increase and build-out a dramatic cat-eye or smokey eye makeup look.
- use the tip of the pencil to fill in any gaps between lashes.
- smudge immediately after application when creating a soft or smokey look since this gel eyeliner formula is ultra-waterproof and sets quickly.

pro tip!
for those with brown eyes, try the warm and golden toned colors such as blue (#6 parisian night), violet (#7 purple cabaret) and teal (#5 seine sparkles).
for those with green eyes, line the lower lash line with black to offset any redness, and try purple (#7 purple cabaret), olive (#3 green metropolitan) and copper (#2 french chocolate) hues.
for those with blue eyes, try brown and bronze tones as well as gold (#4 leading lights) or navy blue (#6 parisian night).

Title: Le stylo waterproof eyeliner
Description:
a creamy, waterproof eyeliner pencil that is both blendable and long-wearing. the ultimate must-have for smokey eye fans who want rich color payoff from their eyeliner. this versatile eye pencil smoothly glides on to lash line for precise application and intense color payoff that won’t budge or flake.
waterproof and water resistant, it sets quickly for all-day wear.
with an ultra creamy texture eyeliner that allows seamless blending, whether going to work or out to play, for a smokey eye or for gradient-effect cat eye makeup looks.
le stylo eyeliner comes in ten richly pigmented shades, matte and metallic finishes and double-ended with retractable thin tip and smudger propel.

benefits
• high precision long lasting eyeliner
• custom-wear effect with double-ended pencil ultra thin tip or blended wear, waterproof
• ultra-creamy, buildable, blendable

Title: Le stylo waterproof eyeliner
Description:
a creamy, waterproof eyeliner pencil that is both blendable and long-wearing. the ultimate must-have for smokey eye fans who want rich color payoff from their eyeliner. this versatile eye pencil smoothly glides on to lash line for precise application and intense color payoff that won’t budge or flake.
waterproof and water resistant, it sets quickly for all-day wear.
with an ultra creamy texture eyeliner that allows seamless blending, whether going to work or out to play, for a smokey eye or for gradient-effect cat eye makeup looks.
le stylo eyeliner comes in ten richly pigmented shades, matte and metallic finishes and double-ended with retractable thin tip and smudger propel.

benefits
• high precision long lasting eyeliner
• custom-wear effect with double-ended pencil ultra thin tip or blended wear, waterproof
• ultra-creamy, buildable, blendable

Title: Teint idole ultra wear blush stick
Description:
warm up your cheeks in a single swipe!
this blush possesses a lightweight cream-to-powder texture that glides comfortably onto your skin.
it is highly concentrated in pigments for a natural colour that stays all day.
this blush stick is also super buildable, allowing you to go from a natural flush to a full bold sophisticated look.

teint idole ultra wear blush sticks are suitable for all skin tones.
tested under dermatological control. formula designed for all skin types even sensitive skins.

benefits
• it sculpts with pigments in a single swipe for the perfect vibrant complexion
• it has a lightweight cream-to-powder texture
• it provides a buildable, long-lasting colour
• it is an easy-to-apply, quick and precise blush stick, ready wherever you go

how to apply
with teint idole ultra wear blush stick there are no rules. apply face blush alone or on top of your lancôme foundation.
dab the skin blush on the apples of you cheek for a natural flush look or build the colour for a full bold sophisticated look.

ingredients

what makes the difference
• this long-lasting blush features an innovative extreme long-wear formula gives all skin tones lasting colour
• it has an ultra-lightweight powder-cream texture glides comfortably onto skin
• it is a pigment-rich makeup stick for a vibrant colour

Title: The eye pencil the intense color eye pencil
Description:
intense tones to redefine your eyes
a selection of pencils with a creamy, ultra-comfortable texture and an endlessly buildable finish.

violette, guerlain creative director of make-up, has imagined five intense, long-lasting and waterproof shades inspired by the fascinating colours of nature.
capacity : 0,35 g

a range of five colours inspired by the wonders of nature
drawn from the fascinating colours offered by nature, the range of five intense shades offers a long-lasting and waterproof result.

01 - black ebony: a black as deep as ebony.
02 - brown earth: a brown that draws its density from the earth.
03 - night blue: a blue as deep as a starry night sky.
04 - plum peony: a dark purple inspired by spellbinding peony petals.
05 - jungle green: an intense, pearly bronze evoking a jungle paradise.

ingredients
#16485 ingredients:
• trimethylsiloxysilicate
• synthetic wax
• hydrogenated polyisobutene
• hydrogenated poly(c6-14 olefin)
• hydrogenated polydecene
• mica
• polybutene
• ethylene/propylene copolymer
• pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate
• cera carnauba (copernicia cerifera (carnauba) wax)
• disteardimonium hectorite
• propylene carbonate
• [+/- ci 77499 (iron oxides)
• ci 77510 (ferric ferrocyanide)]
disclaimer : guerlain product ingredient listings are updated periodically. before using a guerlain product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

a retractable pencil with a sharpener
each pencil, cloaked in glossy black with a subtle band matching its shade, has a retractable lead and comes with a sharpener.

a word from violette, guerlain creative director of make-up
“for me, the eyes are an endless source of creativity. a space to make colour - all colours - shine, so that the eyes are the real centrepiece of the make-up look."
violette, guerlain creative director of make-up

Title: Ombres g eyeshadow quad
Description:
multi-effect eyeshadows
ombres g eyeshadow quads have an exceptional, talc-free texture made up of intense pigments for long-lasting color, offering unparalleled depth.

true gems of nature, the ombres g adorn the eyes with four different finishes: an intense satin, a deep matte, a luminous metallic finish and a radiant pearl.

violette, guerlain creative director of make-up, has imagined generous and balanced palettes, which allow you to play with shades, textures and finishes, creating a host of effects to endlessly transform your eyes both day and night.
capacity : 6 g

six harmonies inspired by the wonders of nature
three star harmonies for a captivating gaze:

360 - mystic peacock: the combination of different shades of blue borrowed from the sumptuous gradation of peacock feathers, enhanced by the sheen of coppery shades.
555 - metal butterfly: the captivating metallic reflections of butterfly wings in tones of gold, pink, orange and brown.
530 - majestic rose: all the facets of a tender rose petal transcribed in addictive soft shades of pink, plum and brown.

three other quads complete this unique color chart:

011 - imperial moon: a sophisticated smoky effect with a hint of nude.
214 - exotic orchid: burgundy to gold hues.
940 - royal jungle: majestic tawny hues.

a carefully developed formula
the soft and comfortable formula based on winter rose oil is extremely sensory. the eyeshadow glides easily over the lid and can be blended as desired to create multiple effects.

ingredients

an elegant golden case
the ombres g harmonies are contained in elegant jewel compacts, slipped into a black velvet suede pouch.
each palette comes with two applicators for ease of application: foam tips for maximum coverage, a liner for a precise line and a brush to blend the textures.

a word from violette, guerlain creative director of make-up
“for me, the eyes are an endless source of creativity. a space to make color - all colors - shine, so that the eyes are the real centerpiece of the make-up look."
violette, guerlain creative director of make-up

Title: Ombres g eyeshadow quad
Description:
multi-effect eyeshadows
ombres g eyeshadow quads have an exceptional, talc-free texture made up of intense pigments for long-lasting color, offering unparalleled depth.

true gems of nature, the ombres g adorn the eyes with four different finishes: an intense satin, a deep matte, a luminous metallic finish and a radiant pearl.

violette, guerlain creative director of make-up, has imagined generous and balanced palettes, which allow you to play with shades, textures and finishes, creating a host of effects to endlessly transform your eyes both day and night.
capacity : 6 g

six harmonies inspired by the wonders of nature
three star harmonies for a captivating gaze:

360 - mystic peacock: the combination of different shades of blue borrowed from the sumptuous gradation of peacock feathers, enhanced by the sheen of coppery shades.
555 - metal butterfly: the captivating metallic reflections of butterfly wings in tones of gold, pink, orange and brown.
530 - majestic rose: all the facets of a tender rose petal transcribed in addictive soft shades of pink, plum and brown.

three other quads complete this unique color chart:

011 - imperial moon: a sophisticated smoky effect with a hint of nude.
214 - exotic orchid: burgundy to gold hues.
940 - royal jungle: majestic tawny hues.

a carefully developed formula
the soft and comfortable formula based on winter rose oil is extremely sensory. the eyeshadow glides easily over the lid and can be blended as desired to create multiple effects.

Title: Mascara noir g
Description:
noir g, the intense volume & curl mascara
guerlain's noir g mascara delivers an intense, vibrant finish to make lashes flutter like butterfly wings.

thanks to its curved brush that hugs the lash shape to perfection, it gives lashes exceptional volume and a dizzying curl, with 24-hour wear¹.
an exclusive combination of exceptional ebony and midnight blue pigments creates a deeply intense, blacker than black shade.

¹instrumental test and clinical evaluation on 30 women.
capacity : 6 g

a 360 effect and 24-hour wear
24h

curl, volume & length¹
noir g mascara in deep black pushes volume and curl intensity to the max. lashes are instantly coated and sculpted.
¹instrumental test and clinical evaluation on 30 women
curl²
+35%
²instrumental test and clinical evaluation on 32 women

volume²
+106%
²instrumental test and clinical evaluation on 32 women

length²
+47%
²instrumental test and clinical evaluation on 32 women

a carefully developed formula
the formula, infused with winter rose oil, offers the brush a smooth glide on the lashes.

ingredients
#17009 ingredients:
• aqua (water)
• olea europaea (olive) oil unsaponifiables
• cera alba (beeswax)
• polyacrylate-21
• bis-diglyceryl polyacyladipate-2
• candelilla cera (euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax)
• cera carnauba (copernicia cerifera (carnauba) wax)
• palmitic acid
• stearic acid
• camellia japonica seed oil
• vp/eicosene copolymer
• acacia senegal gum
• pentylene glycol
• aminomethyl propanediol
• caprylic/capric triglyceride
• hydroxyethylcellulose
• caprylyl glycol
• parfum (fragrance)
• silica
• butylene glycol
• hydroxyacetophenone
• chlorphenesin
• aluminum hydroxide
• trideceth-6 phosphate
• kaolin
• tocopheryl acetate
• dipropylene glycol
• glyceryl caprylate
• disodium phosphate
• sodium phosphate
• tulipa gesneriana flower extract
• polysorbate 60
• [+/- ci 77499 (iron oxides)
• ci 77007 (ultramarines)]
disclaimer : guerlain product ingredient listings are updated periodically. before using a guerlain product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

an elegant golden object
noir g mascara's formula is encapsulated in an elegant golden object in sleek lines.

its cap, highlighted in black and stamped with guerlain's iconic double g signature, underscores the depth of this mascara formula.
