Title: Lash & brow double fix waterproof mascara
Description:
what it is:
a 2-in-1, clear top coat mascara that creates a lifted lash effect and sets brows for up to 12 hours. the lightweight, invisible gel is waterproof and smudge-proof—helping any mascara hold even in the face of rain, heat, sweat, and tears. lashes and brows are protected, nourished and conditioned thanks to our lash boosting complex. application is easy and precise with our innovative, dual-action brush: one side has long fibers that coat every last lash; the other side has short fibers to sculpt and lift the brows.

this formula contains 83% ingredients of natural origin, including clarins’ proprietary, plant-enriched lash boosting complex + organic cranberry oil. polymers derived from natural sugars set, sculpt and visibly lift lashes and brows for 12 hours. a revolutionary new emollient of 100% natural origin creates an invisible, non-sticky, water- and smudge-proof finish that won’t flake.

lash and brow double fix’ mascara’s outer carton is made of cardboard sourced from sustainably-managed forests. show less

  • skin type: normal, oily, combination, dry
  • texture: cream-gel
  • use: sweep over your favorite mascara, or apply to bare lashes and brows for a natural eye look.

benefits:

  • creates a lifted lash effect and sets brows
  • protects, nourishes and conditions for 12 hours
  • waterproof, sweat- and smudge-proof
  • won’t flake or leave a white residue
  • 83% ingredients of natural origin
  • plant-based lash-boosting complex

innovation and plant expertise

pioneers of plant science, clarins research has found a natural alternative to isododecane—a mineral oil derived from petrochemicals that is commonly used for waterproof and long-wearing mascaras. lash & brow double fix’ mascara’s new formula has the same "silicone-like" glide, but is 83% naturally derived—for a lighter touch and a non-sticky, invisible finish that won’t flake or whiten lashes or brows.

clarins plus

makeup made for skin. developed with the same expertise as clarins' skincare, we harness the power of the most potent plant extracts for makeup that delivers true skincare benefits.

results:
85%*
lashes and brows are sculpted and set immediately

82%* lashes and brows are supple immediately
81%** say our innovative, dual-sided applicator brush assures an even distribution of the product on lashes and brows
*consumer study - 110 women - immediately and after 28 days.
**consumer study - 110 women - after 28 days

ingredients:
undecane. tridecane. dextrin palmitate. polymethylsilsesquioxane. trimethylsiloxysilicate. ethylhexyl palmitate. dextrin palmitate/ethylhexanoate. vaccinium macrocarpon (cranberry) seed oil. panthenol. sphinganine. tocopherol. [stm4132a]
*for informational purposes only. every ingredient list is specific to an individual product reference. all formulas are subject to change. while we endeavor to keep this ingredient list accurate, we cannot guarantee that it is reliable, up-to-date, or error-free. please also refer to the ingredient list on the product’s outer packaging for a complete, accurate, and up-to-date list. organic ingredients are produced in accordance with european regulation (ce 2018/848).

Title: Sos lashes serum mascara
Description:
what it is:
a multi-tasking, serum mascara that conditions, nourishes, and primes lashes for flawless mascara application, while enhancing natural lash color. the sensorial, lightweight, refreshing gel texture glides over lashes with a buildable, non-sticky, natural effect. this natural carmel pigment wears beautifully alone, and intensifies any mascara color and makeup result. clarins’ ultra-soft, lash care brush—designed with cotton and castor seed oil fibers—grips lashes to coat each and every one in a single pass, to visibly promote length, curve, and definition.

this lash boosting serum performs as a nourishing sleeping mask and cares for lashes down to the roots. 94% ingredients of natural origin including clarins’ proprietary, plant-enriched lash boosting complex for visibly longer, fuller, thicker lashes, organic castor oil to condition and protect, mastic extract to revitalize , organic oat sugars for a natural curve effect, plus sphinganine and panthenol to visibly thicken, lengthen, and smooth.

  • skin type: normal, oily, combination, dry
  • texture: cream-gel
  • use: sweep over bare lashes for a natural eye look, or use as a base coat to intensify any mascara.

benefits:

  • protects, nourishes, conditions lashes.
  • visibly smoothes, thickens, and lengthens
  • preps and primes lashes for mascara
  • intensifies mascara color and makeup effect
  • natural makeup result on bare lashes
  • can be used as a sleeping mask
  • plant-based lash-boosting complex

innovation and plant expertise
created in the laboratories of clarins, paris, and inspired by the science of hair, our researchers have combined nourishing active plant ingredients in their ideal concentrations to create a deeply conditioning serum, formulated with 96% skincare ingredients, that revitalizes eyelashes—from roots to tips—so lashes appear revitalized and visibly longer.

clarins plus
makeup made for skin. developed with the same expertise as clarins' skincare, we harness the power of the most potent plant extracts for makeup that delivers true skincare benefits.

results:
94%*
say mascara application is easier after serum application

88%* say the brush grips perfectly to the lashes
84%* say their mascara hold is improved
84%* say damaged lashes seem stronger
* consumer study - 104 women

ingredients:
aqua/water/eau. glycerin. alcohol. propanediol. ricinus communis (castor) seed oil. pvp. ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp copolymer. caramel. avena sativa (oat) kernel extract. sphinganine. panthenol. caprylyl glycol. hydroxyacetophenone. chlorphenesin. potassium cetyl phosphate. caprylic/capric triglyceride. ci 77499/iron oxides. disodium edta. ci 77491/iron oxides. ci 77492/iron oxides. pistacia lentiscus (mastic) gum. sodium hydroxide. sodium benzoate. phytic acid. ethylene brassylate. [m4146a]
*for informational purposes only. every ingredient list is specific to an individual product reference. all formulas are subject to change. while we endeavor to keep this ingredient list accurate, we cannot guarantee that it is reliable, up-to-date, or error-free. please also refer to the ingredient list on the product’s outer packaging for a complete, accurate, and up-to-date list. organic ingredients are produced in accordance with european regulation (ce 2018/848).

Title: Absolue the serum
Description:
anti aging skin renewal serum formulated to brighten and rejuvinate dull skin.
millions of regenerative perpetual rose molecular fractionstm clinically proven to accelerate cell renewal to promote healthy skin.

why you'll love it
who doesn't love a myriad of luxury skincare benefits, all-in-one? reveal your golden glow with new absolue the serum. inspired by our longevity science, infused with millions of perpetual rose molecular fractionstm in every bottle, and clinically proven to accelerate cell renewal to remedy dry, dull skin. absolute the serum is the best serum for glowing skin. formulated with pro xylane and perpetual rose, rejuvinated skin has now replaced dry and dull skin.

what does it do?
slows down visible signs of ageing. drop after drop skin feels firmer, plumper, smoother, redensified. skin looks radiant and behaves younger, with the proliferation of fine lines and wrinkles reduced. this skin regeneration serum promises longevity in the form of the reduced visible signs of aging on skin. the binding of potent natural ingredients bring life and plump skin. this skin serum tends to a number of skincare concerns, including skin discoloration, uneven skin, fine lines and wrinkles.

who is it for?
all skin types, (dry skin, oily skin, combination skin), even sensitive skin.
all ages and all ethnicities.

a sumptuous sensoriality
experience our transformative texture skin serum: concentrated and dense at first touch, it immediately melts into skin in a fresh burst, deeply penetrating and plumping skin for instant firming and lifting action. skin is automotically softened and feels healthy and plump, while total smoothness is restored. take this sensorial journey with the best serum for glowing skin.

skin concerns
uneven skin
fine lines and wrinkles on face
dull skin
tired skin

benefits:
when observing absolue the serum, it has shown above industry standard breaking results:

clinically proven results*:
+13% plumpness
+25% smoothness
+16% radiance

*tested under dermatological control; at weeks 4 and 8, clinical test on 51 women.

the benefits provided by absolute the serum are clinically proven and tested, ready to tend to all skin types and various skin concerns. anti aging action is apparent in achieving overall plump and elastic skin, while improving smoothness. allow this skin serum to provide you with a show-stopping radiance.

how to apply:
this skin renewal serum is appropriate for daily use. apply twice daily, in the morning and at night, on clean, dry skin before your face moisturizer (and spf during the day) as follows:

  1. blend 3-4 pumps of the serum between fingertips.
  2. begin at the chin and glide up along the cheeks toward the ears.
  3. glide down along the side of the neck to the clavicle.
  4. glide up in the center of the neck and outward under the jaw line.
  5. continue to apply the remaining product from the center of the forehead outward, around the outer eye area, under the cheeks.
  6. finish above the cheeks from the center of the face toward the outside.
  7. repeat both movements 2 times. finish with your favourite hydrating face moisturizer.

the perfect routine

discover your absolue essentials for your ultimate golden glow.

texture:
experience our transformative texture serum, concentrated and dense at first touch it immediately melts into skin in a fresh burst, deeply penetrating and plumping skin for instant firming and lifting effect. a sensorial journey for an absolute golden glow.

Title: Crushliner
Description:
keywords
eyeliner creamy long lasting precision intense

benefits
this retractable pencil is infused with natural phytopigments and cream formula to deliver a 24-hour wear. this formula creates a ultra-precise, buildable color that fashions bold definition with all-day comfort.

type
eyeliner

how to apply:
suggested usage: twist the tip of the pencil to desired length. draw a line at the base of your lashes, then form a wing dragging it outwards. precaution: twist tip of the pencil back into tube and snap the cap shut to ensure pencil is ultra-creamy.

Title: Multi active revitalizing treatment essence
Description:
this revitalitizing treatment essence, perfect for all skin types, combines powerful botanical ingredients and a hyaluronic acid complex to intensely moisturize skin for 8 hours*, while renewing and reenergizing it. its age specific formula helps to preserve the skin's youth and visibly reduce the look of pores. it also preps the skin to absorb skin care applied afterwards. a super lightweight texture that dives deep, leaving skin feeling supple. its eco-designed bottle uses a minimum of 25% recycled plastic.
*clinical test, 25 women 

  • use: every morning and/or night. 

benefits

  • hydrates skin.

  • leaves skin renewed and reenergized.

  • revitalizes and visibly addresses signs of ageing and imperfections.

clarins plus

our range of treatment essences is specially formulated to address age-specific concerns by infusing skin with potent anti-ageing plant extracts.

ingredients

aqua/water/eau. glycerin. propanediol. pentylene glycol. butylene glycol. sodium benzoate. dipsacus sylvestris extract. disodium edta. sodium hyaluronate. citric acid. 1,2-hexanediol. ppg-26-buteth-26. cellulose. gellan gum. peg-40 hydrogenated castor oil. xanthan gum. biosaccharide gum-4. spiraea ulmaria extract. parfum/fragrance. panax ginseng root extract. jania rubens extract. sodium citrate. lactic acid/glycolic acid copolymer. heptapeptide-15 palmitate. polyvinyl alcohol. copper palmitoyl heptapeptide-14. ci 17200/red 33 [v3959a]

Title: Clarifique double essence refining enzymatic dual essence
Description:
clarifique visibly improves uneven skin texture & tone while minimizing the appearance of pores.

formula: clarifique works both to exfoliate & nourish the skin. our dual-acting formula is made of: 
• clear active essence: infused with organic beech bud extract, glycolic acid, and salicylic acid to gently exfoliate the outermost layer of the skin.
• lipidic oil essence: infused with grapeseed & sunflower seed oil, rich in omega-6 fatty acids that help to nourish & hydrate the skin.

what it does*:
• immediately, skin feels hydrated, plump, and softer to the touch: skin is better prepared for face care.
• after 1 week, skin looks luminous & radiant: skin texture & tone are improved.
• after 4 weeks, skin is revitalized: skin feels purified & refreshed, pores appear tighter.
*based on self-assessment of 51 women in a 4-week study

what an essence is: think of an essence as a primer for your skincare. essences help absorb the products you apply afterward, helping the rest of your skincare routine work better, all while providing unique & targeted benefits.

skin concerns: dull skin, dry skin, uneven skin texture, uneven skin tone, large pores

how to use:
use day and night before your serum to help your skin care work better.
1. shake to activate the formula
2. pour up to 3 drops onto the palm of your hands or a cotton round
3. press onto face and neck

for best results, use in combination with advanced génifique face serum

we're honored
2021 allure best of beauty award

benefits:
immediately:
94% of women agree skin feels soothed
90% of women agree skin feels hydrated & moisturized
90% of women agree clarifique prepares skin for face care

after 1 week:
80% of women agree skin texture appears refined
75% of women agree skin tone looks radiant and more luminous

after 4 weeks:
92% of women agree skin looks more fresh
90% of women agree skin feels purified
80% of women agree skin feels pores appear tightened, less visible

based on a self-assessment study conducted with 51 women

ingredients:
ingredient callouts:
glycolic acid: a naturally occurring alpha hydroxy acid known to exfoliate the skin’s outer surface.
salicylic acid: a well-known exfoliator widely used to remove dead cells from skin surface and help stabilize the ph of cosmetic products.
beech bud extract: an organic active ingredient known to hydrate and exfoliate skin.
papain: an enzyme naturally found in papaya, known for its exfoliating properties.
sunflower seed oil: known to hydrate the skin and reinforce the skin’s moisture barrier.
grapeseed oil: rich in omega-6 fatty acids and known for antioxidant properties.
vitamin c: an antioxidant known to help neutralize free radicals, brighten, and smooth the skin. this formula uses vitamin cg, a water-soluble, stable vitamin c derivative that is known to be gentle on the skin and that will not degrade when exposed to air, heat, or light.

this product contains no silicone, no fragrance, no mineral oil, no phenoxyethanol, no parabens, no colorant. 25% recycled glass.

ingredient list:

Title: Mirror effect gel gloss
Description:
"violette, guerlain’s makeup creative director, has created a multi-use gel gloss to shine during the holiday season.
a signature product on shoots, for its sheer, soft, and shiny texture with a hint of rose gold shimmer, which can be applied as a top coat on the eyes, cheekbones, lips, etc.
apply over eyeshadow or lipstick, to create a mirror-finish and multi-dimensional effect. apply onto the face to attract the light and reveal the complexion’s radiance for a festive look!"

Title: Soleil bronzer spf 50 bb cream
Description: soleil bronzer sun bb cream protects your skin against the harmful effects of the sun and makes your skin shine with a more even tan. double effect on the skin with the improved uva and uvb filtering system;-protective effect: optimum uva and uvb protection strengthened against long uva rays protects the skin against harmful uva rays. beautifying effect: with its colorful texture in the bb cream formula, it closes the skin imperfections and reveals a more even skin tone.

Title: Visionnaire crescendo peel
Description: visionnaire crescendo™ is an overnight progressive peel that helps fight multiple signs of ageing: fine lines and wrinkles, enlarged pores and lack of luminosity.

Title: Absolue precious cells rose mask
Description:
absolue precious cells rose mask by lancôme combines the power of rose extracts and the vitality of natural rose water for a rich yet intensely fresh and soothing texture.

nourished with moisture, skin is hydrated throughout the day to appear revitalised and radiant.

skin is left feeling soft, supple and smooth to reveal a youthful glow.

Title: Renergie multi-lift cream set
Description: give the gift of the extraordinary with our rénergie triple serum & eye cream holiday set!  this set includes our rénergie triple serum 50ml, rénergie eye cream 15ml et la rénergie h.p.n. cream 15ml, the perfect present for skincare lovers!s!

Title: Abeille royale uv shield
Description: abeille royale uv skin defense ensures daily skin protection: it is the high-protection sun care solution against uvb thanks to spf 50 protection and against uva thanks to pa++++ protection, including long uva rays, the spectra responsible for collagen fibre deterioration. its flex uv technology creates an ultra-resistant second-skin mesh compatible with the filters and delivers advanced protection. concentrating the youth-repairing powers of our exclusive honeys thanks to the dynamic blackbee repair technology, this fluid – a lightly tinted fine and fresh emulsion – helps to reduce the visible signs of collagen degradation: wrinkles and loss of firmness. enriched with radiance-restoring white honey, uv skin defense revives the complexion's luminosity and visibly reduces the appearance of dark spots.

Title: Mascara volume effet faux cils the curler
Description:
ysl mascara volume effect faux cils the curler,our 2-in-1 mascara wand offers stunning curl and beautifully defined volume.
a mascara that matches wand technology with a curl formula, offering a breath-taking lash curling effect that lifts and volumizes lashes. the mascara wand is perfectly designed to create clean, defined lashes whilst following the natural curve of the lash to create a beautifully curled lash. enriched with coconut oil, walnut leaf extract and jojoba oil for lashes that feel nourished and conditioned.

- curl: the black rounded fibre wand to curl lashes.
- define: the pink elastomer comb to add a look of instant lash lift and definition.
 

• lashes look lengthened - 91% agree*
• lashes look defined 83%*
• lashes look curled 82%*

* consumer test on 120 women.

Title: Kind & free clean eye liner
Description:
for the ultimate hd look with high-color impact, the rimmel kind & free clean eye definer is just the eyeliner you’ve been looking for. 100% vegan and made with forest stewardship council (fsc) certified wood, making your eyes look their best has never been this environmentally conscious. this cruelty-free eyeliner was made to glide as effortlessly as possible to impart an ultra-creamy and buttery texture for a seriously eye-popping look. available in 5 stunning and prestige-inspired shades for all occasions. live the london look!

• it's an eyeliner that instantly defines and enhances eyes with super-rich, high-color impact
• the ultra-creamy and buttery texture allows it to glide around eyes effortlessly
• this cruelty-free cosmetic eyeliner is made with a clean and 100% vegan skin care formula
• the eco-friendly packaging is made with forest stewardship council (fsc) certified wood
• available in 5 stunning & inspired shades so you can be sure you'll always look amazing

how to apply
effortlessly glide on the lash line. blend out quickly for a soft pigmented look, or leave it as-is for a bold and vibrant cat eye. finish with a rimmel mascara for extra volume.

Title: Kind & free brow definer
Description:
the rimmel kind & free brow definer is rimmel’s 1st clean dual-ended eyebrow pencil that delivers bold yet natural looking eyebrows. featuring both a spoolie brush and a 1.7mm ultra-fine tip, creating precise, hair-like strokes has never been easier. available in four different shades, this vegan formula is infused with organic certified shea butter and biotin for clean, conditioning density and definition.

• this versatile eyebrow pencil definer has one end for defined, fuller-looking brows, and another for ultra-fine, hair-like strokes
• the spoolie brush combs through brow hair to seamlessly blend the tint for a groomed, natural look
• this eyebrow pencil has a 1.7mm ultra-fine tip for a precise application of tint
• it's a vegan and kind-to-animals eyebrow pencil that is made with no added fragrances or mineral oils
• this flexible eyebrow pencil from rimmel is available in 4 natural shades, so you can find your perfect match

how to apply
starting at the under-brow arch, apply this eyebrow pencil while moving toward the tail end. next, outline the upper arch, then blend using the spoolie brush.

Description:
kind & free clean mascara from rimmel – our 1st clean mascara delivering volume and length with no compromise.
clean, vegan formula contains 99% of ingredients of natural origin
conditioning volume & length
formulated with organic shea butter and biotin
bio-based brush made from 100% bio-based fibers

Title: Wonder volume thrill seeker
Description:
the new viral sensation!

rimmel london thrill seeker mascara. bold volume to thrill, gravity-defying length, and weightless definition.

from the uk's #1 make up brand, rimmel's new viral thrill seeker mascara delivers a whipped, creamy formula that's charged with lash-loving panthenol to leave your eyelashes feeling softer, smoother and stronger. layer up for the lash look you seek. stay fearlessly clump-proof and smudge-proof all day.

live the london look.

• bold volume & lash lengthening mascara 
• all-day wear that stays clump-proof & smudge proof 
• charged with lash-loving panthenol 
• creamy, whipped formula 
• hour glass shaped brush grabs every lash

how to apply
step 1: swipe on thrill seeker mascara from root to tip in a zig zag motion.
step 2: layer it up to achieve bold volume and outlandish length.

Title: Bright plus ampoule
Description:
what it is
potent vitamin c concentrate boosts radiance in only 7 days.* this brightening ampoule contains a 15% concentration of vitamin c, 10% pure ascorbic acid in powder form combined with a 5% vitamin c derivative, plus radiance-boosting superfruits, organic acerola seed and rose myrtle. a plant-powered, intensive formula that targets dull skin and dark spots for a more even skin tone and radiant complexion. this powerful, yet gentle, fast-absorbing formula contains only 15 ingredients for optimal skin tolerance and is free of fragrance, alcohol, oil, parabens and colorants.

the innovative, airless, water-and light-proof glass bottle activates the formula just before use—preserving its freshness, stability, potency and efficacy for maximum results. simply press down on top of ampoule to dispense the powder into the essence, replace the top with the dropper and shake to mix the two formulas together. designed to be used every day for one week, the vitamin c ampoule contains a precise dose that is perfect for when skin needs a quick radiance fix.
*self-assessment – 100 women – after 7 days

skin type: oily
texture: liquid
use: use each morning and evening for 7 days.

benefits
provides an intense boost of radiance
targets dull skin and dark spots
evens skin tone
innovation and plant expertise
pollution and sun exposure can take a toll on the skin, resulting in dullness, dark spots, and uneven skin tone. bright plus fresh ampoule’s antioxidant-rich vitamin c complex—with acerola seed and rose myrtle extracts—delivers a powerful boost of radiance in 7 days. *
*self-assessment – 100 women – after 7 days

clarins plus
ampoules contain highly concentrated ingredients to address specific concerns and boost your existing skincare routine. containing 2 types of vitamin c, our fresh ampoule's innovative packaging maintains the stability and purity of 10% pure ascorbic acid—a highly potent format—plus a 5% vitamin c derivative, to safely target dark spots and leave skin with brilliant results.

results
81%*
skin is more radiant immediately

after 1 vial:
82%** skin appears more even & blemishes are visibly reduced
96%*** skin appears more radiant
87%*** dark spots are less visible
*consumer test – 100 women – after application
**consumer test – 100 women – after 7 days
***consumer test, 100 subjects, 28 days of bright plus fresh ampoule alone, followed by 14 days in routine with bright plus serum

ingredients
aqua/water/eau. ascorbic acid. ascorbyl glucoside. propanediol. sodium hydroxide. oryza sativa (rice) hull powder. 1,2-hexanediol. pentylene glycol. butylene glycol. ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp copolymer. xanthan gum. chlorphenesin. chondrus crispus powder. malpighia emarginata (acerola) seed extract. rhodomyrtus tomentosa fruit extract. [stv4152a]
*for informational purposes only. every ingredient list is specific to an individual product reference. all formulas are subject to change. while we endeavor to keep this ingredient list accurate, we cannot guarantee that it is reliable, up-to-date, or error-free. please also refer to the ingredient list on the product’s outer packaging for a complete, accurate, and up-to-date list. organic ingredients are produced in accordance with european regulation (ce 2018/848).

Title: Clarinsmen shave gel
Description:
what it is

refreshing shave gel transforms into a creamy foam that coats and softens beard hair. tested and approved by master barbers, this soothing and moisturizing formula allows for a clean, comfortable, professional shave at home. clarinsmen’s exclusive new grooming phyto-complex—a blend of energizing bison grass and gymnema extracts and soothing organic blackcurrant bud extract—helps protect skin from razor burn, ingrown hairs, and irritations, leaving the face soft and smooth. ideal for maintaining a close shave. made with 90% ingredients of natural origin.

use: use every day, or as needed.

soothes, softens, and moisturizes
energizes the skin
conditions beard hair
helps prevent, razor burn, ingrown hairs, and irritation

Title: Absolue soft cream set
Description:
product benefits

absolue soft cream collection

discover absolue soft cream collection, a powerful youth activating program that recovers skin barrier, boosts skin radiance and fights signs of aging. a full routine with serum, soft & rich cream, eye cream.

 

? brightening & revitalizing

 

? plumping & smoothing

 

? skin feels softer & smoother

 

? reduced signs of aging & younger-looking skin

 

what makes it different

enjoy a moment of indulgence with the absolue soft cream collection.

the gift set contains the following:

- the soft cream with the perpetual rose extract 60ml

- the serum intensive concentrate with the exclusive perpetual rose extract 5ml

- the revitalizing eye cream with grand rose extracts 5ml

- the rich cream with grand rose extracts 15ml

 

what else you need to know

clinically tested results*

- eye bag puffiness is diminished (-31.3%)

- under-eye wrinkles are visibly reduced (-15.9%)

- crow’s feet are visibly reduced (-10.7%)

*based on 4-week results in a clinical study of 41 women

 

how to apply

step 1: apply absolue the serum using massage gestures to help increase skin surface cell renewal, to reveal visibly plumper, smoother, glowing skin. after the first drop

step 2: apply the absolue soft cream, an transformative face cream that smooths the look of fine lines while visibly brightening and firming the skin. in 4 weeks, skin looks visibly plumper and radiant. switch for the absolue rich cream when your skin is feeling more dry than usual.

step 3: apply the absolue eye cream, a luxurious eye cream that visibly reduces puffiness and smooths fine lines and wrinkles.

Title: Genifique serum 50ml routine set
Description:
advanced génifique contains the unique blend of 7 prebiotic and-probiotic fractions that have been selected to deliver essential resources such as sugars, amino acids, and lipids, to the skin and its microbiome, in order to help the skin better defend and recover. 

it delivers powerful ingredients directly into the skin thanks to smaller molecules that penetrate deeper and provide a higher concentration of active ingredients.
 

your skincare gift set includes:
â— advanced génifique serum 50ml. this is the best face serum for radiant skin.
â— rénergie multi-lift ultra cream 15ml
â— rénergie multi-lift night cream 15ml. this is the best night cream for smooth and even skin tone.
â— advanced génifique new eye cream 5ml. this is the best eye cream for dark circles.

for a radiant and youthful glow, advanced génifique is our #1 serum for all ages, all skin types and skin tones. proven to strengthen your microbiome, an integral part of your skin for stronger, faster, and visible recovery from aging signs. rénergie, lancôme’s secret weapons against sagging skin, including rénergie skin firming cream, tinted moisturizer, and firming eye cream offer ground-breaking tm technology for younger-looking skin.

Title: Absolue eye cream collection
Description:
exceptional ritual to regenerate eyes, a skin revitalizing set to smooth eye wrinkles and boost radiance

 

- smoother & firmer eye contour overnight

 

- clinically correct 6 wrinkle dimensions

 

- delay appearance of eye wrinkles by 5 years

 

what makes it different

enjoy a moment of indulgence with the absolue eye cream collection.

leveraging artificial intelligence to isolate a unique molecular sequence, new, exclusive and patented p12 biotech pearl™ in the absolue eye cream are coded to target deep wrinkle correction.

- revitalizing eye cream with grand rose extracts (20ml)

- soft cream with the perpetual rose extract (15ml)

- the brightening and revitalizing toning lotion with grand rose extracts (15ml)

- the serum intensive concentrate with the perpetual rose extract (5ml)

 

what else you need to know

a new golden era of eye wrinkle correction with the absolue eye cream

6 wrinkle dimensions clinically corrected*

-25.4% glabellar wrinkles*

+43% tonicity*

-24.5% crow's feet*

-25.4% undereye wrinkles*

+22% firmness*

-26.9% undereye bags*

 

*clinically tested on 41 caucasian women, 8 weeks, 4h result dtm

 

how to apply

use daily, in your morning and/or night skincare routine after cleansing and toning skin.

1: apply a dab of cream with your fingertips to the eye contour.

2. with 2 fingers, swipe under the eye and upper eyelids.

3. use double fingers to pull up eye contour and smooth between eye brows.

for enhanced application experience, use the new & exclusive eye cream tool to gently massage eye contours.

Title: Orchidee imperial lift serum
Description:
the ultimate alchemy of technology and nature, the micro-lift concentrate combines latest-generation microencapsulation with the extraordinary power of the orchid’s longevity. its high naturally derived ingredient formula* with 7,000 micro-sculptors works like a series of micro-lifts on the skin. it has a visible 46°** lifting effect, enveloping the skin in intense comfort. 95% of women find that their skin appears lifted***. this serum offers a long-lasting lifting effect and visibly improves the signs of ageing. composed of 92% naturally derived ingredients*, this formula merges with the skin and envelops it in a tightening yet comfortable mesh. the skin is instantly firmed. day after day, it appears superbly sculpted: the contours of the face are more defined.
*composed of 92% naturally derived ingredients (in accordance with iso 16128, including water. the remaining 8% helps to optimize the integrity of the formula over time and its sensoriality).
**instrumental test by the displacement field method, 32 women, average observed displacement of 0.45mm instantly.
***in-use test, 61 women, after 1 month’s use, twice a day

fragrance
a floral scent with hints of orchid that blend with notes of rose, white musk and precious cedar wood.

Title: Super restorative replenishing comfort mask
Description:
• a lavish, creamy restorative mask.

  • boosts line-preventive, anti-wrinkle & contour lifting benefits.

  • noticeably minimizes signs of stress.

  • skin appears smoother & youthful in a refined contour.

  • to use: apply a generous amount to face & neck. leave on for 10 minutes. rinse off with lotion using a cotton ball. use once a week.

Title: After sun moisturiser self tanning
Description:
a deeply hydrating treatment that moisturises the skin whilst helping to support a gorgeous tan, the clarins after sun moisturiser offers a soothing formula with watermelon extract that replenishes the skin’s moisture after sun exposure.

to use: apply all over the body after sun exposure. wash hands after application.

Title: After sun replenishing moisture care
Description:
this after sun soothes and replenishes the skin after sun exposure thanks to centella asiatica combined with an extract of mimosa tenuiflora.

redness and peeling are visibly reduced and the skin feels soft to touch and comfortable.

Title: Sleeping mask
Description:
dehydrated skin lacks moisture. it feels tight and wrinkles appear prematurely. less protected by a thinner cutaneous barrier, it is more reactive and more likely to redden.

a truly nocturnal moisturizing infusion, aqua plus multi-moisturizing sleeping mask helps skin restore its water reserves and reinforce the protecting cutaneous barrier. inspired by the « sleeping packs » from korea (no-rinse night mask, very concentrated in active ingredients), its silky formula, lightly film-forming, diffuses the benefits of its ingredients overnight, allowing the skin to perfectly breathe at the same time.
highly concentrated in dermo-soothing mallow flower and of in pure hyaluronic acids of three different molecular weights, this daily cream penetrates the heart of the epidermis to re-infuse skin with moisture and restore comfort.
1.100% swiss, the kind of mallow flower that our laboratories selected, managed to flourish in wild areas and in extreme conditions, where few other plants survive. we use it distilled in steam, to preserve its entire dermo-soothing benefits for the skin.
2. biomimetic and biodegradable, hyaluronic acid is the most important moisturizing ingredient in cosmetology. naturally present in the skin, it is capable of attracting up to 1000 times its weight in water and intensely and lastingly retains water in the heart of the skin. aqua plus line contains three different molecular weights:
- the highest molecular weight acts as a "protective coat". its surface action is immediate and helps prevent water loss.
- particles fragmented in medium and low molecular weights deeply penetrate all the epidermis layers to replenish cells with moisture.

how to use
apply a thin layer on clean face and neck every night. leave on to infuse overnight without rinsing. can also be used as a "classic" rinse-off mask. leave it to act for 10 to 15 minutes on clean face and neck. gently remove excess.

 
its texture
half mask, half cream, subtly fragranced formula, lightly film-forming to keep the benefits of ingredients all night long.

 expected results
skin awakens fully replenished, rehydrated and supple .it is more resistant and regains absolute comfort.

 remark
can also be used as a "classic" rinse-off mask. leave to act for 10 to 15 minutes on clean face and neck. remove excess.

Title: Cryo flash cream mask
Description:
what it is

this high-performance face mask inspired by cryotherapy and clarins’ expertise reproduces the benefits of cold on the skin to prevent and fight the signs of aging. its formula combines powerful active ingredients - m.g.a. molecule derived from menthol and organic evening primrose extract - for skin that feels lifted, firmed and glowing with youth. its smooth and ultra-fresh blue-green cream texture glides over the skin like ice and provides an intense and immediate cryo effect. visibly effective from the first application.

texture: cream

Title: Double serum set
Description:
this set contains three essential expert treatments for firm skin and rested eyes. double serum targets the visible signs of aging thanks to its double formula enriched with 21 of the most powerful anti-aging plant extracts, while double serum eye targets the eye area. mascara supra lift & curl perfectly lifts the lashes: lashes are lifted, curled and perfectly defined with increased volume.

this set contains

Title: Couture mini clutch
Description:
description

introducing couture mini clutch, ysl beauty’s new couture object of desire that makes a statement before you even open it. tone-on-tone palettes of four eye-sculpting colours to express your edge with high intensity pigments. couture-inspired chromatics and luxurious finishes that take your gaze to a new dimension. the two statement palettes are inspired by places close to the designer’s heart. palmeraie skies is inspired by the skies of marrakech, while the trocadero nights is paris at its best, at sunrise and sunset. there’s a palette that suits everyone, and every occasion, making each compact the ultimate in versatility.

Title: Clarifique pro solution serum
Description:
brightening serum that visibly reduces dark spots and post-acne marks and tightens the look of pores.

what it is
formulated with 10% pha (polyhydroxy acid), niacinamide, and beech bud extract, clarifique pro-solution is a concentrated brightening treatment that delivers powerful results over time without being harsh on skin. women see brighter skin in one week and visibly tighter pores in four weeks. in eight weeks, dark spots and post-acne mark skin discoloration are visibly reduced. from light to melanin-rich skin tones, 9 out of 10 women saw a visible transformation in their skin after using one bottle of clarifique pro-solution* – including those with sensitive skin or acne-prone skin.

what else you need to know
for those who struggle with concerns like uneven skin tone, dark spots, and skin discoloration, it can be difficult to find a brightening serum that is both effective and gentle. concentrated brightening serums formulated with aha or bha may cause sensations like burning or tingling when applied – especially if you have sensitive skin. powered by 10% pha, clarifique pro-solution strikes the perfect balance between results and comfort. pha has a larger molecular structure compared to aha or bha, allowing it to gently exfoliate the surface of the skin to minimize irritation. when pha is combined with an ingredient like niacinamide, it delivers visible brightening results without the unwanted harshness.
*based on self-assessment results in a 10-week consumer study with 64 women

skin concerns: uneven skin tone, dark spots, skin discoloration left over from past acne marks, pores.
safety measures: tested for tolerance under dermatological control. suitable for all skin tones and skin types, including oily skin, sensitive skin and skin prone to acne.
texture: a lightweight water-gel texture that absorbs quickly into skin.

Title: Double serum light texture
Description:
the iconic double serum is available in a light, imperceptible texture, with proven results on signs of aging. developed by clarins research, its unique dual formula combines 21 powerful plant extracts that help boost the 5 vital functions of the skin - regeneration, nutrition, oxygenation, hydration, protection - and act on signs of aging. its dual texture - evanescent oil and fluid gel - leaves an immediate "barely there" finish and a pleasant fragrance with fruity, floral, fresh and refined notes.
the nested bottles contain the two formulas in a technological and eco-designed feat that prioritises responsible materials and limits waste.

Title: Ombre skin mono
Description:
these highly pigmented nude eyeshadows combine the glide-on ease of a cream with the color payoff of a powder—in fresh matte, soft satin, and shimmering pearlized finishes that won’t crease, flake or fade. infused with a primer, these easy-to-layer nude shades create a natural-looking, second skin effect that blends and builds in intensity for any desired look—from soft to bold.

glide over lids with fingertips or brush. formulated with 80% ingredients of natural origin, this skincare enriched formula softens and comforts with organic manioc powder to help smooth and mattify, and organic coconut oil to nourish skin. ideal for sensitive eyes.*

*dermatologist tested and under ophthalmological control

skin type: normal, oily, combination, dry
use: apply with fingertip or brush. 

benefits
highly pigmented shades
nourishes
smoothes and softens eyelids
innovation and plant expertise
part makeup, part skincare—new ombre skin eyeshadows are formulated with 80% ingredients of natural origin that nourish, soften, smooth and comfort the delicate skin on eyelids. this primer-infused formula contains organic manioc powder with smoothing and mattifying benefits for easy application.
clarins plus
makeup made for skin. plant enriched. skincare powered. developed with the same expertise as clarins skincare, we harness the power of the most potent plant extracts for makeup that delivers true skincare benefits.

results
94%*
the eyeshadow does not fall off/leave residue 

92%* eyeshadow blends quickly and evenly
89%* coverage is adjustable, can be layered easily 
*consumer test - 103 women

ingredients
mica. ci 77891/titanium dioxide. silica. dimethicone. ci 77007/ultramarines. caprylyl glycol. ethylhexylglycerin. pentylene glycol. zinc stearate. diisostearyl malate. octyldodecyl stearoyl stearate. cocos nucifera (coconut) oil. dicalcium phosphate. tapioca starch. sodium dehydroacetate. ci 77491/iron oxides. kaolin. tocopheryl acetate. sorbitan sesquioleate. ci 77499/iron oxides. Title: My clarins pure reset serum
Description:
ideal for young, oily skin with imperfections, this serum offers an immediate new skin effect. it helps to reduce excess sebum and the appearance of blemishes and visible pores. it also boosts skin renewal for smoother skin day after day. its formula enriched with organic apple extract and exfoliating salicylic and glycolic acids rebalances the skin and reduces the appearance of shine.
day after day, the appearance of imperfections is reduced, the skin is softer, as if new, and the complexion is more even. a fresh, light serum texture that glides on the skin’s surface and is quickly absorbed. formulated with 92% natural ingredients.

skin type: combination, oily
texture: serum
use: every day, morning and/or night. 

benefits
rebalances the skin
visibly reduces imperfections
evens out complexion

results
-35%*
fewer blemishes

-14%* dilated pores
-12%* appearance of pores
+16%* improvement in skin texture
*clinical test, 20 volunteers, 21 days

ingredients
aqua/water/eau. alcohol. propanediol. pentylene glycol. glycolic acid. glycerin. xanthan gum. sodium hydroxide. salicylic acid. propylene glycol. ppg-26-buteth-26. peg-40 hydrogenated castor oil. parfum/fragrance. sodium glycolate. zinc gluconate. bidens pilosa extract. cichorium intybus (chicory) leaf extract. hexylene glycol. malus domestica fruit extract. caprylyl glycol. sodium chloride. [v4396a]

Title: My clarins re charge detox replumping night mask
Description:
this mask recharges, quenches and plumps youthful skin. formulated with [healthy plant complex]: organic coconut water and organic alpine rose extract for a healthy glow. enriched with huang qi extract for a pure and clarified complexion, organic fig extract for intensely moisturised skin and acerola seed extract (organic plant) for a fresh, rosy complexion and radiant skin. skin is fresh, supple, soft and plumped up... it's more beautiful with every morning. light, melting and fresh gel-cream texture with a silky finish.

skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily
texture: cream
use: 1 to 3 times a week 

benefits
skin is plumped, recharged and quenched

innovation and plant expertise
at the heart of my clarins* formulas is our plant-based innovation: the [healthy plant complex], a powerful duo with nutritive and protective properties. clarins research has focused on the benefits of organic coconut water and organic alpine rose extract, which help the skin maintain its balance and fight against oxidative stress. *except re-move purifying cleansing gel and pure-reset smooth skin blemish serum

results
+37%*
women reported a 37% fresher complexion.

women said their skin was 41% brighter*
*self-assessment, 105 women, 14 days

ingredients
aqua/water/eau. caprylic/capric triglyceride. glycerin. betaine. pentylene glycol. 1,2- hexanediol. pentaerythrityl tetraethylhexanoate. hydroxyethyl acrylate/sodium acryloyldimethyl taurate copolymer. tapioca starch. cocos nucifera (coconut) fruit juice. cellulose. silica. propylene glycol. xylitylglucoside. butylene glycol. acrylates/c10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer. anhydroxylitol. parfum/fragrance. ethylhexylglycerin. xylitol. bisabolol. disodium edta. sodium hydroxide. glucose. inulin lauryl carbamate. marrubium vulgare extract. citric acid. ficus carica (fig) fruit extract. malpighia emarginata (acerola) seed extract. phenethyl alcohol. furcellaria lumbricalis extract. sodium benzoate. rhododendron ferrugineum extract. potassium sorbate. engelhardtia chrysolepis leaf extract. lapsana communis flower/leaf/stem extract. maris sal/sea salt/sel marin. Title: Teint idole ultra wear care & glow serum concealer
Description:
what it is:
a multi-use, medium coverage serum concealer with up to 24hr hydration and a natural, soft glow finish.

what it does:
with an 81% serum base skin-loving formula, this multi-use hydrating concealer enhances your natural look, rather than covering your imperfections. best for brightening, blurring undereye dark circles, and enhancing your features for an everyday natural soft glow look. this creamy serum concealer easily blends into the skin and its unique applicator allows for ease of application with its ultra-pointed tip, curved and flat surface for multi-use. no creasing or caking for up to 12hrs.*

what else you need to know:
• contains hyaluronic acid which is known to hydrate the skin
• ceramides + peptides which are known to protect & strengthen the skin barrier
• pairs nicely with: teint idole ultra wear care & glow foundation & teint idole ultra wear

benefits:
serum concealer benefits:
• medium buildable coverage
• creamy liquid texture
• natural soft glow finish
• easy to blend & use
• crease-resistant for up to 12hr
• up to 81% serum base

how to apply:
serum concealer how-to tips:
conceal & spot correct
use a shade that matches your skin tone to cover any discoloration, pigmentation, and blemishes.

brighten & blur
use 1-2 shades lighter than your skin tone for the under-eye area. will help to minimize the appearance of fine lines and create an eye-lifting effect.

brontour
use 2-3 shades deeper than your tone to sculpt/warm complexion.

all-over coverage
use a shade that matches your skin tone for a minimal makeup look, touch ups, or pair with your favorite foundation.

ingredients:
hyaluronic acid & vitamin e for skin smoothing benefits

• water, dimethicone, isododecane, alcohol denat., trimethylsiloxysilicate, butyleneglycol, peg-10 dimethicone, perlite, synthetic fluorphlogopite, moringa oleifera seed extract, polymnia sonchifolia root juice, calcium aluminum borosilicate, glycerin, dipentaerythrityl tetrahydroxystearate/ tetraisostearate, alpha-glucan oligosaccharide, sodium hyaluronate, silica, silica silylate, hdi/trimethylol hexyllactone crosspolymer, cellulose, aluminum hydroxide, magnesium sulfate, nylon-12, disodium phosphate, disodium stearoyl glutamate, isopropyl lauroyl sarcosinate, hydrogen dimethicone, citric acid, diisopropyl sebacate, bis-peg/ppg-14/14 dimethicone, lactobacillus, maltodextrin, disteardimonium hectorite, bht, tocopherol, phenoxyethanol; may contain: titanium dioxide, iron oxides

• shades 230w, 350n, 400w: water, dimethicone, isododecane, alcohol denat., trimethylsiloxysilicate, butylene glycol, peg-10 dimethicone, perlite, synthetic fluorphlogopite, moringa oleifera seed extract, polymnia sonchifolia root juice, calcium aluminum borosilicate, glycerin, dipentaerythrityl tetrahydroxystearate tetraisostearate, alpha-glucan oligosaccharide, sodium hyaluronate, silica, silica silylate, hdi/trimethylol hexyllactone crosspolymer, cellulose, aluminum hydroxide, magnesium sulfate, nylon-12, disodium phosphate, disodium stearoyl glutamate, isopropyl lauroyl sarcosinate, hydrogen dimethicone, citric acid, diisopropyl sebacate, bis-peg/ppg-14/14 dimethicone, lactobacillus, maltodextrin, disteardimonium hectorite, bht, tocopherol, phenoxyethanol ; may contain: titanium dioxide, iron oxides, chromium oxide greens

• shades 505n, 515w, 525w-540c: water, isododecane, dimethicone, alcohol denat., butylene glycol, trimethylsiloxysilicate, isononyl isononanoate, peg-10 dimethicone, perlite, synthetic fluorphlogopite, silica, squalane, nylon-12, isopropyl lauroyl sarcosinate, diisopropyl, sebacate, moringa oleifera seed extract, polymnia sonchifolia root juice, calcium aluminum, borosilicate, glycerin, dipentaerythrityl tetrahydroxystearate/tetraisostearate, alpha-glucan oligosaccharide, sodium hyaluronate, silica silylate, hdi/trimethylol hexyllactone crosspolymer, aluminum hydroxide, magnesium sulfate, disodium phosphate, disodium stearoyl glutamate, citric acid, bis-peg/ppg-14/14 dimethicone, lactobacillus, maltodextrin, disteardimonium hectorite, tocopherol, phenoxyethanol, may contain titanium dioxide, iron oxides, ultramarines, (f.i.l. u297188/1)

Title: Teint idole ultra wear care & glow serum concealer
Description:
what it is:
a multi-use, medium coverage serum concealer with up to 24hr hydration and a natural, soft glow finish.

what it does:
with an 81% serum base skin-loving formula, this multi-use hydrating concealer enhances your natural look, rather than covering your imperfections. best for brightening, blurring undereye dark circles, and enhancing your features for an everyday natural soft glow look. this creamy serum concealer easily blends into the skin and its unique applicator allows for ease of application with its ultra-pointed tip, curved and flat surface for multi-use. no creasing or caking for up to 12hrs.*

what else you need to know:
• contains hyaluronic acid which is known to hydrate the skin
• ceramides + peptides which are known to protect & strengthen the skin barrier
• pairs nicely with: teint idole ultra wear care & glow foundation & teint idole ultra wear

benefits:
serum concealer benefits:
• medium buildable coverage
• creamy liquid texture
• natural soft glow finish
• easy to blend & use
• crease-resistant for up to 12hr
• up to 81% serum base

how to apply:
serum concealer how-to tips:
conceal & spot correct
use a shade that matches your skin tone to cover any discoloration, pigmentation, and blemishes.

brighten & blur
use 1-2 shades lighter than your skin tone for the under-eye area. will help to minimize the appearance of fine lines and create an eye-lifting effect.

brontour
use 2-3 shades deeper than your tone to sculpt/warm complexion.

all-over coverage
use a shade that matches your skin tone for a minimal makeup look, touch ups, or pair with your favorite foundation.

Title: Noir g bee primer
Description:
uerlain’s noir g bee primer lash-plumper serum combines a caring formula with the treasures of the bee for a 24 hours¹ enhanced make-up result: lashes are visibly stronger and more beautiful day after day.

its lash care formula coats lashes one by one to prepare them for make-up and offer them triple action on volume, curl and length. thanks to its curved brush, the lash fringe fans out to create a 360 effect.

noir g bee primer can be used on its own as a night mask or in combination with your mascara.

capacity: 6g

¹clinical evaluation and instrumental test on 25 caucasian women.

directions for use:
noir g bee primer can also be used on its own at bedtime to allow its active ingredients to soak into lashes overnight, like a mask to remove in the morning.

ingredients:
#19158 ingredients: aqua (water) • polyglyceryl-10 behenate/eicosadioate • c18-36 acid triglyceride • cera carnauba (copernicia cerifera (carnauba) wax) • pentylene glycol • candelilla cera (euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax) • palmitic acid • stearic acid • cera alba (beeswax) • squalane • acacia senegal gum • hydroxyethylcellulose • aminomethyl propanediol • mel (honey) • caprylyl glycol • propanediol • chlorphenesin • parfum (fragrance) • silica • tocopheryl acetate • disodium phosphate • sodium phosphate • polysorbate 60

Title: Noir g 24h graphic liner
Description:
thanks to its innovative formula infused with natural-origin charcoal, noir g graphic liner creates an intensely matte finish with 24-hour hold¹.
its ultra-precise felt tip offers easy, buildable and smudge-free application for a tailor-made graphic result of varying intensity as desired.
for best results from the very first application, shake before use.

¹clinical evaluation on 25 caucasian women.

infused with natural-origin charcoal, noir g graphic liner’s formula delivers an intense matte finish for 24 hours¹. the line stays true and meets the challenges of the day.

¹instrumental test on 25 caucasian women.

noir g graphic liner’s fine and flexible tip draws a buildable line, from the finest to the thickest, with an intensity that can be adjusted according to the pressure applied.

size: .55ml

directions for use:
“lightly coat the tip of the eyeliner for a precise line. achieve a perfect line with the help of a soft tape placed at the outer corner of the eye."

- violette, guerlain makeup creative director

ingredients:
#19088 ingredients: aqua (water) • charcoal powder • butylene glycol • ammonium styrene/acrylates copolymer • sodium polyaspartate • pentylene glycol • glycerin • 1,2-hexanediol • caprylyl glycol • sodium dehydroacetate • hydroxyacetophenone • ethylhexylglycerin • disodium edta

Title: Joli rouge satin
Description:
what it is
our new generation, refillable, joli rouge satin lipstick provides intense  color, extreme comfort and full coverage with a luminous satin finish that stays fresh and flawless. the lightweight, creamy and melting  texture provides maximum impact with a barely-there feel. enriched with organic camelia oil + organic shea butter extract, this deeply nourishing formula delivers 8 hours of non-stop hydration,* and 10 hours of comfort**.

shiny pearls + natural hd pigments—mixed in a complex with sunflower seed oil—provide glide-on ease and an intense color payoff. comforting candelilla wax helps protect lips by creating barrier action from dehydration for soft, smoothed lips all day long.

joli rouge satin’s eco-friendly, refillable gold tube creates less waste. simply insert any joli rouge refill shade into the case; then re-use the original lipstick cap. it’s easy, intuitive and economical.  


*hydration kinetics - 30 women
**consumer test - 107 women - 1 month

skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily
use: apply to lips for intense color and a luminous satin finish. 

benefits
intense color
hydrates, nourishes, comforts
lightweight, full coverage, satin finish
eco-friendly refillable lipstick tube
innovation and plant expertise
our new green joli rouge satin lipstick is an 84% skincare formula** and was created with 80% ingredients of natural origin. organic camelia oil, organic shea butter, and sunflower seed oil nourish, comfort and hydrate—for lips that look more beautiful when bare after 5 days.* a complex formulated with candellila wax promotes a satin finish and helps protect lips from drying. intensely colorful hd pigments—enriched with a nourishing complex of sunflower seed oil —assure glide on ease and a standout pout.
*consumer test - 107 women - 1 month
**corresponding to the minimum % of the lipstick base preserving optimal nutrition, protection and comfort before the addition of the color
clarins plus
makeup made for skin. developed with the same expertise as clarins’ skincare, we harness the power of the most potent plant extracts for makeup that delivers true skincare benefits.

results
97%*
intense color + smoothed lips

91%** soft, supple lips after 5 days
90%** lips are perfectly defined
71%** more beautiful lips, even bare after 5 days
93%** smooth, melting texture
85%** second skin effect
sensoriality after 14 days:
95%** fine, lightweight texture
*hydration kinetics - 30 women

what it is
our new generation, refillable, joli rouge satin lipstick provides intense  color, extreme comfort and full coverage with a luminous satin finish that stays fresh and flawless. the lightweight, creamy and melting  texture provides maximum impact with a barely-there feel. enriched with organic camelia oil + organic shea butter extract, this deeply nourishing formula delivers 8 hours of non-stop hydration,* and 10 hours of comfort**.

shiny pearls + natural hd pigments—mixed in a complex with sunflower seed oil—provide glide-on ease and an intense color payoff. comforting candelilla wax helps protect lips by creating barrier action from dehydration for soft, smoothed lips all day long.

Title: Joli rouge satin
Description:
what it is
our new generation, refillable, joli rouge satin lipstick provides intense  color, extreme comfort and full coverage with a luminous satin finish that stays fresh and flawless. the lightweight, creamy and melting  texture provides maximum impact with a barely-there feel. enriched with organic camelia oil + organic shea butter extract, this deeply nourishing formula delivers 8 hours of non-stop hydration,* and 10 hours of comfort**.

shiny pearls + natural hd pigments—mixed in a complex with sunflower seed oil—provide glide-on ease and an intense color payoff. comforting candelilla wax helps protect lips by creating barrier action from dehydration for soft, smoothed lips all day long.

joli rouge satin’s eco-friendly, refillable gold tube creates less waste. simply insert any joli rouge refill shade into the case; then re-use the original lipstick cap. it’s easy, intuitive and economical.  


*hydration kinetics - 30 women
**consumer test - 107 women - 1 month

skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily
use: apply to lips for intense color and a luminous satin finish. 

benefits
intense color
hydrates, nourishes, comforts
lightweight, full coverage, satin finish
eco-friendly refillable lipstick tube
innovation and plant expertise
our new green joli rouge satin lipstick is an 84% skincare formula** and was created with 80% ingredients of natural origin. organic camelia oil, organic shea butter, and sunflower seed oil nourish, comfort and hydrate—for lips that look more beautiful when bare after 5 days.* a complex formulated with candellila wax promotes a satin finish and helps protect lips from drying. intensely colorful hd pigments—enriched with a nourishing complex of sunflower seed oil —assure glide on ease and a standout pout.
*consumer test - 107 women - 1 month
**corresponding to the minimum % of the lipstick base preserving optimal nutrition, protection and comfort before the addition of the color
clarins plus
makeup made for skin. developed with the same expertise as clarins’ skincare, we harness the power of the most potent plant extracts for makeup that delivers true skincare benefits.

results
97%*
intense color + smoothed lips

91%** soft, supple lips after 5 days
90%** lips are perfectly defined
71%** more beautiful lips, even bare after 5 days
93%** smooth, melting texture
85%** second skin effect
sensoriality after 14 days:
95%** fine, lightweight texture
*hydration kinetics - 30 women
**consumer test - 107 women - 1 month

ingredients
polyglyceryl-2 triisostearate. dicaprylyl ether. octyldodecanol. polyglyceryl-2 isostearate/dimer dilinoleate copolymer. candelilla cera/euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax/cire de candelilla. helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed wax. ci 77891/titanium dioxide. silica. bis-diglyceryl polyacyladipate-2. ci 77492/iron oxides. butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter. camellia oleifera seed oil. ci 15850/red 7 lake. disteardimonium hectorite. dicalcium phosphate. butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter unsaponifiables. aroma/flavor. ci 77491/iron oxides. parfum/fragrance. ci 77499/iron oxides. pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate. polyhydroxystearic acid. tocopherol. ascorbyl palmitate. [stm4112a/705]

Title: Brow g brow pencil
Description:
brow g, the sculpting brow pencil
with its retractable high-precision tip, brow g long-wear brow pencil allows you to redefine and fill out the brow line to perfection.

brow g offers easy and natural application thanks to its double-ended design, which combines a precise retractable tip and a spoolie brush for blending. its seamless formula comes in a range of five shades tailored to every eyebrow tone.

capacity: 0,09 g

a second-skin formula
its seamless formula glides over skin and can be easily worked to build the desired intensity.

list of ingredients

#19049 ingredients:
• stearic acid
• mica
• hydrogenated castor oil
• rhus succedanea fruit wax
• bis-behenyl/isostearyl/phytosteryl dimer dilinoleyl dimer dilinoleate
• polyglyceryl-2 triisostearate
• jojoba esters
• triethylhexanoin
• tocopherol
• [+/- ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides)
• ci 77891 (titanium dioxide)]
disclaimer : guerlain product ingredient listings are updated periodically. before using a guerlain product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

an ultra-precise retractable tip
the brow g formula is encapsulated in a double-ended pencil in sleek black lines, which combines an ultra-precise retractable tip and a spoolie brush for blending.

a word from violette, guerlain makeup creative director

"for naturally defined eyebrows, i draw micro-strokes in the direction of hair growth with the fine tip of brow g, then brush them on to blend the material and mimic the natural texture of my eyebrows ".
violette, guerlain makeup creative director

Title: Kind & free clean brow wax 001
Description:
rimmel london's clear universal brow wax provides long-lasting hold to lock brows in place to instantly give the look of lifted brows. the easy-to-apply, mess-free formula helps tame unruly brows and set them in place without leaving a residue or flaking. for a brow look at lasts all day. live the london look!

live the london look! rimmel london's clear universal brow wax tames any brow!

provides long-lasting hold to lock brows in place to instantly give the look of lifted brows.

the easy-to-apply, mess-free formula helps tame unruly brows and set them in place without leaving a residue or flaking.

creates a brow look at lasts all day.

use alone or as a top coat to your eyebrow makeup to get a laminated brow look at home whilst keeping your brows conditioned.

product features:

  • a lightweight rimmel eyebrow wax that gives brows an at-home laminated brow effect.

  • holds brows in place for brows that last all day.

  • can be used alone or as a top coat to your eyebrow makeup.

  • this easy-to-apply, mess-free formula is a makeup bag must have.

Title: kind & free tinted lip balm
Description:
this is the first clean makeup line, without giving up anything. 100% vegan and respectful of animals and the planet. free of fragrances, mineral oils and ingredients of animal origin.

tinted, moisturizing and nourishing lip balm.

• ultra creamy texture.

• light coverage that adapts to the natural color of the lips.

• juicy and bright color.

• vegan formula, clean and made with recycled and recyclable ingredients.

Title: Pure reset purifying matifying toner
Description:
what it is
this mattifying lotion with a light and ultra-fresh texture prepares the skin to absorb products. it reduces shine, visibly reduces excess sebum and helps clarify the complexion. the skin exudes purity as if oxygenated and appears to restore its natural balance. formulated with [healthy plant complex]: organic coconut water and organic alpine rose extract for healthy glowing skin. its formula is also enriched with tamarind pulp acids (organic plant) which refines skin texture and meadowsweet (organic plant) with purifying properties.
vegan. 98% natural ingredients

benefits
purified skin.
rebalanced skin.
mattified complexion.
refined skin texture.

innovation and plant expertise
at the heart of my clarins* formulas is our scientific innovation: the [healthy plant complex], a powerful duo with nutritive and protective properties. clarins research has focused on the benefits of organic coconut water, which provides essential nutrients for the skin and helps boost its radiance, and organic alpine rose extract, which helps to remove the skin’s impurities. *except re-move purifying cleansing gel, pure-reset smooth skin blemish serum, clear-out targeted blemish lotion and pore-less mattifying pore eraser

Title: Hydra essentiel mask
Description:
intensely hydrating, hyaluronic acid face mask plumps, nourishes, and helps reinforce the skin’s moisture barrier, boosting its resistance to environmental stressors for skin that looks hydrated, smooth, radiant, and visibly renewed.

clarins’ proprietary new hyaluronic power complex+ combines a double dose of hyaluronic acid [ha²] in a new acetylated + low molecular weight with organic leaf of life extract*, to boost skin's natural hydration with immediate and long-term results — for supercharged hydrating + plumping power. this ultra-rich cream mask contains nourishing + hydrating ceramides that help reinforce the skin’s moisture barrier function in just one application — and for up to 4 hours² — to lock moisture in, and keep external aggressors out, ensuring 24h¹ hydration for soft, supple, radiant skin.

the sensorial, pampering, easy-to-apply cream envelopes the senses with a luxurious scent for a spa-fresh experience at home.

¹clinical test - 30 women - 24 hours
²clinical study - 20 women
*organic ingredients are produced in accordance with european regulation (ce 2018/848).

  • use: apply to clean face and neck 2-3 times a week.
benefits
  • visibly plumper skin after 1 application + 24h hydration¹
  • reinforces the skin’s moisture barrier
  • visibly smoothes + renews skin

Title: Hydra mask bi serum
Description:
this bi-phase serum has a duo hydric and lipidic texture that provides intense hydration.

at the heart of its formula is the [hyaluronic power complex +], a duo of hyaluronic acids with organic leaf of life extract, which provides continuous, multi-level and long-lasting hydration. the organic leaf of life extract+ hyaluronic acid help to intensely hydrate and plump the skin. acetylated hyaluronic acid, the formula’s standout ingredient, provides intense hydration.
the formula is also enriched with saffron flower polyphenols to help balance the microbiota and organic strawberry tree extract to regulate sebum. it helps refine skin texture and tighten pores. it balances the skin* and improves its quality. skin radiates with beauty after each use.

the silky and non-greasy formula absorbs easily and nourishes the skin.
for all skin types.

  • texture: serum

benefits

  • plumped skin
  • improves skin quality

Title: Kisskiss bee glow oil
Description:
the honey tinted lip oil, between skincare and makeup
guerlain presents kisskiss bee glow oil, a honey-infused tinted lip oil formulated with 92% natural-origin ingredients¹. its nourishing and plumping texture delivers 24 hours of care² and ensures an instant volume effect and a completely addictive glassy shine, with no stickiness. enhanced and nourished, lips are more beautiful day after day.

kisskiss bee glow oil is available in 6 ultra-luscious shades that subtly tint lips for a radiant look with an intense shine.

¹based on the iso 16128 standard, the remaining 8% contributing to the integrity, sensorial texture and pigmentation of the formula.
²instrumental test on 30 caucasian women.

capacity: 9.5 ml

Title: Terracotta 24 concealer
Description:
an all-natural, perfectly corrected complexion
drawing on its scientific expertise and in-depth knowledge of powder and pigment, guerlain has created the new concealer pairing the long-lasting power of a liquid concealer with the blurring radiance of a correcting powder, incorporating 95% naturally-derived ingredients¹.

terracotta concealer offers exceptional, easily buildable coverage, for a seamless result. particularly comfortable, soft and sensory, the texture ensures 24-hour hydration² and 24-hour optimal wear³ thanks to its no-transfer technology.

with an innovative, long-lasting formula of natural origin, terracotta concealer introduces an essential new beauty step to correct imperfections, illuminate shadowy areas, blur dark circles, and reveal a radiant freshness, as if you were returning from an outdoor escape.

a formula with nothing but the essentials to give skin a natural glow.

¹based on iso 16128 standard. the remaining 5% contribute to product integrity and sensoriality.
²instrumental test on 33 women.
³instrumental test and clinical evaluation on 25 women.

capacity: 11.5 ml

terracotta concealer offers exceptional, easily buildable coverage, for a seamless result. particularly comfortable, soft and sensory, the texture ensures 24-hour hydration² and 24-hour optimal wear³ thanks to its no-transfer technology.

with an innovative, long-lasting formula of natural origin, terracotta concealer introduces an essential new beauty step to correct imperfections, illuminate shadowy areas, blur dark circles, and reveal a radiant freshness, as if you were returning from an outdoor escape.

a formula with nothing but the essentials to give skin a natural glow.

¹based on iso 16128 standard. the remaining 5% contribute to product integrity and sensoriality.
²instrumental test on 33 women.
³instrumental test and clinical evaluation on 25 women.

capacity: 11.5 ml

Title: Terracotta 24 blush powder
Description:
reinventing color for a naturally radiant complexion
terracotta blush, formulated with 90% naturally-derived ingredients¹, transparently reveals and sets cheekbones with a delicate shade reminiscent of the freshness that rises to the cheeks after an outdoor escape.

with its lightweight and airy texture, this long-lasting² and comfortable powder blush reveals skin’s natural undertones under a perfectly balanced, ultra-buildable and second-skin veil of color.

capacity: 5g

¹based on iso 16128 standard. the remaining 10% contribute to product integrity, sensoriality and pigmentation.
²instrumental test and clinical evaluation on 30 women.

Title: All hours precise angles longwear concealer
Description:
what it is

a creamy, creaseless, full coverage concealer designed with a unique, multi-use applicator for a natural soft matte finish up to 24h wear + hydration.

what it does

twice the size of a standard concealer, it has a unique precise angled applicator to help spot conceal, sculpt, and seamlessly enhance features. this lightweight cloud skin formula is packed with skincare actives to help skin look smoother, softer, and firmer after 14 days.*

available in 18 shades. fragrance free.

consumers agree**:

  • 95.3% said their skin looked smoother
  • 90.7% said their skin felt softer
  • 83.3% said their fine lines and imperfections were less visible
  • 77.3% said that their skin looked firmer
keywords

creamy concealer, natural matte finish, full coverage concealer, longwear

benefits

precisely conceals, sculpts, and enhances complexion

type

liquid concealer

Title: Lip oil balm
Description:
our iconic lip oil re-imagined as a do-it-all hydrating lip balm that gives lips sheer color and shine. infused with a trio of plant oils -including nourishing organic sweetbriar rose* oil- it instantly smoothes, and visibly plumps lips for a natural look.

 

what it is

skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily

texture: balm

use: wear alone, or top off any lipstick or stain for plump, smooth lips.

 

benefits

luminous shine with a hint of color for a natural-looking pout

24h¹ hydration + 12h² comfort

smoothes + visibly plumps immediately³

 

the dual-action, tinted, oil-in-stick texture, delivers an instant hint of color and nourishment, plus luminous shine. the lightweight and creamy formula takes lips from dry and fragile to smooth and supple with 24h¹ hydration and 12h² comfort. a powerful trio of responsibly harvested, essential oils- organic sweetbriar rose,* hazelnut, and organic jojoba*- plus a hyaluronic acid powered plumping + hydrating peptide, provide comfort and care - delivering a +20% fuller pout immediately³ and bare lips that look +30% smoother?.

 

available in 6 sheer, shades — 01 pale pink, 02 pitaya, 03 lychee, 04 almond, 05 cherry, and 06 fig—each infused with a delightfully addictive, black currant and vanilla scent.

 

developed with the same expertise as clarins' skincare, this plant-based lip balm is a 99% skincare formula created with 96% ingredients of natural origin. packaged in a sleek silhouette. the carefully angled tip glides smoothly over lip's contours for a precise application.

 

¹clinical study - 24 volunteers

²consumer test, 110 women

³self evaluation on a structured scale - 110 women

?self evaluation on a structured scale - 109 women after 13 days

*organic ingredients are produced in accordance with european regulation (ce 2018/848).

 

innovation and plant expertise

this 99% skincare formula is formulated with 96% ingredients of natural origin, and contains 30% responsibly harvested essential oils. organic sweetbriar rose* oil, hand-harvested and rich in omega-6 + omega-3 fatty acids, helps to nourish and comfort lips. cold-pressed organic jojoba* oil and hazelnut oil help nourish, hydrate and soften lips while providing a luxurious silky feel. a new peptide visibly plumps and hydrates for an instant volumizing effect.

 

clarins plus

makeup made for skin. developed with the same expertise as clarins' skincare, we harness the power of the most potent plant oils to create makeup that delivers true treatment benefits.

Title: Glowing sun oil high protection spf30
Description:
a high protection nourishing oil, ideal for soft and moisturised skin.

 

what it is

skin type: all skin types

texture: spray

use: high protection care for body and hair, water-resistant, suitable for outdoor activities, and all skin types.

 

benefits

skin is protected from the harmful effects of the sun and free radicals.

nourishes.

absorbs quickly, no greasy feel.

dry oil with a non-stickyfinish.

 

learn more

this dry oil with a non-sticky finish allows for quick absorption without a greasy feel. it produces an incredible sensory experience when applied and is highly effective. its relaxing fragrance has been specifically redesigned to help you fully enjoy your holiday. it's water-resistant and suitable for outdoor activities. it can also be applied to the hair to nourish and protect it from the drying effects of the sun.

 

innovation and plant expertise

clarins research has combined the best of science with the power of plants to develop the [solar protect complex]. highly effective, it includes a broad-spectrum of protection against uva/uvb rays and has a dual action that combats wrinkles and dark spots.

 

clarins plus

its extra special because it can also be applied to the hair to nourish and protect it from the drying effects of the sun.

Title: Lines liberated eye pencil
Description:
the new ysl beauty eye pencils. highly pigmented, highly blendable 24h wear.
smudge-resistant. waterproof.
dare to discover unbridled pigments with a shot of invigorating color in 1 stroke.
ultra-charged pigments for boldly vibrant matte, satin matte & chrome finishes.
indulge in ultra-gliding high-pleasure texture. experience the 3-in-1 slant-angle brush to sculpt, blend & stretch your look.
enjoy the enriched formula with cactus fig oil from ysl beauty ourika community gardens for all day comfort. available in 12 hyper-charged shades.

Title: Abeille royale honey treatment rich cream
Description:
inspired by clinical honey dressings, the rich honey treatment cream¹ concentrates the most powerful bee products selected by guerlain research to correct 4 visible signs of collagen loss linked to age: firmness, wrinkles, smoothness and radiance.

 

 its formula contains 93% ingredients of natural origin². superconcentrated in royal jelly with lipid-replenishing properties³ and equipped with beeswax butter to preserve hydration in the heart of the epidermis, it provides comfort and elasticity to the skin. day after day, wrinkles are reduced, the firmness, smoothness and radiance of the skin improve. repaired, the skin appears visibly younger.

 

benefits:

 

scientifically proven anti-aging effectiveness clinical evaluation by a dermatologist

from 1 month, radiance is revived: +43%¹, skin is smoothed: +32%¹

proven effectiveness even post dermo-esthetic procedure reduction of redness

honey treatment rich cream is refillable.

¹cosmetic treatment treatment with honey.

²in accordance with iso 16128, calculation including water.

³in vitro test on ingredient.

 

usage tips:

tone: with the edge of your index fingers, massage up and down the sides of the nose. stretch outwards from the face to the ears, still using the edge of the index fingers.

 

lifter: slide the palms of the hands flat along each side of the jawline, starting from the bottom of the chin towards the ears. finalize with an external smoothing of the crow's feet with your fingertips.

Title: Thrill seeker glassy gloss lip gloss
Description:
get instantly fuller-looking lips with glassy shine with rimmel london thrill seeker glassy gloss. its vegan formula contains hyaluronic acid and an anti-oxidant complex that's super hydrating and nourishing for healthy-looking lips. rimmel’s boldest lip cushiony doe foot applicator scoops up just the right amount of this hydrating gloss to give you a seamless application. • this lip gloss contains hyaluronic acid • an anti-oxidant complex that boost moisture for instant hydration • a cushiony doe-foot applicator that scoops up just the right amount • instantly soft, luscious and volumized-looking lips • subtle juicy scent with coconut water, red pineapple and pink berry citrus • clean • gluten-free • dermatologist-tested • vegan & cruelty-free formula

how to apply

simply swipe on a layer of our non-sticky lip gloss using the plush doe-foot applicator for a sheer, lightweight and natural shine to your lips.
