Title: The gommage de beaute skin resurfacing peel
Sos comfort nourishing balm mask
Description: nourishing balm mask with wild mango butter calms and soothes dry and flaky skin. its ultra-rich creamy texture softens the skin, leaving it velvety-smooth and incredibly comfortable. so relax your senses restore the softness and radiance to your skin!

Title: Genifique advanced eye cream set
Description:
the set contains:

  • advanced génifique eye cream (15 ml)

  • mascara hypnôse (2 ml)

  • bi-facil (30 ml)

Title: Encre de peau all hours foundation
Description:
ysl all hours liquid foundation has you covered for endless nights: own the night and the day with a matte foundation for a flawless complexion, which stays put for up to 24 hours. a rich level of fine pigments means full coverage with a flawless, even finish, without a mask-like effect. the high coverage foundation’s innovative formula is waterproof and transfer-resistant, with no compromise on comfort and no need to touch up.
the oil-free formula gives a matte look throughout the day and helps to reduce the appearance of pores. apply with the all hours blender for a polished, flawless finish. for increased wear & hold, apply all hours primer before the foundation, an instant perfecting layer for a lasting matte complexion.
the ysl all hours liquid matte foundation formula is enriched with a skincare complex and uv filter leaving skin looking fresh and smooth. suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. dermatologically tested. non-comedogenic. spf 20.

application

ysl flawless matte complexion routine:

1. apply a thin layer of all hours primer using fingertips, a mattifying primer to increase foundation wear & hold.
2. apply all hours foundation using all hours blender for full coverage with a flawless, polished finish.
3. conceal dark circles & imperfections with all hours concealer, a creamy full coverage concealer with 16 hour long-wear.
4. finish with all hours compact, a velvet balm-to-powder texture for a flawless, matte complexion night & day.
pro tip: apply a thin layer of all hours compact in between each of these steps for an ultra-matte finish.

pro finishers:

touche eclat glow shot
three shades of strobing cream for a dewy, highlighted finish, apply on the parts of the face that would naturally catch sunlight.

couture contouring palette
swipe and blend the taupe, matte powder underneath cheek bones to create a natural-looking contour & sweep the highlighter over cheekbones to accentuate facial features.

rouge pur couture the mats
a seductive, matte lip is the perfect complement to a flawless, matte complexion, select your perfect shade of rouge pur couture the mats.

Title: Fix it forget it
Description:
what it is: 
an ultra hydrating, antioxidant rich setting spray that locks in makeup for up to 24h.

what it does:

an ultra hydrating, antioxidant rich setting spray that keeps makeup fresh and set for up to 24 hour. this sweatproof, weatherproof formula extends makeup wear while delivering a high concentration of hyaluronic acid to ensure that skin stays smooth all day long and vitamin c rich kiwi extract and the moringa seeds toprotect skin against free radicals and pollution. plus, an innovative silica compound ensures that skin stays shine-free and natural looking all day long.

what else you need to know: : 

pro tip: for a luminous glow, mix-in your favorite liquid highlighter into the spray and apply liberally

how to use: 

- following the application of your foundation, apply the mist all over the face to lock-in your makeup 
- for an extra-boost of hydration throughout the day, re-apply as needed

Title: Everlasting youth fluid spf15
Description:
the foundation that fully restores your complexion's youthful glow. instantly restore a glowing radiant complexion with this new skin tone optimizing complex. conceals age spots and imperfections. contains extracts of chicory and red jania that help optimise the skin's luminosity and radiance. day after day, your skin is firmer, plumped, smooth and radiant.

how to

smooth the foundation gently outwards from middle of the face. blend delicately towards the neck, hairline and ears.

Title: All hours powder
Description:
introducing the first 24hr mattifying powder by ysl. its lightweight texture blends with the skin for a smooth finish and perfect coverage. up to 24 hour matte wear. buildable coverage. shine control.

apply as the final touch of your ysl complexion routine to set your makeup, blur the look of imperfections and minimise the appearance of pores.

perfect on-the-go with a two sided applicator for a perfect makeup result. the beige sponge side is designed to deliver the ideal amount of powder while the white fluffy side can be used for easy touch ups throughout the day.

Title: Milky boost foundation
Description:
milky boost is a milk foundation innovatively formulated with magical micro pearls featuring micro-encapsulation technology, which makes them change colour upon contact with the skin. it smooths and evens out your complexion, making it luminous and radiant. since it comes in a large size, you get almost double the daily applications as a regular size*. plus, it's recyclable** and made in france. *compared to 30ml sizes on the market.

benefits:

  • makes your complexion even, radiant, luminous and smooth
  • hydrates the skin and makes it soft
  • gives your skin energy and vitality

Title: Instant poreless matifying primer
Description: instant poreless primer creates a matte complexion, minimising visible pores and imperfections. containing organic strawberry tree fruit extract, the gel-cream texture transforms into a powder to absorb excess sebum and oil to tackle oily skin and eliminate shine.

Title: Skin illusion loose powder foundation
Description:
a loose powder texture that combines the smoothness and lightness of a powder with the coverage of a foundation. a mineral and plant active ingredient compound gives the complexion incomparable radiance while nurturing the skin. the result is a matte yet glowing complexion that mimics the look of flawless skin.

intuitive convenient packaging, its innovative application system can deliver the right dose of powder and easily remove it with the magnetic retractable brush.

matte finish – light to medium coverage – all skin types, even the most sensitive. dermatologically tested. oil-free.

Title: Skin illusion loose powder foundation
Description:
a loose powder texture that combines the smoothness and lightness of a powder with the coverage of a foundation. a mineral and plant active ingredient compound gives the complexion incomparable radiance while nurturing the skin. the result is a matte yet glowing complexion that mimics the look of flawless skin.

intuitive convenient packaging, its innovative application system can deliver the right dose of powder and easily remove it with the magnetic retractable brush.

matte finish – light to medium coverage – all skin types, even the most sensitive. dermatologically tested. oil-free.

Title: Skin illusion
Description:
discover the secret to a naturally flawless complexion with new skin illusion.

this natural hydrating foundation gives immediate freshness and a beautiful glow without masking your skin’s natural beauty.

formulated with red jania extract and light optimising complex to instantly revive radiance.

just a few drops are enough to instantly enhance the complexion, while a subtle dose of non-greasy oils creates a completely new feel.

Title: Meteorites powder brush
Description:
the météorites brush has been created as the ideal companion for météorites powders. designed to last, its ultra-soft synthetic bristles take up just the right amount of product and deposit a light veil of powder.

elegant and travel-friendly, it slips into any bag for touch-ups during the day, protected in its velvet suede pouch.

Title: Meteorites setting & finishing pearls of powder
Description:
what it is: one-of-a-kind, handmade finishing pearls of powder that set makeup, color correct, mattify shine, and illuminate the complexion, housed in a luxury re-usable case.


highlighted ingredients: 
- sparkling-colored mother-of-pearls: provide multidimensional radiance.

- cooler-toned mother-of-pearls: provide long-lasting radiance.

 

what else you need to know: the pearls of powder guarantee a radiant complexion for up to 12 hours and improve foundation wear.

-delphine jelk, guerlain perfumer, and violette, guerlain make-up creative director, came together to revisit the météorites' iconic scent. the violet floral heart has been preserved. to bring modernity, a woodier facet with a sandalwood, musk and vanilla note was added.

 

"for a complexion with a made-to-measure glow, i've precisely chosen the different colors of meteorites pearls, taking into account the undertones and subtle variations of shades that characterize each type of skin tone." - violette, guerlain make-up creative director.

 

clinical results: in an evaluation and instrumental test on 25 women, results showed:

- the pearls of powder guarantee a radiant complexion for up to 12 hours.

Title: Meteorites base perfecting pearl anti dullness
Description:
guerlain météorites base is a skin-perfecting and anti-dullness make-up base.

the fresh gel texture melt with the rosy pearls to give skin a plumpy finish while a combination of absorbent powders and a special polymer neutralizes excess sebum and helps to conceal blemishes for a long-lasting matt complexion that gradually becomes more even with each application. thanks to the stardust technology, a diamond powder encapsulated in microspheres, light is reflected in a new direction to create soft-focus perfecting halo. multi-coloured pearlescent flecks maximise the diffusion of light and delicately correct the complexion thanks to the unique mix of colours, signature of the météorites range.

fragrance

a delicate violet fragrance, inimitable and  addictive

Title: Parure gold mist- setting mist
Description:
parure gold mist is the final step for a flawless make-up result. it sets make-up and brings a more radiant finish to foundation.

the complexion gets an immediate beauty boost thanks to the formula’s moisturising and smoothing properties, which are designed to leave the skin suppler, moisturised as plumped.

formulated to act as a beauty-enhancing and protective (pollution) veil, it creates a thin barrier over the skin and protects it from free radicals.

the complexion remains flawless, with a sensation of soft comfort that lasts all day long.

fragrance

parure gold has a distinctive and delicate floral scent. the first peach note blended with an accord of vegetal notes is fresh and sparkling. the rose, raspberry and jasmine heart is enriched with benzoin and white musks.

Title: Terracotta pinceau bronzing powder brush
Description:
terracotta pinceau is the ideal ally for a uniform complexion.
compact and generous with its ultra-soft natural hair, it smoothes the bronzing pigments perfectly over the skin for an even, luminous and skin-embracing result. it's the guarantee of a flawless tan, without leaving any marks. 
nomad, elegant, it fits in all bags for a new touch in the day, well protected in its bronze velvet suede bronze pouch with magnetic closure.

Title: Terracotta joli teint beautifying foundation spf20
Description:
with terracotta joli teint, a new beauty dream has come true; a single formula that combines the perfection of foundation, the beautiful effect of a skincare product, and the sun-kissed radiance of terracotta. 
against fatigue that blurs the complexion, women now have terracotta joli teint. at the heart of winter or upon arrival of spring, this beautiful small bottle reveals the skin radiance! appearing make-up-free, your complexion is instantaneously warmer, more even, and naturally radiant, as
though you have just returned from a weekend in
the sun. spf 20 - pa++

fragrance

its tiare flower fragrance leaves a gentle scent on the skin, instantly sweeping you away to an exotic far-off paradise…

ingredients

aqua (water) • methyl trimethicone • alcohol • dimethicone • titanium dioxide [nano] • isododecane • peg-9 polydimethylsiloxyethyl dimethicone • ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate • polymethylsilsesquioxane • acrylates/dimethicone copolymer • diphenyl dimethicone/vinyl diphenyl dimethicone/silsesquioxane crosspolymer • glycerin • aluminum hydroxide • stearic acid • disteardimonium hectorite • phenoxyethanol • glyceryl undecyl dimethicone • sodium myristoyl glutamate • hydroxyethylcellulose • sodium chloride • propylene carbonate • parfum (fragrance) • chlorella vulgaris extract • diamond powder • benzyl salicylate • linalool • tropaeolum majus extract • bht • ethylhexylglycerin • tocopherol • [+/- : ci 77491,ci 77492,ci 77499 (iron oxides) • ci 77891 (titanium dioxide)

Title: Terracotta matte sculpting powder
Description:
terracotta matte powder is infused with the deep sunset hues.

soft and easy to apply, this sun-kissed powder warms the complexion and sculpts the features. its comfortable, ultra-fine texture blends beautifully with the skin to build the result up to the desired intensity. enriched with kaolin, a white clay known for its mattifying properties, terracotta matte powder sculpts the complexion with a shine-free finish.

fragrance

the fragrance of terracotta powder is an invitation to escape. the ylang-ylang and orange blossom notes create the sensation of a cocoon.  they are blended into tonka bean and vanilla notes with solar facets embodying the essence of terracotta. a touch of white musk brings softness to this addictive scent.

Title: Fix make up
Description:
4-in-1 makeup setting spray for all skin types—with organic alpenrose extract*—keeps makeup fresh and flawless all day. with 24h hold,¹ the ultra-fine mist provides 12h hydration,² locks out pollutants and boosts skin’s radiance for a flawless finish.

 

what it is

skin type: combination, dry, normal, oily

texture: spray

use: apply a light mist over face to set makeup.

 

benefits

24h makeup hold ¹ / 12h hydration ²

transfer-proof + sweat-proof

refeshes + soothes

boosts skin’s radiance

clarins’ plant-based anti-pollution complex helps minimize the skin-aging effects of environmental pollution, including blue lights from electronics

 

learn more

this refreshing, lightweight setting spray is sweatproof, tackling the effects of heat + humidity so makeup looks fresh all day. non-transferring - colors stay true without settling into fine lines and pores. enriched with potent plant ingredients including anti-oxidant rich organic alpenrose extract* to protect against environmental aggressors, organic leaf of life extract* that boosts skin’s natural hydration for a soft, smooth and radiant appearence, and organic raspberry water* which deeply hydrates and soothes.

 

clarins’ plant-based anti-pollution complex—made with nipplewort, furcellaria and organic white horehound* — helps minimize the skin-aging effects of environmental pollution, including blue lights from electronics.

 

mood boosting fragrance soothes the senses with clarins’ signature rose petal scent.

 

*organic ingredients are produced in accordance with european regulation (ce 2018/848).

 

innovation and plant expertise

our newly formulated fix' make-up is a 97% skincare formula and created with 94% ingredients of natural origin—including antioxidant-rich organic alpenrose extract*, super-quenching organic leaf of life extract*, soothing + hydrating organic raspberry water*, and refreshing organic alcohol*—to hydrate skin for 12h¹ + extend makeup wear for 24h.²

¹clinical test on 30 volunteers

²clinical test on 30 volunteers

 

clarins plus

not just makeup - developed with the same expertise as clarins skincare, we harnessed the power of the most potent organic* plant actives from around the world to create a makeup setting spray that delivers true skincare benefits—soft, smooth, hydrated skin that looks more radiant even when.

Title: Sos primer
Description:
redness, dullness and dark spots giving your complexion a hard time? prime for perfection! sos primer is tinted to suit all skin tones and works to even out the complexion in an instant. its fresh-feeling, flawless-effect formula contains high lumitech complex to correct, revive and illuminate the complexion instantly.

sos primer is enriched with organic sea lily extract to deliver 24-hour hydration to the skin. the fine, weightless texture lets skin breathe and is formulated with the clarins anti-pollution complex to protect the skin from environmental damage.

the green concealer neutralises redness and imperfections in a flash, leaving your skin hydrated and luminous. the essential green primer for a flawless complexion!

benefits

  • sets make-up
  • boosts radiance and brightens the complexion
  • protects and hydrates the skin for 24 hours

Title: All hours cushion foundation
Description:
description & benefits

ysl introduces all hours cushion foundation, the latest compact cushion formula for non-stop, on the go application

this liquid cushion format offers full coverage, long lasting wear while spf50 helps to protect against premature signs of skin ageing.

the ysl all hours range has you fully covered day or night for a flawless complexion. this cushion format has a travel-friendly sponge applicator offering a cool, fresh sensation when applied. the cushion can be used alone for a natural-looking matte finish or as a portable top-up product for your all hours foundation. when the cushion runs low, purchase a refillable insert.

• full-coverage matte finish
• buildable coverage
• portable format – great for daily use or touch-ups on the move
• cool, fresh sensation when applied
• all day long-lasting wear
• refillable
• spf 50 / pa +++

ingredients

Title: Wonder perfect mascara set
Description:
this set contains:
- clarins wonder perfect mascara 4d
- clarins instant eye make up remover 30ml
- clarins total eye contour gel 5ml

Title: Mavala 002 protective base coat
Description: mavala 002 formula prevents pigments in nail polish from coming in direct contact with the nail plate, protecting it from yellowing. its slightly "sticky" formula allows perfect adhesion of your nail polish and extends the life of your manicure.

Title: Touche eclat 3d radiant shaper
Description:
what it is

a universal, multi-use highlighter and finishing powder designed to suit all skin tones for natural, all-over glow in one step.

what it does

this buildable pressed powder is packed with iridescent micro-pearls to create a subtle lit-from-within look. the versatile powder instantly brightens complexion with a multidimensional glow, and is perfect for on-the-go touch ups to refresh your makeup look or natural complexion throughout the day.

Title: Make-up correcting pen
Description: to make your life easier, clarins has created the make-up corrector pen to be used anytime, anywhere. thanks to its precise tip, it removes unwanted traces from eyes and lips without touching the rest of your make-up. its formula is enriched with jojoba oil recognized for its ability to nourish the skin without leaving a greasy feel. even better, with 3 refills, it can be used around 300 times in total... enough to "accidentally" apply too much!

Title: Everlasting foundation
Description:
this high-coverage foundation withstands all tests for 24 hours. rich in bamboo powder, quinoa and oat sugar extracts, as well as a plant-based micro-patch extract that binds water to its surface while protecting it from dehydration, the everlasting foundation conceals imperfections, redness or birthmarks and blends into the skin thanks to its ultra-light texture.

benefits:

  •  high coverage
  •  matte finish
  •  moisturises

Title: Barrier base coat
Description:
nails are sensitive to detergents, impacts and abrasions. ingredients contained in some enamels can make nails dryer, thinner and more sensitive.

developed for sensitive nails, this water-based odourless base coat moisturizes, prevents dehydration, splitting and breaking of nails and helps nails retain their flexibility while protecting and improving the adherence of nail polish. also protects nails from yellowing

Title: Colorfix for nail polish
Description: colorfix is a clear top coat reinforced with acryl which dries to a hard, elastic glaze, contributes a brilliant sheen to nail colour and "fixes" it, forming an extra protective shield against flaking.

Title: Gel finish top coat
Description: gel finish top coat, "gel effect" fixator gives your manicure extra-volume, smoothness and extra-gloss. its transparent gel texture replicates the finish of a gel manicure, creates a volumizing magnifying effect, a perfect domed finish and an exceptional ultra glossy shine. its formula respects the structure and the integrity of the natural nail, does not use a uv lamp and is removed with a classic nail polish remover.

Title: Nail polish remover pads
Description:
handy for travel and make-up bag.

they are saturated with a gentle nail polish remover, which does not dry out nail nor cuticle. quick and easy to use. packed in a handy plastic container of 30 pads.

Title: Oil seal dryer
Description: this oil has the property of accelerating the drying time of your manicure. ideal for dry skin and cuticles, it is enriched with cotton oil, that softens and regenerates your skin, and antioxidant vitamin e. it forms a slightly gliding and non-sticky film, which instantly locks in colour and protects nail polish from fingerprints, sheet marks and light knocks.

Title: Mini color
Description: the mini color's - small golden cap bottle - relies on a simple yet great idea. nail polish, regardless of the quality, tends to dry out sooner or later, especially when the bottle is frequently opened. the mavala mini color's have been designed to minimize solvent evaporation and avoid this inconvenience. because of its small size, one uses the whole content with no waste! other important advantages : its small size makes it handy to keep with you and its low and affordable cost for all allows one to buy 2, 3 or even more at the same time. wide range of different shades to suit all tastes and all styles with, over the season, new trendy colours. mavala cares about consumers' health, so their nail polishes are formulated only with carefully selected ingredients. mini color’s are worry free nail polishes !

Title: Color matt top coat
Description: a transparent top coat that provides a totally matt and velvety finish to nail polish for an innovative result and a beautiful soft touch effect.

Title: Palette bronzing
Description:
every year clarins brings out a special edition bronzer and this year is no exception.  this year’s stunning design was love at first sight for me.  on swatching it at a counter, the silky smooth texture endorsed my need of owing the bronzer:)
this is a giant bronzer, all 20g of it!  it is housed in a beautiful limited edition round compact, embossed with hibiscus flowers and palm leaves.

Description: Catch light face stick

Title: Extra firming foundation spf15
Description:
this rich, oil-free creamy foundation is formulated with a light-enhancing complex and oat sugar
provides superior anti-aging benefits and blemishes
protects skin from harmful uv rays with spf 15
creates firm, smooth, smooth, radiant and youthful complexion

Title: Teint highlighter palette
Description: a little bit of shimmery paint never hurts, especially if you're creating a bold look for the show. therefore, powder for the face and décolleté area from the french brand clarins will be an excellent purchase, which will add an alluring golden shimmer to the skin, which can bewitch and charm everyone around. the process of forming shining strokes will take a couple of minutes, and the gorgeous result, pleasant sensations and soul-warming compliments will delight you for a long time!

Title: Instant smooth perfecting touch
Description:
this award winning makeup primer is the perfect combination of make-up and skin care. with an ultra-light, ultra-smooth texture it glides on skin, leaving a imperceptible veil on its surface, filling in and smoothing away the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and pores.

the very light texture ensures that skin is not overloaded and is able to breathe. your skin is left 'foundation ready'. smoother, moisturized and even-toned, your skin offers the best surface, ready to give your foundation make-up a more even and flawless finish.

can also be used alone or mixed-in with your foundation for a quick and easy application.

Title: Teint idole ultra wear spf15
Description:
hanks to its unique matte finish, it integrates perfectly with your skin and does not leave a shiny appearance.
 with its water and moisture resistant structure, it does not let you down even on the hottest days or the most intense exercise hours.
it is suitable for the ph of the skin and preserves its freshness and vitality during the first day (* personal evaluation by 109 women)

Title: Lasting finish primer
Description:
want the london look? prolong the life of any foundation for up to 8 hours so your makeup never lets you down with lasting finish primer from rimmel london. our first wear-enhancing base goes on nice and smooth – almost like a lotion – instantly smoothening and brightening your skin. it minimises pores and imperfections so makeup glides on easily and evenly. best of all, it continuously recharges your skin’s moisture which means your makeup feels light and comfortable all day long.  this highly moisturizing primer makes foundation look excellent (especially on drier skin!) perfect before making up your face for the office or a night out. apply a small amount before putting on your foundation for a hydrated but natural base. it absorbs easily and creates a nice softened base for foundation to adhere to. for the extra moisture that will allow your foundation to apply more easily and last longer, lasting finish primer from rimmel london is a must! a lovely gift for a girlfriend, sister, or even your mum! rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving.
rimmel is not perfection or intimidating,  it is like  london : young, urban, eclectic, edgy.
it is expression with no rules, it is real, it is accessible. get the london look.

Title: Stay matte pressed powder
Description:
want the london look? say goodbye to shine with stay matte pressed powder from rimmel london! this longlasting pressed powder with natural minerals helps to minimize the appearance of pores and fine lines. it provides a natural, matte finish for flawless complexion. dermatologically tested. perfect for all skin types, apply alone or over foundation for a finishing touch or to touch up make-up throughout the day. for long lasting shine protection at work or out on the town, make stay matte your go-to powder! apply a light dusting with a big powder brush and blend onto skin as finishing stepand to create a true matte look. as you need it use with a sponge as a shine cover-up  throughout the day. to mattify your complexion and as finishing touch over your foundation, there’s nothing like rimmel stay matte pressed powder. try it once and you won’t want to go without it. the ultimate essential in your beauty bag. rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving.
rimmel is not perfection or intimidating,  it is like  london : young, urban, eclectic, edgy.
it is expression with no rules, it is real, it is accessible. get the london look.

Title: Super gel by kate moss
Description:
want the london look? hands up if you're ready for a professional looking mani without the lamps, the mess, the long drying time! rimmel london introduces super gel kate, a long lasting, chip resistant nail varnish that goes on with just 2 steps. in new romantic , a glossy light pink shade created by kate moss. when only a long lasting nail lacquer will do, super gel in new romantic delivers up to 14 days of colour and shine. super gel nail polish dries without bubbling or cracking. easy to use -- and easy to remove! apply 1 - 2 thin, even coats of super gel  - no base coat required. once it is dry, follow up with the self-curing gel top coat. the maxi brush affords ultimate control and precision. with super gel kate from rimmel london you can say ""yes"" to salon technology, without the down side.- a flattering, feminine shade, new romantic  is a go-to staple for your lacquer collection.-- wouldn't it make a delightful little gift (think: mother, sister, best friend, gran...)? rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving.
rimmel is not perfection or intimidating,  it is like  london : young, urban, eclectic, edgy.
it is expression with no rules, it is real, it is accessible. get the london look.

Title: Super gel
Description:
looking for the perfect gel-like manicure you can do at home? get a high-shine, chip-resistant, long-lasting gel colour with rimmel london super gel nail polish. it's super easy to apply - no uv light needed - and lasts up to 14 days. nailed it.

how to apply

step 1: apply 1-2 coats of super gel nail polish.

step 2: wait for nails to dry completely.

step 3: sweep super gel top coat over the top to activate curing.

Title: Lasting finish matte foundation
Description:
want the london look? yet for all its glamour, this matte lipstick feels sublimely comfortable all day long. the creamy formula is enriched with ruby powder, an ingredient exclusive to rimmel london and kate moss: it  intensifies lip colour whilst ensuring a long wearing result.   for those times that you fancy an everyday pink lip.  lasting finish matte by kate goes on easily and smoothly. apply directly from the signature slim red tube -- then rock that stunning pout for hours on end! kate matte #101 by rimmel london and kate moss is one of those essential  lipsticks every girl needs in her makeup bag of tricks. don't you reckon your best friend (or your sister, or your mum) would like to own one, too?  rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving.
rimmel is not perfection or intimidating,  it is like  london : young, urban, eclectic, edgy.
it is expression with no rules, it is real, it is accessible. get the london look.

Title: Match perfection
Description: want the london look? rimmel london offers a revolution wit h a 2 in 1 primer & setting spray with insta fix & go, that can be applied underneath or over the top of your makeup. it dries quickly with just one application & locks your makeup into place for all day staying power. after applying makeup, hold the bottle 8 inches from your face, close eyes & spray in circular motions to cover the full face to help set makeup into place. use throughout the day to help revitalise & refresh makeup for a freshly applied look & feel all day long. avoid spraying into eyes. makeup artist tip: apply before makeup application to help prime the skin for a more durable effect a must-have in every girl's makeup bag of tricks. #insta fix & go would make a lovely gift for a girlfriend, sister... or mum! rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving. rimmel is not perfection or intimidating, it is like london: young, urban, eclectic, edge. it is expression with no rules, it is real, itis accessible. live the london look

Title: 60 seconds super shine nail polish
Description:
want the london look? gloss up those tips with 60 seconds super shine nail polish in port-a-loo- blue, a bright teal blue. you'll be on your way in no time, thanks to 3 in 1 colour technology that delivers ultra shiny colour along with a base coat and glossy top coat -- all in one stroke. and it dries in under a minute! if you love to change your polish often, 60 seconds super shine is ideal. give your manicure an edgy allure with 60 seconds super shine  in port-a-loo- blue,  from rimmel london. long lasting 60 seconds super shine resists chips and fading for up to 10 days. apply to nails with a downward stroke. for a more intensely coloured finish, add an extra coat. 60 seconds super shine dries so quickly there's practically no down time. a girl doesn’t live by nude lacquers alone! add a dash of drama to your polish wardrobe with  60 seconds super shine in port-a-loo- blue, from rimmel london.it makes a lovely little gift for your best friend, your sister or your mum! rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving.
rimmel is not perfection or intimidating,  it is like  london : young, urban, eclectic, edgy.
it is expression with no rules, it is real, it is accessible. get the london look.

Title: 60 seconds super shine nail polish
Description:
want the london look? gloss up those tips with 60 seconds super shine nail polish in port-a-loo- blue, a bright teal blue. you'll be on your way in no time, thanks to 3 in 1 colour technology that delivers ultra shiny colour along with a base coat and glossy top coat -- all in one stroke. and it dries in under a minute! if you love to change your polish often, 60 seconds super shine is ideal. give your manicure an edgy allure with 60 seconds super shine  in port-a-loo- blue,  from rimmel london. long lasting 60 seconds super shine resists chips and fading for up to 10 days. apply to nails with a downward stroke. for a more intensely coloured finish, add an extra coat. 60 seconds super shine dries so quickly there's practically no down time. a girl doesn’t live by nude lacquers alone! add a dash of drama to your polish wardrobe with  60 seconds super shine in port-a-loo- blue, from rimmel london.it makes a lovely little gift for your best friend, your sister or your mum! rimmel london is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving.
rimmel is not perfection or intimidating,  it is like  london : young, urban, eclectic, edgy.
it is expression with no rules, it is real, it is accessible. get the london look.

Title: Glow stick highlighter
Description: effortlessly create a gorgeous radiant look with our illuminating cream stick highlighter. the silky-smooth formula melts into the skin for an instant and natural-looking glow that looks fresh all day. the precise, cream stick comes in a chubby xxl pack and is available in four luminous shades to let you build looks from a subtle glow to an intense luminous finish.

Title: Glow stick highlighter
Description: effortlessly create a gorgeous radiant look with our illuminating cream stick highlighter. the silky-smooth formula melts into the skin for an instant and natural-looking glow that looks fresh all day. the precise, cream stick comes in a chubby xxl pack and is available in four luminous shades to let you build looks from a subtle glow to an intense luminous finish.

Title: Lasting finishing 25 hour foundation
Description:
want a long-lasting foundation that also cares for your skin? try rimmel london’s #1 skincare inspired foundation – lasting finish 25hr.

the long-lasting formula is infused with hyaluronic acid and vitamin e, helping to boost your skin with hydration so it appears fresh, plump and smooth.

it blends seamlessly into your skin, concealing dark circles and imperfections. no need to worry about sweat, heat or humidity – your foundation stays flawless for up to 25 hours.

how to use:

apply a small amount –  then sheer it out or build it up to full coverage with a beauty blender or a brush.

infused with hyaluronic acid and vitamin e for a boost of hydration

Title: Chic black 7-day set
Description:
chic black 7-day set includes: 7 makeup erasers approx. 5in x 4in & 1 laundry bag approx. 6in x 5in. one mini for every day of the week! #1 sustainable makeup remover.

erase all makeup with just water! including waterproof mascara, eyeliner, foundation, lipstick, & more! the original makeup eraser is a premium, patented, polyester cloth made up of millions of tiny hair-like fibers that work together to create a "suction" for all dirt, makeup, & oil in your pores. double-sided to erase makeup with the short fibers side & exfoliate the skin with the long fiber side (side with tag).

Title: Original black
Description:
the original makeup eraser, erase all makeup with just water, including waterproof mascara, eyeliner, foundation, lipstick, and more (pink mini)

the original makeup eraser is reusable & machine washable. great for sensitive skin dermatologist recommended.

Title: Love red
Description:
#1 sustainable makeup remover in the world. erase all makeup with just water! including waterproof mascara, eyeliner, foundation, lipstick, & more!

the original makeup eraser is a premium, patented, polyester cloth made up of millions of tiny hair-like fibers that work together to create a "suction" for all dirt, makeup, & oil in your pores. double-sided to erase makeup with the short fibers side & exfoliate the skin with the long fiber side (side with tag). reusable, machine washable, & lasts 3 to 5 years.

1 makeup eraser is equal to 3600 makeup wipes! no chemicals, less waste. ultra soft, dermatologist approved, & great for sensitive skin. pro tip: use in sections, wash approx. 1-2 times per week. 

free of alcohol, oils, astringents, parabens, fragrances, & sulfates. #nomorewipes

full size makeup eraser measures approx. 15.5in x 7.25in.

Title: Original pink
Description:
the original makeup eraser, erase all makeup with just water, including waterproof mascara, eyeliner, foundation, lipstick, and more (pink mini)

the original makeup eraser is reusable & machine washable. great for sensitive skin dermatologist recommended.

Title: Giving me butterflies 7 day set
Description: erase all makeup with just water! including waterproof mascara, eyeliner, foundation, lipstick, & more! reusable, machine washable, lasts 3-5 years. perfect for erasing makeup, applying toner, & removing face masks. no added chemicals. free of alcohol, oils, astringents, parabens, fragrances, & sulfates. set of 7. approx. 4in. x 3in. for directions, see "additional info". imported

Title: Les sahariennes bronzing stones
Description:
description & benefits

applied to the face with its very own brush accessory, it creates a natural-looking complexion, enhanced with a soft, brightening effect all year round.

skin type: normal / oily
coverage: light / natural, long hold
finish: natural, radiant
format: solid
texture: powder

no marks. instead, a fresh and radiant looking glow all day long. no texture feeling on face, yet a magical bronzed glow. intensely sensorial and effortlessly blendable, the texture glides smoothly on skin for an extreme comfort. customisable coverage.
les sahariennes bronzing stones creates a special weightless feeling on the skin.

application

this sensorial texture can be used all year round:
1. all over the face for a healthy glow
2. to contour to create definition

ingredients

"ingredients / composition / formule synthetic fluorphlogopite talc methyl methacrylate crosspolymer caprylic/capric triglyceride hdi/trimethylol hexyllactone crosspolymer peg10 dimethiconesqualane glycerin dimethicone sorbitan isostearate caprylyl glycol ethylhexylglycerin polysorbate 20 hexanediol chondrus crispus xanthan gum silica

Title: 3dhd blender
Description:
reach your every edge and contour with unique angles designed to prime, conceal, sculpt and highlight with any formula for flawless skin.
function: precise application + blending of liquids, creams or powders
unique feature: blending sponge with 3dhd® angled edges
recommended use: apply your favorite complexion product with a stippling or blending motion
coverage: sheer to medium
details
latex-free
to use:
1- wet 3dhd™ blender
2- squeeze to remove excess water
3- use damp sponge to apply and blend products onto the skin

to clean:
1- thoroughly wet 3dhd™ blender
2- apply 1-3 pumps sigmagic® brushampoo™
3- squeeze to lather
4- rinse well under warm, running water
5- repeat until water runs clear

Title: 3dhd kabuki brush
Description:
you'll achieve perfect skin on every curve and contour using the angles and sigmax® fibers designed to prime, conceal, sculpt and highlight.
function: buffed foundation application
unique feature: dense 3dhd® brush with a double wedge flat and pointed head
recommended use: a multi-functional design for all areas of the face to apply liquid, cream and powder products uniformly on every curve, crease and angle
coverage: medium to full

details
highest-quality fibers:
exclusive synthetic antimicrobial fibers
engineered to better hold, apply + blend products

ferrules with unmatched strength:
durable + corrosion-resistant sigmaalloy™
precious metal plating for shine + strength
exclusive, patented interlocking technology
double-threaded engineering

sleek, durable handles:
solid polymer-based handles are waterproof
outlasts all product formulas + frequent brush care

Title: Sigma dry''n shape spa
Description:
quickly deep clean, dry and reshape up to 18 makeup brushes all with one compact brush care tool. it’s engineered to wash brushes of every size using 4 exclusive textures, then squeeze-dry them upside-down to quickly restore their shape and function, protecting your brush investment.
function: quickly clean, dry + reshape makeup brushes
unique feature: design disassembles to wash brushes
recommended use: swirl brushes on 4 patented textures, then snap them into place, upside-down, to dry

additional info:
patented cleansing tool
holds, reshapes + dries up to 18 brushes
easy-to-breakdown design
compact design frees up counter space

how to use it:
1. wet brush under warm running water
2. apply 1-3 pumps of sigmagic® brushampoo™ liquid or foam directly onto brush fibers or wash texture of sigma dry’n shape® spa
3. swirl brush on wash texture, using face textures for larger brushes and eye textures for smaller brushes
4. using warm water, sweep brush back and forth on rinse texture to remove makeup and cleanser
5. move brush up and down on refine texture to ensure all makeup is removed
6. gently squeeze brush bristles to remove excess water
7. dry and reshape brush bristles by threading face brushes, handle first, through one of the elastic bands and securing the handle in the sigmasnap®
8. ensure there’s a small space between the elastic band and the ferrule to prevent water sitting in the ferrule
9. secure eye brushes, bristles down, handles up, into smaller silicone holders on the inside of the brush cleansing tool
cruelty-free
vegan

details
formulated without: latex, bpa, lead
non-toxic material
made of high-grade silicone

Title: Sigma spa express brush cleaning
Description:
swirl away product build-up, oil and dirt with this compact silicone mat, featuring 7 exclusive textures to clean brushes of every size!

firm-hold suctions cups
prolongs brush lifespan
prepares brushes for next use
clean brushes mean better skin and makeup application

step-by-step brush cleaning

1- position mat upright in sink and secure suction cups
2- wet brush under warm, running water
3- apply 1-3 pumps of sigmagic® brushampoo™ liquid or foam directly onto brush fibers or wash texture
4- swirl brush on wash texture, using face textures for larger brushes and eye textures for smaller brushes
5- using warm water, sweep brush back and forth on rinse texture to remove makeup and cleanser
6- move brush up and down on refine texture to ensure all makeup is removed
7- swirl brush on refine plus texture for an added clean
*add more brush cleanser and repeat steps 1-5 as needed
8- gently squeeze brush bristles to remove excess water
9- store, dry and reshape brush by placing it in a sigma dry'n shape® product

Title: Sigmagic scrub
Description:
achieve a quick and total clean with the 2-in-1 power of this solid brush cleanser and silicone texture. outperforming instant brush sprays that only remove surface-level makeup residue and bacteria, the all-natural cleanser dissolves tough pigment and foundation stains while the silicone texture penetrates brush bristles to scrub it all away.
function: remove makeup residue + bacteria
unique feature: compact silicone texture + cleanser
recommended use: secure suction cups in sink. swirl wet brush on texture to lather. rinse well with warm water. repeat as needed.

additional info:
great for dense foundation brushes
perfect for travel
antimicrobial + hypoallergenic
features firm-hold suction cups
vented lid allows product to stay dry and germ-free
prevents the growth of bacteria up to 2 weeks after use
once the solid cleanser in sigmagic™ scrub runs out, reuse the silicone texture as a cleansing tool with sigmagic® brushampoo™ liquid or foam

details
formulated without: fragrance, parabens, sulfates and phthalates

since sigmagic™ scrub is free of preservatives, natural oxidation may occur over time. discoloration does not affect the quality, effectiveness or safety of the product.

to achieve the ultimate clean and extend the life of your scrub, gently lather your brush with sigmagic® scrub, then transfer to a sigma spa® brush cleaning tool using the exclusive textures to rinse and refine brush bristles.

ingredients
contains 30% or more of soap, cocoa nucifera (coconut) oil, elaeis fruit (palm) oil, aqua (water), sodium hydroxide, potassium hydroxide.

sigma clean beauty products are formulated without:
acetaldehyde, acetone, acetonitrile, aluminum salts, animal oils/musks/fats, avobenzone, benzalkonium chloride, benzoisothiazolinone, benzophenone, beta hydroxy acid (bha), bisphenol a (bpa), bromostyrene, butoxyethanol, butyl methacrylate, butylated hydroxytoluene (bht) that is more than 0.1% of the total formulation, carbon black, casein, coal tar, cyclohexasiloxane, cyclomethicone, cyclotetrasiloxane, diethanolamine (dea), ethanolamine (eta), ethyl acrylate, ethyl methacrylate, formaldehyde donors, formaldehyde-releasing agents, formaldehydes, genetically modified organisms (gmo), glycerin stearate, grain proteins, hydroquinone, hydroxypropyl methacrylate, lanolin, latex, lead, lead acetate, lecithin, mercury, mercury compounds (thimerisol), metallic/metalica aluminum, methoxyethanol, methyl cellosolve, methyl methacrylate, methylene chloride, methylchloroisothiazolinone, methylisothiazolinone, mineral oil, nano tio2, nano zno2, nanoparticles (as defined by the eu), octamethyl cyclotetrasiloxane, octinoxate, oxybenzone, parabens, paraffin / paraffin wax (usp-grade is considered safe and clean), perfluorooctanoic acid (pfoa; part of ptfe), petroaltum (usp-grade is considered safe and clean), phenoxyethanol that is more than 1% of the total formulation, phthalates, plastic microbeads, polyacrylamide, polypropylene, polyetrafluoroethylene (ptfe; teflon), resorcinol, selenium sulfide, sodium lauryl sulfate, sodium laureth sulfate, sodium styrene/divinylbenzene copolymer, squalene,stearamide monoethanolamine (mea), stearyl glycyrrhetinate, styrene, styrene oxide, sulfates: sls & sles, synthetic flavors that are more than 1% of the total formulation, synthetic fragrances that is more than 1% of the total formulation, talc that is not certified asbestos-free, tetrahydrofurfuryl methacrylate, toluene, triclocarban, triclosan, trimethylolpropane trimethacrylate,1,4 dioxane

Title: E25 blending brush
Description:
make harsh lines disappear for your most seamless eye look yet, using this cult-favorite sigmatech® fiber brush.
function: apply + combine shadow shades
unique feature: slightly firm, rounded brush head
recommended use: blend colors onto the lid and buff out harsh lines
coverage: sheer to medium

details
winner of nylon's 2015 beauty hit list!
length: 6 1/2 in. (16.51 cm)

highest-quality fibers:
exclusive synthetic antimicrobial fibers
engineered to better hold, apply + blend products

ferrules with unmatched strength:
durable + corrosion-resistant sigmaalloy™
precious metal plating for shine + strength
exclusive, patented interlocking technology
double-threaded engineering

sleek, durable handles:
solid polymer-based handles are waterproof
outlasts all product formulas + frequent brush care

Title: Milky boost bb cream
Description:
an innovative bb cream bursting with skincare ingredients. at the heart of the new milky boost cream is peach milk, known for its nourishing and softening properties that leaves skin feeling comfortable every day. apply onto clean and moisturised skin to diminish the appearance of imperfections, signs of fatigue and fine lines. your complexion is even, brightened and radiant.

benefits

  • evens, corrects & smooths the complexion.

  • restores radiance.

  • intensely moisturises.

  • protects skin while letting it breathe.

  • ingredients* :

  •  aqua/water/eau. dimethicone. ci 77891/titanium dioxide. glycerin. propanediol. ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp copolymer. peg-11 methyl ether dimethicone. potassium cetyl phosphate. ci 77492/iron oxides. butylene glycol. silica. polysilicone-11. sodium polyacrylate. peg-12 dimethicone. synthetic fluorphlogopite. disodium edta. ethylhexylglycerin. tocopheryl acetate. ci 77491/iron oxides. parfum/fragrance. ci 77499/iron oxides. sodium hydroxide. dimethiconol. propylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate. prunus persica (peach) leaf extract. sodium hyaluronate. phenoxyethanol. marrubium vulgare extract. caprylyl glycol. decyl glucoside. prunus persica (peach) fruit extract. kalanchoe pinnata leaf extract. potassium sorbate. xanthan gum. malpighia emarginata (acerola) seed extract. phenethyl alcohol. citric acid. furcellaria lumbricalis extract. sodium benzoate. engelhardtia chrysolepis leaf extract. lapsana communis flower/leaf/stem extract. maris sal/sea salt/sel marin [m3829a1/02]

Title: Highlight powder
Description:
high 'light powder highlighter by rimmel london.

an illuminator that provides a radiant finish with slight reflections.

its formula with highly reflective and finely ground pigments has a smooth texture that feels light on the skin.

get an irresistible, bright and homogeneous glow, giving a luminous final touch to your look.

available in different shades.

Title: Natural bronzer bronzing powder
Description:
powder bronzer natural bronzer from rimmel london.

a water-resistant bronzing powder, with a velvety soft texture that provides a uniform finish and a natural tan.

get a sunless tanned face with these matte finish bronzing powders.

the formula applies perfectly, and lasts up to 10 hours.

apply it as a bronzer or even contour, and both on the face and neck and décolleté.

Title: Skin illusion velvet foundation
Description:
the lightweight foundation instantly blends into the skin to create an even matte finish that looks very natural.

it is quickly and evenly applied, perfectly masks minor skin imperfections and mattifies it. the comfortable velvety finish remains completely invisible on the face. and the formula based on plant extracts cares for the skin throughout the day, helping to maintain its beauty.

Title: Kind & free clean plant based nail polish
Description:
our first clean makeup that works, no compromises. 100% vegan & kind to animals. free from fragrance*, mineral oils, animal derived ingredients*. vegan & clean plant based formula that delivers on shine, gloss and rich pigment while still allowing your nails to stay healthy. • super gentle formula with strengthening properties & protects from daily aggressors formulated with algae. • made with 70% ingredients of natural origin (potato & corn) & 75% bio sourced ingredients. • providing colour for up to 5 days. • packaging made with recycled materials. • without perfumes.

how to apply

step 1: starting with clean nails, paint nails with 3 strokes from base to tip: 1 per side and 1 in the middle.
step 2: once dry, apply a 2nd coat if needed, allow to dry and apply a topcoat for dazzline shine.

Title: Kind & free pressed powder
Description:
our first clean makeup that works, no compromises. 100% vegan & kind to animals. free from fragrance*, mineral oils, animal derived ingredients*. vegan & clean healthy look lightweight pressed powder delivers a fresh, natural-looking glow. • long lasting & instantly mattifies skin and reduces shine. • formulated with aloe vera & tapioca. • made with 94% ingredients of natural origin. • without perfumes. • doesn’t feel cakey. • dermatologist tested. suitable for sensitive skin. • packaging made with recycled materials.

how to apply

step 1: swirl a fluffy brush across the powder and gently sweep across areas of the face you want to stop shine, usually forehead, nose & chin.

step 2: alternatively sweep a powder sponge across the powder and tap onto face. can be used to set under eye make-up.

Title: Kind & free moisturising skin tint
Description:
our first clean makeup that works, no compromises. 100% vegan & kind to animals. free from fragrance*, mineral oils, animal derived ingredients* our new kind & free™ moisturising skin tint is made with 100% vegan & kind to animals ingredients – stuff that’s simply good for you & good for the planet. • moisturises and perfects skin for a fresh, healthy-looking glow. • clean formula gives skin the moisturisation it needs. • infused with an anti oxidant complex with vitamin e, pro vitamin b5 and aloe vera. • made with 77% ingredients of natural origins. • lightweight, dewy finish gives a healthy glow instantly & all-day long hydration. • non-comedogenic, dermatologist tested, suitable for sensitive skin. • packaging made with recycled materials.

how to apply

step 1: squeeze out a pea sized amount and apply to skin with your favourite method: finger tips, brush or sponge. for more coverage simply apply a little more product until you get the desired look.

Description:
our first clean makeup that works, no compromises. 100% vegan & kind to animals. free from fragrance*, mineral oils, animal derived ingredients* our new kind & free™ moisturising skin tint is made with 100% vegan & kind to animals ingredients – stuff that’s simply good for you & good for the planet. • moisturises and perfects skin for a fresh, healthy-looking glow. • clean formula gives skin the moisturisation it needs. • infused with an anti oxidant complex with vitamin e, pro vitamin b5 and aloe vera. • made with 77% ingredients of natural origins. • lightweight, dewy finish gives a healthy glow instantly & all-day long hydration. • non-comedogenic, dermatologist tested, suitable for sensitive skin. • packaging made with recycled materials.

how to apply

step 1: squeeze out a pea sized amount and apply to skin with your favourite method: finger tips, brush or sponge. for more coverage simply apply a little more product until you get the desired look.

Title: Ever matte loose powder
Description:
a loose powder infused with peach milk to mattify and hydrate the complexion.

what it is
ever matte loose powder is perfect for setting and enhancing your make-up for an ultra-natural and matte finish. the powder will set make-up to help it last longer, whilst blurring imperfections. the skin care powered formula contains bamboo powder extract to mattify and peach milk to soften and hydrate. enriched with clarins anti-pollution complex.
skin type: all skin types
texture: powder
benefits
mattifies and evens the complexion
controls shine
ultra-fine and lightweight texture
allows skin to breathe

ingredients
talc. mica. silica. zinc stearate. aqua/water/eau. phenoxyethanol. bambusa arundinacea stem extract. caprylic/capric triglyceride. sodium dehydroacetate. ci 77492/iron oxides. ci 77891/titanium dioxide. tocopheryl acetate. parfum/fragrance. butylene glycol. ci 77491/iron oxides. ci 77499/iron oxides. propylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate. prunus persica (peach) leaf extract. salicornia herbacea extract. tin oxide. prunus persica (peach) fruit extract. hydroxyethyl urea. potassium sorbate. xanthan gum. camellia sinensis leaf extract. algin. acacia senegal gum. lapsana communis flower/leaf/stem extract. [stm3804a/01]
*for informational purposes only. every ingredient list is specific to an individual product reference. all formulas are subject to change. while we endeavor to keep this ingredient list accurate, we cannot guaranty that it is reliable, up-to-date, or error-free. please also refer to the ingredient list on the product's outer packaging for a complete, accurate, and up-to-date list.

Title: Terracotta bronzer powder light
Description:
a fresh and luminous healthy glow in a natural-origin formula
guerlain is offering a reinvented sun-kissed glow with terracotta light, the new natural healthy glow powder.this light powder features a unique blend of sun-kissed tones enhanced with vibrant colours to reveal a radiant, healthy-looking glow for every skin tone.

with 96% naturally-derived ingredients¹, including luminescent shimmer, its texture instantly fuses with skin to provide a fresh and lively healthy glow finish.infused with natural-origin moroccan flower honey, known for its moisturising properties, its formula maintains skin's hydration for long-lasting comfort.

a radiant, luminous and translucent complexion that sports a fresh and natural healthy-looking glow all year long. six harmonies designed to illuminate all skin tones: three intensities - light, medium, deep - each available in two undertones: cool and warm.

¹based on iso 16128 standard, the remaining 4% contribute to product integrity and sensoriality.

a 96% naturally-derived ingredients¹ formula
this new formula offers an ultra-fine second-skin texture that preserves the natural finish of each complexion. a unique combination of naturally-derived luminescent shimmers to bring out the radiance of the complexion all day long.

¹based on iso 16128 standard, the remaining 4% contribute to product integrity and sensoriality.

six harmonies for all skin tones
in each powder case, four shades are encapsulated in terracotta light’s historic compaction with organic impressions that symbolise this natural revolution and pay homage to the earth itself. this pattern perfectly combines a satin bronzing shade, a tone-on-tone matte shade, a vibrant blush shade and a universal luminiser that offers all skin types a beautiful translucent finish. the composition comes in six harmonies to reveal the healthy glow and natural radiance of all skin tones, from the fairest to the darkest. three intensities – light, medium and dark – are each available in two tones: cool and warm.

beautiyfying morrocan flower honey
this unprecedented formula, whose luminescent shimmer naturally brings out the radiance of the complexion, is infused with a touch of flower honey from euphorbia, a moroccan plant, which maintains skin's natural hydration and ensures long-lasting comfort.

ingredients:
• mica
• silica
• lauroyl lysine
• zinc stearate
• bis-behenyl/isostearyl/phytosteryl dimer dilinoleyl dimer dilinoleate
• octyldodecyl stearoyl stearate
• dicaprylyl ether
• dimer dilinoleyl dimer dilinoleate
• kaolin
• parfum (fragrance)
• cellulose
• calcium sodium borosilicate
• caprylyl glycol
• ethylhexylglycerin
• sodium dehydroacetate
• pentylene glycol
• aqua (water)
• butylene glycol
• propanediol
• mel (honey)
• glycerin
• tocopherol
• butyrospermum parkii (shea) seedcake extract
• tin oxide
• [+/- ci 77891 (titanium dioxide)
• ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides)
• ci 77163 (bismuth oxychloride)
• ci 73360 (red 30 lake)]
disclaimer : guerlain product ingredient listings are updated periodically. before using a guerlain product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

Title: Lasting finish compact powder foundation
Description: rimmel london lasting finish compact foundation is a lightweight, soft-touch powder foundation. it controls shine without feeling dry on your face. the fine powder blends seamlessly to provide medium, buildable, natural looking coverage that lasts all day. it comes in a convenient compact container with pressed powder for easy on-the-go make-up refresh. available in a range of 12 shades. • soft touch powder that lasts • fine powder blends seamlessly for a buildable yet lightweight coverage, that lasts all day and control shine without feeling dry • lightweight vegan powder foundation that controls shine without feeling dry • medium buildable coverage, transfer proof, sweat & water resistant, vegan • dermatologist tested, suitable for sensitive skin, will not clog pores, suitable for all skin types

Title: Lasting finish compact powder foundation

Title: Teint idole ultra wear blur and go priming stick
Description:
what it is:
a universal priming stick that instantly blurs the appearance of pores, fine lines, wrinkles and other skin imperfections.

what it does:
a universal priming stick that instantly blurs the appearance of pores, fine lines, wrinkles and other skin imperfections. with just a few swipes, skin is shine-free, matte and smooth and primed for makeup application with a ""barely there"" feel.

how to use:
- apply the product direclty onto the skin and using the fingertips, gently massage until skin feels smooth to the touch
- use alone to control shine, before your foundation as a primer or as a touch-up to lock-in makeup throughout the day

ingredients
dimethicone, cyclohexasiloxane, dimethicone/vinyl dimethicone crosspolymer, ozokerite, trimethylsiloxysilicate, silica, titanium dioxide, c20-40 alkyl stearate, silica silylate, perlite, laureth-4

Title: Teint idole ultra wear highlighting stick
Description:
light up your complexion in a single swipe!
it's lightweight cream-to-powder texture glides comfortably onto your skin.
it is highly concentrated in light-reflecting optics for a second-skin radiance that stays put all day.
this highlighting stick is also super buildable, allowing you to go from a natural radiance to a dramatic glow.

teint idole ultra wear highlighting sticks are suitable for all skin tones.
tested under dermatological control. formula designed for all skin types even sensitive skins.

benefits
• it highlights with light-reflecting optics in a single swipe for the perfect radiant complexion
• it possesses a lightweight cream-to-powder texture
• it offers a buildable, long-lasting radiance
• it is easy to apply with a quick and precise gesture, wherever you go.

how to apply
with teint idole ultra wear highlighting sticks, there are no rules.
apply alone or on top of your lancôme foundation. dab cream contour stick on your cheeckbones for natural radiance.
for an even more dramatic glow, apply some highlighter on your browbone, cupid's bow and down the center of your nose.

ingredients
shade 01: ethylhexyl palmitate â—methyl methacrylate crosspolymer â—hydrogenated polyisobutene â—polyethylene â—phenyl trimethicone â—diisostearyl malate â—nylon-12 â—ethylhexyl hydroxystearate â—ozokerite â—polyvinyl laurate â—butyrospermum parkii butter / shea butter â—propylene carbonate â—caprylyl glycol â—citric acid â—disteardimonium hectorite â—tocopherol â— [+/- may contain / peut contenirci 77163 / bismuth oxychloride â—ci 77491 / iron oxides â—ci 77891 / titanium dioxide â—mica] â— (f.i.l. b248234/1)
shade 02: ethylhexyl palmitate â—methyl methacrylate crosspolymer â—synthetic fluorphlogopite â—hydrogenated polyisobutene â—polyethylene â—phenyl trimethicone â—diisostearyl malate â—nylon-12 â—ozokerite â—polyvinyl laurate â—butyrospermum parkii butter / shea butter â—tin oxide â—propylene carbonate â—caprylyl glycol â—citric acid â—disteardimonium hectorite â—tocopherol â— [+/- may contain / peut contenirci 75470 / carmine â—ci 77491 / iron oxides â—ci 77891 / titanium dioxide â—mica]â— (f.i.l. b248239/1)

what makes the difference
teint idole ultra wear is your ideal highlighter:
• a face illuminator with an extreme long-wear formula that gives lasting radiance
• it possesses an ultra-lightweight powder-cream texture that glides comfortably onto skin
• it features concentrated light-reflecting optics for a second-skin radiance

Title: Parure gold skin brush
Description:
a precise gesture
the kabuki brush perfectly combines the smoothing power of a brush, the seamless-finish power of a sponge and the massaging power of a skincare tool.
due to its very high density, this new brush makes the application technique easier, facilitating a precise yet intuitive approach. its short handle allows the hand to be positioned close to the makeup application area, for greater control.
the result is precise, airy and extremely refined.

the ideal companion for all fluid foundations
its high-quality synthetic, short bristles gently caress the face.

as effective as it is ethical, the brush features a handle in mahogany-coloured satin-finish wood, which bears the fsc wood label and has been responsibly sourced. its gold ferrule embossed with guerlain logo makes it an iconic beauty object.

protected in a velvet pouch, it can be carried everywhere. an invaluable everyday ally, this essential accessory is refined down to the smallest details

Title: Parure gold skin matte
Description:
an unprecedented no-transfer matte finish
the parure gold complexion has embodied the ideal alliance of make-up and skincare for an unmatched youthful glow. boasting an ultra-sensory texture, parure gold skin matte’s formula is 85% rejuvenating skincare-based¹, for a beautified skin, application after application.

no-transfer technology lies at the heart of this new formula offering 24 hours² infallible hold, a luminous matte effect with a velvety feel. a hint of pure 24-karat gold is associated to a duo of white peony extracts in a formula which instantly offers an exceptional complexion, and a more beautiful and luminous skin day after day.

¹percentage of base without pigments and mother-of-pearl.
²instrumental test on 25 caucasian women.
capacity : 35 ml

exceptional high-performance skincare action
85%

rejuvenating skincare-based¹
after four weeks wearing makeup², the complexion is even (+15%), skin texture is refined (+4%) and skin quality is improved (+13%).

¹percentage of base whitout pigments and mother-of-pearl.
²clinical evaluation on 34 asian women.

wear¹ and shade stability²
24h
¹instrumental test on 25 caucasian women. ²clinical evaluation on 25 caucasian women.

hydration¹
24h
¹instrumental test on 32 caucasian women.

comfort¹
24h
¹self-scoring evaluation on 25 caucasian women.

an expanded array of shades
meticulously designed to adapt to all skins, 18 shades from the fairest to the darkest are available for parure gold skin matte.

ingredients
#16947 ingredients:
• aqua (water)
• methyl trimethicone
• isododecane
• alcohol
• synthetic fluorphlogopite
• butylene glycol
• ethylhexyl salicylate
• peg-9 polydimethylsiloxyethyl dimethicone
• glycerin
• acrylates/polytrimethylsiloxymethacrylate copolymer
• silica
• dimethicone
• acrylates/dimethicone copolymer
• titanium dioxide
• disteardimonium hectorite
• cetyl dimethicone
• parfum (fragrance)
• polyglyceryl-10 decaisostearate
• sodium myristoyl glutamate
• alpha-glucan oligosaccharide
• betaine
• propylene carbonate
• chlorphenesin
• polymnia sonchifolia root juice
• paeonia lactiflora root extract
• calcium aluminum borosilicate
• aluminum hydroxide
• maltodextrin
• tromethamine
• alumina
• stearic acid
• tocopherol
• prunus cerasus (bitter cherry) flower extract
• lactobacillus
• paeonia albiflora flower extract
• gold
• tin oxide
• [+/- ci 77891 (titanium dioxide)
• ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides)]
disclaimer : guerlain product ingredient listings are updated periodically. before using a guerlain product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

Title: Parure gold skin matte
Description:
an unprecedented no-transfer matte finish
the parure gold complexion has embodied the ideal alliance of make-up and skincare for an unmatched youthful glow. boasting an ultra-sensory texture, parure gold skin matte’s formula is 85% rejuvenating skincare-based¹, for a beautified skin, application after application.

no-transfer technology lies at the heart of this new formula offering 24 hours² infallible hold, a luminous matte effect with a velvety feel. a hint of pure 24-karat gold is associated to a duo of white peony extracts in a formula which instantly offers an exceptional complexion, and a more beautiful and luminous skin day after day.

¹percentage of base without pigments and mother-of-pearl.
²instrumental test on 25 caucasian women.
capacity : 35 ml

exceptional high-performance skincare action
85%

rejuvenating skincare-based¹
after four weeks wearing makeup², the complexion is even (+15%), skin texture is refined (+4%) and skin quality is improved (+13%).

¹percentage of base whitout pigments and mother-of-pearl.
²clinical evaluation on 34 asian women.

wear¹ and shade stability²
24h
¹instrumental test on 25 caucasian women. ²clinical evaluation on 25 caucasian women.

hydration¹
24h
¹instrumental test on 32 caucasian women.

comfort¹
24h
¹self-scoring evaluation on 25 caucasian women.

an expanded array of shades
meticulously designed to adapt to all skins, 18 shades from the fairest to the darkest are available for parure gold skin matte.

Title: Teint idole ultra wear foundation stick
Description:
long-lasting perfection whenever you need it!
it's silky texture applies seamlessly and blends effortlessly onto skin. complexion looks flawless with this innovative powder-cream makeup foundation that stays up to 24 hours.
a lightweight foundation with a comforting formula that glides smoothly over skin to cover imperfections, resulting in a "second-skin" makeup look and an all day color wear.
new sleek, portable and ultra-expert packaging with a built-in kabuki foundation brush for a precise application, contouring and blending.

use teint idole ultra wear stick foundation as a foundation, concealer or to highlight and contour, with medium to full coverage.

this high coverage foundation is tested under dermatological control, with a formula designed for all skin types (even sensitive skin).

this long-lasting makeup stick can be applied as a foundation, concealer, or to highlight and contour.

how to apply:
this long-lasting makeup stick can be applied as a foundation, concealer, or to highlight and contour.

Title: Touche eclat le teint renovated foundation
Description:
ysl beauty’s best glow foundation, breaking the frontier between makeup and skincare with 24h breathable coverage* and 24h hydration**.

the iconic touche éclat le teint medium-coverage foundation comes in an advanced formula made with hydrating skincare ingredients that provide a healthy natural glow and uncompromised flawless skin from day to night.

infused with marigold bloom & mallow extracts as well as vitamin e derivatives, touche éclat le teint glow foundation leaves a weightless feel and a long-lasting finish for a twenty-four hour natural no-makeup look. now in a modern square glass bottle.

ysl beauty uses the following descriptions in all foundation shade names:

• b or 'beige' is best for neutral undertones
• bd or 'beige doré' is best for warm undertones
• br or 'beige rosé' is best for cool undertones

*consumers test - 102 women
**instrumental test - 24 women
benefits
24h breathable coverage* and hydration**. natural healthy glow. uncompromised flawless skin. available in 30 shades.
type
liquid foundation
keywords
liquid foundation - medium coverage - long lasting - luminous glow

how to apply
after applying touche éclat blur primer, apply your foundation with a brush. for optimal results, start from the center of the face by stretching outwards.

after applying touche éclat blur primer, apply your foundation with a brush. for optimal results, start from the center of the face by stretching outwards.

Title: Touche eclat le teint renovated foundation
Description:
ysl beauty’s best glow foundation, breaking the frontier between makeup and skincare with 24h breathable coverage* and 24h hydration**.

the iconic touche éclat le teint medium-coverage foundation comes in an advanced formula made with hydrating skincare ingredients that provide a healthy natural glow and uncompromised flawless skin from day to night.

infused with marigold bloom & mallow extracts as well as vitamin e derivatives, touche éclat le teint glow foundation leaves a weightless feel and a long-lasting finish for a twenty-four hour natural no-makeup look. now in a modern square glass bottle.

ysl beauty uses the following descriptions in all foundation shade names:

• b or 'beige' is best for neutral undertones
• bd or 'beige doré' is best for warm undertones
• br or 'beige rosé' is best for cool undertones

Title: Instant light complexion base
Description:
this lightweight base gives you a perfect complexion everyday that naturally illuminates and corrects your skin tone for a flawless finish. it also offers hydrating and soothing skin care benefits due to katafray bark extract.

• the new high-lumitec complex brightens the complexion and optically corrects imperfections.

• available in three shades - rose (brightens all complexions), champagne (corrects redness) and peach (restores lustre to medium and matte skin) - leaving a veil of light radiance that evens skin tone, boosts luminosity and restores skin's vitality.

• fast and easy to apply: in just a few seconds, the complexion is naturally luminous and skin recovers its vitality, freshness and suppleness.

Title: Parure gold 24k primer
Description:
true to the magic equation that characterises the parure gold franchise, the parure gold 24k primer, infused with a hint of 24-karat gold, ensures 24-hour² absolute radiance and 24-hour³ hydration. pure radiance booster, parure gold 24k is the promise of beautifully enhanced, flawless make-up and more beautiful skin day after day.

formulated with 98% naturally-derived ingredientsâ´, this perfecting primer boasts an iconic sensory gel texture and guarantees instantly unified skin. imperfections are corrected and skin texture is perfectly smoothed. beautifully enhanced and impeccably prepped with parure gold 24k, skin is like a flawless canvas, ready for make-up, which thus appears in its best light. foundation is easier to apply and its wear is optimised.

¹percentage of base, without pigments and mother-of-pearl. ²instrumental test on 24 caucasian women. ³instrumental test on 33 caucasian women. â´based on iso 16128 standard. the remaining 2% contribute to product integrity and sensoriality.

capacity: 35 ml

Title: Terracotta luminizer
Description:
a resplendent golden complexion in a naturally-derived formula
a true innovation in guerlain's range of face powders, terracotta luminizer shimmering powder, formulated with 96% naturally-derived ingredients¹, reproduces the distinctive, dazzling and sensual light of the golden hour thanks to two shimmering shades, a cool ivory and a warm gold, for a radiant and sensual glow.

natural-origin luminescent shimmer create a subtle golden glow, playing on multidimensional reflections. its light second-skin texture settles like a delicate veil on skin forming a film of ultra-fine shimmer that captures the light to give the complexion a radiant, long-lasting glow.

infused with natural argan oil with moisturising properties, the powder offers long-lasting wear and absolute comfort all day long.

weight : 7 g

¹based on iso 16128 standard. the remaining 4% contribute to product integrity and sensoriality.

a halo of golden light
wearing terracotta luminizer, skin is enhanced with a long-lasting shimmering golden glow.
this new ally for a resplendent complexion offers a natural result thanks to a light, buildable second-skin texture.

a duo of shimmering shades
for spectacular radiance, terracotta luminizer comes in two shades :

cool ivory: a subtle pink champagne shade
warm gold: a shimmering golden shade

each of these two shades features gemtone technology, a self-adaptable pigment that allows terracotta luminizer to adapt to skin’s true tone for a natural finish.

a natural-origin formula infused with argan oil
with 96% naturally-derived ingredients¹, terracotta luminizer’s formula is composed exclusively of shimmer and pigments of natural origin.
it is infused with natural argan oil, ethically sourced in morocco, with moisturising properties to ensure long-lasting wear and absolute comfort.

¹based on iso 16128 standard. the remaining 4% contribute to product integrity and sensoriality.
list of ingredients

#17800 ingredients:
• mica
• caprylic/capric triglyceride
• silica
• alumina
• c13-15 alkane
• coco-caprylate/caprate
• polyglyceryl-3 polyricinoleate
• polyglyceryl-4 caprate
• butylene glycol
• triheptanoin
• glycerin
• c9-12 alkane
• parfum (fragrance)
• dilinoleic acid/butanediol copolymer
• caprylyl glycol
• ethylhexylglycerin
• triethoxycaprylylsilane
• 1,2-hexanediol
• lauroyl lysine
• polyglyceryl-3 diisostearate
• gellan gum
• calcium chloride
• castor oil/ipdi copolymer
• argania spinosa kernel oil
• tocopherol
• [+/- ci 77891 (titanium dioxide)
• ci 77163 (bismuth oxychloride)
• ci 77491, ci 77492 (iron oxides)]
disclaimer : guerlain product ingredient listings are updated periodically. before using a guerlain product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

an iconic fragrance
for generations, the terracotta powders’ legendary fragrance evokes summer with its sunny ylang-ylang and orange blossom notes, warmed by vanilla and tonka bean, on a sensual white musk base. this instantly identifiable cult fragrance is a sensuous one-way ticket to warmth, sun and travel all year round. it combines pure pleasure and desirability.

a naturally radiant complexion
terracotta luminizer shimmering powder can be used over foundation or on bare skin.

dab on the top of the cheekbones, the bridge of the nose and the cupid's bow for a sensual radiant and shimmering make-up look.

apply under the brow bone or as an eyeshadow to subtly illuminate the eyes.
