Title: Terracotta le teint
Description:
flawless complexion
guerlain is defining the contours of a new-generation of complexion with terracotta le teint: a liquid foundation, formulated with 95% naturally-derived ingredients¹. terracotta le teint pairs the lightness and radiance of a powder with the perfection of a foundation. its 24-hour wear² no-transfer formula guarantees a beautiful healthy glow.

this incredibly fine, ultra-light texture foundation offers a barely-there feel. its airy formula fuses with the skin and is incredibly light, delivering perfect tailor-made, ultra-buildable medium to full coverage.

with terracotta le teint, skin is beautifully enhanced and glowing. perfecting powders in the formula instantly create a flawless yet unbelievably natural luminous matte finish. on the high points of the face (cheekbones, bridge of the nose, etc.), light catchers ensure a fresh and luminous complexion – the famous beautiful healthy glow.

¹based on iso 16128 standard. the remaining 5% contribute to product integrity and sensoriality.
²instrumental test and clinical evaluation on 27 women.

35ml

the lightness and radiance of a powder. the 24-hour long-wear, no-transfer perfection of a foundation.
born of guerlain’s powder expertise, terracotta le teint combines the seamless, ultra-sensoral lightness of a powder with the perfecting power of a fluid foundation. its innovative texture incorporates 95% naturally-derived ingredients¹, without compromising on performance, offering 24-hour hold² thanks to a no-transfer formulation.

¹based on iso 16128 standard. the remaining 5% contribute to product integrity and sensoriality.
²instrumental test and clinical evaluation on 27 women.

naturality¹
95%
¹95% naturally-derived ingredients ¹based on iso 16128 standard. the remaining 5% contribute to product integrity and sensoriality.
¹based on iso 16128 standard. the remaining 5% contribute to product integrity and sensoriality.

long-wear138
24h
¹instrumental test and clinical evaluation on 27 women.

maintains skin’s hydration138
24h
¹instrumental test on 31 volunteers.

a tailor-made result for all skin tones
terracotta le teint comes in a wide array of 30 shades: 16 intensities and three undertones (neutral, cool, warm), covering the entire complexion spectrum.

its exceptional formula contains self-adaptable shimmer – gemtone, which allows it to adjust to all skin tones.

a naturally-derived formula infused with argan oil
the newest signature of the terracotta line feels like a second-skin, with 95% naturally-derived ingredients¹. infused with argan oil, it delivers lasting comfort and maintains skin’s hydration for 24 hours².

remaining faithful to the house commitments, guerlain has opted to source this natural argan oil from morocco via the targanine network of cooperatives which was created over 15 years ago. this network participates in safeguarding local resources from moroccan land and creating stable employment in rural areas.

¹based on iso 16128 standard. the remaining 5% contribute to product integrity and sensoriality.
²instrumental test on 31 volunteers.

list of ingredients

#17782 ingredients:
• aqua (water)
• c9-12 alkane
• alcohol
• undecane
• silica
• propanediol
• polyglyceryl-2 dipolyhydroxystearate
• glycerin
• tridecane
• disteardimonium hectorite
• coco-caprylate/caprate
• dicaprylyl ether
• polyglyceryl-3 diisostearate
• trimethylsiloxysilicate
• barium sulfate
• vinyl dimethicone/lauryl dimethicone crosspolymer
• brassica campestris (rapeseed) seed oil
• sodium myristoyl glutamate
• propylene carbonate
• parfum (fragrance)
• lecithin
• caprylic/capric triglyceride
• opuntia ficus-indica flower extract
• polyhydroxystearic acid
• sodium benzoate
• sodium citrate
• camelina sativa seed oil
• aluminum hydroxide
• citric acid
• isostearic acid
• polyglyceryl-3 polyricinoleate
• mica
• argania spinosa kernel oil
• palmitic acid
• tocopherol
• magnesium hydroxide
• [+/- ci 77891 (titanium dioxide)
• ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides)
• ci 77163 (bismuth oxychloride)]
disclaimer : guerlain product ingredient listings are updated periodically. before using a guerlain product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

the terracotta aesthetic in a bottle
terracotta le teint boasts a brand new bottle, inspired by the iconic codes of terracotta powders.

these are seen in its brown cap set off with a fine golden ring, the sheer finish offering a glimpse of the house’s signature double g. the delicately frosted clear glass bottle in rounded lines evokes the lightness of the terracotta powder and offers an organic, intuitive grip for an elegant gesture.

a word from violette, guerlain creative director of makeup
"seamlessly fusing with skin, terracotta le teint creates an incredibly natural, luminous matte complexion… a real outdoor healthy glow! with its formula based on naturally-derived pigments and argan oil, it combines a powder’s level of precision with the fluidity of a liquid foundation.”
violette,
guerlain creative director of make-up

a precise gesturea

new application ritual has appeared thanks to the kabuki brush¹ created by guerlain to apply its foundations. with its short synthetic bristles, it perfectly combines the smoothing power of a brush, the seamless-finish power of a sponge and the massaging power of a skincare tool.

simply apply the foundation directly to the brush, then blend in circular motions from the centre of the face outwards to apply.

the result is precise, airy and extremely refined.

terracotta le teint comes in a wide array of 30 shades: 16 intensities and three undertones (neutral, cool, warm), covering the entire complexion spectrum.

its exceptional formula contains self-adaptable shimmer – gemtone, which allows it to adjust to all skin tones.

a naturally-derived formula infused with argan oil
the newest signature of the terracotta line feels like a second-skin, with 95% naturally-derived ingredients¹. infused with argan oil, it delivers lasting comfort and maintains skin’s hydration for 24 hours².

remaining faithful to the house commitments, guerlain has opted to source this natural argan oil from morocco via the targanine network of cooperatives which was created over 15 years ago. this network participates in safeguarding local resources from moroccan land and creating stable employment in rural areas.

¹based on iso 16128 standard. the remaining 5% contribute to product integrity and sensoriality.
²instrumental test on 31 volunteers.

the terracotta aesthetic in a bottle
terracotta le teint boasts a brand new bottle, inspired by the iconic codes of terracotta powders.

these are seen in its brown cap set off with a fine golden ring, the sheer finish offering a glimpse of the house’s signature double g. the delicately frosted clear glass bottle in rounded lines evokes the lightness of the terracotta powder and offers an organic, intuitive grip for an elegant gesture.

a word from violette, guerlain creative director of makeup
"seamlessly fusing with skin, terracotta le teint creates an incredibly natural, luminous matte complexion… a real outdoor healthy glow! with its formula based on naturally-derived pigments and argan oil, it combines a powder’s level of precision with the fluidity of a liquid foundation.”
violette,
guerlain creative director of make-up

a precise gesturea

new application ritual has appeared thanks to the kabuki brush¹ created by guerlain to apply its foundations. with its short synthetic bristles, it perfectly combines the smoothing power of a brush, the seamless-finish power of a sponge and the massaging power of a skincare tool.

simply apply the foundation directly to the brush, then blend in circular motions from the centre of the face outwards to apply.

the result is precise, airy and extremely refined.

guerlain creative director of make-up

a precise gesturea

new application ritual has appeared thanks to the kabuki brush¹ created by guerlain to apply its foundations. with its short synthetic bristles, it perfectly combines the smoothing power of a brush, the seamless-finish power of a sponge and the massaging power of a skincare tool.

simply apply the foundation directly to the brush, then blend in circular motions from the centre of the face outwards to apply.

the result is precise, airy and extremely refined.

this incredibly fine, ultra-light texture foundation offers a barely-there feel. its airy formula fuses with the skin and is incredibly light, delivering perfect tailor-made, ultra-buildable medium to full coverage.

remaining faithful to the house commitments, guerlain has opted to source this natural argan oil from morocco via the targanine network of cooperatives which was created over 15 years ago. this network participates in safeguarding local resources from moroccan land and creating stable employment in rural areas.

¹based on iso 16128 standard. the remaining 5% contribute to product integrity and sensoriality.
²instrumental test on 31 volunteers.

the terracotta aesthetic in a bottle
terracotta le teint boasts a brand new bottle, inspired by the iconic codes of terracotta powders.

these are seen in its brown cap set off with a fine golden ring, the sheer finish offering a glimpse of the house’s signature double g. the delicately frosted clear glass bottle in rounded lines evokes the lightness of the terracotta powder and offers an organic, intuitive grip for an elegant gesture.

a word from violette, guerlain creative director of makeup
"seamlessly fusing with skin, terracotta le teint creates an incredibly natural, luminous matte complexion… a real outdoor healthy glow! with its formula based on naturally-derived pigments and argan oil, it combines a powder’s level of precision with the fluidity of a liquid foundation.”
violette,
guerlain creative director of make-up

a precise gesturea

new application ritual has appeared thanks to the kabuki brush¹ created by guerlain to apply its foundations. with its short synthetic bristles, it perfectly combines the smoothing power of a brush, the seamless-finish power of a sponge and the massaging power of a skincare tool.

simply apply the foundation directly to the brush, then blend in circular motions from the centre of the face outwards to apply.

the result is precise, airy and extremely refined.

Description:
flawless complexion
guerlain is defining the contours of a new-generation of complexion with terracotta le teint: a liquid foundation, formulated with 95% naturally-derived ingredients¹. terracotta le teint pairs the lightness and radiance of a powder with the perfection of a foundation. its 24-hour wear² no-transfer formula guarantees a beautiful healthy glow.

this incredibly fine, ultra-light texture foundation offers a barely-there feel. its airy formula fuses with the skin and is incredibly light, delivering perfect tailor-made, ultra-buildable medium to full coverage.

with terracotta le teint, skin is beautifully enhanced and glowing. perfecting powders in the formula instantly create a flawless yet unbelievably natural luminous matte finish. on the high points of the face (cheekbones, bridge of the nose, etc.), light catchers ensure a fresh and luminous complexion – the famous beautiful healthy glow.

simply apply the foundation directly to the brush, then blend in circular motions from the centre of the face outwards to apply.

the result is precise, airy and extremely refined.

Title: Kabuki brush foundation
Description:
a precise gesture
the kabuki brush perfectly combines the smoothing power of a brush, the seamless-finish power of a sponge and the massaging power of a skincare tool.
due to its very high density, this new brush makes the application technique easier, facilitating a precise yet intuitive approach. its short handle allows the hand to be positioned close to the makeup application area, for greater control.
the result is precise, airy and extremely refined.

the ideal companion for all fluid foundations
its high-quality synthetic, short bristles gently caress the face.

as effective as it is ethical, the brush features a handle in mahogany-coloured satin-finish wood, which bears the fsc wood label and has been responsibly sourced. its gold ferrule embossed with guerlain logo makes it an iconic beauty object.

protected in a velvet pouch, it can be carried everywhere. an invaluable everyday ally, this essential accessory is refined down to the smallest details.

Title: Teint idole ultra wear care & glow
Description:
beyond longwear,
we stand for care
care and glow features our neo-glow foundation technology that gives your complexion
a supercharged healthy glow makeup result. fresh for 24h this medium coverage, buildable glow foundation that highlights your features and catches the light naturally. 

complimented by 82% glow boosting skincare serum, this foundation is powered by hydrating hyaluronic acid and smoothing mandelic acid for a natural healthy skin glow.
 

- longwear healthy glow
- medium buildable coverage
- no transfer. no fading. no settling in fine lines
- 82% glow-boosting serum base
- powered by hyaluronic acid & mandelic acid


what makes the difference
all-day hydration and true radiance activated by an 82% glow boosting skincare serum base with hydrating hyaluronic acid and smoothing mandelic acid.

day after day skin is brighter, smoother and clearer: 90% say their bare skin feels improved, 85% say skin looks more radiant, 89% say skin looks smoother, 90% say skin tone is more even*

*after consumer test on 99 women.


what else you need to know
teint idole ultra wear care & glow foundation provides a glow that stands up to anything: it stays fresh all day without transferring, fading or settling in fine lines.


made for all skin types. non comedogenic. spf 25.

Title: Mava dry spray
Description:
dry faster, prevents smearing and gives a high lustre. developed by mavala switzerland.

dries nail polish to a touch-dry surface in seconds and enhances color
a clever blending of resins, solvents and plastifiers
provides a protecting sheen
protects nail polish and prevents it from chipping
essential product for today’s busy woman

Title: Oil seal dryer
Description: this oil has the property of accelerating the drying time of your manicure. it is ideal for dry skin and cuticles, as, at the same time, it nourishes cuticles and softens them. in one application, this product makes nail polish touch dry in seconds and takes care of the nail contour

Title: Teint idole ultra wear foundation
Description:
new and improved teint idole ultra wear foundation. now enriched with skincare and with a reinvented shade range – 45 shades for all.
- up to 24h longwear
- natural matte finish
- undetectable buildable full coverage
- ultra thin, ultra breathable
- sweat and humidity proof
- for all skin types, tones & ages
- tested on all skin concerns and suitable for sensitive skin

what makes it different
a renovated formula suitable for all skin types, tones and ages. from dry, sensitive, and acne prone skin.
seamlessly covers imperfections with buildable full coverage in a natural matte finish.
with advanced airwear technology for an ultra thin, ultra breathable formula that is comfortable all day long.
concentrated with 81% skincare serum including hyaluronic acid, vitamin e and moringa. 9/10 women said skin felt moisturised and comfortable when wearing*.
reinvented shade range with 45 new and improved shades for all. try our shade finder to identify your perfect match.

*based on a consumer test with 215 people
what else you need to know
ultra thin, ultra breathable long wear, in buildable full coverage without drying, or creasing. spf 35.
with a smooth and easily blendable texture, that leaves the skin perfectly smooth, just a flawless natural matte finish and reduces shine.

how to apply
discover tips for a flawless application, every time.
1. add one pump of foundation to your sponge.
2. swipe over cheeks, forehead, chin and nose.
3. use the sponge to blend the foundation with light dabbing movements.

Title: Pressed serum primer

Title: Parure gold skin controle
Description:
a flawless, radiant and controlled matte complexion

parure gold skin control is a compact foundation that perfectly blends makeup and skincare, incorporating the two pillars of the parure gold skin foundation formulation into its ultra-fine texture: a hint of 24-karat gold teamed with a duo of white peony extracts.

its formula ensures 24-hour wear¹ and 24-hour comfort². thanks to an extreme, infallible and no-transfer hold, the complexion is under control: it is impeccably matte and perfectly blurred throughout the day, with no mask effect or cakiness. an exceptional make-up result, which in no way compromises the skincare properties of the formula.

the veil of exquisitely soft matte powder feels like skincare on application and fuses perfectly with the skin to make it more beautiful, smoother, visibly plumper, and more radiant. perfectly unified, the skin appears revitalised and regains the radiance of youth.

¹clinical evaluation and instrumental test on 26 caucasian women.
²self-scoring evaluation on 26 caucasian women.

Title: Fix make up hydrates refreshes soothes
Description:
what it is

a light and refreshing mist that sets make-up for a longer-lasting hold. enriched with aloe vera and allantoin, it instantly hydrates and soothes the skin. grapefruit extract and the inclusion of organic rose water provides a continuous sense of wellbeing. contains clarins anti-pollution complex to help protect your skin against exposure to urban pollution.

Title: Tint oleo serum
Description:
what it is

a clarins skincare innovation, inspired by a unique expertise in plant oils. formulated with 98% natural ingredients and 80% skincare formula, it is the perfect combination of flawless complexion and effective skincare. our first tinted skincare serum combines unique mineral pigments with the power of nourishing dry plant oils: hazelnut oil and organic jojoba oil. the addition of plant-derived squalane provides comfort and sensoriality, while the addition of ceramides strengthens the skin's barrier function and protects it from dehydration. its fluid texture is easy to apply and melts into the skin: your complexion is left glowing*, naturally radiant, without shine. what's even more amazing is that you will find that the quality of your natural skin improves over time, becoming more supple and luminous. tinted oleo serum is suitable for all skin types, even the driest, and adapts to all skin tones with 11 shades, from lightest to darkest.

  • skin type: dry, normal

benefits

  • instantly brightens the complexion.

  • take care of your skin every day.

  • deeply nourishes.

  • helps to prevent skin dehydration.

Title: Lasting finishing 35 hour foundation
Description:
get unbeatable hydration and up to 35hr wear with rimmel london lasting finish 35 hour foundation, rimmel's most hydrating long-wear foundation. this full-coverage rimmel foundation has a natural-looking finish and is clinically proven to improve skin radiance. a clean foundation (d5-free) with a cruelty-free and vegan formula. • a full-coverage • up to 35hour wear • breathable formula • clinically proven to improve skin radiance • cruelty-free and vegan • infused with hyaluronic acid, vitamin e • 2% niacinamide • spf20 • sleep-proof • waterproof • crease-resistant • transfer-resistant

how to apply

apply this rimmel lasting finish 35 hour foundation with a foundation brush, sponge or fingertips to blend into the skin for unbeatable wear and coverage.

get unbeatable hydration and up to 35hr wear with rimmel london lasting finish 35 hour foundation, rimmel's most hydrating long-wear foundation. this full-coverage rimmel foundation has a natural-looking finish and is clinically proven to improve skin radiance. a clean foundation (d5-free) with a cruelty-free and vegan formula. • a full-coverage • up to 35hour wear • breathable formula • clinically proven to improve skin radiance • cruelty-free and vegan • infused with hyaluronic acid, vitamin e • 2% niacinamide • spf20 • sleep-proof • waterproof • crease-resistant • transfer-resistant

how to apply

apply this rimmel lasting finish 35 hour foundation with a foundation brush, sponge or fingertips to blend into the skin for unbeatable wear and coverage.

Title: Kind & free tinted multi stick
Description:
get instant hydrating buildable color in a rush with rimmel london kind & free multi stick. use it as a cream blush on your cheeks or as a lipstick on your lips. this cruelty-freeâ€‹, clean and vegan lip and blush stick is formulated without perfume and mineral oils. • buildable rich color for use on lips and cheeks. • instantly hydrating formula that glides on easily and smoothly. • nourishing formula infused with skin-loving ingredients to leave skin and lips hydrated. • formulated without perfume and mineral oils. • cruelty-free and vegan formula.

how to apply

step 1: apply on lips as a lipstick and/or cheeks as a cream blush and blend out using fingertips.

step 2: use alone or underneath your base to give skin a glow.

step 3: layer up to build color.

Title: Nail care 7 in 1 multi benefit base & top coat
Description:
protect your nails and your nail polish color with the rimmel london nail care multi benefit 7 in 1 base & top coat.

•the calcium-containing formula of this shiny rimmel nail care is quick-drying, so that the nails get a smooth, hard finish

•top and base coat that fills cracks and smoothes grooves and imperfections: the perfect base layer for your rimmel nail polish

•nail care with an immediate nail protective effect

• makes your nails look healthier and more beautiful

•a nail strengthener that makes your nails stronger. quick-drying, base coat, glossy top layer, color protective effect, nail strengthener, fills nail grooves, brightening effect.|give your nails the ultimate boost with this 7-in-1 rimmel nail care.|beautifully cared for and healthy nails in no time!|this nail care is enriched with nail care ingredients and is the ideal addition to your rimmel nail polish.|this nail care protects your nails and perfects your nail polish color.

Title: Multitasker better than filters primer
Description:
rimmel multi-tasker better than filters 3 in 1 primer, highlighter + glow booster. wear it your way, for the ultimate skin glow available in 8 skin-adapting shades. say goodbye to social media filters!

• filters face primer alone,

• mixed, underneath, or above your base!

• lightweight, blendable formula is infused with skin-loving ingredients like natural biopeptides and vitamin c,

• anti-ageing and antioxidant benefits in just 4 weeks!

• light-reflecting pigments give the skin a perfectly lit and smooth glow,

• available in 8 skin-adapting shades,

• cruelty-free,

• vegan.

how to apply

wear alone for a healthy, natural glow, wear under makeup as a tinted, glowy primer, mix with your favourite skincare or foundation for a more radiant finish or wear over your base as highlighter.

Title: All hours hyper finish powder
Description:
all hours hyper finish powder, the new couture multi-use matte powder –mattify and set complexion for 24h*.

 

powered by skincare actives and infused with 90% natural-origin ingredients, all hours hyper finish blurs imperfections and minimizes appearance of pores, while smoothing skin.

 

•hyaluronic acid known for keeping skin comfortable and smooth.

•niacinamide known for skin enhancing benefits.

•limetta from ysl beauty ourika community garden known for non-drying properties.

fully blendable and breathable thanks to its finely milled texture, hyper finish ensures a seamless application, whether it is layered onto foundation or glided on a bare skin.

 

hyper versatile, this multi-use matte powder is perfect to :

•set foundation all day

•mattify complexion with a soft-touch finish

•wear alone to enhance a bare-skin look and give a healthy skin finish

 

makeup is locked and color true, never feeling cakey or creasy.

 

available in 11 skin-adaptable shades

non-comedogenic - sweat proof – water proof – crease proof – stress proof

 

*consumer test on 100 women, 60 in china

 

results/finish/effect

soft matte finish

 

how to apply:

1. set foundation softly blend all over to lock your look.

2. matify complexion apply on t-zone to sweep out shine.

3. enhance bare skin look apply all over on a moisturized skin for naturally healthy complexion

 

ingredients:

all hours hyper finish

talc • silica • perlite • caprylic/capric triglyceride • octyldodecyl stearoyl stearate • boron nitride • magnesium stearate • caprylyl glycol • parfum / fragrance • niacinamide • sodium hyaluronate • citrus limon peel extract / lemon peel extract • [+/- may contain / peut contenir ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 / iron oxides • ci 77891 / titanium dioxide •]

Title: Teint idole ultra wear highlighting
Description:
c.e. skin transforming highlighter

teint idole ultra wear c.e. skin transforming highlighter—our new 24h serum-infused highlighter delivering a radiant, multidimensional glow. enriched with a blend of vitamin c derivative, vitamin e, moringa oil, and pomegranate peel extract for a formula that fuses with your skin. combined with micro-light-catching pearls, ensuring a radiant 24h buildable wear. extend your beauty routine with this luminous, thin, and breathable texture providing a natural glow and feel on the skin. developed in collaboration with lisa eldridge, discover your perfect match among three radiant shades.

what makes it different

? radiant and multi-dimensional glow, with micro-light-catching pearls.

? achieve a seamlessly buildable, skin-fusing glow with a 24-hour wear texture.

? skincare ingredients infused formula is enriched with vitamin c derivative, vitamin e, moringa oil, and pomegranate peel extract.

Title: Teint idole ultra wear bronzer
Description:
c.e. skin transforming bronzer

teint idole ultra wear c.e. skin transforming bronzer is a groundbreaking 24-hour serum-infused bronzer that achieves instant sun-kissed skin through a fusion of innovation, technology, and skincarefor complexion perfection. the formula boasts a sensational, breathable, and blendable texture enriched with vitamin c dertivative, vitamin e and moringa oil, providing a natural bronze that lasts up to 24 hours.

? buildable color result for instant sun-kissed skin & natural matte finish

? skin-fusing color & texture that wears up to 24h

? skincare ingredients infused formula for skin that looks awakened

what makes it different

transform your complexion with this skin-fusing bronzer featuring a revolutionary texture that seamlessly blends with your skin. infused with vitamin c derivative and vitamin e, it not only gives an instant instant sun-kissed matte finish but also nourishes and awakens your skin. achieve your desired intensity with its buildable formula, offering up to 24 hours of flawless wear. developed in collaboration with the renowned makeup expert lisa eldridge, discover the perfect match from our selection of 7 expertly curated shades for effortlessly awakened skin.

Title: Atx matt chrome
Description:
streamlined from integrated clip to tapered tip, atx delivers singular contemporary style in a chic, ergonomic package.
a delicate balance of design ingenuity and practical sensibility that's often imitated, never duplicated.
the two most popular of all writing instrument colors, black and chrome, combine to create an exciting look.

Title: Century lustrous chrome
Description:
• an icon of american design and innovation. the choice of movers, shakers and ground breakers since 1946. does form follow function? or does function drive form? whatever your point of view, classic century delivers. its sleek profile and patented twist-action barrel sparked a design revolution. generations later passionate fans remain loyal to the iconic silhouette, while trendsetters appreciate its authenticity. cool comes full circle.
  • the iconic slim silhouette shines brightly in a polished chrome-plated finish. subtle incised line pattern chrome-plated appointments
  • lifetime mechanical guarantee
  • premium gift box
  • lenght: 133 mm
  • width: 7,6 mm
  • patented twist-action propel/repel feature
  • specially formulated cross ink flows flawlessly for a superior writing experience
  • includes 1 black medium ballpoint refill (#8513) in pen
  • extra refills available in additional widths and colors

Title: Century ii lustrous chrome ballpens
Description:
• the legend continues. embracing both tradition and evolution—the iconic cross profile takes a broader point of view.
    created with a keen appreciation for modernist design and lasting value, century ii offers a bolder look and wider girth than the original classic century. saturated with color or finessed with fine metal, it's everything we're famous for, only 'bigger'.
  • decidedly modern, in mirror-finished chrome with black conical top
  • lifetime mechanical guarantee
  • premium gift box
  • lenght: 137 mm
  • width: 10 mm
  • patented twist-action propel/repel feature
  • specially formulated cross ink flows flawlessly for a superior writing experience

Title: Frankovery satin chrome
Description: designed to make a great impression, the greenwich collection by franklincovey is contemporary, modern and perfect for jotting down notes in a business meeting or giving as gift for a special occasion. this greenwich ballpoint with matte chrome body and lustrous chrome trims is perfect for engraving meaning it can be personalised with the recipients name or even the name of your business.

Title: Century ii royal blue
Description: cross century ii is a high-quality pen made of brass with a shimmering lacquered blue finish. it is combined with chrome accessories. this classic collection is a variation of the classic century line - it has a wider body, one ring on the lid and a typical conical top. the cross brand is one of the oldest manufacturers of writing instruments, the company was founded in 1846. lifetime warranty on mechanical parts premium gift package length: 135 mm width: 10 mm in package 1 one black refill (# 8513) resp.

Title: Cross x crimson red
Description: live large with the bold new cross x series, the pen that tells the world you mean business. this capless rollerball pen has a modern finish, and features a powerful, wide stance with strong lines, and the iconic cross conical top. it springs into action on demand via a dynamic patented snap-open, snap-shut slide writing mechanism that extends the pen when you’re ready to put ideas to paper.

Title: Cross x cobalt blue
Description: live large with the bold new cross x series, the pen that tells the world you mean business. this capless rollerball pen has a modern finish, and features a powerful, wide stance with strong lines, and the iconic cross conical top. it springs into action on demand via a dynamic patented snap-open, snap-shut slide writing mechanism that extends the pen when you’re ready to put ideas to paper.

Title: Marvel 2 spider man

Title: Marvel 2 hulk
Description: cross has partnered with marvel on this officially licensed cross x marvel writing instrument. its big, bold design reflects the strength and sheer size of the incredible hulk. this cap less gel pen features a powerful wide stance with strong lines and authentic character details. it springs into action on demand via a dynamic snap open and snap shut mechanism. cross x marvel hulk makes an epic gift for fans of this iconic super hero. it is presented in a premium gift box with a hulk themed sleeve. like all cross pens, it comes with a lifetime mechanical guarantee.

Title: Marvel 2 thor rolling
Description: cross has partnered with marvel on this officially licensed cross x marvel writing instrument. its big, bold design reflects the godly strength and charisma of thorn. this cap less gel pen features a powerful wide stance with strong lines and authentic character details. it springs into action on demand via a dynamic snap open and snap shut mechanism. cross x marvel thorn makes an epic gift for fans of this iconic super hero. it is presented in a premium gift box with a thorn themed sleeve. like all cross pens, it comes with a lifetime mechanical guarantee.

Title: Men's gallery
Description:
with its pattern-embellished, black dial; polished, silver-tone case; and unadorned, black, natural leather strap, our ultra-thin gallery watch has mastered the art of elegance. this timepiece showcases a subtle yet sophisticated 40mm case size, while its 2-hand movement omits a ticking second-hand, creating a clean, streamlined aesthetic. like some of the world?s finest examples of modern art, this piece breaks with tradition by exploring new and unexpected elements of design. in the spirit of experimentation, dimensional hour and minute markers appear on the outer ring of this showstopper, which?when displayed on the wrist?will empower you to challenge the existing notion of art on your terms.

Title: Legacy
Description:
we have looked to our past, and we?re paying homage to our original watch collection by using the waterbury watch company logo on the dial, crown, and second hand, which bears the stylized w. each watch displays our attention to craftsmanship and detail, with finely finished surfaces and careful applications of watchmaking ingenuity. special details came into play with our waterbury day-date, including a sunray finished blue dial and sturdy, stainless-steel bracelet. it's a watch has all the makings of a timepiece you?ll keep on your wrist for years to come.

Title: Toccata
Description:
toccata ladies classic steel quartz watch, 29mm
stainless steel, white dial, black roman numerals

this toccata ladies classic steel quartz watch has a traditional character. the white dial offers black roman numerals and a date function at 3 o’clock. the uncluttered beauty of this toccata watch is timeless.

refined design and timeless materials: toccata will impress women on whom time holds no dominion. this elegant and timeless collection celebrates the artistic and musical spirit behind the brand’s dna. following in the footsteps of the great composers, toccata promotes raymond weil’s swiss horology while respecting the tradition and heritage handed down from generation to generation within the family company.

Title: Gc coussin shape lady
Description:
revamp your style, with gc coussin shape and its square case.rose gold sophistication, and dazzling crystals give this timepiece an elegant and daring allure.the charismatic case is holding a day-date swiss movement that is visible on the dial within a window at 3 o’clock. it is encircled with crystals and have screw design details on the bezel.the two-tone silver & rose gold version has a grey mother of pearl dial with rose gold hands.this timepiece is comfortable to wear, thanks to the multi-links bracelet.

Description:
don’t resist the charm of the gc fusion the slim 34mm case for the large version makes the gc fusion and its new iconic t-bar attachment the new gc watches effigy.the bezel is encircled with a ring of crystals. the white elegant mother of pearl dial is set with crystals on the indices and roman numbers at 3, 6, 9 and 12 o’clock, perfectly matching the two-tone rose gold & silver bracelet.

• product details

this finn world watch box set provides you the choice between a stainless steel bracelet or a comfortable silicone strap enriched with an embossed logo. it features a 44 mm case, a top ring complete with a signature flag at the 12 mark, and numbers at quarters highlighting the dial.

  • 40% low lead brass, 40% stainless steel, 20% silicone

  • 44 mm case with mineral glass crystal.

  • 22x20 mm bracelet and strap fits up to 8 in. wrist circumference. embossed j-class logo.

  • deployment folding clasp closure.

  • water-resistant up to 50m (165 ft).
